The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 123 - 101 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday . This was a lopsided matchup on paper and that proved to be true on the court as well . The second half was particularly lopsided , with Golden_State leading by at least 20 points for the final 16 minutes . Rebounding was the biggest factor for the Warriors , as they won that battle , 53 - 34 . They were also very efficient , recording 36 assists on 51 percent shooting , while committing just nine turnovers . Free-throw shooting was a factor as well , with Golden_State hitting 15 - of - 16 and New_Orleans going just 12 - of - 19 . The Pelicans ( 33 - 47 ) played this game without Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins , as they had very little to compete with the best team in the league . Alexis Ajinca got the start at center and led the starters with 17 points and six rebounds . Jrue Holiday accrued 10 points , six rebounds and 10 assists . Jordan Crawford and Quinn Cook played well off the bench , combining for 43 points on 18 - of - 29 from the field . On deck for New_Orleans is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday . The Warriors ( 66 - 14 ) have secured the top - spot in the west and wins like this show just how motivated they are . Kevin Durant made his return from a knee injury to accrue 16 points , 10 rebounds and six assists . Klay Thompson led the team , as he scored 20 points to add to his three rebounds and two assists . Ian Clark and Andre Iguodala were huge off the bench , as Clark provided 17 points , four rebounds and three assists , with Iguodala tallying 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Warriors will host the Utah Jazz for their next game on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New_York Knicks , 119 - 112 , at Verizon Center on Thursday . The Wizards ' ( 3 - 8 ) offense received a notable boost with the return of Bradley Beal , who 'd missed three games with a hamstring injury . The talented two - guard posted 18 points , five assists and two rebounds over 29 minutes , knocking down half of his six three - point attempts in the process . The remainder of the starting five made sizable contributions as well , with three other players also hitting double digits in the scoring column . The reserves were solid as well , totaling 33 points , and the Wizards shot a stellar 54 percent from the field overall and 60 percent from three - point range . The Knicks ( 5 - 7 ) saw Derrick Rose lead the way with a game - high 27 points , which he complemented with four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Carmelo Anthony managed 19 points , three rebounds , three assists and a steal . Kristaps Porzingis supplied 16 points , seven boards , two assists and four steals . Brandon Jennings was outstanding off the bench over 24 minutes , posting a 17 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included five rebounds and a steal . John Wall paced the Wizards with a 23 - point , 11 - assist double - double that he rounded out with two rebounds and a steal . Otto Porter continued his recent stretch of strong play with 21 points , eight rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Marcin Gortat was solid down low , registering 16 points , eight rebounds , an assist and a block . Markieff Morris was the only Washington player not to tally double - digit scoring , but he did generate a full stat line of eight points , eight boards , two assists and a steal . Marcus Thornton paced the reserves with 13 points , two rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Knicks return home to face the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday , while the Wizards face off with the Miami Heat at home on Saturday night .
The visiting San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Washington Wizards , 112 - 100 , at Verizon Center on Saturday . LaMarcus Aldridge had seen a string of three consecutive 20 - point efforts come to an end on Friday night versus the Celtics , when he 'd mustered a modest 10 points on 4 - of - 12 shooting . However , his resurgent effort Saturday helped keep the Spurs ( 14 - 3 ) perfect on the road , as he paced the team with 24 points , seven rebounds and a steal . His performance spearheaded a 53 percent tally from the field overall for San_Antonio , which helped overcome a strong night from the Wizards ' starting five . Tony Parker served as Aldridge 's wing man on the night , as he posted 20 points , three assists and a rebound . Kawhi Leonard was right behind him with 19 points , five assists , a rebound and three steals . Pau Gasol had a redemptive showing of his own , as he supplied eight points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a steal after going scoreless over 17 minutes against the Celtics on Friday . Jonathan Simmons led the bench with 15 points , four assists , a rebound , two steals and a block , while Patty Mills finished with 13 points , four assists and three rebounds in a reserve role as well . The Wizards ( 5 - 10 ) saw all members of the starting five reach double figures in the scoring column . Bradley Beal led the way with 25 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . John Wall was next with 21 points , five assists , three rebounds and a steal . Otto Porter contributed 14 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Markieff Morris checked in with a 12 - point effort , while Marcin Gortat rounded things out with a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . The Spurs return home to face the Orlando Magic on Tuesday , while the Wizards face the Sacramento Kings on Monday evening in the Nation 's Capital .
DeMarcus Cousins exploded for a massive 36 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , two steals and a block , but it was n't enough to overcome a similarly impressive 31 - point outing from Bradley Beal that included 12 - of - 24 and 4 - of - 7 tallies from the field and three - point range , respectively . John Wall registered a 19 - point , 11 - assist double - double while also hauling in eight rebounds , but he committed a game - high 11 turnovers . Otto Porter and Marcin Gortat combined for 25 points and 15 rebounds , while Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the bench with a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Rudy Gay was next behind Cousins with 18 points but the rest of the starting five fell short on the stat sheet , as Darren Collison , Arron Afflalo and Kosta Koufos combining for just 13 points . Ty Lawson led the bench with a 12 - point effort .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 109 - 106 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The back - and - forth tussle between two relatively evenly - matched teams was undecided until the closing seconds , as both teams made respective strong pushes in the second half . The Hornets ( 14 - 12 ) had built a 54 - 49 lead by halftime , but the Wizards ( 10 - 14 ) stormed back in the third , winning the period by a 38 - 23 margin . Charlotte had their own resurgence in the final quarter , outscoring their hosts by 29 - 22 but still falling short , with a John Wall free throw in the waning seconds providing the final margin of victory . Both clubs saw their starting fives post very productive nights , with each team shooting over 51 percent overall . The Hornets were led by Nicolas Batum , who tallied 20 points , eight assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block . Cody Zeller enjoyed a strong night at center , collecting 18 points , two rebounds , an assist and a pair of blocks . Kemba Walker came within a shade of a double - double with 17 points , nine assists and six rebounds . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist contributed 11 points , three rebounds , a steal and a block . Marco Belinelli led the second unit with 16 points , a rebound and an assist , and Frank Kaminsky also contributed 10 points in a reserve role . The Wizards received a 25 - point , 10 - assist double - double from John Wall that also included six rebounds and an outstanding seven steals , although he also turned the ball over eight times himself . Backcourt mate Bradley Beal was close behind with 20 points , nine assists and four rebounds . Marcin Gortat turned in a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also featured two assists , two steals and a block . Kelly Oubre , Jr. supplied 15 points , six rebounds , an assist and two steals while drawing a start for the ailing Markieff Morris ( foot ) , while Otto Porter totaled 10 points , five rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal . Jason Smith came off the bench to produce 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three steals in just 18 minutes . The Hornets continue on the road and face the Celtics in Boston on Friday night , while the Wizards remain home and await the Detroit Pistons for a showdown on Friday evening .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 117 - 110 , at Verizon Center on Sunday . The contest was a battle of two surging squads , with the Clippers ( 20 - 8 ) having checked in to Sunday on a four - game win streak , and the Wizards ( 12 - 14 ) having prevailed in four of their previous five contests as well . The high - scoring affair was befitting of two teams on the rise , and was tightly - contested through all four quarters . Ultimately , Bradley Beal 's season - high 41 points , which came on the strength of a 13 - of - 23 shooting tally from the field , as well as a 6 - of - 10 mark from three - point range , was too much for the visitors to overcome . Markieff Morris had the hot hand for Washington as well , going 10 - of - 17 from the floor on his way to 23 points . The two stellar offensive efforts led to impressive success rates of 53 percent and 53 percent from the field and three - point range , respectively , for the hosts . The Clippers saw Blake Griffin 's 26 points lead the way , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , seven assists and a steal . J.J. Redick checked in a rather distant second with 17 points and a rebound . Chris Paul and DeAndre Jordan turned in a pair of 13 - point performances that were part of double - doubles . Paul also dished out 12 assists and recorded four rebounds and a pair of steals , while Jordan hauled in 17 boards , handed out two assists and posted a block . Mareese Speights led the second unit with 14 points , while Austin Rivers , back on the bench due to the surprising return of Luc Mbah_a_Moute from a shoulder injury , contributed 13 points . Beal added three rebounds , three assists and a steal to his aforementioned game - high scoring haul . Morris supplemented his 23 points with nine rebounds , three assists , three steals and a block . John Wall registered an 18 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also featured five rebounds , a steal and a block . Otto Porter and Marcin Gortat contributed matching nine - point tallies , with the former adding four rebounds , two assists and three steals , and the latter supplying seven rebounds , a steal and two blocks . The Clippers head back home to face the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Wizards travel to Indiana for a Monday evening date with the Pacers .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 105 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) entered the fourth quarter with a seemingly comfortable 85 - 74 lead , and extend that edge to 87 - 74 early in the fourth after a Marcus Thornton layup in the opening minute . However , the Pacers ( 15 - 18 ) refused to go quietly , as they battled back throughout the quarter to eventually close the deficit to 100 - 98 with 1:54 remaining after a pair of Paul George free throws . That 's as close as it would get , though , as Otto Porter drained a clutch three - pointer with 1:39 left , and John Wall , who led all scorers with 36 points , tallied the final six for Washington on a layup and two sets of free throws . The Pacers were led by George , who nearly matched Wall point for point with 34 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 6 - 10 3Pt ) , four assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jeff Teague bounced back from one of his poorer shooting nights of the season with a 19 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included a pair of rebounds and a steal . Myles Turner compiled 15 points and eight rebounds , along with a trio of blocks . Thaddeus Young filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and a game - high six steals . C.J. Miles provided his typically solid contribution off the bench with 15 points , three rebounds and an assist . Wall added 11 rebounds , nine assists and a pair of steals for a spectacular stat line overall . Porter scored 22 points overall , which he supplemented with a rebound . Marcin Gortat stepped up with a 13 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and a steal . Bradley Beal compiled 12 points , two assists , a rebound and a pair of steals , but he was limited to just 18 minutes due to a sprained right ankle suffered in the contest . Markieff Morris supplied 10 points , seven boards , an assist and a steal . The Pacers return home for a Friday date with the Chicago Bulls , while the Wizards host the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Chicago Bulls , 101 - 99 , at Verizon Center on Tuesday . The Bulls ( 19 - 20 ) , which play a total of five games this week , announced before the game that both Jimmy Butler ( illness ) and Dwyane Wade ( rest ) would sit out Tuesday 's contest , which automatically made them a sizable underdog on the road against a Wizards ( 19 - 18 ) squad that was at full strength . However , it was clear from the onset that Chicago had a different mindset , as they walloped their hosts by a 36 - 26 margin in the first quarter . They maintained their advantage through the second period , leading to a 61 - 48 halftime edge . However , intermission must have served as a wake - up call for Washington , which roared out of the gates in the third quarter and doubled up their feisty visitors , 32 - 16 . Ultimately , however , it all came down to the best player on the court , John Wall . The Wizards ' point guard led all scorers with 26 points , and his 16 - foot basket with five seconds remaining snapped a 99 - 99 deadlock and provided the home team with the final margin of victory . Chicago was paced by Denzel Valentine , who went for 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals in 30 minutes off the bench . Robin Lopez and Michael Carter-Williams followed with matching 14 - point efforts , with the former providing six rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block , and the latter supplying seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Bobby Portis offered 13 points , seven boards and a steal , while Rajon Rondo totaled 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals in 27 minutes , his most extensive game action in some time . Wall added 14 assists , six rebounds , a steal and a block to his aforementioned scoring total . Bradley Beal and Markieff Morris each went for 19 points , and Otto Porter , Jr. registered 11 points , two rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Marcin Gortat posted a 10 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included a steal and a block . Jason Smith led the second unit with seven points , six rebounds and three blocks . The Bulls will next visit the New York Knicks on Thursday evening , while the Wizards head to Beantown for a Wednesday night date with the Boston Celtics .
The Washington bench combined to score a whopping 70 points to help spearhead the blowout win . Wall 's 22 points led the Wizards . Beal poured in 19 points . No other member of the starting five managed double digits in the scoring column , although Marcin Gortat had a near double - double with eight points and nine rebounds . Brandon Jennings led the second unit with 18 points and Bojan Bogdanovic totaled 17 . Ian Mahinmi managed 16 points , while Kelly Oubre , Jr. and Jason Smith were productive as reserves as well with nine and eight - point efforts , respectively . Justin Hamilton 's 20 points off the second unit led Brooklyn . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson paced the starting five with 19 points . Jeremy Lin supplied 14 points , while Isaiah Whitehead , Archie Goodwin and K.J. McDaniels all generated 10 - point efforts off the bench as well .
The Philadelphia Sixers traveled to Wells Fargo Center and defeated the Indiana Pacers , 121 - 110 , on Friday evening . The Sixers ( 5 - 4 ) showed grit and resiliency , allowing them to come from behind with an impressive reaction during the second half . Even though the Pacers ( 5 - 4 ) built a 63 - 56 after the first half , Philadelphia stormed back with a 65 - 47 victory during the final 24 minutes . The game was tight throughout most of the contest , but the Sixers pulled away in the fourth quarter and moved over .500 for the first time since 2013 . J.J. Redick and Ben Simmons paved the way for the Sixers in this one . The veteran shooting guard had his best performance since joining Philadelphia in the offseason as he finished with a game - high 31 points ( including 8 - of - 13 from three - point range ) , while Simmons posted the second triple - double of his career . The talented rookie finished the contest with 14 points , 11 assists , 11 rebounds , three blocks , and two steals . On the other end , Victor Oladipo once again led the way for the Pacers with another stellar offensive output of 31 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic finished with 21 points . Former Sixer Thaddeus Young chipped in with 15 points and five boards . Myles Turner came off the bench to contribute with 11 points and nine rebounds after a seven - game absence due to a concussion .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 100 - 82 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Pelicans ( 28 - 26 ) likely arrived in a City of Brotherly Love still awash in post - Super Bowl euphoria with an itch to get on the court , considering their most recent contest had the distinction of having been `` rained out '' , a true rarity in NBA circles . New_Orleans ' Wednesday showdown with the Indiana Pacers never got started due to a leak in the arena roof at Smoothie King Center , and the fact they 'd therefore been off since Monday may have caused a bit of rustiness . The 76ers ( 27 - 25 ) looked to be playing a couple of notches faster in a prolific first quarter , one that saw them establish a dominant 32 - 14 lead . The visitors appeared to awaken from their slumber in the second , but they still trailed by a 56 - 41 margin heading into intermission . Any hopes of a second - half comeback were dashed in short order early in the third , as Philadelphia opened the period on a 10 - 4 run that got their edge back up over 20 points . It was up to 32 points by the end of the quarter , leading to a comfortable victory . As the final score implied , the Sixers dominated across the stat sheet , particularly in the area of rebounds and assists . The hosts won the battle on the glass by a 58 - 46 margin and dished out 26 dimes to the Pelicans ' 17 . Ian Clark paced the Pelicans with a modest 15 points in 22 minutes off the bench , with the majority of that scoring coming in the latter stages of the fourth quarter . He added one rebound . Anthony Davis followed with 14 points , eight rebounds and one steal . He played 28 minutes and shot 6 - for - 19 from the field . Darius Miller followed with 13 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Nikola Mirotic delivered 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . Jrue Holiday poured in nine points and added one rebound and two blocks . Cheick Diallo turned six points , seven boards and one steal , while Rajon Rondo tallied five points but posted 10 assists and two steals . The Sixers ' balanced first - unit effort was paced by a pair of 24 - point efforts from the frontcourt tandem of Joel Embiid and Dario Saric . The former overcame an ankle issue to also produce 16 rebounds , two steals and one block , while the latter hauled in five boards and dished out four assists . J.J. Redick followed with 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Ben Simmons filled out the stat sheet in impressive fashion with 10 points , nine rebounds , eight assists , three steals and one block . Robert Covington totaled eight points , three rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Justin Anderson matched Covington 's scoring total to lead the bench and also had one rebound and one assist . The Pelicans remain on the road and make the short trip to the Big Apple , where they 'll face off with the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday night . The Sixers remain home and await a visit from the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday evening as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 108 - 94 , at Wells Fargo Center on Monday . While there were six ties and 11 lead changes in this matchup , Philly really pulled away in the second half . In fact , the Sixers rode a 32 - 14 third quarter to victory , as the Hornets trailed by double figures for the final five minutes of action . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Sixers hitting 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range while the Hornets connected on 38 percent from the field and 27 percent from long range . Rebounding is what really changed the game , with Philadelphia outrebounding Charlotte , 60 - 40 . Ball movement was also critical , with the Sixers handing out 30 assists while holding the Hornets to 16 assists . The Hornets ( 30 - 41 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 24 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three steals . Jeremy Lamb amassed 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Willy Hernangomez led the bench with 17 points , three rebounds and two steals . The Sixers ( 39 - 30 ) got another triple - double out of Ben Simmons , as he accumulated 11 points , 12 rebounds , 15 assists and three steals . Joel Embiid totaled 25 points , 19 rebounds and four blocks . Robert Covington finished with 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Marco Belinelli led the bench with 21 points , two rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Philly playing host to the Memphis Grizzlies and Charlotte traveling to face the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 120 - 108 , at Wells Fargo Center on Saturday . The 76ers ( 42 - 30 ) and the Timberwolves ( 42 - 32 ) engaged in a tight battle that saw Philly break free in the first three quarters , and even though Minnesota managed to come back in the fourth , they did n't have enough time to change their fate . Philadelphia jumped to a 32 - 24 lead in the first quarter , but the Wolves made it closer with a 28 - 27 second quarter . The biggest differential here was the third quarter , as the Sixers won that period by 20 points ( 39 - 19 ) and closed it out comfortably in the fourth despite the fact Minny won the final quarter they extended it after winning the next 37 - 22 . Ben Simmons led the way for the Sixers after notching another triple - double of 15 points , 13 assists and 12 rebounds . Joel Embiid was the top scorer after finishing with 19 points , six boards and three blocks , while Dario Saric added 18 points . Robert Covington chipped in with 11 points , while Marco Belinelli contributed 17 points off the bench . Andrew Wiggins chipped in with 16 points and eight rebounds . Karl-Anthony Towns had 15 points with 11 rebounds , and Gorgui Dieng ended with the same stat line . The bench provided quite a spark for Minnesota in this game , as Jamal Crawford ( 13 points ) , Tyus Jones ( 11 points with six assists ) and Marcus Georges-Hunt ( 11 points ) all did a good job off the bench .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 118 - 101 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday evening . The 76ers got out to a good start , with a 10 - point lead midway through the first quarter , where they went on to outscore the Knicks , 37 - 28 . The Sixers expanded their lead to 15 early in the second quarter , but the Knicks rallied back to tie it up at 56 with just under three minutes left in the half , before trailing 67 - 63 at halftime . The Knicks came out strong in the third quarter and kept it close for the first few minutes , however the 76ers took over the remainder of the quarter with a 19 - 8 run , to take a 93 - 80 lead into the fourth . The rest of the game belonged to Philly , as the 76ers cruised to their eighth straight win . Joel Embiid ( face ) was forced to leave the game after a collision with Markelle Fultz , early in the second quarter . Dario Saric led the Sixers with 26 points , 14 rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . Ben Simmons finished with 13 points , 10 assists , eight rebounds and one blocks , while J.J. Redick tallied 21 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . The 76ers shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Michael Beasley was big for the Knicks , with 22 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Emmanuel Mudiay also finished with 22 points , and added four rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Enes Kanter tallied 17 points , 14 rebounds , one assist and one block , while Trey Burke finished with 18 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Knicks shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . The Knicks ( 27 - 49 ) will look to avoid a third straight loss , as they play host to the Pistons on Saturday . The 76ers ( 44 - 30 ) take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Friday .
The Philadeplhia 76ers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 109 - 97 at Wells Fargo Center on Sunday . The 76ers ( 50 - 30 ) had a clear advantage on paper in this game against the Mavericks ( 24 - 57 ) , and they did n't have problems to translate that dominance into the score . The Sixers jumped to a 28 - 20 advantage in the first quarter , and they extended it to a 13 - point lead at the half time break . Dallas won the third quarter , 28 - 24 , and it seemed as if they were going to make things tough for Philadelphia down the stretch , but the hosts did n't rattle and closed things out with ease in the fourth . With the win , the Sixers extended their winning streak to 14 games and also hit the 50 - win mark . J.J. Redick was Philadelphia 's top scorer with 18 points and four assists . Ben Simmons had 16 points , but the talented rookie also filled the stat sheet thanks to nine assists , seven rebounds , four steals and one block . Robert Covington made an impact on both ends of the court , thanks to 15 points , 10 rebounds , three assists , Mario Belinelli ( 15 points ) and Ersan Ilyasova ( 11 points , 12 rebounds ) made their presence felt off the bench . Six out of Dallas ' nine players scored in double digits in this one , and the top scorer was Harrison Barnes who finished with 21 points . Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 20 points , 11 assists , five rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Dwight Powell had 13 points and 10 boards . Dorian Finley-Smith and Doug McDermott both netted 10 points in the same exact 26 minutos of action .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 116 - 97 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday evening . The Cavs ( 20 ) used a great team effort to overcome a strong attack from the Bucks ( 1 - 1 ) in Milwaukee . Six players scored in double digits for Cleveland , including four of the five starters . The Cavs shot 54 percent from the field , including 42 percent from long range , and went 17 - of - 17 from the foul line . On the other hand , the Bucks hit 46 percent from the field , and 31 percent from long range . LeBron James led the way in the win with 24 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , eight assists , five rebounds , a block and a steal , in 37 minutes . Kyle Korver chipped in 17 points on 6 - of - 8 shooting , including 5 - of - 6 from long range , in 19 minutes off the bench . Kevin Love totaled 17 points , to go along with 12 rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Meanwhile , Giannis Antetokounmpo did all he could to keep his team in the game , finishing with 34 points , eight assists , eight rebounds , three steals and one block , in 39 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Milwaukee was Malcolm Brogdon , who finished with 16 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . The Bucks will be right back in action , as they play host to the Trail Blazers on Saturday . The Cavaliers will also be in action on Saturday , when they play host to the Magic .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 113 - 110 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday . Giannis Antetokounmpo scored a career - high 44 points to lead the Bucks ( 2 - 1 ) . He added eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Antetokounmpo came up big in the waning moments with a steal , a block and a dunk to seal the game in the final 30 seconds . There were 15 ties and 10 lead changes with neither team leading by double - digits . The shooting disparity was the difference , with Milwaukee hitting 53 percent from the field , while holding Portland to just 43 percent . The Bucks also dominated down low , outscoring the Trail_Blazers , 54 - 26 , in the paint . The Blazers ( 2 - 1 ) dropped their first game in the last of a three - game road trip to start the season . Damian Lillard was Portland 's best player , as he accrued 26 points , five rebounds , four assists and four steals . C.J. McCollum also scored 26 points , adding three rebounds and two steals to his stat line . Jusuf Nurkic finished with 17 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Khris Middleton totaled 18 points , six rebounds and three assists for Milwaukee . Tony Snell went 7 - of - 8 from the field to score 17 points . Malcolm Brogdon was the only other Buck in double figures , totaling 13 points , six assists and four steals . On deck for Milwaukee is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets . Portland plays its home opener Tuesday against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 98 - 90 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday . Milwaukee came into this game as a sizable favorite , as they left no doubt with this victory . It was closer than expected though , as there were 10 ties and 10 lead changes in total . The key in the game was the turnover differential , as the Bucks forced 23 of them from the Lakers , while committing just 11 of them on their end . Los_Angeles killed themselves at the charity stripe , as they hit just 22 - of - 37 , while Milwaukee went 22 - of - 26 . The first and third quarters were decisive , with Milwaukee outscoring Los_Angeles , 50 - 35 . The Lakers ( 5 - 8 ) were led by Lonzo Ball , as he became the youngest player in NBA history to capture a triple - double . He finished the game with 18 points , 12 rebounds , 13 assists , three steals and three blocks . Kyle Kuzma led the team , as he totaled 21 points and 11 rebounds en route to a double - double . Julius Randle led the bench with 17 points and eight rebounds . The Bucks ( 6 - 6 ) have now won two - straight with Eric Bledsoe in the fold , as they look like a defensive powerhouse with him in the backcourt . He finished this game with 11 points , two rebounds and two assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the player of the game , as he accumulated 33 points , 15 rebounds and three assists . Khris Middleton amassed 13 points , four rebounds and four assists . Malcolm Brogdon was a huge spark off the bench , providing 16 points , three rebounds , three assists and three steals . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Milwaukee hosting the Memphis Grizzlies and Los_Angeles traveling to face the Phoenix Suns .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 129 - 110 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday evening . The Raptors ( 27 - 10 ) and the Bucks ( 20 - 17 ) played a very even game during the first half , and all signs indicated this one was headed for another close finish just like it happened when these two Eastern Conference rivals met earlier this week . However , the Raptors pulled away for good in the second half , as their impressive performance during the third quarter ( 43 - 19 ) pulled them away for good . Milwaukee won the fourth quarter , but it was n't enough and Toronto secured the win rather comfortably . Surprisingly , Serge Ibaka led the Raptors offensively since he finished with 21 points and five rebounds . DeMar DeRozan added 20 points with five rebounds and four assists , while Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 20 points and 13 rebounds . Kyle Lowry added 15 points , six boards , four dimes and two steals . The bench did a good job as well , as three players ( Delon Wright ( 12 ) , C.J. Miles ( 11 ) and Fred VanVleet ( 10 ) ) scored in double digits . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks , as the Greek forward finished with 24 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe chipped in with 17 points , and Khris Middleton had 11 points . Malcolm Brodgon thrived coming off the bench , as the second - year guard scored 19 points .
The Miami Heat defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 106 - 101 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 26 - 18 ) came into Wednesday 's game looking to extend an impressive stretch that had seen them notch victories in seven of their prior eight contests . Armed with a solid 13 - 9 road record , they certainly appeared capable of accomplishing the feat despite the opposition from a quality squad in the Bucks ( 23 - 21 ) . A tightly contested first half ended with the hosts holding a relatively slim 57 - 52 advantage , a lead Miami was able to whittle down to one point by the start of the fourth period . After Milwaukee tallied the first five points of the quarter to take an 83 - 78 advantage with 10:56 remaining , the visitors went on a 22 - 10 run over the ensuing 8:22 to garner a seven - point cushion that would prove insurmountable . Khris Middleton got the Bucks as close as 104 - 101 with 10 seconds remaining , but a subsequent pair of Wayne Ellington free throws provided the final margin of victory . Hassan Whiteside led the way for the Heat with a 27 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included a game - high six blocks . Goran Dragic contributed 15 points , five assists and four boards . Kelly Olynyk matched Dragic 's scoring total to lead the second unit and added one rebound and one assist . Josh Richardson provided a full line of 14 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Ellington finished with 11 points , five boards and four assists in 28 minutes off the bench . James Johnson supplied nine points , seven rebounds and six assists . Middleton paced the Bucks with 25 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Giannis Antetokounmpo managed a 22 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , two steals and two blocks . Tony Snell led the bench with 12 points and added two rebounds , two assists and one block . Eric Bledsoe managed 11 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . John Henson pitched in a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . The Heat next head to the Big Apple , where they 'll face the Brooklyn Nets on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Bucks head to the City of Brotherly Love for a showdown with the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 103 - 96 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday evening . It was a very low - scoring first quarter , as it was tied 8 - 8 six minutes into the game . The Bucks emerged with a 21 - 18 advantage heading into the second . Things picked up in the second quarter , where the teams traded buckets , with the Pacers outscoring the Bucks , 27 - 25 , in the quarter to cut the deficit to one , as they trailed 46 - 45 at the half . The Bucks started out well in the third quarter , but the Pacers turned it up late with a 12 - 1 run to over take the lead , and take a 78 - 67 lead into the final frame . The Bucks battled in the fourth , chipping away at the lead and managed to make it a three - point game with eight seconds left , however the Pacers closed it out with four made free throws . Six players scored in double digits for the Pacers , led by Victor Oladipo , who finished with 21 points , seven rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Lance Stephenson came up big with 16 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 25 minutes off the bench . Bojan Bogdanovic came up clutch with four free throws to seal the win , and finished with 14 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 29 minutes . The Pacers shot 45 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 16 from long range . Meanwhile , Khris Middleton led the Bucks with 30 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , in 40 minutes of action . Giannis Antetokounmpo followed up with 24 points , 10 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal , while Eric Bledsoe tallied 15 points , seven rebounds , six assists , two rebounds and two steals . The Bucks shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . The Bucks ( 33 - 29 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the 76ers on Sunday . The Pacers ( 35 - 27 ) take on the Wizards in Washington on Sunday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the New_York Knicks , 120 - 112 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday . Milwaukee was squarely in control for the majority of this game , as they held the lead for all but one minute . In fact , the Bucks held a 16 - point lead in the second and fourth quarters , as Milwaukee led by at least eight points for the final eight minutes . Milwaukee 's offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 56 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . Free-throw shooting was huge as well , with the Bucks hitting 30 - of - 39 and New_York connecting on just 11 - of - 14 . The Knicks ( 24 - 42 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he tallied 26 points and seven rebounds . Emmanuel Mudiay amassed 19 points , two rebounds and four assists . Enes Kanter amassed 16 points and eight rebounds while Troy Williams led the bench with 18 points . Kyle O'Quinn also played well off the bench , accumulating 14 points , six assists and three blocks . The Bucks ( 35 - 31 ) got a gem out of Khris Middleton , as he accrued 30 points and four rebounds on 11 - of - 16 from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo collected 28 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . John Henson amassed 14 points , four rebounds and four blocks . Jabari Parker provided 12 points , four rebounds and five assists off the bench . On deck for Toronto is a home matchup versus the Toronto Raptors on Sunday . As for Milwaukee , they travel to face the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday for their next fixture .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 106 - 103 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Sunday . The Bucks ( 39 - 34 ) finally ended the Spurs ( 43 - 31 ) winning streak in emphatic fashion , as they came out on top on a back - and - forth game where the home club managed to hold on to their early advantage . Milwaukee built a 27 - 15 in the first quarter , but San_Antonio answered back and the first half finished with 47 - 47 . The Bucks once again grabbed the lead in the third quarter ( 41 - 28 ) and San_Antonio stormed back in the fourth ( 28 - 18 ) , but they did n't have enough time to mount a second - half comeback . The game went down to the wire , but the Bucks came out on top . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the best player for Milwaukee , as he finished with 25 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Eric Bledsoe had 23 points with five assists , and Khris Middleton chipped in with 19 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . John Henson had 10 points with six rebounds and four assists , while Jabari Parker filled the stat sheet off the bench thanks to eight points , three assists , two boards and two blocks . As it has been the trend all season long , LaMarcus Aldridge was San_Antonio 's best player since he finished with 34 points and seven rebounds . Pau Gasol impressed coming off the bench , since he had 22 points and 13 rebounds , including seven offensive boards . Danny Green had 13 points , while Dejounte Murray contributed 10 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two steals .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Chicago Bulls in overtime , 96 - 90 , at United Center on Saturday . This was one of the tightest games of the season , as it took an extra session to decide a winner . In fact , there were 12 ties and 11 lead changes in total , as neither team ever achieved a double - digit lead . Defense was key for the Pelicans , as they held the Bulls to 35 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . New_Orleans also dominated down low , outscoring Chicago , 42 - 30 , in the paint . The Pelicans ( 5 - 5 ) were led by Anthony Davis , who collected 27 points , 16 rebounds and three blocks . DeMarcus Cousins finished with 25 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Jrue Holiday accrued 10 points , five rebounds and six assists . Jameer Nelson played well off the bench , providing 13 points , five rebounds , five assists and four steals . The Bulls ( 2 - 6 ) had five players score in double figures , but the other five players who played combined for just 15 points . Justin Holiday led the way with 18 points , nine rebounds and three steals . Robin Lopez amassed 14 points and nine rebounds but committed five turnovers . Lauri Markkanen totaled 14 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Jerian Grant fell just shy of a triple - double , collecting 13 points , eight rebounds and nine assists . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with New_Orleans traveling to face the Indiana Pacers and Chicago playing the Toronto Raptors on the road as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 119 - 109 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday evening . It was a close game for most of the way , with the Nets ( 6 - 11 ) leading by one , 46 - 45 , at the half , before being all tied up at 77 after three quarters . The Cavaliers ( 11 - 7 ) turned it up a notch in the fourth quarter , where they outscored the Nets , 42 - 32 , on way to their sixth straight win . LeBron James took over with 23 points in the fourth quarter , on his way to a game - high 33 points , along with six rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 33 minutes . Kevin Love tallied a double - double with 18 points and 10 rebounds , along with three assists and one block , in 31 minutes . Dwyane Wade provided a nice boost off the bench , with 18 points , five assists , four rebounds , and one steal , in 28 minutes . The Cavs shot 52 percent from the field , including 40 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Rondae Hollis-Jefferson was the high - point man for the Nets , with 20 points , along with six rebounds and two assists , in 24 minutes . Spencer Dinwiddie dished 10 assists , and added eight points , one rebound , one steal and one block , in 27 minutes . Joe Harris poured in 18 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Nets also shot 52 percent from the field , including 40 percent from long range . The Nets will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail Blazers on Friday . The Cavs play host to the Hornets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 105 - 98 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Saturday evening . The Sixers put up a strong fight , taking an early lead , 24 - 23 after one quarter . The Cavs punched back in the second though , outscoring the 76ers 29 - 22 , to take a 52 - 46 lead into halftime . The 76ers came out strong once again in the second half and kept the game close right down to the wire , however the Cavs were able to hang in on the second night of a back - to - back . LeBron James notched his third triple - double of the season , with 30 points , 13 rebounds and 13 assists , in 38 minutes of action . Jeff Green , Kyle Korver and Dwyane Wade chipped in 13 points each off the bench , while Jae Crowder added 12 points , including a dagger three in the final minutes . The Cavs shot 48 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 29 from long range , and dished 26 assists . Meanwhile , Robert Covington and J.J. Redick led the 76ers with 19 points each . Covington was forced to leave the game in the final few minutes due to injury . Ben Simmons tallied 14 points , 10 assists , six rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Dario Saric finished with 17 points , nine rebounds , and six assists , in 34 minutes . The 76ers shot 47 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 33 from long range , and dished 31 assists . This marked the third straight loss for Philadelphia . The Sixers ( 13 - 12 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Pelicans in New Orleans on Sunday . The Cavs ( 19 - 8 ) play host to the Hawks on Tuesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 121 - 112 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday night . The Cavaliers ( 21 - 8 ) and the Lakers ( 10 - 17 ) engaged in quite a battle in this game , as the Lakers proved to be a harder - than - expected opponent for a Cavs team that has been on a roll of late . The Cavaliers built a three - point advantage at the break and they never looked back , but that does n't mean the game was easy . Both teams missed chances to either cut or extend the lead , and in the end the more experienced team came out on top . But the Lakers certainly proved they can compete with any team in the league if they engage to do so . LeBron James was the undisputed star for the Cavaliers , as the small forward finished with a strong triple - double of 25 points , 12 rebounds , and 12 assists but he was n't the only player who made a difference for Cleveland . Kevin Love contributed with 28 points and 11 rebounds , and Jose Calderon contributed with 17 points , six assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dwyane Wade had 10 points with six assists . Brandon Ingram led the way for the Lakers with 26 points , six rebounds and six assists . Lonzo Ball came close to a triple - double , as the rookie point guard with 13 points , 11 assists , and eight boards . Two players off the bench delivered strong performances as well , as Kyle Kuzma finished with 20 points and seven rebounds , and Julius Randle added 13 points with four boards and three assists .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 127 - 110 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Tuesday evening . While much fanfare surrounded the expected debut of Isaiah Thomas ( hip ) on Tuesday , the Cavaliers ( 25 - 12 ) were likely more focused on simply righting their ship after having lost four of their previous five games , a stretch that even included a defeat at the hands of the lowly Sacramento Kings . Matters were n't looking too positive in that regard in the first half , as the Trail_Blazers ( 19 - 18 ) , buoyed by the return of their star point guard Damian Lillard from a hamstring injury , forged a 56 - 53 halftime lead . However , Cleveland came out firing on all cylinders offensively after intermission and never let up , scoring an impressive 74 points over the final 24 minutes to put together a comfortable double - digit home win . Thomas ' encouraging play was certainly an added bonus , as he produced 17 points and three assists over just 19 minutes , shooting 50 percent ( 6 - for - 12 ) from the field . The home squad enjoyed a strong shooting night overall , posting a 52 percent success rate from the floor , including 41 percent from three - point range . Lillard paced the Blazers in his return from a five - game absence , managing 25 points , six assists and one steal . Jusuf Nurkic tallied 23 points , seven boards , four assists and two steals . C.J. McCollum took on a less pronounced role in the offense with Lillard 's return but still supplied 19 points , five boards and four assists . Evan Turner filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu mustered a modest five points but also brought down nine rebounds , dished out two assists and recorded one steal . Noah Vonleh led the reserves with six points and added three rebounds . LeBron James led the Cavaliers with 24 points , eight assists , six rebounds , four steals and one block . Kevin Love , questionable until earlier in the afternoon with an illness , registered 19 points , seven rebounds , one steal and one block . Jae Crowder tallied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Thomas led the bench with his aforementioned scoring total , while Dwyane Wade ( 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists ) and Jeff Green ( 10 points , five assists , four rebounds , two steals ) were productive off the second unit as well . The Trail_Blazers head back home to face the Atlanta Hawks on Friday evening , while the Cavaliers hit the road to face the Boston Celtics on Wednesday night .
In a game that may go down as a modern classic , the Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 140 - 138 , in overtime on Wednesday . The game featured 34 lead changes and a late 80 run to help Minnesota regain the lead . The two teams shot the lights out from three - point range , setting a new NBA record by combining for 40 made three - pointers . In overtime , the team traded buckets back and forth , with Jimmy Butler doing most of Minnesota 's damage and LeBron James leading the charge for Cleveland . With 24 seconds left and the game tied , Minnesota had the ball and was able to run an isolation for Butler , but Butler was rejected by James at the rim . Cleveland 's J.R. Smith recovered the ball and called a quick time - out with one second left on the clock . The Cavaliers managed to inbound the ball from the backcourt up to James in the paint , who knocked down a turnaround jumper at the buzzer to give Cleveland a much - needed win . For the Cavaliers ( 31 - 22 ) , it was all about LeBron James . James shot 16 - of - 22 from the field en route to a team - high 37 points . He had a triple - double as well , notching 16 assists and 10 rebounds . The Cavs also saw a rare strong game from veteran starter J.R. Smith , who has seen his production fall off a cliff this season . Despite his poor season to this point , Smith scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting in Wednesday 's win . Minnesota ( 35 - 22 ) , on the other hand , balanced its attack between its two All-Stars . Butler was the team 's leading scorer with 35 points on 14 - of - 21 shooting . Seven of those points came in the overtime period . Karl-Anthony Towns , meanwhile , had a ridiculously efficient 10 - of - 12 shooting night . Towns scored 30 points and went a perfect 6 - of - 6 from three - point range . Towns has now made his last nine straight three - point shots , tying a Timberwolves franchise record . The Cavaliers will visit Atlanta on Friday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Chicago .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 103 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . Despite the fact that Cleveland had won five of their previous six games over Washington , the Wizards were able to prevail here despite not having John Wall ( knee ) . This matchup was close throughout though , as there were 10 ties and 14 lead changes in total , with neither team ever leading by more than 12 points . Three-point shooting was a key statistic , with Washington connecting on 12 - of - 30 and Cleveland hitting just 8 - of - 35 . Free-throw shooting also killed the Cavaliers , as they went just 11 - of - 19 from the charity stripe while the Wizards went a perfect 10 - of - 10 . Washington ended up winning the rebounding , assisting , steals , blocks and turnover differentials as well . The Wizards ( 34 - 24 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 18 points , two rebounds , nine assists and two blocks . Tomas Satoransky amassed 17 points , four rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Otto Porter finished with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals . Markieff Morris accrued nine points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kely Oubre Jr. led the bench with 17 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Cavaliers ( 34 - 23 ) were carried by LeBron James , as he collected 32 points , nine rebounds and eight assists on 13 - of - 18 from the field . Tristan Thompson totaled 12 points , nine rebounds and two assists . The only other Cavalier in double figures was J.R. Smith , who scored 15 points but failed to provide much else . Both teams play again on Friday , with Cleveland traveling to play the Memphis Grizzlies and Washington playing host to the Charlotte Hornets .
The Boston Celtics defeated the San_Antonio Spurs 108 - 94 on Monday at TD Garden . The win ended an 11 - game losing streak to the Spurs for the Celtics ( 5 - 2 ) , which dates all the way back to 2011 . They managed to break it thanks to an 18 - 2 run that started with two minutes left in the second quarter and lasted through the first five minutes of the third . From that point on , Boston managed to go punch - for - punch with San_Antonio the rest of the way and hold them off . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Celtics , scoring a game - high 24 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) to go along with six assists and three steals in 30 minutes . Jaylen Brown was also excellent in the outing , posting 18 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 30 minutes of his own . As for the Spurs ( 4 - 3 ) , they 've now dropped three straight games , and it appears they are starting to miss superstar Kawhi Leonard ( quad ) after their hot start to the season . San_Antonio struggled to get anything going offensively , and it was Brandon Paul would ended up leading the team in scoring with 18 points ( 6 - 8 FG . 3 - 4 3Pt ) in 30 minutes off the bench . Star big man LaMarcus Aldridge failed to get much going , scoring just 11 points in 26 minutes . What really hurt the Spurs was their awful free throw shooting , as they shot a miserable 10 - of - 20 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Celtics will look to extend their winning streak to six games Wednesday against the Kings while the Spurs will look to stop their losing streak Thursday against the Warriors .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 92 - 88 , at TD Garden on Thursday . Despite the fact that Golden_State led for the majority of this game , Boston were able to prevail and extend their winning streak to 14 games . It was competitive throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 10 lead changes in total . Defense was on display for both teams , as Golden_State hit just 40 percent of their shots and Boston shooting just 33 percent from the field . The difference for Boston was getting to the free - throw line , as they went 33 - of - 38 , while holding Golden_State to just 12 - of - 19 . The Warriors ( 11 - 4 ) were led by Kevin Durant , as he tallied 24 points , three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Klay Thompson , Stephen Curry and Draymond Green combined for just 33 points on 11 - of - 45 shooting . Green did provide eight rebounds , five assists and three blocks , while Curry added six rebounds , five assists and four steals to his line . The Celtics ( 14 - 2 ) got 22 points , seven rebounds , two steals and two blocks out of Jaylen Brown to lead the way . Al Horford totaled 18 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . Kyrie Irving amassed 16 points , five rebounds and six assists on 4 - of - 16 shooting . Marcus Morris and Jayson Tatum each scored 12 points . Both teams return to action on Saturday , as the Celtics travel to play the Atlanta Hawks and the Warriors playing the Philadelphia 76ers on the road as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 105 , at TD Garden on Sunday evening . The Celtics ( 30 - 10 ) were massive favorites ahead of this game , but they had to work harder than expected against a hard - working Nets ( 13 - 23 ) team that made things quite complicated for Boston . Even though the Celtics jumped to a 10 - point lead after the first quarter , the Nets answered and cut the deficit to two points at the break . Both teams went back and forth during the second half , but in the end Boston came on top despite Brooklyn 's attempts to send the game to overtime . One of the big differences was both teams ' shooting from the field , as the Celtics hit 49 percent of their shots while Brooklyn converted just 41 of theirs . Star point guard Kyrie Irving led the way for Boston , as he finished with 28 points . Jaylen Brown had 13 points , and Al Horford contributed with 10 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , and three blocks . Markieff Morris and Terry Rozier had very good performances coming off the bench as well . The shooting guard contributed with 14 points and seven rebounds , while the power forward chipped in with 15 points of his own . Six Brooklyn players scored in double digits , led by Rondae Hollis-Jefferson who contributed with 22 points and 12 rebounds . Allen Crabbe had 12 points , and Spencer Dinwiddie chipped in with 10 points and eight assists . Caris LeVert had a monster game off the bench as well , finishing with 16 points , seven assists , six rebounds , and two steals . Quincy Acy had 14 points as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Boston Celtics , 116 - 113 , in overtime at TD Garden on Tuesday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start on the road , as they managed to take the early advantage through the first quarter and hold a 32 - 25 lead heading into the second . They continued to play with the advantage through the second quarter and pushed their lead to 10 , up 58 - 48 , heading into halftime . The Celtics did a better job in the second half and chipped away until they took a three - point lead with 4:40 left in the game . The teams traded buckets during the last minutes of regulation , until Kyrie Irving nailed a game - tying layup with 11 seconds left , that would send it to overtime . The Pelicans held strong in OT and edged the Celtics , en route to their third straight win . Anthony Davis led the way for New_Orleans with 45 points , 16 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 44 minutes of action . DeMarcus Cousins added 19 points , 15 rebounds , five assists and three steals , while Jrue Holiday finished with 23 points , seven assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block . The Pelicans shot 45 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving was the high - point man for the Celtics , with 27 points on 8 - of - 24 shooting , in 40 minutes . Jaylen Brown followed up with 16 points , five assists , four rebounds and one steal , while Al Horford finished with 14 points , nine rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . The Celtics shot 40 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 50 from long range . The Celtics ( 34 - 11 ) play host to the 76ers on Thursday . The Pelicans ( 23 - 20 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Wednesday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Boston Celtics , 129 - 119 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . Eight ties and 16 lead changes make this game look much closer than it actually was , as the Clippers held the lead for over 40 minutes . The first and fourth quarters were key for Los_Angeles , outscoring Boston , 70 - 53 . The shooting disparity was a big factor as well , with the Clippers shooting 50 percent while holding Boston to just 43 percent from the field . Much of that was done down low , with Los Angles outscoring Boston in the paint , 56 - 36 The Clippers ( 30 - 26 ) were led by DeAndre Jordan , as he collected 30 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and four steals on 11 - of - 14 from the field . Tobias Harris accrued 21 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Danilo Gallinari amassed 20 points and nine rebounds while Lou Williams led the bench with 19 points , two rebounds and six assists . The Celtics ( 40 - 20 ) got a gem out of Kyrie Irving , as he totaled 33 points and eight assists . Al Horford finished with 20 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Marcus Morris led the bench with 13 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . The Clippers are off until the 22nd , when they travel to play the Golden State Warriors . As for Boston , they 're off until the 23rd , when they travel to play the Detroit Pistons .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Boston Celtics , 99 - 97 , at TD Garden on Sunday evening . The game started out close , with the Celtics holding a slight edge through the first and a 25 - 24 lead entering the second quarter . The Celtics picked up the pace in the second , as they outscored the Pacers 25 - 16 in the quarter , expanding their lead to 50 - 40 by halftime . Kyrie Irving ( knee ) did not take the floor in the second half . The Pacers took advantage of the shorthanded Celtics in the third quarter , as they outscored the Celtics 34 - 20 in the quarter to take a 74 - 70 lead into the fourth . The Pacers maintained a lead through most of the fourth quarter , until the Celtics rallied to tie it up at 95 with 36 seconds left . The Pacers responded with a lay up by Myles Turner and then two free throws from Victor Oladipo to take a four - point lead . However , the Celtics were not finished as Jayson Tatum hit a lay up to make it a two - point game . They then immediately drew a charge to get the ball back , but missed their final shot attempt at the buzzer , leaving the Pacers to their second straight win . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 27 points , four assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Myles Turner followed up with 19 points , 10 rebounds , three blocks and one steal , while Bojan Bogdanovic added 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block . The Pacers shot 48 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 22 from long range . Meanwhile , Marcus Smart led the Celtics with 20 points , eight assists , seven rebounds and four steals , in 35 minutes . Jayson Tatum followed up with 19 points , five rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , while Terry Rozier added 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . The Celtics shot 42 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 37 from long range . The Celtics ( 46 - 21 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Wizards on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 39 - 28 ) take on the 76ers in Philly on Tuesday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 100 - 99 , at TD Garden on Tuesday evening . The Celtics ( 48 - 23 ) still retain an outside shot of recapturing the top spot in the Eastern Conference from the Toronto Raptors , but they 'll have to keep piling up wins to do so . The fact that star point guard Kyrie Irving ( knee ) remains out of commission only makes the task more daunting , but Tuesday 's contest ultimately showed why Boston ca n't be counted out just yet . After a highly entertaining , back - and - forth affair that saw both teams often match each other bucket for bucket , the Thunder ( 43 - 30 ) looked like they 'd finally built an insurmountable 98 - 92 cushion with 25 seconds remaining . No one gave the trio of Jayson Tatum , Terry Rozier and Marcus Morris the memo , however , as they all drained clutch baskets over the final 18 seconds to seal the improbable comeback . Rozier 's 27 - foot three - pointer with 13 seconds remaining followed a free - throw line sequence by Russell Westbrook where he had a key miss on the first of his two shots . The trey left the home squad down only two , and then Carmelo Anthony subsequently missed two more attempts from the charity stripe - - the second of which was rebounded by Tatum . That set up a 26 - footer from Morris that found the net with 1 seconds left and gave the hosts a one - point lead . Westbrook would have one more chance to atone for his earlier misfire , but he hit the front of the rim on his last - gasp three - point attempt at the buzzer . Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 27 points and added eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Paul George posted a 24 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Steven Adams produced 14 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Anthony finished with 13 points , five boards , three assists , one steal and one block . Corey Brewer supplied 11 points , five rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . The bench played a minor role , as Jerian Grant paced the second unit with a modest six points , two rebounds and one assist . Tatum paced the Celtics with a 23 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , one steal and one block . Morris posted 21 points , four rebounds and one steal . Greg Monroe continued his strong play off the bench with 17 points , six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Rozier managed 14 points , six rebounds , six assists and two steals . Shane Larkin was productive on the second unit with 13 points , four boards and one assist . Al Horford had a rough 2 - for - 9 shooting night on his way to five points , a total he complemented with seven assists , six rebounds and two blocks . The Thunder head back home and await a Friday night visit from the Miami Heat , while the Celtics embark on a West Coast road swing that begins with a Friday night showdown with the Portland Trail Blazers .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 110 - 97 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 55 - 27 ) managed to secure a huge win over the Nets ( 28 - 54 ) as they managed to finish their regular - season campaign on a strong note , and it seems they are ready to take on a postseason path where they appear as one of the favorites to make a deep run in the Eastern Conference . The Celtics quickly jumped ahead to a 27 - 22 lead in the first quarter , and they extended it both in the second ( 26 - 21 ) and the third quarter ( 30 - 27 ) , so they looked set to close things out with ease . The final 12 minutes of action ended 27 - 27 , so Boston closed things out with a huge 110 - 97 victory that should have them heading into the playoffs riding high on confidence . The Celtics rested most of their regulars , but still did a good job overall . Aron Baynes was the best player for the Celtics since he finished with a strong double - double 26 points and 14 rebounds . Guerschon Yabusele finished with 16 points , five rebounds , and two steals . Shane Larkin came close to a triple - double since he had 12 points , 10 rebounds , and seven assists . Jonathan Gibson added 18 points off the bench . The top scorer for the Nets was Nik Stauskas , who had 18 points in 35 points coming off the bench . Allen Crabbe finished with 16 points and seven rebounds . D'Angelo Russell finished with 11 points and three assists . Caris LeVert contributed 11 points , six assists , and three steals . Jarrett Allen chipped in with 10 points and seven rebounds while only playing 19 minutes .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 95 - 87 , at Staples Center on Saturday . Los_Angeles came into this game as the final undefeated team in the league , but they choked this game away despite a 10 - point lead at the half . In fact , Detroit outscored Los_Angeles , 28 - 15 , in the fourth quarter to cap off their comeback win . Defense was key for Detroit , as they held Los_Angeles to 33 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 18 turnovers . Detroit also won the points in the paint battle , 38 - 22 , and the fastbreak differential , 22 - 7 . The Pistons ( 4 - 2 ) were led by Reggie Jackson , who accumulated 15 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Andre Drummond also finished with 15 points , adding 17 rebounds and three blocks to his tally . Avery Bradley tallied 12 pints , five rebounds , two assists and four steals . The Clippers ( 4 - 1 ) got another double - double out of Blake Griffin , as he accrued 19 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Austin Rivers led the team in scoring , amassing 20 points , four rebounds and four steals . DeAndre Jordan scored just seven points , but provided 14 rebounds and three blocks . Detroit will have a quick turnaround , as they play the Golden State Warriors on Sunday for their next fixture . The Clippers next opponent will also be the Warriors , as they play host to them on Monday for their next game .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 119 - 98 , at Staples Center on Wednesday night . The Clippers ( 5 - 2 ) cruised their way to a relatively easy win in this one , as they pulled away in the first half and never looked back . Los_Angeles built a 66 - 48 lead in the first half , highlighted by an impressive 34 - 19 run during the second quarter . They simply kept the Mavs away on the scoreboard during the remaining two quarters . Dallas tried to react from time to time , but the Clips always shut the door en route to a comfortable win . Blake Griffin 's solid all - around effort certainly sparked the Clippers , as the star power forward finished the game with 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Austin Rivers had another decent outing with 19 points starting at shooting guard . DeAndre Jordan added 13 points with eight boards . Lou Williams provided a spark off the bench thanks to 17 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench . On the Mavericks ' side , all five of their starters scored in double digits but that was n't enough to take down the Clippers . Rookie point guard Dennis Smith Jr. led the way with 18 points , but he also committed six turnovers . Harrison Barnes had 14 points and Dirk Nowitzki ended with 13 points , eight boards and two assists . One player to highlight was Maxi Kleber , as the German rookie finished with 11 points ( on 4 - for - 4 from the field ) off the bench .
The Utah Jazz took down the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 126 - 107 , at Staples Center on Thursday . Utah ( 11 - 11 ) saw one of its best offensive nights of the season , as the team hit 58 percent of its shots and knocked down 17 three - pointers . The Jazz relied on a team - focused approach on the offensive end , as every Jazz starter scored at least 12 points in the win . The team dished out a whopping season high of 38 assists on the night , assisting on over three - quarters of their made field goals . The starters ' strong effort extended to the bench , as the Jazz 's second unit contributed an additional 49 points , including a team high of 28 from Alec Burks . The Jazz were relentless on the offensive end until the night 's conclusion , scoring 100 points over the final three quarters of action . All in all , the team enjoyed one of its strongest offensive showings despite the continued absence of injured All-NBA center Rudy Gobert . The Clippers ( 8 - 12 ) have become one of the league 's most severely shorthanded teams this season . Los_Angeles has seen major injuries to both members of its starting backcourt - - Milos Teodosic and Patrick Beverley . More recently , the team lost All-Star big man Blake Griffin to an MCL sprain . The power forward is expected to miss at least two months with the injury . LA was also missing small forward Danilo Gallinari on Thursday , as the newly - acquired wing is nursing a strained left glute . On Thursday , the undermanned Clippers took the court and delivered a respectable offensive showing , shooting a highly - efficient 54 percent from the field and 10 - of - 29 from beyond the arc . The backcourt of Austin Rivers and Lou Williams , both of whom have been thrust into starting roles , combined for 45 points on 15 - of - 30 shooting . No other Clipper scored more than 13 , however , and only four total Clippers finished in double digits for scoring . The lack of overall offensive firepower made it tough for LA to match Utah 's ridiculous offensive onslaught . Utah will host the Pelicans on Friday , while the Clippers will visit Dallas on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 126 - 105 , at Staples Center on Saturday afternoon . The Clippers ( 21 - 21 ) prepared the final meeting of the season against the Kings ( 13 - 29 ) knowing a win would give them a swept of the season series , and that was exactly what happened . Los_Angeles have been getting healthier and hotter in the past few games , and the results back that up since they extended their winning run to four games thanks to another dominant performance . Los_Angeles jumped ahead to a 30 - 17 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . They won the second quarter and third quarters as well ( by scores of 34 - 28 and 27 - 23 ) , and even though Sacramento won the final 12 minutes , the game was already over by then . The Clippers delivered a strong effort and eight players scored in double figures , including the entire starting lineup . Lou Williams led the offense once again after scoring 26 points , and he added four steals as well . Blake Griffin chipped in with 11 points and nine assists , while Willie Reed - who started in place of DeAndre Jordan - contributed with 14 points and 13 rebounds . Montrezl Harrell added 17 points and six rebounds coming off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein was the top player for the Kings , as the talented big man contributed with 23 points , 12 rebounds , and four assists . De'Aaron Fox had 17 points and 10 assists , while Skal Labissiere had 14 points and seven boards coming off the bench . Buddy Hield ( 10 points ) and Bogdan Bogdanovic ( 13 points , five assists ) contributed off the bench as well .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Milwaukee Bucks , 105 - 98 , at Staples Center on Tuesday evening . Los_Angeles ( 40 - 34 ) led by as much as 14 points early on , but Milwaukee ( 39 - 35 ) responded with a major run in the third quarter . The Bucks battled back to take a late lead , holding an advantage for much of the second half . The Clippers , though , fought back . Austin Rivers tied the game at 88 with a three - pointer , then hit a layup to give the Clippers the lead with just under six minutes remaining . The Clippers never gave up that lead , earning a much - needed win as they look to remain relevant in the Western Conference playoff picture . Tobias Harris led the Clippers with 19 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . DeAndre Jordan added a double - double , scoring 13 points and pulling down 16 rebounds . Overall , the team benefited from strong three - point shooting . The Clippers went 15 - of - 28 from beyond the arc in the win . Milwaukee , meanwhile , saw a typically strong night from superstar forward Giannis Antetokounmpo . The 'Greek Freak ' tallied a game - high 26 points along with nine rebounds and seven assists . Khris Middleton added another 22 points for the Bucks . However , the Bucks had trouble matching the red - hot three - point shooting of LA . Middleton and Antetokounmpo accounted for four of Milwaukee 's six three - pointers , which came on just 6 - of - 23 shooting . The Bucks will visit Golden State on Thursday , while LA faces the second half of a back - to - back on Wednesday with a trip to Phoenix .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 111 - 104 , at Staples Center on Sunday . Despite the fact that Los_Angeles led for the majority of this game , Indiana led when it mattered most . In fact , the Pacers rode a 35 - 26 fourth quarter en route to their comeback win , as they ended the game on a 60 run . While many of the statistics were even , Indiana won because of rebounding and turnovers . The Pacers won the rebounding differential , 40 - 36 and forced 13 turnovers from the Clipper while committing just 10 on their end . The Indiana starters really set the tone , as they outscored Los_Angeles starters , 91 - 63 The Pacers ( 46 - 31 ) got a gem out of Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 30 points , four rebounds , 12 assists and five steals on 11 - of - 17 from the field . Myles Turner amassed 24 points and eight rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic totaled 15 points and five rebounds while Darren Collison finished with 14 points and four assists . The Clippers ( 41 - 36 ) were led by Tobias Harris , as he collected 21 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Austin Rivers accrued 18 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two steals . No other starter reached double figures , as DeAndre Jordan amassed eight points and 12 boards . Lou Williams led the bench with 20 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals . Montrezl Harrel provided 19 points , three rebounds and two assists off the bench as well . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Los_Angeles playing host to the San Antonio Spurs and Indiana traveling to face the Denver Nuggets .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 102 - 101 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . This was a competitive matchup throughout , as it took a extra - session to decide a winner . In fact , there were nine ties and 12 lead changes en route to Oklahoma_City 's win , as neither team led by more then five points for the final 25 minutes of action . Memphis did everything they could to lose , as they went 2 - of - 6 from the free - throw line in the final 10 seconds of regulation and overtime . Transition offense was the only true advantage for the Thunder in the stat sheet , as they won the fastbreak differential , 25 - 16 . The Thunder ( 12 - 13 ) got a triple - double out of Russell Westbrook , as he collected 20 points , 11 rebounds and 14 assists . Carmelo Anthony amassed 21 points , nine rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Those two combined to go just 14 - of - 49 from the field and 3 - of - 18 from three - point range though . Steven Adams finished with 21 points and nine rebounds , while Alexis Abrines accrued 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . The Grizzlies ( 8 - 18 ) were led by Tyreke Evans , as he tallied 29 points , 13 rebounds and five assists . Marc Gasol accumulated 22 points , six rebounds and six assists . Dillon Brooks provided 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Ben McLemore led the bench with 17 points and four rebounds . Both teams return home on Monday , with Oklahoma_City hosting the Charlotte Hornets and Memphis facing the Miami Heat .
The Miami Heat defeated the Memphis Grizzlies 107 - 82 on Monday at FedExForum . The Heat made light work of the home team Monday , outscoring them by 17 points in the final quarter and 24 points across the entire second half . And it was a complete team effort from Miami , with seven different players managing to score in double figures . Point guard Goran Dragic led the way with 19 points , five assists and five rebounds in just 25 minutes , with Josh Richardson not far behind with 17 points and five rebounds in 30 minutes . As a team , Miami shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field and a scorching 52 percent from behind the arc . Tyler Johnson and Wayne Ellington were a big part of that , as they both came off the bench to shoot a combined 8 - of - 13 from three . The Grizzlies , on the other hand , failed to find the same success from the floor , shooting just 30 percent from behind the arc and 39 percent overall . The resulting 82 points was their lowest total in seven games , and they have now lost four games in a row and 15 of their last 16 .
