Marc Gasol led the way in defeat with 19 points and six rebounds , but he shot just 5 - of - 14 from the field . Andrew Harrison was close behind with 16 points of his own on 5 - of - 6 shooting , while Tyreke Evans was the only other Grizzlies player to hit double figures with 11 points . Up next , the Heat will head home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Grizzlies will travel to Washington on Wednesday to play the Wizards .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 92 - 88 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . Both teams started out slow . The Jazz took an eight point lead mid way though the first and hung on to lead 21 - 16 heading into the second . The Grizzlies battled back in the second and tied it up at 28 with six minutes left in the quarter , but the Jazz pulled away and settled on a 44 - 39 lead by halftime . The Jazz and Grizzlies played to a tie though the third , so that the Jazz took a five - point lead into the fourth . The Jazz expanded their lead to 11 , with 7:30 left in the fourth and did not look back from there , en route to their seventh straight win . Ricky Rubio led the way for the Jazz with 29 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 28 minutes of action . Rodney Hood followed up with 18 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , while Rudy Gobert tallied eight points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . The Jazz shot 42 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 22 from long range . Meanwhile , Andrew Harrison was the high - point man for the Grizzlies , with 23 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , in 35 minutes . Marc Gasol followed up with 20 points on 7 - of - 20 shooting , six rebounds , five assists , three blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes . Dillon Brooks and JaMychal Green chipped in 11 points each . The Grizzlies shot 42 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 36 ) will look to end a five game losing streak , as they take on the Thunder in OKC on Sunday . The Jazz ( 26 - 28 ) play host to the Hornets on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 116 - 103 , at Phillips Arena on Wednesday night . The two teams came into Wednesday night badly in need of a victory , as the Clippers ( 6 - 11 ) had lost a whopping nine straight while the Hawks ( 3 - 15 ) had dropped seven of their previous eight . The visitors turned out to want it just a bit more , as they rode a 9 - 2 run at the beginning of the fourth quarter to gain some distance and notch the double - digit road win . Los_Angeles enjoyed the benefit of some blistering shooting , as they posted a 58 percent success rate from the field , including 50 percent from three - point range . Blake Griffin unsurprisingly led the way for the Clippers with 26 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists and one steal . Wesley Johnson was right behind him with 24 points , a total he supplemented with one rebound , one assist , one steal and one block . Johnson went a red - hot 8 - for - 10 from the field , including 6 - for - 7 from three - point range . Lou Williams drew the start at two - guard and poured in 20 points , along with eight assists , one rebound and one steal . Austin Rivers contributed 18 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Marco Belinelli paced the Hawks with 20 points in 26 minutes off the bench . He also tallied three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Dennis Schroder turned in 19 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . Dewayne Dedmon supplied 17 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . John Collins was stellar while starting at power forward , providing a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and four steals . Taurean Prince notably scored just two points in 21 minutes , going 1 - for - 7 from the field . The Clippers head back to California to take on the Sacramento Kings in a Saturday night road showdown , while the Hawks are home against the New York Knicks on Friday evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 95 , at Philips Arena on Wednesday night . The Pacers ( 18 - 14 ) came into the game with a vastly superior record to the Hawks ( 7 - 24 ) , but it was n't evident by the play in the first half . Atlanta hung with Indiana virtually point - for - point on their home court , leading to a slim 53 - 51 halftime advantage for the visitors . However , the Pacers managed to be just a bit better than the Hawks in the second half , outscoring their hosts by a 52 - 44 margin . They got it done with the help of some solid marksmanship , as they saw five players shoot better than 50 percent , and another tally a 46 percent success rate . Meanwhile , they played effective defense overall , with Atlanta 's highest scorer , John Collins , posting a modest 18 points . Victor Oladipo led Indiana with 23 points , which he complemented with five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Myles Turner followed with 20 points and added six rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 19 points and also brought in one rebound and recorded two steals . Darren Collison registered 11 points , one rebound and one assist . Cory Joseph turned in 11 points , three boards and two assists in 28 minutes off the bench . Lance Stephenson filled out the stat sheet on the second unit , totaling 10 points , eight rebounds , six assists and one block . Collins supplemented his aforementioned team - high scoring haul with nine rebounds and one block . Kent Bazemore and Marco Belinelli managed matching 13 - point contributions from the starting five and bench , respectively . The former also offered three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , while the latter posted three assists and one rebound . Miles Plumlee collected 10 points , five rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Ersan Ilyasova matched Plumlee 's scoring total and added five boards and one assist . Dennis Schroder had a rare down game with eight points on 4 - for - 15 shooting , and he also dished out eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Taurean Prince had eight points , six rebounds , three assists and one block . The Pacers head back home and face the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday night , while the Hawks hit the road and do battle with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday evening .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 107 , at Philips Arena on Saturday evening . The teams fought to a tie through the first quarter . The second quarter stayed tight as well , with neither team taking a lead greater than a couple of possessions , with the Mavericks leading 53 - 48 at halftime . The Hawks started out the third with a 7 - 2 run to tie it up at 55 . They continued to apply pressure and led for most of the third before the Mavericks rallied back to take a one - point , 80 - 79 , lead heading into the fourth . Thing stayed close for most of the fourth , with the Mavs leading by two with 4:40 to go . However , the Hawks turned it up down the stretch , taking a slight edge and maintaining it for the final minutes . Dennis Schroder led the way for the Hawks , with 33 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 35 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova followed up with 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and a block , while John Collins chipped in 13 points , four rebounds and two assists , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Hawks shot 57 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led Dallas with 22 points on 10 - of - 21 shooting , in 34 minutes . J.J. Barea came up large off the bench , with 15 points , 12 assists , three steals and two rebounds , in 29 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and one block . The Mavericks shot 51 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from distance . The Mavs ( 9 - 25 ) play host to the Raptors on Boxing Day . The Hawks ( 8 - 25 ) play host to the Wizards on Wednesday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Orlando Magic , 94 - 88 , at Philips Arena on Sunday . In a battle between two bottom dwellers , Atlanta was able to prevail thanks to a big first half . In fact , a 35 - 25 second quarter in advantage of Atlanta really set the tone , as they carried a 13 - point lead into the half and never trailed in the second half . The shooting disparity was critical , as Atlanta shot 48 percent from the field while holding Orlando to just 34 percent . Rebounding was also huge , with the Hawks winning that battle , 52 - 41 . Ball movement was also a huge factor , with Atlanta recording 33 assists and Orlando handing out just 19 . The Hawks won despite attempting just one free - throw attempt , the lowest total from any team all season . The Magic ( 22 - 54 ) were led by D.J. Augustin , as he tallied 20 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Jonathan Issac totaled 15 points and four rebounds . Nikola Vucevic went just 3 - of - 19 from the field but still finished with 10 points , 14 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Aaron Gordon amassed 10 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Hawks ( 22 - 55 ) were led by Dewayne Dedmon , as he accrued 17 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . John Collins generated 10 points , 11 rebounds and two blocks . Tyler Dorsey led the bench with 19 points and two assists . Mike Muscala provided 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists off the bench as well . On deck for Atlanta is a road matchup versus the Miami Heat on Tuesday . Orlando also returns to action on Tuesday , as they travel to face the New York Knicks .
The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 115 - 86 , at Philips Arena on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 42 - 36 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to make it two wins in two nights against the hapless Hawks ( 22 - 57 ) , which they 'd upended by a 101 - 98 score on Tuesday in Miami to clinch a playoff spot . It would have likely to blame the visitors if they came out a bit flat as a result , especially with Goran Dragic sitting with an ankle injury . Matters seemingly played out that way in the first quarter , with Atlanta taking a 29 - 23 lead in the first 12 minutes . However , it was all Heat from that point forward , as they hit or eclipsed 30 points in each of the last three periods while allowing their hosts no more than 21 points in any one quarter . The disparity lead to a comfortable and runaway victory for Miami , which produced identical 45 percent tallies from the floor and three - point range . Josh Richardson and Kelly Olynyk led the way for the Heat with matching 19 - point efforts , with the latter notably notching 15 of his on five three - pointers in the second quarter . Richardson added four rebounds , two assists , four blocks and three steals , while Olynyk also supplied eight rebounds and five assists . Justise Winslow turned in 18 points , five assists and one rebound . Rodney McGruder drew the start at shooting guard with Tyler Johnson sliding over to point guard in Dragic 's place , and he produced 14 points , two boards , one assist and one steal . Wayne Ellington poured in 11 points off the bench and also ripped down three rebounds and recorded one steal . Derrick Jones , Jr. went for 10 points , four boards and one assist . Johnson collected just six points , two rebounds , two assists and one block over 23 minutes . Hassan Whiteside totaled a modest four points but did haul in 13 rebounds , dish out two assists and post three blocks . Taurean Price paced the Hawks with 20 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , one rebound and one steal . Damion Lee delivered 15 points , four boards , one assist and one steal . Tyler Dorsey matched Lee 's scoring total while leading the bench and also offered five rebounds , one assist and two steals . John Collins managed a full line of nine points , eight rebounds , four assists and one block . Dewayne Dedmon pitched in six points , eight boards and two assists . The Heat 's next stop is in the Big Apple , where they 'll face off with the New York Knicks on Friday night . The Hawks hit the road themselves and land in the Nation 's Capital , where they 'll tangle with the Washington Wizards on Friday evening , as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Miami Heat , 96 - 90 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday evening . This marks the Celtics ' fourth straight win , after they dropped their first two of the season . The Celtics led 74 - 63 after three quarters but the Heat gave them a scare with 70 run to bring it to a two - point game , with 2:16 left in the fourth . However , Kyrie Irving showed the poise of a champion as he poured in seven straight points for the Celtics , to seal the deal . Irving was the high - point man for the Celtics ( 4 - 2 ) with 24 points , on 10 - of - 23 shooting , along with four rebounds and three assists , in 33 minutes . Jayson Tatum had another impressive game , with 20 points and five rebounds , in 31 minutes . Al Horford was solid with 12 points , nine rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Marcus Smart chipped in 16 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 26 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Goran Dragic led the way for Miami ( 2 - 3 ) with 22 points , four assists , three rebounds and one block , in 36 minutes . Josh Richardson and James Johnson chipped in 16 points each , while Kelly Olynyk added 14 points , nine rebounds and three blocks , in 23 minutes off the bench . Justise Winslow hauled in 12 rebounds and contributed six points , three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 23 minutes . The Heat will look to bounce back as they play host to the Timberwolves on Monday . The Celtics play host to the Spurs on Monday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the hosting Miami Heat , 123 - 95 , at American Airlines Center on Sunday evening . The Warriors ( 18 - 6 ) were coming off a huge win against the Orlando Magic , and continued their road trip with another excellent performance on the offensive end of the court . Despite the fact the Heat ( 11 - 12 ) led after the first quarter and were down by two after half time , they simply could n't find a way to contain Golden_State in the second half . The reigning NBA champions won the third quarter 37 - 17 and 24 - 18 in the fourth , looking dominant in the process and improving their road record to 10 - 3 . Meanwhile , Miami fell to 5 - 6 at home . Stephen Curry led the Warriors offensively with 30 points , as the two - time MVP winner shot 11 - of - 16 from the field and 5 - of - 9 from three - point range . Kevin Durant added 24 points with seven assists , and Klay Thompson chipped in with 19 points , five rebounds , and four assists . Omri Casspi contributed with 10 points and six boards off the bench . At the other end , Goran Dragic led the way for the Heat with 20 points and Josh Richardson added 12 points , but they would have liked a better performance from Dion Waiters . The shooting guard only made one of his 10 field - goal attempts , and finished the game with four points in 24 minutes . Tyler Johnson ( 13 points ) and Kelly Olynyk ( 14 points , seven boards and five assists ) did a good job off the bench as well .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Miami Heat , 102 - 95 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . Despite the fact that Miami led for the majority of this game , it came down to the final seconds with Portland coming out as the victors . In fact , the Trail_Blazers led for less than five minutes , as they finished the game with a 32 - 16 fourth quarter to comeback and win . Free-throw shooting was a huge factor , with Portland hitting 20 - of - 23 and Miami going just 14 - of - 23 from the charity stripe . The Turnover differential was also a big factor , as Portland forced 16 turnovers from Miami , while committing just 11 on their end . The Trail_Blazers ( 14 - 13 ) were led by C.J. McCollum , as he tallied 28 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Damian Lillard struggled early on , but still finished with 18 points , three rebounds and six assists . Al-Farouq Aminu recorded a 15 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . The Heat ( 13 - 14 ) had all five starters score in double figures , as none of them reached 20 points . Dion Waiters was the closest , as he accrued 17 points , two rebounds and three assists . James Johnson flirted with a triple - double , as he collected 10 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Wayne Ellington was huge off the bench , dropping 24 points . On deck for Portland is a road matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Friday . As for Miami , they play host to the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday for their next fixture .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Miami Heat , 109 - 94 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . Miami are dealing with as many injuries as anyone right now , as they simply could n't match up with this potent New_Orleans roster in this game . The middle quarters were key , with New_Orleans outscoring Miami , 56 - 41 , as the Pelicans held the lead for the entirety of the second half . New_Orleans were lights - out , as they shot 53 percent from the field and 60 percent from three - point range . Miami shot just 42 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . The Pelicans ( 17 - 16 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and four blocks . DeMarcus Cousins finished with 16 points , seven rebounds , eight assists , two steals and three blocks . Jrue Holiday collected 13 points , six rebounds and four assists . Ian Clark was huge off the bench , as he dropped 19 points on 5 - of - 6 from three - point range . The visiting Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 115 - 107 , at Spectrum Center on Wednesday . LeBron James scored 31 points to lead the Cavaliers , but he was on the bench when the Cleveland ( 8 - 7 ) took the lead for good late in the game . James picked up his fourth foul with 3:31 to play in the third quarter , and went to the bench , trailing 82 - 79 . Moments later , Kyle Korver hit a 3 - pointer that gave the Cavaliers an 86 - 84 lead with 1:6 left in the quarter that they would not relinquish . James returned with 8:58 to play and help extend a 95 - 88 lead to double digits in the fourth quarter . Kevin Love totaled 22 points and 10 rebounds as the Cavaliers won their third consecutive game . Jeff Green had 13 points , while Korver added 11 and J.R. Smith had 10 . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist scored a season - high 22 points but could n't prevent the Hornets ( 5 - 8 ) from losing their fifth in a row . Kemba Walker had 20 points and seven assists . Nic Batum totaled 16 points , six assists and five rebounds in his first game of the season after a tearing a ligament in his left elbow in October . Both teams are back in action Friday with the Cavaliers playing host to the Los Angeles Clippers and the Hornets at the Chicago Bulls . Cavaliers : Host the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Washington Wizards , 133 - 109 , at Spectrum Center on Wednesday evening . The Hornets ( 18 - 25 ) have n't exactly made their mark as an offensive juggernaut this season , but one would n't have known it by looking at their first - half performance . Charlotte exploded for 77 points over the first 24 minutes , leading to a 16 - point halftime lead . The focus then turned to their defense in the third quarter , as they limited the Wizards ( 25 - 20 ) to just 18 points during the period while compiling another 25 themselves . That paved the way for the surprisingly easy win , which also evened the Hornets ' home record at 12 - 12 for the season . As the final score implied , it was a red - letter offensive night for the hosts , which tallied a 49 percent success rate from the field , including 48 percent from three - point range . Seven Charlotte players also hit double digits in the scoring column , and the second unit compiled 52 points with extended minutes in the runaway victory . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards with 26 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists and one block . Michael Scott collected a bench - leading 18 points and added three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Kelly Oubre , Jr. posted 16 points and five boards . John Wall had a near double - double of 12 points , nine assists , two rebounds and two blocks . Jason Smith poured in 10 points and also provided three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Otto Porter , Jr. ( six points , two rebounds , two assists ) and Markieff Morris ( two points , five boards , one assist ) had decidedly underwhelming efforts , while Marcin Gortat was held scoreless over 18 minutes but supplied eight rebounds , one assist and two steals . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist paced the Hornets with 21 points while also registering four rebounds , two assists and three steals , all over a modest 23 minutes . Kemba Walker mustered 19 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two blocks . Dwight Howard produced an 18 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and two blocks . Jeremy Lamb 's 16 points led the reserves , and he complemented the scoring with three rebounds and one block . Frank Kaminsky was productive off the second unit as well with 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Marvin Williams managed 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . Nicolas Batum poured in 11 points and also tallied four assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Wizards remain on the road and head to Motown for their next stop , where they 'll tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night . The Hornets remain home and await a Saturday night visit from the Miami Heat .
The Miami Heat defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 106 - 105 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday evening . The Heat started out well and controlled the lead for most of the first half , before taking a 57 - 48 lead into halftime . The Hornets came out much stronger in the third quarter , and chipped away until they tied it up at 73 , with 3:12 left in the quarter . They then went on a 100 run to close the quarter and take an 83 - 73 lead into the final frame . Despite trailing for most of the quarter , the Heat snuck up on the Hornets , as they closed the gap to 105 - 102 on a driving layup by James Johnson with 30 seconds left . The Heat then immediately stole the inbound pass and Johnson knocked down a game - tying three . The Hornets flopped on their last possession , which allowed the Heat one more push up the floor , where Kelly Olynyk was fouled . Olynyk knocked down one - of - two free throws to take the win . Wayne Ellington was the high - point man for Miami , with 26 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , in 36 minutes . James Johnson followed up with 22 points , seven assists and six rebounds , in 29 minutes , while Hassan Whiteside tallied 10 points , 14 rebounds and three assists , in 24 minutes . Kelly Olynyk added 16 points , 10 rebounds and three assists , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot 49 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Nicolas Batum led the Hornets with 26 points , six assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 33 minutes . Kemba Walker followed up with 22 points , seven assists , three rebounds and three steals , while Dwight Howard added 14 points , 15 rebounds , three blocks , an assist and a steal . The Hornets shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . The Hornets ( 18 - 26 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Kings on Monday . The Heat ( 27 - 19 ) take on the Rockets in Houston on Monday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 125 - 111 , at Spectrum Center on Thursday evening . The Nets ( 21 - 45 ) have been in spoiler mode for some time now , as any postseason aspirations they may have had are a distant memory . Brooklyn has been playing competitively in many of its losses , making them a dangerous opponent with nothing to lose . The Hornets ( 28 - 38 ) found that out the hard way Thursday , allowing a whopping 65 points to the visitors in the first half and then coming up with no real answers at intermission . The Nets racked up another 60 over the third and fourth periods and shot an impressive 51 percent overall . They benefited from an excellent performance by their second unit , which compiled 54 points . Allen Crabbe spearheaded the Nets ' efforts with 29 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Caris LeVert tallied a bench - leading 22 points and eight assists while also contributing four rebounds and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson generated an 18 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , two blocks and one steal . DeMarre Carroll pitched in 15 points , five boards , three assists , three steals and one block . Jarrett Allen registered 13 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Joe Harris poured in 11 points and dished out one assist . D'Angelo Russell posted eight points , two rebounds and two assists . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with 21 points and added six assists and two steals . Dwight Howard was next with 19 points , which he complemented with seven rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Jeremy Lamb accounted for 15 points and two rebounds . Cody Zeller and Malik Monk posted matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and one assist , and the latter totaling five assists , three rebounds and one block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist turned in 10 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Nets head back home and face off with the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday evening , while the Hornets remain home and await a Saturday afternoon visit from the Phoenix Suns .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 140 - 79 , at Spectrum Center on Thursday . The Hornets ( 32 - 41 ) had one of their best performances of the season , and they ended destroying a Grizzlies ( 19 - 53 ) team that could n't deny a bucket to save their lives . After jumping to a 37 - 14 advantage in the first quarter , Charlotte did n't sit back and did n't take the foot off the gas for one second . In fact , Charlotte won all three remaining quarters ( 38 - 28 , 37 - 15 and 28 - 22 , respectively ) and cruised their way to the biggest win of the entire season if we consider the point differential . Kemba Walker led the way for Charlotte since he had an impressive performance of 46 points , four rebounds and four assists , including a franchise - high 10 three - pointers . Marvin Williams had 15 points with six rebounds , and Jeremy Lamb filled the stat sheet thanks to 12 points , nine rebounds and six assists . Dwayne Bacon ( 15 points ) and Frank Kaminsky ( 14 points ) did a good job off the bench as well . Wayne Selden Jr. was the top scorer for the Grizzlies in this game , as he came off the bench and ended scoring 18 points while going 7 - 12 from the field . Tyreke Evans chipped in with 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Jarell Martin contributed 12 points and eight boards . No other Memphis player scored over 10 points , and the team as a whole shot just 38 percent from the field .
The Miami Heat took down the Utah Jazz , 84 - 74 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Friday . Miami ( 6 - 6 ) saw success on the defensive end in its fifth game of an extended road trip . In Utah , star center Hassan Whiteside dominated , pulling down a game - high 20 rebounds while anchoring the successful Heat defense . Whiteside delivered three steals and three blocks . Thanks to the strong defensive effort , Miami was able to stomach a sub - par scoring performance . The Heat shot only 30 - of - 77 from the field and dished out only ten assists as a team . Despite the poor offensive night , the Heat were able to pull ahead in the fourth quarter , establishing a double - digit lead in the final three minutes . Utah ( 5 - 7 ) has now dropped three straight home games after starting a perfect 50 this season . The Jazz have seen their fair share of struggles on the offensive end , and Friday epitomized the team 's issues . Utah shot only 34 percent from the field , coming up with only 74 total points on the night . Once again , Utah failed to find a solid primary option on offense . Guard Rodney Hood led the team with 19 points , but shot just 5 - of - 19 from the field . No Utah starter scored more than 12 points . Rookie Donovan Mitchell , who earned the start , scored 12 points but shot only 5 - of - 14 on the night . Utah will host Brooklyn on Saturday , while the Heat will visit Detroit on Sunday .
The Utah Jazz protected their home court on Saturday , defeating the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 121 - 108 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena . Utah ( 9 - 11 ) has started the season slowly , but remains a tough matchup on its home court . The Jazz are now 8 - 4 in Utah , and won Saturday 's home stand in impressive fashion . The team made 18 three - pointers , a new single - game franchise record . While it was the team 's eighth straight game without star center Rudy Gobert , the Jazz were able to excel without their franchise player . Rookie Donovan Mitchell led the team , pouring in 24 points including six made three - pointers . Off the bench , sixth man Rodney Hood added 21 points and knocked down three three - pointers . The inconsistent duo had a stellar night , helping Utah 's impressive efficiency with a combined 17 - of - 31 shooting performance . Utah also set a new season high in assists , dishing out 31 en route to the win . Milwaukee ( 9 - 9 ) is not lacking in talent , but has struggled to stay firmly over .500 early in the season . The Jazz were the second team in the last two weeks that Milwaukee allowed to set a franchise high in three - pointers . On Saturday , defense proved a major issue for the Bucks , as the team allowed over 56 percent of Utah 's shots to be successful . The Bucks were able to construct their own stellar offensive outing , shooting 53 percent as a team . Superstar forward Giannis Antetokounmpo led the team with 27 points and had 14 rebounds . However , perimeter defense proved to be too large an issue to overcome , as the Bucks were sent home easily on Saturday night . Utah will host the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Bucks will visit Sacramento .
The host Utah Jazz blew out the Washington Wizards at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday , 116 - 69 . The Jazz ( 13 - 11 ) have now won six straight , with Monday 's win coming in historic fashion . Monday 's blowout marked the second - largest margin of victory in franchise history for Utah . Center Rudy Gobert made his return to the lineup Monday after missing the past four weeks with a knee injury . Gobert contributed in limited fashion on the offensive end ( four points ) , but blocked two shots and had a steal on defense . Defense was the key for Utah , as Washington was held to just 28 percent shooting from the field . On the offensive end , guard Alec Burks had a team - high 27 points . The veteran has now turned in three straight performances of at least 24 points . Washington ( 12 - 11 ) , meanwhile , had its largest deficit of the season in Monday 's loss . The Wizards shot only 28 percent from the field and hit just four three - pointers on the night . Starters Bradley Beal and Marcin Gortat combined to go just 4 - of - 20 from the field in the loss , also contributing three turnovers . Washington also had a significant deficit on the glass , pulling down just 32 boards as opposed to 52 from Utah . It was an all - around off night for the Wizards , as only one Wizard scored more than 11 points in the game . The Jazz will visit OKC on Tuesday , while the Wizards will travel to Portland .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Utah Jazz , 112 - 101 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Thursday evening . Despite the Jazz 's strong home record , the Rockets came into Utah and took control from the start . The Rockets led 25 - 20 after one quarter and carried the five - point lead to halftime , where they led 51 - 46 . Houston came out firing on all cylinders in the third , where they outscored the Jazz 37 - 20 , to take an 88 - 66 lead into the final frame . The Rockets extended their lead to 24 points , before the Jazz took to a 90 run to make things interesting , however the Rockets pulled away for the win . This marks the eighth straight win for the Rockets , coinciding with Chris Paul 's return to the lineup . Paul was stellar in this one , with 18 points , 13 assists , nine rebounds , three steals and one block , in 36 minutes . James Harden finished with 29 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Ryan Anderson added 23 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . The Rockets shot 47 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 41 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 26 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Alec Burks followed up with 17 points , while Thabo Sefolosha chipped in 14 points off the bench . The Jazz shot 44 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . The Jazz ( 13 - 13 ) go on to take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Saturday . The Rockets ( 19 - 4 ) visit Portland to take on the Trail Blazers on Saturday .
The visiting New_Orleans Pelicans took down the struggling Utah Jazz , 108 - 98 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Wednesday . New_Orleans ( 19 - 18 ) snapped a quick two - game losing streak with Wednesday 's win . The team has had issues with depth all season , but was able to rely on its starters to take down Utah . The Pelicans ' starting five combined for 90 of the team 's 108 points and had 37 total rebounds . Superstar big man Anthony Davis led the way with 29 points and 15 rebounds . Davis played a team - high 40 minutes on Wednesday , helping make up for star center DeMarcus Cousins ' mildly limited minutes due to foul trouble . Cousins had five fouls on the night , but managed to record a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double nonetheless . Utah ( 16 - 22 ) , meanwhile , has lost 11 of its last 14 games . The team is still without star center Rudy Gobert ( knee ) . On Wednesday , Utah struggled to find reliable sources of offense . The team shot just 21 percent from three - point range and reached the free - throw line a meager 17 times . The top scorer for the Jazz , rookie Donovan Mitchell , had 24 points but shot just 6 - of - 17 on the night . Two of Mitchell 's buckets came in garbage time , when the rookie refused to let up his intense offensive push . Veteran Joe Johnson added another 20 points off the bench . The Jazz will visit Denver on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to Minnesota on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 97 - 90 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . Despite the fact that Utah were sizable favorites in this matchup , eight ties and six lead changes show just how close this game was . In fact , this game was within a single - digit margin for all but six minutes , as neither team led by more than seven points for the final 30 minutes of action . Free-throw shooting was huge for the Jazz , as they connected on 20 - of - 26 while the Mavericks hit just 12 - of - 14 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Utah recording seven more assists than Dallas while committing five fewer turnovers . Scoring down low was also big , with Utah winning that battle , 46 - 30 . The Mavericks ( 18 - 42 ) were led by J.J Barea , as he tallied 17 points , three rebounds and 12 assists . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 12 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks . Yogi Ferrell led the bench with 13 points , five rebounds and four assists . Dennis Smith Jr. had a game to forget , as he totaled seven points , seven rebounds , no assists and five turnovers on 2 - of - 11 from the field . The Jazz ( 31 - 29 ) got another gem out of Donovan Mitchell , as he led the team with 25 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Derrick Favors accrued 14 points and six rebounds . Rudy Gobert amassed 13 points and 10 rebounds while Joe Ingles accumulated 12 points , four rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . Both teams play home games on Monday for their next fixtures , with Utah welcoming the Houston Rockets and Dallas playing the Indiana Pacers .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Orlando Magic , 94 - 80 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . While there were 10 lead changes in the first 20 minutes , Utah held the lead for the entirety of the second half . The second quarter is where the game was decided , as the Jazz outscored the Magic , 29 - 15 , as Orlando never got the game within five points in the second half . Defense was once again the key for Utah , as they held Orlando to 34 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . Defensive rebounding was a big part of that , with the Jazz winning that battle , 42 - 30 . Utah ended up shooting 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . The Magic ( 20 - 44 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 15 points , 12 rebounds and three assists . Aaron Gordon finished with 13 points and six boards . Evan Fournier went just 4 - of - 18 from the field to total 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Jazz ( 34 - 30 ) got a gem out of Rudy Gobert , as he collected 21 points , 17 rebounds and two blocks . Donovan Mitchell accrued 19 points , five rebounds and four assists . Joe Ingles generated 18 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Ricky Rubio accumulated 12 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Both teams will play road games on Wednesday for their next outings , with Utah traveling to face the Indiana Pacers and Orlando facing the Los Angeles Lakers .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 102 - 87 , at Golden 1 Center on Sunday afternoon . The Raptors ( 17 - 7 ) had reason to believe they 'd have a relatively easy assignment despite the road setting , as the Kings ( 8 - 18 ) did n't have the talent to match Toronto on paper . While that 's not always the best measuring stick for how a game will unfold , it was reasonably accurate Sunday . The visitors started fast and kept their foot on the gas , turning a modest 22 - 17 first - quarter lead into a 54 - 46 halftime advantage . The Raptors would go on to outscore Sacramento by a 48 - 41 margin in the second half , sealing the double - digit road victory in efficient fashion . While the Kings actually enjoyed a strong shooting afternoon marked by a 48 percent success rate from the field , they ultimately committed 21 turnovers while only eliciting 13 from Toronto . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 25 points , nine assists and three rebounds . Serge Ibaka managed 20 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Kyle Lowry contributed a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one steal . C.J. Miles tallied a bench - leading 11 points and added two rebounds , one assist and five steals . Jonas Valanciunas contributed nine points , eight boards and a steal . Backup Jakob Poeltl matched his scoring total and also hauled in four rebounds . Zach Randolph paced the Kings with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Buddy Hield led the bench with 17 points and complemented them with three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Bogdan Bogdanovic supplied 15 points , one rebound and one assist . Jakarr Sampson was solid off the bench with 11 points , four rebounds , three blocks and one steal . The Raptors continue their West Coast swing with a visit to the Los Angeles Clippers on Tuesday evening , while the Kings remain home and tangle with the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 109 - 95 , at Golden1 Center on Thursday evening . The Cavs got out to a quick 12 - 6 lead but the Kings battled back to take a 28 - 27 lead by the end of the first quarter . The Kings continued the strong effort through the second quarter , outscoring the Cavs , 34 - 28 , to take a 62 - 55 by halftime . The Cavs tightened things up through the third quarter , but still trailed 85 - 80 heading into the final frame . The Kings pushed their lead to 14 early in the fourth and were able to keep enough of a cushion to come out with the impressive win . Vince Carter was on fire and came up clutch in the final minutes for Sacramento . Carter finished with a team - high 24 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting , along with five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 29 minutes of action off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein finished with 17 points , nine rebounds , four assists and one block , while Bogdan Bogdanovic tallied 16 points , eight assists , four steals , three rebounds and one block , in 30 minutes . The Kings bench outscored the Cavs bench 68 - 32 . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Kevin Love finished with a team - high 23 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting for Cleveland . LeBron James tallied a triple - double with 16 points , 14 assists and 10 rebounds , in 37 minutes . J.R. Smith was the only other player to score in double digits for the Cavs , with 15 points . The Cavs shot 44 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . The Cavaliers ( 24 - 11 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Saturday . The Kings ( 12 - 22 ) play host to the Suns on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings took down the Denver Nuggets , 106 - 98 , at Golden 1 Center on Saturday . The Kings ( 13 - 25 ) had been slipping a bit recently , having gone just 1 - 3 through the first four games of their current home stand . On Saturday , however , the team was able to turn its luck around . Recently-returned rookie De'Aaron Fox was dominant in his second game back from a quad injury . Fox led the team with 18 points and seven assists . Fox was one of seven Kings players to score in double digits on Saturday . One of those players , Willie Cauley-Stein , had 17 points and was a major factor on the defensive end . Cauley-Stein came away with seven steals , a new career high and the most by any Sacramento player this season . Cauley-Stein 's active defense was a big reason for Denver 's turnover issues . The Nuggets turned it over 25 times on the night . Denver ( 21 - 18 ) had issues managing the ball in what was the second half of a back - to - back for the young team . Three different Nuggets starters - Nikola Jokic , Jamal Murray , and Wilson Chandler - committed five turnovers on the night . Though Denver was able to match or exceed the Kings ' shooting splits across the board , lost possessions due to turnovers wound up being the difference in the game . Jokic , Denver 's star center , had an interesting night , as he led the team with 10 assists but struggled to crash the glass or find his shot . He went just 3 - of - 10 from the field en route to eight points and had only seven rebounds . The Nuggets will visit Golden State on Monday , while Sacramento will host the San Antonio Spurs .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the host Sacramento Kings , 119 - 104 , at Golden One Center on Friday . Though the final score would not indicate it , Friday 's California clash was a relatively close game throughout . The Kings ( 16 - 35 ) remained within single digits of the defending champions for the majority of the game , and trailed by just one point with seven minutes left in regulation . From there , though , it was all about Kevin Durant . Durant had 10 consecutive points for the Warriors ( 41 - 11 ) , including two big three - pointers to help the team reclaim a double - digit lead . Golden_State scored 20 points in total in the final seven minutes of the game , helping to open up a commanding lead on the Kings ' home court . Durant finished the game with a team - high 33 points , which came on 12 - of - 17 shooting . Steph Curry had 23 points , while Klay Thompson added another 20 . The trio 's strong play helped make up for the team 's relatively high number of turnovers . Golden_State committed 25 on the night , which was just one away from tying its season high . For the Kings , all five starters scored in double digits in what was a relatively strong showing for the first 42 minutes . Veteran Zach Randolph led the team with 18 points and seven rebounds . Rookie forward Justin Jackson added another 17 , shooting 7 - of - 13 on the night . Both teams face the second half of a back - to - back on Saturday , as the Warriors travel to Denver while Sacramento hosts the Dallas Mavericks .
The Dallas Mavericks took down the host Sacramento Kings , 106 - 99 , at Golden One Center on Saturday . Dallas 's Yogi Ferrell helped to spark a fourth quarter run that helped push the Mavericks to victory . While Ferrell finished with just 11 points , the bulk of those came in rapid succession , as he knocked down three straight three - pointers to fuel a game - winning final push for the Mavs . The team outscored Sacramento by 11 points in the fourth , helping to push them over the edge to victory . It was a balanced approach in the win for Dallas ( 17 - 36 ) , as six players scored in double digits . This included all five starters , as well as Ferrell . The team 's high scorer was Harrison Barnes , who scored 18 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . Rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. also had a solid game , scoring 12 points to go with five rebounds and five assists . The team as a whole shot 49 percent from the field and hit 13 three - pointers . Sacramento ( 16 - 36 ) dropped their second straight game with the loss . The team was able to shoot very effectively , hitting 53 percent of its shots from the field . However , getting to the free - throw line proved immensely difficult . The team attempted only six free - throws in the game , compared to 14 for Dallas . Rookie De'Aaron Fox led the team with 15 points and also came away with three steals . Sacramento will host the Chicago Bulls on Tuesday , while the Mavericks will visit the Los Angeles Clippers .
The host Sacramento Kings took down the New_York Knicks , 102 - 99 , in a last - second thriller at Golden 1 Center on Sunday evening . The game came down to the wire after New_York ( 24 - 40 ) started the fourth quarter on an impressive run . After out - scoring Sacramento 27 - 16 through the first 11 minutes of the fourth , the Knicks had the game tied at 99 - 99 . Sacramento ( 20 - 44 ) , though , had possession , and sophomore big man Skal Labissiere was able to make the most of it . Labissiere received the inbounds pass with five seconds remaining and stepped into a three - pointer , knocking the shot down to win the game with 2 seconds remaining . In addition to his clutch shot , Labissiere had 14 points , six rebounds , and three blocks . He shot 5 - of - 10 and added to what was a relatively efficient offensive night for the Kings . Rookie guard Bogdan Bogdanovic , though , was the driving force for the Sacramento offense . He led the team with 22 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting and had seven assists while committing no turnovers . The Knicks , meanwhile , have now lost 12 of their last 13 games . Since All-Star big man Kristaps Porzingis went down with an ACL tear , the team has been among the league 's worst . On Sunday , the team struggled to hit from three - point range . New_York went just 6 - of - 21 from beyond the arc . Tim Hardaway , Jr. was the team 's leading scorer with 24 points . The Knicks will visit Portland on Tuesday , while Sacramento will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings took down the Orlando Magic , 94 - 88 , at Golden 1 Center on Friday night . The Kings ( 21 - 45 ) led by as much as 15 in what was a fairly cut - and - dry win for the struggling team . Head coach Dave Joerger earned his 200th career win with the victory , though wins have been few and far between for Sacramento this season . The same can be said for Orlando ( 20 - 46 ) , who struggled to make anything happen on Friday night . The team shot just 42 percent in the game and 31 percent from beyond the arc . Garrett Temple led the Kings with 23 points and knocked down four of the team 's nine three - pointers . Big man Kosta Koufos , meanwhile , scored a season - high 18 points to go with 13 rebounds . Koufos logged a team - high 38 minutes as he enjoyed a breakout night , shooting 9 - of - 12 from the field and committing only one turnover . Orlando , meanwhile , saw a game - high 25 points from Jonathan Simmons . Simmons reached the free - throw line nine times , accounting for more than half of Orlando 's makes and attempts from the charity stripe . Unfortunately for the Magic , their bench was unable to contribute anything meaningful . The Orlando second unit had only 21 points on 8 - of - 24 shooting in the loss . The Magic will visit the Clippers in Los Angeles on Saturday , while the Kings travel to Denver to see the Nuggets on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings closed out the regular season by defeating the Houston Rockets , 93 - 86 , at Golden 1 Center on Wednesday night . Houston ( 65 - 17 ) was coming off a back - to - back and had already secured the league 's top overall record , and thus opted to rest a number of key players . James Harden , Chris Paul , Clint Capela , and Eric Gordon all sat out for rest on Wednesday . With the powerhouse Rockets severely undermanned , the Kings ( 27 - 55 ) were able to close out the season on a high note . Sacramento took an early lead and never looked back , never trailing over the final three quarters of the game . Willie Cauley-Stein led Sacramento with 22 points and 11 rebounds . The Kings largely scored by committee , as seven players scored in double figures despite the team only putting up 93 points in total . Buddy Hield was the top scorer off the bench , finishing with 14 points as well as five rebounds and five assists . The Rockets , meanwhile , were led by 31 points from Gerald Green . Despite Green 's stellar contribution , the Rockets largely struggled on offense . shooting under 38 percent from the field and hitting only eight free - throws . R.J. Hunter added another 19 points for the Rockets while receiving a spot in the starting lineup . Sacramento will not suit up again until next season . Houston , meanwhile , will gear up for the first round of the 2018 NBA Playoffs , in which they will face the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 116 - 110 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday . Despite the fact that there were only four ties and two lead changes in this game , it was close throughout the second half . In fact , it was a single - digit margin for the final 18 minutes . Denver actually overcame a 22 - point halftime deficit by going on a 27 - 2 run in the third quarter to take their one and only lead . Rebounding was decisive for the Knicks , as they outrebounded the Nuggets 49 - 36 . New_York ended up shooting 50 percent from the field while holding Denver to just 41 percent shooting . The Nuggets ( 3 - 4 ) were led by Nikola Jokic , who accumulated 28 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Jamal Murray finished with 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Gary Harris collected 18 points , three assists , three steals and two rebounds . The Knicks ( 3 - 3 ) got a career - high from Kristaps Porzingis , who led the team with 38 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . Tim Hardaway Jr. accrued 13 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Kyle O'Quinn came off the bench to provide 15 points , 12 rebounds and five blocks . Both teams play again on Wednesday , with Denver hosting the Toronto Raptors and New_York hosting the Houston Rockets .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Tuesday . This was one of the most competitive games of the season , as it took an overtime session to decide a winner . In fact , there were 17 ties and 20 lead changes in total , with neither team ever leading by more than 10 points . Defense was key for New_York , as they held Los_Angeles to 41 percent shooting . The Knicks ended up hitting 48 percent of their shots and 41 percent from three - point range . The Lakers ( 10 - 16 ) were led by Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , as he tallied 24 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Lonzo Ball finished with 17 points , eight points , six assists and two steals . Brook Lopez amassed 14 points , four rebounds and three assists . Kyle Kuzma led the bench with 19 points and six rebounds . The Knicks ( 14 - 13 ) got another gem out of Kristaps Porzingis , as he accrued 37 points , 11 rebounds and five blocks . Enes Kanter totaled 14 points and 11 rebounds . Jarrett Jack scored just three points , but still provided six rebounds and 10 assists . Michael Beasley , Frank Ntilinka and Doug McDermott all reached double figures in scoring off the bench .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the New_York Knicks , 100 - 91 , at Madison Square Garden on Tuesday evening . The Spurs ( 26 - 12 ) had to come from behind after losing the first quarter to the Knicks ( 18 - 19 ) by a 29 - 25 score , but eventually settled and delivered another strong performance in what was a record - setting night for Gregg Popovich . The long - time head coach registered his 1,176 career win , passing George Karl for fifth most in the history of the NBA . Despite the fact the Spurs had to rally for this win , they looked absolutely in control as soon as the second quarter started . The biggest difference here was the third quarter , since the 29 - 18 lead from the Spurs over that period was a differential the Knicks could mount back . LaMarcus Aldridge and Kawhi Leonard carried with the Spurs ' offense in this game . Aldridge finished with 29 points and five rebounds , while Leonard filled the stat sheet and proved to be quite a weapon on both ends of the court after contributing with 25 points , eight boards , four assists , and four steals . Pau Gasol chipped in with 11 points and eight rebounds , while Manu Ginobili added 12 points off the bench . Michael Beasley led the way for the Knicks after registering 18 points and nine rebounds coming off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis contributed with 13 points , the same amount as Courtney Lee and Lance Thomas , although the Latvian star also added nine boards . Enes Kanter had 12 points and Jarrett Jack added 10 , meaning all five starters for New_York scored in double digits .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New_York Knicks , 121 - 112 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday evening . The Celtics ( 42 - 19 ) have been more renowned for their defense than their work on the other end of the floor , although the team 's stellar record is naturally the product of a strong all - around effort . However , the script was somewhat flipped Saturday , as Boston 's offense turned out to be the linchpin of what was a third consecutive road triumph . After a tight first quarter that saw the Knicks ( 24 - 37 ) emerge with a slim 24 - 23 advantage , the visitors exploded for 36 points in the second to take a 59 - 56 halftime lead . They kept their foot on the gas in the second half as well , outscoring their hosts by a 62 - 56 margin to secure the victory . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with a near triple - double with 31 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Jaylen Brown followed with 24 points , three rebounds and one assist . Terry Rozier provided a bench - leading 14 points and supplemented them with three rebounds and one assist . Al Horford posted a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks . Jayson Tatum delivered a full line of 11 points , five boards , four assists , four steals and one block . Marcus Smart matched Tatum 's point total off the bench and added five assists , two rebounds and three steals across 28 minutes . Daniel Theis drew the start for Aron Baynes ( elbow ) and generated six points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Trey Burke continued his stellar play while pacing the Knicks with 26 points in 26 minutes off the bench . He added eight assists and one steal . Tim Hardaway Jr. poured in 17 points and added two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Michael Beasley contributed 15 points , eight boards and one steal . Troy Williams accounted for 14 points , four rebounds and one steal . Emmanuel Mudiay supplied 13 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Enes Kanter registered nine points , 12 boards , one steal and one block . Frank Ntilikina totaled eight points , five boards , one assist and one steal . The Celtics head back home to tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday evening , while the Knicks remain in the Big Apple and await a visit from the defending champion Golden State Warriors on Monday night as well .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 124 - 101 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday . Despite the fact that Charlotte either led or tied for the entirety of the first quarter , that 's the only time this game was competitive . In fact , a 35 - 26 second quarter set the tone for the Knicks , as a 42 - 17 third quarter was the dagger . Charlotte actually never got the game within 20 points in the fourth after that devastating third quarter . The shooting differential was key , with New_York hitting 49 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range while holding Charlotte to 37 percent from the field and 27 percent from long range . Much of that can be attributed to ball movement , with the Knicks recording 24 assists and the Hornets handing out only 11 assists . The Hornets ( 30 - 40 ) had no player surpass 15 points scored , as Dwayne Bacon led the team with 15 points and three assists off the bench . Frank Kaminsky and Malik Monk both provided 12 points apiece off the bench as well . Dwight Howard led the starters with 14 points and 13 rebounds . Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum combined for 12 points , four assists and no steals . The Knicks ( 25 - 45 ) had just one starter in double figures , as Tim Hardaway Jr. tallied 25 points , three rebounds and three assists . Enes Kanter amassed nine points and nine rebounds . Four bench players reached double figures , as Frank Ntilinka , Trey Burke , Troy Williams and Isaiah Hicks combined for 54 points . Both teams return to action on Monday , with New_York playing host to the Chicago Bulls and Charlotte traveling to face the Philadelphia 76ers .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 110 - 92 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday . While there were seven ties and 14 lead changes in the first half , New_York really dominated in the second half . The middle quarters were the difference , with the Knicks outscoring the Bulls , 64 - 49 . Defense was key for New_York , as they held Chicago to 33 - of - 92 from the field and 3 - of - 30 from three - point range . Rebounding was also a huge factor , with the Knicks outrebounding the Bulls , 61 - 48 . The Bulls ( 24 - 46 ) were led by Cristiano Felicio , as he tallied 17 points and six rebounds . No other starter had more than eight points , as Cameron Payne tallied four points , six rebounds and six assists starting for Kris Dunn . Bobby Portis led the bench with 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Noah Vonleh also played well off the bench , providing nine points and 12 boards . The Knicks ( 26 - 45 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he amassed 22 points , two rebounds and two steals . Michael Beasley finished with 17 points , six rebounds and two assists . Enes Kanter accrued 10 points and 13 rebounds in 17 minutes of action . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with New_York traveling to face the Miami Heat and Chicago playing host to the Denver Nuggets .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the New_York Knicks , 108 - 104 , at Madison Square Garden on Friday evening . The Timberwolves ( 42 - 31 ) likely were n't taking anything for granted coming into the matchup , but the Knicks ( 26 - 47 ) probably turned out to be a more formidable opponent than they expected . New_York appeared to be in a spoiler mindset , and remained as close as 105 - 101 with 1:39 remaining . A trio of free throws from Karl-Anthony Towns ( one ) and Jeff Teague ( two ) then extended the lead to seven with 11 seconds remaining , giving Minnesota the needed cushion to escape the Big Apple with a win and clinch their first winning record since the 2005 - 6 season . Towns paced the Timberwolves with 24 points , 13 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal . Taj Gibson posted 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . Andrew Wiggins generated a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Nemanja Bjelica matched Wiggins ' scoring total and added six rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Jamal Crawford tallied a bench - leading 13 points and also supplied three assists and one rebound . Teague pitched in 10 points and eight assists . Tim Hardaway was brilliant while leading the Knicks , accounting for 39 points , three assists , two rebounds and three steals . Trey Burke contributed a bench - leading 15 points , which he complemented with nine assists , two rebounds and two steals . Frank Ntilikina pitched in 13 points , five boards , three assists and one steal . Enes Kanter delivered an 11 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Michael Beasley mustered eight points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Timberwolves continue their trek through the Northeast and visit the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday night , while the Knicks head to the Nation 's Capital to do battle with the Washington Wizards on Sunday evening .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Washington Wizards , 102 - 99 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Lakers made up for a tough Dodgers loss after a thrilling affair matching up the elite John Wall against No . 2 overall pick Lonzo Ball . The matchup went back and forth through the first half with the Wizards eventually pulling away in the third quarter . However , the Lakers ( 2 - 2 ) defense rejuvenated the youthful team in the fourth quarter where they held the Wizards ( 3 - 1 ) to just 13 points . With just a few ticks on the clock remaining , Brandon Ingram missed a driving layup but followed up with a tip on his own rebound with one second left to send the game to overtime . The overtime period started off in favor of Bradley Beal after a basket , a pair of free throws and a floater continued to give Washington the momentum , but the Lakers kept up on each possession including two big three - pointers from Kyle Kuzma and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . After a Julius Randle dunk which put Los_Angeles up three points with four seconds remaining , John Wall missed a relatively clean look from three as the Lakers walked away with their first home win of the season . Bradley Beal led all scorers with 28 points , to go with six rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block , while John Wall struggled from the field but still posted 18 points on 7 - of - 22 shooting . Jodie Meeks was efficient off the bench for Washington and contributed 11 points in 16 minutes while adding three steals on the defensive end . Lonzo Ball struggled more than Beal with his jumper and finished just 2 - of - 11 from the field , but added 10 assists and eight rebounds , including some highlight worthy full court feeds . Ingram was the hero in the fourth quarter and added 19 points and 10 boards on 50 percent shooting . Both teams play on Friday , as the Wizards head north to face the Golden State Warriors , while the Lakers host the Toronto Raptors .
The Phoenix Suns edged out the Los_Angeles Lakers , 122 - 113 , at Staples Center on Friday . Phoenix ( 6 - 11 ) is now 6 - 8 on the season since parting ways with head coach Earl Watson . On Friday , the team saw strong offensive output , with six players scoring in double figures . Third-year guard Devin Booker delivered a game - high 33 points , knocking down six three - pointers along the way to the win . Three-point shooting proved key to the victory for the Suns , as the team hit 13 shots from beyond the arc on over 40 percent from the field . Off the bench , Phoenix enjoyed strong play headed up by young big man Alex Len . Len delivered a season - high 18 rebounds to go along with 17 points , which led the team 's second unit . The Lakers ( 6 - 10 ) , meanwhile , took the loss but still saw plenty of positives in the win . Rookie forward Kyle Kuzma continued his impressive campaign , scoring a career - high 30 points to lead the team and go along with ten rebounds . Recently-acquired center Brook Lopez , meanwhile , scored 19 points and blocked four shots .LA saw four starters score at least 13 points , with rookie Lonzo Ball being the sole exception . Ball 's struggles continued , as he scored just six points despite playing 38 minutes . The rookie shot 3 - of - 7 from the field and committed three turnovers along with just six assists . On Sunday , Phoenix will host the Bulls while the Lakers will host the Nuggets .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 127 - 109 , at Staples Center on Sunday . Los_Angeles ( 7 - 10 ) bounced back from a two - game losing streak with Sunday 's promising win . Though they faced tough competition in the Nuggets , the Lakers delivered one of their strongest showings of the season , winning by 18 points . Key to the team 's success was the play of rookie point guard Lonzo Ball . While Ball has largely struggled this season , ranking last in the league in true shooting percentage , he impressed on Sunday . The UCLA alum had his second career triple - double , finishing the night with 11 points , 16 rebounds , and 11 assists . Off the bench , meanwhile , fourth - year forward Julius Randle delivered a huge performance . Randle scored 24 points , had seven rebounds , and dished out five assists . Denver ( 9 - 7 ) , meanwhile , saw a worst - case scenario occur , as the team was only able to see 25 combined minutes from its star big man duo of Nikola Jokic and Paul Millsap . Jokic , along with Nuggets head coach Mike Malone , was ejected early in the game after an exchange with a referee . Millsap , meanwhile , exited the game with a sprained left wrist . As a result , the Nuggets were forced to play shorthanded for over half the game . Backup center Mason Plumlee filled the void with 29 disappointing minutes off the bench . The big man went just 2 - of - 10 at the free - throw line en route to eight points . The Nuggets ' duo of young point guards , Jamal Murray and Emmanuel Mudiay , also delivered sub - par outings . The two combined to shoot just 4 - of - 20 from the field . Murray , who had delivered three straight games of at least 18 points , scored only ten while shooting 2 - of - 11 from the field . The Nuggets will visit Sacramento on Monday , while the Lakers will host the Chicago Bulls on Tuesday .
The Golden_State Warriors escaped a near - upset at Staples Center on Wednesday , defeating the Los_Angeles Lakers , 127 - 123 in overtime . Golden_State ( 16 - 6 ) looked shockingly sluggish throughout regulation , committing 20 turnovers and trailing for large portions of the second half . Former back - to - back MVP Steph Curry , in particular , started the game on a slow note , going just 3 - of - 10 and committing five turnovers in the first two and a half quarters . By overtime , however , Curry looked back to his MVP form , as he finished the game 9 - of - 20 from the field with 28 points . Curry sealed the game at the line in the final seconds after Draymond Green regained possession for the Warriors following a rare Curry miss at the charity stripe . Kevin Durant added an additional 29 points for the Warriors , shooting 12 - of - 25 from the field . Durant hit multiple late - game jumpers to help force overtime . Los_Angeles ( 8 - 13 ) put up a valiant effort against the reigning champions , but ultimately came up short . Still , the team saw a career night from sophomore star Brandon Ingram . Ingram was the game 's leading scorer at 32 points , as he put up a new career high on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Rookie Lonzo Ball also turned in an impressive performance . Although he has largely struggled with his shot this season , Ball hit three three - pointers in Wednesday 's game . Two of those came during a personal 80 run that Ball went on in the third quarter . The Lakers added 49 points off the bench in what was a well - rounded team effort on Wednesday . The Warriors will visit Orlando on Friday , while the Lakers will visit Denver on Saturday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 109 - 99 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . Memphis ( 11 - 23 ) had been in the midst of a free - fall coming into Wednesday 's matchup . The Grizzlies had lost 20 of their last 23 games before picking up a double - digit win on Wednesday . While the Grizzlies initially pulled ahead , a tough third - quarter rally from the Lakers had the game tied heading into the fourth quarter . In the fourth , though , Memphis ' offense was able to pull away with the game . 12 of the team 's 33 fourth - quarter points came from veteran guard Tyreke Evans , who finished the night with a team - high 32 . Evans added seven rebounds and seven assists . Marc Gasol also made a splash in the game , finishing with nine rebounds and five assists in addition to his 11 points . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 22 ) , meanwhile , was shorthanded on Wednesday . Guard Lonzo Ball ( shoulder ) and center Brook Lopez ( ankle ) sat out of Wednesday 's action . It was a rough night for rookie Kyle Kuzma without his fellow rook , as he shot just 4 - of - 24 from the field including 1 - of - 11 from three - point range . Kuzma was a primary contributor to the Lakers ' rough team shooting splits . The team shot just 38 percent from the field on the night and 29 percent from beyond the arc . Brandon Ingram led the team with 23 points , but had some frustration throughout the night , as he committed five turnovers and went just 5 - of - 11 at the free - throw line . Ingram was assessed a technical for complaining about a call in the game 's final minute . The Lakers will tangle with the Clippers on Friday , while the Grizzlies visit the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 108 - 94 , on their home court on Friday night . The Hornets ( 15 - 23 ) had clear control of the game by the end of the first half , as they held a 15 - point lead . While shots were n't always falling for Charlotte , the Hornets benefited from an awful offensive showing from the home team . The Hornets were able to hold the Lakers to just 40 percent shooting from the field , and allowed only 12 free - throw attempts on the night . On offense , Charlotte was carried by a few strong performances . Kemba Walker finished the night with 19 points , a team high . Off the bench , Jeremy Lamb scored an efficient 17 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . The team recorded 26 team assists as well , as ball movement was a focus throughout . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 27 ) had yet another pitiful showing on both ends , leading to their ninth straight loss . Rookie point guard Lonzo Ball returned to the starting five following an extended absence due to a shoulder sprain . Ball played fairly well , scoring 11 points and dishing five assists in 27 minutes . Unfortunately , the same could not be said of his fellow rookies . Kyle Kuzma shot just 2 - of - 14 for four points on the night . He also committed three turnovers . Josh Hart , meanwhile , shot just 1 - of - 6 . The team as a whole shot only 40 percent from the field and went just 9 - of - 12 at the free - throw line . Los_Angeles will host the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday , while the Hornets will host the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Denver Nuggets , 112 - 103 , at Staples Center on Tuesday . It was a game of runs , and it was ultimately a fourth - quarter push by Los_Angeles ( 31 - 36 ) that secured a home - court win . The Lakers , led by rookie forward Kyle Kuzma , outscored Denver 35 - 21 in the fourth to earn a victory . Kuzma led the team with 26 points and 13 rebounds , including five three - pointers . He also dished out two assists . Eight of those points came in a 90 - second span in the middle of the fourth quarter , helping the Lakers pull ahead before the game 's close . Julius Randle matched Kuzma 's production , also scoring 26 points and pulling down 13 rebounds . Randle , though , was especially effective on the offensive glass , where he pulled down a whopping seven boards . Randle was also assessed a technical in the closing moments after a heated exchange with Denver star Nikola Jokic . Both big men were slapped with technicals following the testy confrontation , which included Randle shoving Jokic to the ground . Veteran forward Wilson Chandler was the top scorer for Denver with 26 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting . Chandler played a whopping 41 minutes , which was also a team high . Unfortunately for the Nuggets , it was a tough night for their bench unit . Denver 's second unit shot just 9 - of - 29 on the night for 25 points . The Lakers will fly to the Bay Area to take on the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday night . Meanwhile , Denver will return home to host the Detroit Pistons on Thursday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Orlando Magic , 105 - 83 , at Amway Center on Friday . The recent forms of these teams would indicate an easy win for Orlando , but Chicago was in charge for the majority of this matchup . The second half is where the Bulls really separated themselves , outscoring the Magic , 61 - 38 . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Chicago winning the rebounding battle , 48 - 38 . The Magic really struggled shooting , hitting just 41 percent from the field , 29 percent from three - point range and 60 percent from the free - throw line . The Bulls ( 2 - 5 ) were led by Justin Holiday , who tallied 19 points , two rebounds and two steals . David Nwaba amassed 16 points , five rebounds and two steals . Lauri Markkanen totaled 13 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Robin Lopez amassed 11 points and 10 rebounds en route to a double - double . Kris Dunn , Denzel Valentine and Paul Zipser all reached double figures off the bench . The Magic ( 6 - 3 ) got 21 points , five rebounds and three assists out of Even Fournier . Nikola Vucevic accrued 14 points , three rebounds and two assists . Aaron Gordon collected 11 points , seven rebounds and two assists . No other player on the roster scored more than eight points . Chicago will have a quick turnaround , as they host the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday for their next game . Orlando will host the Boston Celtics on Sunday for their next fixture .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Orlando Magic , 104 - 88 , at Amway Center on Sunday . Boston have now won eight - straight games , as they now sit with the best record in the NBA . This was a decisive win too , considering Boston held a double - digit lead for the final 10 minutes . They really separated themselves in the second and fourth quarters , outscoring the Magic 54 - 37 . Defense was key for the Celtics , as they held the Magic to 36 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . Boston also won the rebounding battle , 55 - 45 . The Celtics ( 8 - 2 ) had all five starters score in double figures , even though none of them played more than 28 minutes . Jaylen Brown led them with 18 points , seven rebounds and two steals . Al Horford recorded a double - double , amassing 14 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Marcus Smart flirted with a triple - double off the bench , collecting 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . The Magic ( 6 - 4 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , who tallied 18 points and 12 rebounds . Nikola Vucevic accrued 13 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . Evan Fournier and Terrence Ross combined to shoot just 4 - of - 26 from the field as the starting guards . Boston will be in action again on Monday , as they travel to play the Atlanta Hawks . As for Orlando , they host the New York Knicks on Wednesday for their next game .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 127 - 105 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic ( 15 - 35 ) had an impressive performance in this game , and dominated the Lakers ( 19 - 31 ) from start to finish , to the point that they won each quarter separatedly on route to a massive win that also ended their three - game losing skid . Orlando grabbed a four - point advantage after one , and increased it to seven at halftime . The biggest differential came in the third , as Orlando pulled away thanks to a 43 - 30 huge lead in the third , and the Lakers did n't have enough response through the remainder of the game . It was a convincing win for Orlando , and one that should definitively boost their confidence going forward . The Magic had a balanced performance on offense , since seven players ended scoring in double digits . Marreese Speights led the way for Orlando with 21 points in just 23 minutes , while Elfrid Payton filled the stat sheet thanks to 15 points , seven rebounds , six assists , and four steals . Evan Fournier had 19 points and Jonathon Simmons added 14 . Mario Hezonja ( 14 points ) , Shelvin Mack ( 13 points and six assists ) and D.J. Augustin ( 12 points ) contributed nicely off the bench as well . Jordan Clarkson and Julius Randle led the way for the Lakers , as each ended with 20 points although Randle added nine rebounds as well . Brandon Ingram had 13 points , six boards and five assists , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope had 12 . Kyle Kuzma finished with 11 points and three boards off the bench .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Orlando Magic , 115 - 98 , at Amway Center on Saturday . Despite the fact that this game was close throughout the first half , Washington really took control from there . A 31 - 22 third quarter was the difference , as Orlando never got the game within 15 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Ball movement was the difference in the game , with the Wizards recording 35 assists and Orlando handing out just 17 dimes . That led to Washington shooting 54 percent from the field and Orlando hitting just 44 percent of their shots . The Magic ( 15 - 36 ) had no player surpass 15 points scored , as Jonathon Simmons led the starters with 15 points , two rebounds and two steals . Elfrid Payton accrued 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . Mario Hezonja led the bench with 15 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Wizards ( 30 - 22 ) were led by Otto Porter , as he tallied 20 points , four rebounds and five assists . Tomas Satoransky totaled 19 points , three rebounds , six assists and three steals . Bradley Beal accumulated 18 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Markieff Morris amassed 16 points , three rebounds , three assists and three steals .
