Both teams play road games on Monday for their next fixture , with Orlandi traveling to play the Miami Heat and Washington facing the Indiana Pacers .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Orlando Magic , 90 - 82 , at Amway Center on Friday evening . As their records clearly imply , the Bulls ( 25 - 51 ) and Magic ( 22 - 53 ) are simply playing out the string on a pair of non - playoff seasons , which theoretically could lead to an interesting dynamic when facing each other . Despite their unsightly marks this year , the two clubs are not devoid of talent by any means , and accordingly , much of that shined through in what was an entertaining and competitive first half befitting of two teams with much better records . Chicago did pull away in the second to establish a 13 - point halftime lead , but a lopsided third period in which Orlando outscored the visitors by a 25 - 9 margin gave them a three - point lead heading into the final period . However , to their credit , the Bulls flipped the script almost entirely in the fourth , forging a 24 - 13 edge that gave them the eight - point margin of victory . Poor shooting on the part of both squads ( Bulls- 36 percent/ Magic- 33 percent ) led to plenty of rebounding opportunities , and the Magic won the battle on the glass by a 55 - 53 margin . Lauri Markkanen led the way for the Bulls with 13 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Sean Kilpatrick matched his scoring total off the bench and also delivered four boards and two assists . Cameron Payne followed with 11 points , six assists , two rebounds and one block . Cristiano Felicio mustered eight points , 16 rebounds and one assist . Justin Holiday poured in eight points of his own and also posted one rebound , two steals and one block . Noah Vonleh followed with eight points , 11 boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Ryan Arcidiacono tallied eight points as well , along with one assist and two steals . Bobby Portis registered seven points , five rebounds and two blocks . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 18 points and also provided seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . D.J. Augustin totaled 15 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . Nikola Vucevic accounted for 12 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Shelvin Mack managed nine points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jamel Artis went for eight points and four boards . Ricky Purvis drew the start and delivered five points , two boards , one assist and one steal . The Bulls head back home to face the Washington Wizards in an Easter Sunday battle , while the Magic pay a visit to the Hawks on Sunday evening as well .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Orlando Magic , 137 - 100 , at Amway Center on Friday . The Hornets ( 35 - 45 ) had one of their best scoring performances of the season and even though they are solely playing for their pride , it is clear that Charlotte has some nice pieces going forward . This time , they outplayed the Magic ( 24 - 55 ) right from the start of the game , and jumped to an 18 - point lead after the first quarter . Charlotte never looked back and in fact they were so dominant that they managed to win all four quarters separatedly : 43 - 25 , 29 - 24 , 31 - 26 and 34 - 25 . The Magic looked outmatched on both ends of the court , and Charlotte cruised their way towards an easy win . Dwight Howard has been a beast on the paint of late , and once again delivered a great performance of 16 points , 17 rebounds and four blocks , so he made his presence felt on both ends of the court , Kemba Walker had 13 points and four assists , while Marvin Williams added 18 points . The team 's top scorers came from the bench , however , as Malik Monk had 26 points and eight dimes , while Frank Kaminsky had 21 points . Orlando rest some of their best players for this game , but they still had some notable performances worth highlighting . D.J. Augustin was the top scorer with 19 points in just 18 minutes . Rodney Purvis , Khem Birch and Jamel Artis had 12 points , while Mario Hezonja added 11 . Wesley Iwundu finished with 10 points , and Marreese Speights added 14 off the bench .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 117 - 111 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . In a game that went down to the wire and was n't decided until the very last second , the Hawks stunned the Mavs and came away with a surprising win on the road at Dallas . Atlanta led 58 - 47 at the break , but Dallas came out of nowhere to tie it 82 - 82 after three . The final minutes of the fourth quarter were quite sloppy , but Atlanta held on and secured the win thanks to a few clutch free throws in the final minute of the game . Dennis Schroder led the Hawks offense with 28 points and seven assists in 34 minutes . Marco Belinelli provided a scoring punch off the bench with points , and John Collins added 14 from the second unit as well . Second-year forward Taurean Prince fell one point shy of a double - double thanks to nine points and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. might be on the losing end of this one , but there is no question the first - year point guard did a good job in his NBA debut . The former NC State standout contributed with 16 points and 10 assists , but at the same time , he committed three turnovers . Nerlens Noel provided 16 points and 11 rebounds off the bench , while Wesley Matthews added 15 points , eight rebounds and five assists . The small - forward , however , also committed five turnovers .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 104 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday night . The Cavaliers ( 6 - 7 ) have n't made it look easy this season , even in wins . They 've seemingly had their share of challenges against even the weakest of opponents , with Saturday 's performance serving as a textbook example . Cleveland could n't get a handle on the Mavericks ( 2 - 11 ) in the first half , which resulted in a surprising 52 - 49 halftime deficit . The unexpected developments seemed to shake them up during intermission , as the defending Eastern Conference champs exploded for 34 points in the third period to take an 83 - 74 lead into the fourth quarter . Dallas was n't done yet , however , as they rattled off a 100 run that brought them to within 91 - 90 with 6:44 remaining . They would close the gap to one again with 2:51 remaining after a Wesley Matthews ' three - pointer , but the Cavs were able to stave them off the rest of the way to seal the win . Cleveland notably established an advantage on the glass , winning the rebounding battle by a 53 - 42 margin . Kevin Love led the way for the visitors with a 29 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . LeBron James turned in a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double and added four assists and one block . J.R. Smith posted 17 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jae Crowder supplied 15 points , seven boards and three assists . Kyle Korver led the bench with 13 points - - all which he scored in the fourth quarter - - and added three rebounds . Harrison Barnes paced the Mavericks with a 23 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Dwight Smith , Jr. followed with 21 points , seven assists , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Dirk Nowitzki turned in 14 points , brought down five boards and recorded both a steal and a block . Matthews poured in 12 points overall and complemented them with six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Devin Harris and J.J. Barea co - led the bench with matching nine - point tallies . The Cavaliers next head to the Big Apple to tangle with the New York Knicks on Monday night , while the Mavericks do battle with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday evening .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 122 - 105 , at American Airlines Center on Monday . Dallas have struggled all season , but a wire - to - wire win here may be what they need to get going . In fact , they led by at least eight points for every second after the first six minutes . Shooting was key , with the Mavericks hitting 57 percent of their shots , while holding the Nuggets to under 42 percent . Scoring down low was huge as well , as Dallas outscored Denver , 64 - 42 , in the paint . The Nuggets ( 13 - 10 ) had to play this game without Nikola Jokic and Paul Millsap , as they simply could n't match up with his hungry Dallas team . Will Barton led the team , as he provided 23 points , eight rebounds and six assists off the bench . Jamal Murray led the starters with 22 points , despite not recording a rebound or an assist . Gary Harris accrued 21 points , three rebounds , four assists and three steals . Kenneth Faried amassed 13 points and 11 rebounds . The Mavericks ( 7 - 17 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he amassed 22 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Dennis Smith Jr. collected 20 points , five rebounds and three assists . Devin Harris , Dwight Powell and Yogi Ferrell all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , as Dallas travel to play the Boston Celtics , while Denver travels to face the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Toronto Raptors , 98 - 94 , at American Airlines Center on Tuesday evening . On paper , the matchup between one of the Eastern Conference 's best squads and the struggling Mavericks ( 10 - 25 ) looked like a considerable mismatch , but that 's why the games unfold on the hardwood . The Raptors ( 23 - 9 ) came into Tuesday looking to extend their winning streak to seven games , but Dallas , who had secured seven of the nine wins they 'd notched prior to the contest in their home arena , had other ideas . The Mavericks jumped on the visitors early , forging a 31 - 23 first - quarter lead on the strength of impressive efforts from the frontcourt duo of the ageless Dirk Nowitzki and the emerging Maxi Kleber . Toronto mounted enough of a comeback in the second period to close the deficit to 57 - 54 by halftime , but the home squad did just enough in the second half to maintain their razor - thin advantage . Both clubs clamped down on defense in the final 12 minutes , as a scant total of 29 points were scored in the quarter . However , the Mavericks ' defense was the more impressive of the two , as they limited their guests to a 34 percent success rate from the field , including 31 percent from three - point range . Kyle Lowry led the way for the Raptors with 23 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , six assists and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas posted a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Serge Ibaka provided a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double in his own right while also recording a trio of blocks . DeMar DeRozan had one of his worst shooting nights of the campaign , draining only three of his 16 shot attempts on his way to eight points . He did add five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jakob Poeltl led the bench with nine points and also supplied four boards , one steal and one block . J.J. Barea paced the Mavericks with 20 points , four assists and three rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . Nowitzki followed with 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist , three blocks and one steal . Harrison Barnes posted a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of assists . Kleber poured in 15 points to go along with eight rebounds , two assists , five blocks and two steals . Dennis Smith , Jr. contributed eight points on 3 - for - 14 shooting , but he also tallied five rebounds and four assists . Wesley Matthews had trouble finding the net as well , going just 2 - for - 9 from the field while totaling a modest five points , four rebounds , three assists and one block . The Raptors remain on the road and are right back in action on Wednesday , when they 'll face off with the Oklahoma City Thunder . The Mavericks are also back on the court Wednesday night , when they 'll tangle with the Indiana Pacers in a road tilt as well .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 125 - 122 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday evening . The Warriors ( 30 - 8 ) entered this game as heavy favorites , but they had to work harder than expected to defeat a Mavericks ( 13 - 26 ) team that made things quite difficult for the reigning NBA champions . Golden_State built a decent 35 - 26 lead in the first quarter , but Dallas answered back in the second and third quarters to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth . Both teams went back and forth and it was tied at 122 late in the game . But a late three - pointer from Steph Curry and solid defense in the final play of the game allowed Golden_State to come away with a win on enemy soil . Stephen Curry led the way offensively for the Warriors with 32 points , eight assists and six rebounds while shooting 6 - of - 13 from three - point range . Both Klay Thompson and Kevin Durant ended with 25 points , although the former Oklahoma City Thunder filled the stat sheet since he also added 10 rebounds , six assists , and four blocks . Draymond Green chipped in with 18 points , 10 boards , and six assists . Seven Dallas players scored in double figures , as Dwight Powell led the way off the bench with 21 points and seven rebounds . Wesley Matthews had 19 points , while Harrison Barnes contributed with 18 . Dennis Smith Jr. chipped in with 14 points and eight assists , and Dirk Nowitzki came close to a double - double after registering 12 points and eight boards .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Dallas Mavericks on overtime , 107 - 101 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday afternoon . The Lakers ( 15 - 27 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the NBA of late , and they delivered another impressive outing as they went out to defeat the Mavericks ( 15 - 29 ) on the road . It was a back - and - forth game during the first half , however , as the Lakers jumped to a 31 - 20 lead in the first quarter , only to see Dallas storming back and creating a six - point advantage ( 52 - 46 ) at the break . The Lakers won the remaining two quarters by three points each , so the game needed five extra minutes to decide what would have happened . And Los_Angeles won the OT period 12 - 6 , pushing their winning streak up to four games . Meanwhile , Dallas has lost four of their last six . Julius Randle was the biggest star for the Lakers , as the power forward delivered a strong double - double of 23 points and 15 rebounds . Lonzo Ball struggled from the field going 4 - for - 13 , but he filled out the stat sheet thanks to nine points , seven rebounds , and seven assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope had 17 points . Kyle Kuzma ( 18 points , 10 rebounds ) and Jordan Clarkson ( 19 points ) starred off the bench as well . Yogi Ferrell led the Mavericks offense , finishing with 11 points , 10 rebounds , and four assists . The highest scorer was Dennis Smith Jr. , however , as the rookie point guard chipped in with 23 points . Harrison Barnes and Wesley Matthews had 17 points each , and Dwight Powell left his mark off the bench after contributing with 13 points and four boards .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 114 - 109 , at American Airlines Center on Tuesday . Despite the fact that Dallas attainted the first lead of the game , that would mark their only lead in this matchup as Sacramento controlled from there . In fact , Sacramento led by at least five points from the end of the first quarter all the way to the final whistle . The Kings actually led by 23 points at the half , but Dallas got it close at the end thanks to a 38 - 26 fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was vast , with Sacramento connecting on 54 percent of their shots and Dallas hitting just 46 percent from the field . The rest of the statistics were eerily similar , with the rebounding , assisting , blocks and turnover differentials all within one . The Kings ( 18 - 38 ) were led by Zach Randolph , as he tallied 22 points , seven rebounds and three assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Bogdan Bogdanovic accrued 19 points , five rebounds and four assists . Justin Jackson totaled 12 points , six rebounds and three assists while De'Aaron Fox finished with 11 points , four rebounds and seven assists . The Mavericks ( 18 - 40 ) got a gem from J.J. Barea in his return from injury , as he led the team with 19 points , five rebounds and 13 assists . Harrison Barnes accumulated 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Dennis Smith Jr. provided 17 points , three rebounds and three assists while Dwight Powell led the bench with 18 points , six rebounds and five assists . Sacramento will have to play again on Wednesday , as they travel to play the Houston Rockets . Dallas is now on their all - star break , as they wo n't return to action until February 23rd in a road matchup versus the Los Angeles Lakers .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 115 - 109 , at American Airlines Center on Tuesday . Despite the fact that this matchup looked lopsided on paper , 10 ties and 14 lead changes show just how close this game was . With that said , Dallas held the lead for the final 20 minutes of action , as Portland simply could n't recapture the lead . Turnovers really killed the Trail_Blazers , as they committed 13 of them while forcing just seven from the Mavericks . Three-point shooting was also huge , with Dallas hitting 17 - of - 44 while Portland connected on just 10 - of - 40 . Fastbreak points were also critical , with the Mavericks winning that battle , 21 - 12 . The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 30 ) were led by Damian Lillard , as he tallied 29 points , five rebounds and eight assists on just 6 - of - 20 from the field . C.J. McCollum finished with 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Jusuf Nurkic totaled 15 points and 13 rebounds . Shabazz Napier led the bench with 13 points and four assists . The Mavericks ( 24 - 54 ) had all five starters reach double figures in scoring , as Dennis Smith Jr. led them with 18 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . J.J. Barea amassed 15 points , two rebounds and five assists . Harrison Barnes and Dirk Nowitzki each went 5 - of - 14 from the field as they scored 15 and 14 points respectively . On deck for Dallas is a road matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Wednesday . As for Portland , they travel to face the Houston Rockets on Thursday for their next outing .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Washington Wizards , 103 - 98 , at Barclay 's Center on Tuesday . In a battle between two teams near the bottom of the Eastern Conference , it came down to the final possessions . In fact , there were 10 ties and 21 lead changes in total , as it was a single - digit margin for all but a few minutes . In fact , it was within a five - point margin for the final eight minutes . Both teams really struggled offensively , as they both shot just 40 percent from the field and less than 25 percent from three - point range . Ball movement was key for Brooklyn , as they recorded 26 assists , while holding Washington to just 18 assists . A 44 - 37 defensive rebounding margin was key as well for the Nets . The Wizards ( 14 - 13 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 28 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Otto Porter was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 11 points , five rebounds and three assists . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 12 points and nine rebounds . The Nets ( 11 - 15 ) got a double - double out of Rondae Hollis-Jefferson , as he totaled 16 points and 12 rebounds . DeMarre Carroll accrued 15 points and eight rebounds . Allen Crabbe went just 3 - of - 15 from the field , but still finished with 13 points , five rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie collected 11 points , six rebounds , 12 assists and two steals . Caris LeVert led the bench with 16 points , three rebounds and eight assists .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Brooklyn Nets on overtime , 114 - 113 , at Barclays Center on Monday . The Nets ( 15 - 25 ) made things difficult for a streaking Toronto ( 28 - 10 ) team , but the Canadian franchise eventually ended securing a win after a tight contest that needed an overtime period to find a winner . The Raptors always seemed to be in control , but the Nets found a way to respond time and time again , including on a 36 - 29 fourth - period lead that sent the game to OT . It seemed another overtime would be needed to find a winner , but a clutch free throw from DeMar DeRozan lifted Toronto to a huge win on the road that pushed their winning streak to five games . DeMar DeRozan led the way offensively for the Raptors , as the reigning Eastern Conference Player of the Week contributed with 35 points and six assists . Three other Toronto players had doubles - doubles . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 21 points and 13 rebounds , Kyle Lowry added 18 points with 11 assists , and Serge Ibaka had 11 points , 12 rebounds , and six blocks . Spencer Dinwiddie had a great performance for the Nets , as the talented guard finished with 31 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson filled the stat sheet thanks to 14 points , 17 boards , and five assists . Allen Crabbe chipped in with 20 points and eight rebounds , while Jarrett Allen 14 points and five rebounds . Joe Harris chipped in with 12 points .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 100 - 95 , at Barclays Center on Wednesday evening . The Spurs ( 30 - 16 ) and the Nets ( 16 - 29 ) delivered a game that ended being far tighter than what anyone would have expected , but the Western Conference team ended coming out on top . It was n't easy , however , as the Nets never gave up and in fact Brooklyn looked impressive in the fourth quarter , so much that they could have easily evened things up had they reacted sooner . San_Antonio jumped on top quickly , as they won the first quarter 31 - 26 and maintained that five - point advantage heading into halftime . The Spurs extended that lead in the third , and entered the final 12 minutes with a 12 - points advantage . Brooklyn reacted and made it a close contest late in the fourth , but it was too late and San_Antonio ended winning a tough game on the road . LaMarcus Aldridge was the star of the game for San_Antonio , as the power forward once again carried a heavy load on the offense and finished with 34 points and eight rebounds . Patty Mills had one of his best games of the season coming off the bench , as the Australian point guard chipped in with 25 points on 7 - of - 10 from the field . Pau Gasol came close to a triple - double after notching 13 points , 12 rebounds and seven assists . Allen Crabbe was the top scorer for the Nets , as the talented scorer registered 20 points with eight rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie struggled from the field since he finished with nine points on 3 - of - 13 from the field , but had 12 assists and two steals . Joe Harris ( 18 points ) and Caris LeVert ( 13 points ) made an impact off the bench . DeMarre Carroll had 11 points and 10 boards .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 116 - 108 on Wednesday at Barclays Center . Wednesday night was the complete , efficient team effort that the Nets ( 19 - 33 ) needed to end their four - game winning streak . Point guard D'Angelo Russell embodied that efficiency , as despite still being limited off the bench in his slow return from a knee injury , Russell shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 22 points in just 17 minutes as a reserve . He was only outdone by starting point guard Spencer Dinwiddie , who scored a team - high 27 points in 34 minutes thanks to his ability to get to the free throw line , shooting 13 - of - 15 from the charity stripe . In all , five Brooklyn players scored in double figures while the team shot 41 percent from three and 51 percent from the field overall , as they managed to torch a stout Philadelphia defense . That poor defensive effort from the 76ers ( 24 - 24 ) ended up being the difference in Wednesday 's game , as the team still managed to have a pretty solid overall effort on the offensive end , shooting 39 percent from three and 47 percent from the field overall . Joel Embiid , Ben Simmons and J.J. Redick accounted for majority of Philly 's offensive production , with the three starters combining to score 73 of the team 's 108 points Wednesday . Embiid led the way with a monster double - double of 29 points and 14 rebounds in 38 minutes . Up next , the Nets will remain home Friday and play the Lakers , while the 76ers will return home Friday to take on the Heat .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 109 - 94 , at Barclays Center on Sunday afternoon . The Bucks ( 29 - 23 ) came into Sunday 's game sporting a clear advantage on paper , and they appeared seemingly ready to validate it by taking a 36 - 22 first - quarter lead . Their edge had grown to 62 - 41 by intermission , a margin that strongly hinted at a runaway road win . However , the Nets ( 19 - 35 ) came out of the halftime locker room playing with some pride , racking up 31 points in the third period while limiting their visitors to 21 . That brief surge ultimately was n't enough , though , as Milwaukee prevented Brooklyn from narrowing their deficit beyond seven points . As has been the case with many of the Nets ' opponents , the Bucks thrived on the glass , outrebounding their hosts by a sizable 54 - 36 margin . They also were sharp from the field , as evidenced by a 52 percent success rate overall , including a solid 42 percent from behind the arc . That well - balanced production helped the visitors overcome an early exit from star big man Giannis Antetokounmpo , who left the game with 7:34 remaining after hurting his right ankle . Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Bucks with 28 points on 12 - for - 20 shooting , a total he supplemented with six assists , four rebounds and one steal . John Henson followed with a massive 19 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two blocks . Antetokounmpo finished with 16 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one block in 28 minutes before being sidelined . Khris Middleton matched his scoring total and added four rebounds and one assist . Jabari Parker was once again successful in his second game back , leading the second unit with 11 points , two assists , one rebound , two blocks and one steal . Tony Snell was held scoreless over 31 minutes but did pitch in three rebounds and one block . DeMarre Carroll and Caris LeVert co - led the Nets with 15 points apiece . The former also supplied three rebounds and one block , while the latter managed one assist . Jarrett Allen drew another start at center and generated 14 points and seven rebounds . Allen Crabbe poured in 11 points and also posted five boards . Spencer Dinwiddie mustered a modest nine points but dished out 10 assists and recorded three steals . Quincy Acy produced seven points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Joe Harris was productive off the bench as well with eight points , five rebounds and three assists . The Bucks remain in the Big Apple in anticipation of a Tuesday night battle with the New York Knicks , while the Nets remain home and await a visit from the Houston Rockets on that same evening .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 118 - 115 , at Barclays Center on Monday evening . The first quarter kicked off the high - scoring contest with both the Nets and Grizzlies getting out to a good start . The Nets took a 32 - 31 lead after the first quarter . The Grizzlies rallied ahead to a 47 - 40 lead mid way through the second quarter , but the Nets battled back to take a two - point , 65 - 63 , lead by halftime . The Grizzlies came out strong in the third and outscored the Nets 31 - 22 in the quarter , to take a 94 - 87 lead heading into the final frame . The Nets answered back in the fourth , tying it up at 94 with 10 minutes left in the game . They then used a 90 run mid way through the quarter to take an eight point lead , which was enough of a cushion to keep them ahead the rest of the way . Allen Crabbe led the Nets with 22 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block , in 27 minutes . Caris LeVert tallied 22 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block , in 24 minutes off the bench . D'Angelo Russell finished with 14 points , seven assists , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 29 minutes . The Nets shot 50 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 40 from long range . Meanwhile , JaMychal Green came up big for Memphis , with 14 points , 16 rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block in 29 minutes . Andrew Harrison tallied 19 points , eight assists , one rebound and one block , while Wayne Selden added 17 points , three rebounds and two assists , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 52 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 23 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 51 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the 76ers in Philadelphia on Wednesday . The Nets ( 23 - 48 ) play host to the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 129 - 111 , at Pepsi Center on Wednesday evening . The Nuggets ( 4 - 4 ) were not messing around in their first game back home after a four - game trip , as they poured in a season - high 129 points in a convincing victory over the Raptors ( 4 - 3 ) . They pounced on the Raptors , taking a 34 - 19 lead by the end of the first quarter . Toronto woke up in the second quarter but only managed the trim one point off the lead before halftime . However , the Nuggets poured in 43 third - quarter points to take a 103 - 69 lead into the final frame , where they turned on cruise control . Jamal Murray was the high - point man for Denver , with 24 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting , along with three rebounds and two assists in 21 minutes . This marked the third straight 20 - point game for Murray . Nikola Jokic only scored eight points on 4 - of - 10 shooting , but dominated the glass with 16 rebounds and dropped 10 dimes , along with two blocks and a steal in 30 minutes . Paul Millsap added 20 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals in 26 minutes . The Nuggets shot 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from long range , while assisting on 35 of their 47 field goals . Meanwhile , Norman Powell led the Raptors with 14 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 28 minutes . Four other players scored in double digits for Toronto , including Delon Wright , who finished with 12 points and six assists in 25 minutes off the bench . Serge Ibaka chipped in 11 points , while DeMar DeRozan finished with 10 points . Kyle Lowry had nine points , five rebounds and four assists . The Raptors will continue their road trip as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Friday . The Nuggets play host to the Heat on Friday .
The host Denver Nuggets recorded a season - best scoring output as they blew out the New_Orleans Pelicans , 146 - 114 , at Pepsi Center on Friday . Denver ( 9 - 6 ) has now won four of its last five games after Friday 's monstrous scoring night . The Nuggets scored a new season high , recording 146 points in the win . Sophomore guard Jamal Murray recorded a team - high 31 points in his second 30 - point outing of the season . Murray was one of three Nuggets to score in double digits and six to score in double figures . Denver shot a whopping 63 percent from the field on the night , also marking a new season high for the squad . Denver splashed in 18 three - pointers on the night , shooting 52 percent from beyond the arc . The team finished the game on a high note , scoring 82 second - half points and 40 in the fourth quarter . New_Orleans ( 8 - 8 ) delivered a surprisingly balanced performance in the loss . The Pelicans saw six players score in double digits , with Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins combining for only 31 points in the game . Cousins shot just 6 - of - 16 en route to 14 points , weighing down the Pelicans ' offense which shot a solid 53 percent from the field . Davis wound up leading the team with 17 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting from the field . Point guard Rajon Rondo , who recently returned from injury , shot 6 - of - 8 en route to 13 points in what proved to be an ultimately futile effort against Denver . The Nuggets will visit LA and the Lakers on Sunday , while New_Orleans will host the Thunder on Monday .
The Philadelphia 76ers narrowly edged out the Denver Nuggets , 107 - 102 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . Philadelphia ( 16 - 19 ) will be happy to have the win , as it had gone just 1 - 5 over its last six games . Moreover , star center Joel Embiid ( rest ) was not active for Saturday 's contest . Still , the team earned the win , thanks in large part to a strong defensive effort . The Sixers held the Nuggets to just 40 percent shooting overall and 7 - of - 32 shooting from beyond the three - point line . On the offensive end , six Philadelphia players scored in double digits , in what was a balanced effort for the team . Dario Saric led the Sixers with 20 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting . It was a rare off night for rookie star Ben Simmons despite the win . Simmons had just six points and committed five turnovers on the night . For Denver ( 19 - 17 ) , the loss is the second straight in tough , last - minute fashion . The team struggled to find its shot throughout the night , despite a team - leading performance from sophomore guard Jamal Murray . Murray shot 11 - of - 23 en route to a team - high 31 points . The 20 - year - old is now averaging 19 points per game in the month of December . Star center Nikola Jokic also had a big night , scoring 19 points to go with 13 rebounds . The duo combined to shoot 16 - of - 18 at the free - throw line , reaching the charity stripe more times than the entire 76ers team . Philadelphia will travel to Phoenix on New Year 's Eve . Denver , meanwhile , will host Phoenix next Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 134 - 111 , at Pepsi Center on Wednesday evening . The Nuggets ( 20 - 17 ) have already been one of the toughest teams to knock off in their home arena this season , as they came into Wednesday 's game with a 12 - 4 record at Pepsi Center . That alone stacked the odds against the Suns ( 15 - 25 ) , and travel issues that delayed their flight into early Wednesday morning certainly did n't help their cause whatsoever . However , the way that Denver 's Gary Harris was shooting , it 's unlikely anything could have derailed the home squad . The talented two - guard led all scorers with 36 points , draining 14 of his 17 shots from the field , including three of his five from long distance . His efforts helped spearhead a stellar 62 percent shooting effort overall for the Nuggets , which also won the rebounding battle by a comfortable 48 - 35 margin . To their credit , Phoenix responded to a 34 - 26 first - quarter deficit by exploding for 41 in the second to forge a 67 - 61 halftime lead . That quickly evaporated in the third quarter , however , as Denver outscored the visitors by a 37 - 18 margin in the third to pull away for good . Devin Booker paced the Suns with 17 points , which he supplemented with five assists and two rebounds . Greg Monroe saw the floor for the first time since Dec. 21 and managed a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists . Marquese Chriss matched Monroe 's scoring total and added four rebounds , one assist and five steals . Josh Jackson managed a bench - leading 14 points and added two boards , two assists and one steal . T.J. Warren supplied 13 points , five rebounds , five assists , four steals and one block . Harris added four rebounds , three assists and two steals to his game - high scoring total . Wilson Chandler tallied 17 points , seven boards , four assists and two blocks . Trey Lyles led the second unit with 16 points , 11 rebounds and one assist . Nikola Jokic posted 14 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Jamal Murray registered 13 points , two assists , two steals and one block . Will Barton ( 12 points , six assists and three rebounds ) and Malik Beasley ( 10 points , three assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block ) were productive off the bench as well . The Suns head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday night , while the Nuggets remain home to face the Jazz on Friday evening as well .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 125 - 116 , at Pepsi Center on Friday evening . The Nuggets got out to a great start at home , as they outscored the Lakers 37 - 28 in the first quarter . They expanded their lead to 13 early in the second , before the Lakers made a push to cut the deficit to just one , as they trailed 47 - 46 , 5:30 into the quarter . The Nuggets managed to stay ahead until halftime , where they led 65 - 62 . The Nuggets came out strong in the third and led for most of the quarter , until the Lakers made a push to finish the quarter on a 11 - 4 run , and take a 96 - 94 lead into the fourth . The Lakers kept a slight edge for most of the fourth quarter , but the Nuggets kept chipping away and managed to reclaim a 112 - 110 lead with 4:24 left in the contest . The Nuggets closed the game on a 13 - 6 run , that propelled them to the much - needed win . All five starters scored in double digits for Denver , led by Jamal Murray who finished with 22 points , eight assists , four steals , three rebounds and one block , in 35 minutes . NIkola Jokic and Paul Millsap followed up with 21 points each , while Gary Harris tallied 19 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Will Barton added 13 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Nuggets shot 51 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Brook Lopez led the Lakers with 29 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting , in 32 minutes . Julius Randle followed up with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 17 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Lakers shot 50 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 34 from long range . The Lakers ( 29 - 36 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavaliers on Sunday . The Nuggets ( 36 - 30 ) play host to the Kings on Sunday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 100 - 96 , at Pepsi Center on Thursday evening . With the tight playoff race between the two teams coming to a head , it was only fitting that Thursday 's matchup was a back - and - forth thriller . While Minnesota ( 44 - 35 ) opened up a lead in the second quarter thanks to an 80 run , neither team was able to truly establish command of the game . The Nuggets ( 44 - 35 ) began to turn things around in the late third and early fourth quarter , when veteran guard Devin Harris scored eight quick points to jump - start the team 's offense . The game went down to the wire , but the Nuggets were able to earn the win after All-Star power forward Paul Millsap hit two free - throws to put them up by five points with 34 seconds remaining . Harris had 20 points off the bench , providing much - needed life to Denver 's second unit . The Nuggets saw only six other points from their bench , all from big man Mason Plumlee . Sophomore guard Jamal Murray led the team in scoring overall , shooting 8 - of - 16 en route to 22 points . Star center Nikola Jokic flirted with a triple - double , finishing with 16 points , 14 rebounds , and nine assists . The win moved Denver into a tie with Minnesota for eighth in the Western Conference standings with only three games remaining . The Timberwolves , meanwhile , were led by their own star big man . Karl-Anthony Towns had 26 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting along with 13 rebounds in the narrow loss . Veteran Taj Gibson was also a major factor for the Wolves , scoring 17 points and grabbing six offensive rebounds . Ultimately , though , the Timberwolves had excessive trouble scoring from three - point range . Minnesota went just 6 - of - 24 from beyond the arc in the loss . The team remains without All-Star wing Jimmy Butler ( meniscus ) , and is still making a push for the first Minnesota playoff berth in 13 years . Both teams will travel to Los Angeles for their next game , with the Timberwolves playing the Lakers on Friday and the Nuggets visiting the Clippers on Saturday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 140 - 131 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . Defense was not a priority in this contest , as the Pacers shot 52 percent from the field on their way to the inflated win , while the Nets fell short shooting 48 percent from the field . The Nets scored 30 points or more in every quarter but faltered as they let the Pacers pour in 41 points in the third quarter . Jeremy Lin was forced to leave the game due to a knee injury after 25 minutes of action . Three players topped 20 points for the Pacers ( 10 ) , led by Victor Oladipo , who finished with 22 points , five rebounds , four assists and four steals in 24 minutes . Myles Turner was outstanding with 21 points , 14 rebounds , four blocks and two assists , in 33 minutes , while Darren Collison finished with 21 points , 10 assists , three rebounds and two steals . Thaddeus Young came up large with 17 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Lance Stephenson and Domantas Sabonis chipped in 16 points each , as all the new faces meshed for the win . Meanwhile , the new faces on Brooklyn ( 0 - 1 ) were running and gunning just the same . D'Angelo Russell led the way with 30 points in 30 minutes , to go along with five assists and three rebounds . Trevor Booker poured in 20 points and 10 rebounds , in 27 minutes off the bench , while Jeremy Lin added 18 points and four assists , in 25 minutes . DeMarre Carroll looked good in his Brooklyn debut , with 10 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 27 minutes .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 106 - 102 , at BankersLife Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 15 - 11 ) came from behind and secured a win no one expected them to clinch . The Cavaliers ( 18 - 8 ) were riding a franchise - record 13 - game winning streak , but Indiana ended their streak with a strong performance in the second half . The Cavs had managed to build a 63 - 57 advantage at the half , but the Pacers came from behind and used a stellar third - quarter to gain a three - point lead heading into the final 12 minutes . Cleveland tried hard to recover the lead , but Indiana made some clutch buckets towards the end of the game , and sealed a huge win in front of their own crowd . The biggest star for the Pacers in this game was Victor Oladipo , as the shooting guard once again emerged as a huge scoring threat when the team needed him the most . Oladipo finished the game with 33 points , seven rebounds and five assists , and hit a clutch three - pointer with 1:1 left in the fourth that sealed the deal for Indiana . Myles Turner added 15 points , and Thaddeus Young contributed with 13 points and nine boards . LeBron James led the way for the Cavs , as he came close to a triple - double thanks to his 29 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists . Kevin Love added 20 points with seven rebounds , while J.R. Smith contributed with 15 points . But the Cavs ' bad shooting doomed them in this game , as they only shot 31 percent from three - point range .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 125 - 86 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Saturday evening . The first quarter was close but the Pacers pulled away in the last couple minutes to take a four - point lead heading in the second . They took off in the second quarter , outscoring the Bulls , 33 - 11 , to take a 64 - 37 lead into halftime . They kept the pressure on in the second half , outscoring the Bulls 61 - 49 the rest of the way to complete the blowout win . The win ends a five - game losing streak for the Pacers . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 23 points , nine assists , six rebounds and five steals , in just 23 minutes , in his first game back from injury . Domantas Sabonis followed up with 22 points on 9 - of - 12 shooting , in 26 minutes off the bench , while Darren Collison and Myles Turner added 13 points each . The Pacers shot 56 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Bobby Portis was the high - point man for the Bulls , with 15 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting , in 22 minutes off the bench . Lauri Markkanen and Denzel Valentine finished with 13 points each , while Kris Dunn chipped in eight points and eight assists . The Bulls shot 38 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 32 from long range . The Bulls ( 14 - 26 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Rockets on Monday . The Pacers ( 20 - 19 ) play host to the Bucks on Monday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 114 - 106 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 24 - 17 ) delivered another impressive performance , and remain one of the hottest teams in the NBA at the moment since they are currently riding a six - game winning streak . Indiana ( 21 - 10 ) tried to fight back after they quickly fell to a 12 - point hole after the first quarter and they made things complicated at times for Miami , but the Heat managed to hold on to their advantage and secured another win that continues their surge in the Eastern Conference standings . Goran Dragic was the best player for the Heat , as the Slovenian point guard finished the game with 20 points , nine assists and three rebounds . Hassan Whiteside posted a strong double - double of 16 points , 15 rebounds , and four blocks . Josh Richardson chipped in with 14 points , and Kelly Olynyk added 11 of his own . The bench produced as well , as the trio of Wayne Ellington , Bam Adebayo and Tyler Johnson all contributed with 15 points . Victor Oladipo once again led the way for the Pacers offensively since he contributed with 26 points , seven rebounds , four assists , and three steals . Domantas Sabonis contributed with 18 points , and Thaddeus Young added 12 points with nine rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic had 15 points and six rebounds , and Lance Stephenson added 15 points coming off the bench .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 102 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Wizards ( 31 - 22 ) have somehow managed to continue rolling along despite the absence of John Wall , as they came into the contest with a perfect 40 record since the All-Star point guard went down to a knee injury . Washington was facing an equally surging team in the Pacers ( 30 - 25 ) on Monday , however , so the battle promised to be a hard - fought one . As they 've tended to do recently , the visitors got off to a quick start by building a 28 - 23 first - quarter lead . They 'd expanded their advantage to 58 - 49 by halftime , but a short - handed Indiana squad that was missing their starting backcourt of Darren Collison ( knee ) and Victor Oladipo ( illness ) continued to battle . Ultimately , though , the Wizards were able to pull away in the fourth , never letting the Pacers get closer than eight points . Washington got it done with red - hot shooting and strong rebounding , as they tallied a 55 percent success rate from the field and won the battle on the glass by a 43 - 35 margin . Bradley Beal led the way with 21 points for the Wizards and added three assists and one rebound . Kelly Oubre , Jr. followed with a bench - leading 15 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Otto Porter , Jr. collected 13 points , three assists and two rebounds . Ian Mahinmi was productive on the second unit with 12 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two steals . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris produced matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also supplying nine rebounds and one assist and the latter registering 10 boards and a pair of dimes . Mike Scott poured in 11 of his own while also hauling in four boards and dishing out two assists . Jodie Meeks rounded a 50 - point night for the Washington bench with 10 points and three assists . Bojan Bogdanovic continued a recent offensive tear by leading the Pacers with 29 points . He also posted four rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Joe Young was next with 17 points , two rebounds and one steal in 28 minutes off the bench . Domantas Sabonis accounted for 15 points and added four rebounds and two assists . Lance Stephenson drew the start for Oladipo and contributed 13 points , nine rebounds , six assists and two steals . Cory Joseph was n't as successful while filling in for Collison , totaling seven points , four assists and two rebounds . Both Thaddeus Young ( seven points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal ) and Myles Turner ( six points , five boards and one block ) turned in underwhelming efforts . The Wizards look to continue their winning ways in a road tilt against the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday evening , while the Pacers next face off with the New Orleans Pelicans in the Big Easy on Wednesday night .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the New_York Knicks , 121 - 113 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday evening . The Pacers ( 32 - 25 ) came into the contest looking like the clear - cut favorites on paper , considering both their superior record and the short - handed nature of the Knicks ' ( 23 - 24 ) rotation . Having recently lost Kristaps Porzingis for the season with a torn ACL , New_York was initially expected to also be without center Enes Kanter for a second consecutive game due to recent oral surgery . However , Kanter was subsequently declared as available earlier in the afternoon , affording the visitors some much - needed firepower . It appeared to certainly benefit them early , as New_York forged a 37 - 36 lead after a high - scoring first quarter . However , the hosts began to exert their will in the second , resulting in a 68 - 62 halftime advantage . Both defenses played slightly better coming out of intermission , but the Pacers added another four points to their cushion to head into the final 12 minutes with a 94 - 84 edge . They were able to maintain double - digit distance for the majority of the fourth quarter , with the Knicks ' last hurrah coming when they got within six points at the 1:10 mark following a Frank Ntilikina 27 - foot three - point jumper . Strong shooting and rebounding were both pivotal for the home squad , as they posted a 50 percent success rate from the field - - including 43 percent from three - point range - - while also winning the battle on the glass , 54 - 45 . Kanter and Tim Hardaway , Jr. co - led the Knicks with matching 17 - point efforts . The former also hauled in 11 rebounds and dished out one assist , while the latter provided three assists , one rebound and two steals . Michael Beasley drew the start at power forward and generated a 16 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Courtney Lee , Kyle O'Quinn and trade - deadline acquisition Emmanuel Mudiay all posted 14 - point efforts . Lee also registered four assists and one steal , O'Quinn totaled nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks and Mudiay dished out 10 dimes and hauled in a pair of boards . Ntilikina tallied 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . Veteran Jarrett Jack was significantly outpaced and outplayed by both of his young position mates , as he only managed two points and two rebounds in a scant eight minutes of playing time . Victor Oladipo spearheaded the Pacers with 30 points , a total he supplemented with nine assists , eight rebounds , six steals and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic turned in 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Thaddeus Young produced an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and one block . Lance Stephenson contributed 15 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Myles Turner collected 13 points , six rebounds and one block . Joe Young delivered 11 points , three rebounds and one assist . Al Jefferson and Domantas Sabonis accounted for matching six - point tallies , with Jefferson also responsible for three rebounds , one assist and two blocks , and Sabonis pulling in 10 boards and recording a trio of dimes . Cory Joseph started at point guard once again for Darren Collison ( knee ) but could only muster two points , six rebounds and four assists over 21 minutes . The Knicks will look to snap what is now a six - game losing streak when they take on the Philadelphia 76ers in a road matchup Monday night , while the Pacers are off until Wednesday evening when they face off with the Brooklyn Nets in the Big Apple .

The Lakers ( 31 - 39 ) jumped to a quick lead against the Pacers ( 41 - 30 ) , but they could n't maintain what they did during the first half and crumbled in the second half , as Indiana took advantage of that to secure a massive win at home that puts them one step closer to playoff contention . The Lakers built a 37 - 29 lead after the first quarter , but the Pacers showed signs of a potential comeback when they made it a two - point game at halftime ( 59 - 57 ) . Indiana took control of the game with a 35 - 21 third quarter , and the Lakers did n't have enough in them to turn things around in the fourth despite the fact they won the final 12 minutes ( 20 - 18 ) . Indiana closed things out with ease , securing a huge win in front of their own crowd . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 119 - 93 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Hornets ( 36 - 46 ) were already out of the postseason and the Pacers ( 48 - 34 ) had locked up their seed in the Eastern Conference , so this game had nothing but pride at stake for both franchises . Charlotte started this game with a chip on their shoulder , however , and quickly jumped to a 37 - 25 lead in the first quarter . Indiana pulled back in the second quarter ( 26 - 30 ) and made things close entering the second half , but the Hornets pulled away and won the final two quarters , 24 - 16 and 32 - 22 , to end the regular season on a strong note . Meanwhile , the Pacers will now enter the playoffs with lots of doubts . Frank Kaminsky was the best player for the Hornets in this game , as he finished with 24 points and seven rebounds while coming off the bench . Malik Monk also thrived as a substitute , as he contributed 17 points on 25 minutes . Kemba Walker and Marvin Williams each finished with 15 points , while Dwight Howard and Nicolas Batum had 14 points . Howard also added 17 rebounds . Leaf all had to lead the way on a Pacers squad that did n't have Victor Oladipo due to rest . Al Jefferson registered 12 points , while Domantas Sabonis came off the bench and finished with 10 points and 10 boards in 16 minutes .

The Hawks ( 2 - 12 ) started off strong , with a 32 - 23 lead after one quarter . The Pelicans ( 8 - 6 ) tightened things up in the second quarter , but still trailed by five at halftime . The game came down to the final couple possessions , where the Pelicans nabbed the one - point lead with a few clutch shots . The Hawks had a chance to win it with a final possession , but ended up giving up a turnover with three seconds left in the game . The Pelicans put an end to the Bucks ' three - game winning streak by coming up big down the stretch . The Bucks started out strong and led 37 - 32 after one quarter . The Pelicans responded in the second quarter , where they outscored the Bucks 30 - 26 , however they still trailed by one , 63 - 62 at half time . The Pelicans came out strong again in the third and managed to overtake the lead , holding a two - point advantage heading into the fourth . The Bucks made a run to start the fourth but by midway through the quarter the Pelicans had regained the lead and did not let go from there . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for New_Orleans with 26 points , 13 rebounds , seven assists and one block , in 37 minutes of action .
