The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 124 - 123 , in overtime , at Smoothie King Center on Friday evening . The Heat got out to a great start on the road with a 10 - 2 run just two minutes into the game , and held on to a 27 - 22 lead heading into the second . The teams went back and forth through a high scoring second quarter , where the Pelicans outscored the Heat , 35 - 32 , to cut the deficit to two by halftime . The Heat managed to stay a couple steps ahead through a hard - fought third quarter and took an 89 - 84 lead into the fourth . The Pelicans came back to tie it up at 92 just four minutes into the fourth quarter . It remained a one or two possession game the rest of the way , with the Pelicans holding a two - point lead with 17 seconds left . However , Goran Dragic came up with a huge rebound and put - back shot to tie it up at 108 with 14 seconds left , which would send the game to overtime . The overtime period was more back and forth action , with the teams staying within one possession of each other . The Heat held a one - point advantage with 21 seconds left thanks to a jumper by Dwyane Wade . However , the Pelicans got the last laugh as Jrue Holiday knocked down the game - winning floater with seven seconds left . Anthony Davis led the way for New_Orleans with 45 points on 17 - of - 34 shooting , 17 rebounds , five steals , five blocks and two assists . Jrue Holiday followed up with 29 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and a steal , while Ian Clark chipped in 21 points off the bench . The Pelicans shot 44 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Goran Dragic led the Heat with 30 points , nine rebounds and eight assists . Hassan Whiteside tallied 19 points and 16 rebounds , while Tyler Johnson chipped in 15 points . The Heat shot 47 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 19 from long range . The Heat ( 30 - 29 ) will be right back in action as they play host to the Grizzlies on Saturday . The Pelicans ( 32 - 26 ) take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Sunday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Phoenix Suns , 125 - 116 , at Smoothie King Center on Monday . The Pelicans ( 34 - 26 ) and the Suns ( 18 - 44 ) engaged in quite a battle that ended with New_Orleans winning its sixth straight game , while Phoenix dropped its 10th straight contest . New_Orleans had to come from behind in this one , however , as Phoenix quickly jumped to a 36 - 26 point lead in the first quarter and reached half time up by seven . The Pelicans answered back with a huge fourth quarter , however , and a 38 - 24 third - period performance put them up by seven heading into the fourth . Phoenix tried to comeback , but New_Orleans sealed the deal and ended winning a tough game that could end up being decisive for the team 's playoff chances . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with a monster stat line : 53 points , 17 rebounds , five blocks , and three assists in only 38 minutes . Jrue Holiday contributed 20 points and seven assists , while Emeka Okafor had 14 points and four rebounds in just 19 minutes . Rajon Rondo finished with six points and five rebounds but dished out 12 assists . Nikola Mirotic added 10 points and eight boards off the bench . Devin Booker had quite a game as well for the Suns , as the talented shooting guard finished with 40 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . T.J. Warren had 23 points and six rebounds , while Elfrid Payton had 16 points , seven boards , five assists and two steals . Josh Jackson chipped in with a 20 - point performance coming off the bench .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Indiana Pacers , 96 - 92 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . This was a rescheduled game from a February 7 matchup in which the game got called off due to a leakage issue , as both of these teams left it all on the floor in this crucial matchup . In fact , neither team ever led by more than six points , as there were nine ties and 17 lead changes in total . The difference for New_Orleans was their transition offense , with the Pelicans outscoring the Pacers , 26 - 15 , in fastbreak points . New_Orleans ended up shooting 43 percent from the field while holding Indiana to just 37 percent shooting . Defensive rebounding was also big , with the Pelicans winning that battle , 40 - 33 . The Pacers ( 41 - 31 ) were led by Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 21 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner amassed 13 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . Thaddeus Young totaled nine points , 10 rebounds , two assists and three steals . The Pelicans ( 42 - 30 ) got another double - double out of Anthony Davis , as he collected 28 points , 13 rebounds and five blocks . E'Twaun Moore accumulated 23 points , three rebounds and two steals . Nikola Mirotic led the bench with 15 points , six rebounds and two blocks . Cheick Diallo also played well off the bench , providing nine points and 10 rebounds . New_Orleans will have to play their third game in three days on Thursday , as they play host to the Los Angeles Lakers . As for Indiana , they play host to the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday for their next outing .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 123 - 95 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start right from the jump , as they rushed out to a 100 lead , and hung on to lead 32 - 23 by the end of the first quarter . The Grizzlies made a push early in the second , making it a three - point game , but the Pelicans quickly took back the momentum and built a double - digit lead . The Pelicans led for the rest of the quarter and took a 65 - 53 lead into halftime . The Grizzlies came totally undone in the third , as the Pelicans extended their lead to 21 , just four minutes into the quarter . There was not much competition from that point on as the Pelicans cruised to a much - needed win , ending a four - game losing streak . E'Twaun Moore led the Pelicans with 30 points , four assists , three steals , one rebound and one block , in 29 minutes . Anthony Davis tallied 28 points , 12 rebounds , three blocks , two steals and two assists , while Nikola Mirotic added 25 points , seven rebounds and one block . The Pelicans shot 52 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , MarShon Brooks led Memphis with 25 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 36 minutes off the bench . Ivan Rabb added 16 points and seven rebounds , off the bench , while Jarell Martin finished with 15 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Grizzlies shot 40 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 32 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 57 ) play host to the Kings on Friday . The Pelicans ( 44 - 34 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 101 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Wednesday . This was expected to be quite a battle between two 2 - 2 teams , and it showed right from tip - off . The game was extremely close in the first quarter and the Timberwolves were actually in front , 26 - 23 , after the first 12 minutes . But Detroit ( 3 - 2 ) responded with a 40 - 18 win during the second quarter , and they never looked back . Despite the fact Minnesota ( 2 - 3 ) kept things close in the second half losing 59 - 57 over that span , Detroit did all the damage in the second quarter and moved over .500 with a convincing win in front of their home crowd . The Pistons had huge contributions all across the board in this game . Tobias Harris was the undisputed star of the game for Detroit , as his 34 - point performance matched a career - high for the small forward . However , he was n't alone in Detroit 's impressive offensive output . Avery Bradley added 20 points , Andre Drummond contributed with a double - double of 15 points and 14 rebounds , and Reggie Jackson chipped in with 10 points . A total of six Detroit players scored in double figures , including all five members of the starting lineup . On the other hand , the Timberwolves were missing Jimmy Butler ( illness ) and could not mask the absence of their star forward . Karl-Anthony Towns had 23 points with 10 rebounds and Andrew Wiggins added 21 points of his own , but it was not enough for a Minnesota squad that lost their second consecutive game . They only shot 44 percent from the field , and were out - rebounded , 47 - 37 . That 's usually not a recipe for success .
The host Detroit Pistons defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 105 - 96 , at Little Caesars Arena on Friday . Milwaukee has now lost four of their last five games , as they ran into a hot Detroit team here . The second quarter was decisive for the Pistons , as they outscored the Bucks , 31 - 22 . No other quarter had a margin of more than two points . Another key for the Pistons was their ability to get to the free - throw line , as they went 23 - of - 28 , while holding Milwaukee to just 8 - of - 9 . The Bucks ( 4 - 5 ) got another gem out of Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 29 points , four rebounds , three assists and four blocks . Malcolm Brogdon amassed 21 points and 10 assists . Khris Middleton totaled 17 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . The Pistons ( 6 - 3 ) were led by Andre Drummond , who amassed 24 points and 15 rebounds , while going 14 - of - 16 from the free - throw line . Avery Bradley collected 23 points , two rebounds , two assists and three steals . Reggie Jackson totaled nine points , three rebounds and eight assists . Detroit 's next game will be on Saturday , as they host the Sacramento Kings . Milwaukee is off until Tuesday , when they travel to play the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Indiana Pacers , 114 - 97 , at Little Caesars Arena on Wednesday evening . The Pistons ( 8 - 3 ) fell behind early , as the Pacers ( 5 - 7 ) put together an impressive 30 - point first quarter . However , the light went on for the home squad after that point , as they came back with a second - quarter surge that led to a 59 - 52 halftime advantage . Detroit never looked back , holding serve in the third quarter before pulling away in the final 12 minutes . The Pistons gained a considerable advantage on the glass , as they outrebounded Indiana by a 50 - 38 margin . Andre Drummond was responsible for a significant chunk , as he brought down a game - high 21 boards and complemented them with 14 points , four assists and one block . Detroit also had the hot hand all night , shooting 52 percent from the field , including 44 percent from three - point range . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Pacers with 21 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Al Jefferson followed with a bench - leading 19 points and added six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Thaddeus Young contributed 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic generated 12 points and seven rebounds . Myles Turner had a quiet game down low , supplying a modest eight points , six rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Cory Joseph was productive on the second unit as well , compiling 11 points , six assists , three rebounds and one block . Tobias Harris paced the Pistons with 23 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . Reggie Jackson registered 18 points , six assists and three rebounds . Avery Bradley mustered 14 points , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Langston Galloway led the reserves with 12 points , a total he supplemented with three boards . Ish Smith pitched in 10 points , five assists , three rebounds and one block in 21 minutes . The Pacers next head to the Windy City for a Friday night showdown with the Chicago Bulls , while the Pistons remain home to tangle with the Atlanta Hawks on Friday evening as well .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 112 - 103 , at Little Caesars Arena on Sunday evening . The Pistons ( 10 - 3 ) led 31 - 29 after one quarter . The Heat ( 6 - 7 ) fired back in the second quarter and kept the momentum into the third , where they led 75 - 68 halfway through the quarter . The Pistons bounced back though , using a 21 - 8 run to close the third and take an 83 - 81 lead into the fourth . The Pistons continued to push and reached their biggest lead of the game with about four minutes left in the fourth , from where they cruised to their fifth straight win . Tobias Harris was the high - point man for Detroit , with 25 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , including 5 - of - 8 from long range , in 36 minutes . Avery Bradley followed up with 24 points , six rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 30 minutes . Andre Drummond took care of business with 17 rebounds , while Luke Kennard had the best game of his young career , with 14 points , five rebounds and three assists , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Pistons shot 48 percent from the field , including 50 percent from long range . Meanwhile , five players scored in double digits for the Heat , led by Hassan Whiteside , who posted 20 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 29 minutes . Goran Dragic followed up with 18 points , seven assists and four rebounds , in 34 minutes . Dion Waiters added 16 points , five assists , four rebounds and three steals , while Josh Richardson finished with 15 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Heat shot 43 percent from the field , including 35 percent from long range . This marked the sixth and final game of a road trip for the Heat , which they finished with a 3 - 3 record . They will return home to play host to the Wizards on Wednesday . The Pistons take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 102 - 98 , at Little Caesar 's Arena on Friday . Despite the fact that there were only three ties in this game , it was a competitive matchup throughout . In fact , there were nine lead changes , as neither team ever led by more than 12 points . In addition , it was a single - digit margin for all but one minute . Defense was key for Golden_State , as they held Detroit to just 41 percent from the field . The Warriors actually recorded 15 blocks in their win , as the Pistons swatted away just two shots . Golden Stat 's ball movement was pristine as well , outasssiting Detroit , 29 - 20 . The Pistons also killed themselves at the free - throw line , hitting just , 10 - of - 19 . The Warriors ( 21 - 6 ) were led by Kevin Durant , as he collected 36 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and five blocks . Klay Thompson amassed 21 points , four rebounds and five assists . Draymond Green scored just two points , but still provided six rebounds , 13 assists , three steals and six blocks in an all - around gem . The Pistons ( 14 - 11 ) best player was Andre Drummond , as he totaled eight points , 17 rebounds and four assists . Avery Bradley led the team in scoring , accruing 25 points and four rebounds . Reggie Jackson finished with 16 points , three rebounds and two assists . Detroit will return to action on Sunday in a home matchup versus the Boston Celtics . As for Golden_State , they play host to the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday for their next fixture .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Indiana Pacers , 107 - 83 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Tuesday . A 40 - 19 first quarter really set the tone in this game , as Indiana could never recover from that hole . In fact , this was a wire - to - wire win for Detroit , as they led by double - digits for all but three minutes . The Pistons ended up shooting 50 percent from the field , while holding the Pacers to 44 percent shooting . The rebounding disparity was vast , with Detroit winning that battle , 46 - 26 . The Pacers ( 19 - 15 ) did n't have a single player score more than 13 points , as Victor Oladipo led them with 13 points , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Myles Turner totaled 10 points , three rebounds and three assists . Darren Collison and Thaddeus Young combined for 10 points , three rebounds , no assists and no steals . The Pistons ( 19 - 14 ) were led by Tobias Harris , as he tallied 30 points and six rebounds on 10 - of - 11 shooting . Andre Drummond amassed 21 points , 18 rebounds and three assists . Reggie Jackson accrued eight points , three rebounds and 13 assists before departing with an ankle injury in the third quarter . Ish Smith led the bench with 12 points , two rebounds and three assists , Indiana will have a quick turnaround , as they host the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday for their next fixture . As for Detroit , they travel to play the Orlando Magic on Thursday. ,
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Houston Rockets , 108 - 101 , at Little Caesars Arena on Saturday evening . The hard - fought contest featured a first half in which both clubs matched each other virtually basket for basket , leading to a slim 58 - 57 halftime advantage for the Rockets ( 27 - 11 ) . However , the third quarter is when the Pistons ( 21 - 17 ) managed to distance themselves , as Detroit racked up 31 points while limiting Houston to a modest 19 . That enabled them to enter the final 12 minutes with a relatively comfortable 88 - 77 advantage , which allowed them to withstand a strong 24 - point period by the visitors . Detroit consistently got it done on the offensive end , as evidenced by a 51 percent success rate from the field , including 48 percent from three - point range . Chris Paul led the way once again for the Rockets , managing a 16 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and two steals . Eric Gordon , Trevor Ariza and Gerald Green all followed with 15 - point efforts , with the latter making his contributions from the bench . Gordon also posted seven assists and three rebounds , Ariza provided four boards and one assist and Green added three rebounds to his scoring total . Clint Capela posted a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Tarik Black was productive on the second unit as well with 13 points , six rebounds and one block . Tobias Harris paced the Pistons with 27 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . Ish Smith managed 17 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dwight Buycks followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added two rebounds , two assists and one block . Reggie Bullock supplied 14 points , two rebounds and two assists . Avery Bradley registered 12 points , three assists , one rebound and one steal . With Andre Drummond sitting out with a rib contusion , both Boban Marjanovic and Eric Moreland saw extended opportunity . The former contributed 10 points , five rebounds , one assist and two blocks , while the latter totaled eight points , eight boards , four assists , two steals and one block . The Rockets remain in the Midwest and next head to the Windy City , where they 'll face the Bulls on Monday night . The Pistons also hit the road and head down to the Big Easy for a showdown with the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday evening as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 101 - 100 , at Little Caesars Arena on Sunday evening . The Nets got out to a great start on the road and led 30 - 20 after the first quarter . The Pistons rebounded in the second quarter and tightened the gap , but still trailed 53 - 48 at halftime . The Nets kept up the pressure in the third quarter and quickly stretched their lead to double digits . They held on to take a nine - point lead into the fourth . The Pistons made a strong push in the fourth and were able to tie things up at 94 , with 2:16 left in the game . It looked like Detroit would pull off the comeback , as Andre Drummond hit a go - ahead bucket , with 5 seconds left . However , after a timeout , Spencer Dinwiddie maneuvered his way through the lane and hit the game - winner for Brooklyn . Dinwiddie led the Nets with 22 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting , in 30 minutes of action . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson followed up with 21 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and a block , in 30 minutes , while DeMarre Carroll added 16 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Tobias Harris was the high - point man for the Pistons with 20 points on 8 - of - 18 shooting , in 35 minutes . Ish Smith tallied 11 points , three assists and two rebounds , while Andre Drummond finished with seven points , 13 rebounds , four assists and one block . Stanley Johnson played well off the bench , with 18 points and four rebounds , in 26 minutes . The Pistons shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 29 from long range . The Pistons ( 22 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Jazz on Wednesday . The Nets ( 18 - 29 ) take on the Thunder in OKC on Tuesday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Detroit Pistons , 121 - 108 , at Little Caesars Arena on Saturday afternoon . The Thunder ( 29 - 20 ) came into Saturday 's contest with an underwhelming 10 - 13 record away from Chesapeake Energy Arena , but they played as if they were in front of the home crowd right from the opening tip . OKC racked up a whopping 69 points in a prolific first half , and despite their best attempts to keep up , the Pistons ( 22 - 25 ) still found themselves trailing by 12 at intermission . The visitors kept their foot on the gas in the third , despite losing guard Andre Roberson to what now appears to be a season - ending injury to his patellar tendon . Ultimately , even a game - high 27 points in the fourth quarter could n't draw Detroit anywhere near a tie , leading to their 10th home loss of the campaign . The two teams were very close in shooting percentage , with the Thunder 's 48 percent success rate from the field barely edging the Pistons ' 46 percent figure . The turnover battle was a different story , however , as the hosts lost the ball on 16 occasions as compared to a more modest nine on the part of Oklahoma_City . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with a 31 - point , 13 - assist , 11 - rebound triple - double that also included two steals . Paul George followed with 26 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals . Carmelo Anthony provided 21 points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals . With the Big Three all enjoying productive offensive afternoons , Steven Adams scaled back his involvement but still managed 13 points , seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Roberson tallied five points , five rebounds , one assist and one block in 22 minutes before his injury . Tobias Harris paced the Pistons with 21 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Reggie Bullock followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Ish Smith supplied 15 points , nine assists and three rebounds . Boban Marjanovic registered 14 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal in just 14 minutes off the bench . Andre Drummond pitched in a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three blocks and one steal . Luke Kennard poured in 11 points and one rebound . With Detroit dealing with a sizable second - half deficit , their bench saw extended run and totaled 64 points . The Thunder head back home and await a Sunday evening visit from the Philadelphia 76ers , while the Pistons hit the road and visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday evening as well .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 104 - 98 , at Little Caesars Arena on Wednesday evening . The Pistons ( 28 - 29 ) have n't exactly been the picture of consistency this season , but they still came into the contest as fairly solid favorites against a Hawks ( 18 - 41 ) squad that 's struggled to generate any type of extended winning streak , and that was missing its starting backcourt of Dennis Schroder ( back ) and Kent Bazemore ( rest ) . The first half pretty much went according to script , as the home squad established a comfortable 45 - 33 halftime lead . To their credit , Atlanta awoke from their offensive slumber to an extent during intermission , scoring 28 points in the third period . However , in allowing Detroit to compile 37 of their own , they actually saw their deficit grow to a seemingly insurmountable 21 entering the final 12 minutes . The Hawks put their collective nose to the grindstone yet again , though , clawing all the way back to get as close as 100 - 96 with 12 seconds remaining following an Isaiah Taylor and - one . Ish Smith and Stanley Johnson the made good on four subsequent free - throw attempts for the hosts , sealing what became a hard - fought win . Andrew White III was the surprise team leader in scoring for the Hawks with 15 points , and he added two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Taurean Prince generated 14 points , three boards , one assist and one steal . Taylor finished with 13 points , seven assists , one rebound and one steal . John Collins posted an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double while drawing the start at power forward . He also recorded two blocks and one steal . Malcolm Delaney matched Collins ' scoring total and also supplied seven assists and three steals . Tyler Dorsey went for nine points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal in his start at shooting guard . Dewayne Dedmon turned in eight points and seven boards . The Pistons had seven players post double digits in the scoring column beginning with Smith , who tallied 22 points along with nine assists , four rebounds and two steals . Reggie Bullock poured in 15 points and also collected three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Johnson delivered 14 points , five rebounds and two assists . Andre Drummond contributed a 13 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks . Blake Griffin had a near triple - double with 13 points , 12 rebounds , nine assists and one block . Anthony Tolliver and James Ennis III co - led the bench with matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also posting three boards and two assists and the latter registering three boards and one assist . The Hawks are now off for the All-Star break until Friday , Feb. 23rd , when they 'll take on the Indiana Pacers on the road . The Pistons pick things back up on that same night in a home date versus the Boston Celtics .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Detroit Pistons , 110 - 98 , at Little Caesars Arena on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 41 - 19 ) had to come from behind to defeat the Pistons ( 28 - 30 ) , as they went down by six in the first quarter but stormed back in the second ; a 38 - 21 pushed Boston in front and they never looked back . Detroit won the third quarter by three , but Boston answered with a three - point lead in the final 12 minutes The game was over after the second quarter , however , as Boston built a 12 - point lead they would never let go . One of the reasons why Boston walked away with the win as comfortably as they did was because they shot better than Detroit , especially from three - point range ( 44 against 30 percent ) . Boston had a balanced effort since six players scored in double figures , but surprisingly the top scorer came from the bench as Daniel Theis finished with 19 points and seven rebounds in just 21 minutes of action . Kyrie Irving had 18 points , six assists and four rebounds , and Jayson Tatum added 15 points . Marcus Morris had 15 points and six rebounds off the bench , and Marcus Smart had 12 points in his return from injury . The entire starting lineup of the Pistons scored in double figures in this game . Ish Smith led the way with 20 points and six assists , while Andre Drummond finished with a double - double of 15 points and 17 rebounds . Blake Griffin had 17 points , but he only shot 5 - of - 19 from the field . Reggie Bullock had 13 points , and Stanley Johnson added 12 points with four boards .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 113 - 106 , in overtime at Little Caesars Arena on Friday evening . The Pistons ( 38 - 41 ) came in on a hot streak despite a recent elimination from postseason contention . Meanwhile , the Mavericks ( 25 - 55 ) were on the opposite end of the spectrum , having dropped nine of their previous 11 contests . Nevertheless , in a contest between two teams with nothing to lose , anything can happen . Accordingly , Detroit and Dallas punched and counter - punched throughout the evening , and a game - tying three - point jumper by Johnathan Motley with 11 seconds remaining in regulation ultimately sent the game into overtime . The home squad dominated from the 2:15 mark of the extra period onward , however , going on an 8 - 1 run to seal the hard - fought victory . Motley led the way for the Mavericks with a 26 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Harrison Barnes produced 17 points and four rebounds across 31 minutes . Dorian Finney-Smith generated a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Dwight Powell delivered 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Dennis Smith , Jr. took the court despite recent knee issues but only managed seven points on 2 - for - 12 shooting and also provided eight assists , three rebounds and one steal across 31 minutes . Reggie Jackson paced the Pistons with 24 points and seven assists . Andre Drummond compiled a 19 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , two blocks and one steal . Anthony Tolliver poured in 16 points and also registered three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Langston Galloway finished with a bench - leading 15 points and also supplied four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Stanley Johnson went for 11 points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Henry Ellenson matched Johnson 's scoring total and added five rebounds . The Mavericks remain on the road and next visit the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday afternoon , while the Pistons pay a visit to the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday afternoon , as well .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 128 - 94 , Air Canada Center on Saturday evening . The Raptors ( 20 ) controlled this one from the start , bursting out to a 36 - 19 lead after the first quarter . Philly ( 0 - 3 ) rebounded slightly in the second quarter , before the Raptors poured in 40 points in the third quarter to put the game out of reach . DeMar DeRozan and Kyle Lowry did not hit the floor in the fourth quarter . However , the Raptors experienced a bit of a downer as Jonas Valanciunas left the game in the second quarter with a sprained ankle . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 30 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , along with three rebounds and three assists , in only 26 minutes . Serge Ibaka was on fire from long range , hitting 5 - of - 9 from deep , on his way 21 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 24 minutes . Kyle Lowry finished with 17 points , five rebounds and five assists . Meanwhile , the Sixers were with out Joel Embiid , who sat out the second night of their back - to - back . Ben Simmons was impressive once again , nearing a triple - double with 18 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Jarryd Bayless followed up with 16 points , while Justin Anderson added 12 points . The Sixers gave up 20 turnovers in the contest and hit only 22 - of - 36 free throws . The Sixers look ahead to Monday , when they play in Detroit . The Raptors will begin a road trip with a contest in San Antonio on Monday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers , 120 - 115 , at Air Canada Center on Friday . This marks Toronto 's seventh - straight home win , as they continue to succeed north of the border . Despite the fact that it was close throughout the first half with 12 lead changes , the Raptors actually led for the entirety of the second half . Ball movement was a huge factor , with Toronto out - assisting Indiana , 29 - 21 . The biggest difference in the game was scoring in the paint though , with Toronto getting 70 paint points to Indiana 's 44 . The Pacers ( 12 - 11 ) got another gem from Victor Oladipo , as he scored a season - high 36 points on 14 - of - 22 shooting . He also added seven rebounds , six assists , three steals and three blocks to his tally . Myles Turner amassed 17 points and six rebounds . Darren Collison accrued 16 points , five rebounds , six assists and two steals . Thaddeus Young tallied 12 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Raptors ( 14 - 7 ) were led by DeMar DeRozan , as he collected 26 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Serge Ibaka totaled 15 points , eight rebounds and two blocks . Kyle Lowry accumulated 11 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Jakob Poeltl was huge off the bench , providing a career - high 18 points and six rebounds on a perfect 8 - of - 8 shooting . On deck for Indiana is a home matchup versus the New York Knicks on Monday . As for Toronto , they play host to the Phoenix Suns on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 111 - 98 , at Air Canada Center on Friday . Toronto were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and this dominating scoreline shows just why . In fact , the Raptors led by eight at the end of the first quarter , by 15 at the half and carried a 19 - point lead headed into the fourth quarter . A 29 - 23 fourth quarter for the Hawks made the scoreline respectable , but they still never got the game within nine points for the entirety of the second half . Turnovers really killed Atlanta , as they committed 18 of them , while forcing just 11 from Toronto . The Raptors did a great job of protecting the rim too , recording 15 blocks to the Hawks seven . The Hawks ( 9 - 26 ) got a season - high 30 points out of Taurean Prince , as he added 10 rebounds on 12 - of - 16 shooting . Dennis Schroder collected 14 points , five rebounds , nine assists and two steals . No other starter reached double figures in scoring . Marco Belinelli did provide 14 points and three assists to lead the bench though . The Raptors ( 24 - 10 ) were led by DeMar DeRozan , as he tallied 25 points , five assists and two blocks . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . Kyle Lowry accumulated 12 points , five rebounds and five assists . Delon Wright led the bench with 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . On deck for Atlanta is a home matchup versus the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday . As for Toronto , they 're off until Monday when they host the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 109 - 104 , at Air Canada Center on Tuesday . It took 10 ties and five lead changes to determine a winner , as this game was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , it was a single - digit margin for the entirety of the second half , as Toronto outscored Minnesota , 24 - 17 in the fourth quarter . Ball movement was key for the Raptors , as they recorded 28 assists to the Timberwolves 21 . Free-throw shooting was also a big factor , with Minnesota shooting 22 - of - 26 and Toronto hitting just 15 - of - 24 . Transition offense was also a big factor , with Toronto winning the fastbreak battle , 13 - 1 The Timberwolves ( 32 - 22 ) had all five starters score in double figures , as Jimmy Butler led the way with 25 points , five rebounds and six assists . Andrew Wiggins amassed 15 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Karl-Anthony Towns amassed 11 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . The Raptors ( 34 - 15 ) were led by DeMar DeRozan , as he collected 23 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Kyle Lowry finished with 15 points , three rebounds and nine assists . Jonas Valanciunas tallied 18 points and 11 rebounds . Serge Ibaka accrued 15 points , six rebounds and three assists .
