The Toronto Raptors defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 130 - 105 , at Air Canada Center on Friday . Despite the fact that there were three ties and five lead changes in the first five minutes , that 's the only time this game was close . In fact , the Raptors rode a 37 - 18 first quarter lead , as Portland never got the game within single - digits from there . Offensive rebounding was the difference , with the Raptors winning that battle , 17 - 4 . That allowed them to take 99 shots while the Blazers took only 73 shot attempts . Three-point shooting was also decisive , with Toronto hitting 19 - of - 40 and Portland going just 7 - of - 21 . Bench production was also a huge difference , with Toronto outscoring Portland 's bench , 53 - 25 . The Trail_Blazers ( 29 - 23 ) were led by Damian Lillard , as he tallied 32 points , three rebounds and 10 assists on 11 - of - 18 from the field , C.J. McCollum amassed 21 points , two rebounds and two assists . Jusuf Nurkic accrued 20 points , seven rebounds and three assists on 8 - of - 11 shooting . The Raptors ( 35 - 16 ) got a gem out of DeMar DeRozan , as he collected 35 points , two rebounds and three assists . Jonas Valanciunas amassed 18 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Kyle Lowry accumulated 15 points , four rebounds and five assists . Fred VanVleet , Pascal Siakam and Norman Powell all scored in double figures off the bench . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Portland traveling to face the Boston Celtics and Toronto hosting the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 101 - 86 , at Air Canada Center on Sunday . A 15 - point final margin is unfair to the Grizzlies , as there were six ties and 12 lead changes before a lopsided fourth quarter . In fact , Toronto outscored Memphis , 25 - 12 , in the fourth quarter and 31 - 20 in the second quarter . Defense was key for the Raptors , as they recorded 13 steals and seven blocks while winning the turnover differential , 19 - 11 . They also held Memphis to just 36 percent from the field while shooting 46 percent on their end . Bench production was also critical , with the Raptors bench outscoring the Grizzlies bench , 52 - 19 . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 34 ) were led by Marc Gasol , as he tallied 20 points , six rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Andrew Harrison accrued 16 points , four rebounds and three assists . No other player on the roster had more than 12 points or four assists . The Raptors ( 36 - 16 ) got a gem out of Fred VanVleet off the bench , as he collected 13 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Delon Wright actually led the team in scoring off the bench as well , as he totaled 15 points , four rebounds , two assists and four steals . DeMar DeRozan led the starters with 13 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jons Valanciunas totaled 12 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Memphis traveling to play the Atlanta Hawks and Toronto playing host to the Boston Celtics .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the New_York Knicks , 113 - 88 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 38 - 16 ) came into this game riding a three - game winning streak and had no problems to extend it four , since the Knicks ( 23 - 33 ) barely posed a threat offensively . The absence of Kristaps Porzingis was something New_York could n't mask , and Toronto controlled the game right from the start . In fact , the Raptors jumped to a 23 - 18 lead after the first quarter and they never looked back , winning each quarter by at least five points on route to a comfortable 25 - point win . The loss extended New_York 's losing streak to five contests . DeMar DeRozan ( eight points , 2 - 11 FG ) and Kyle Lowry ( seven points , 2 - 10 FG ) did n't have good performances , but the bench picked up the slack for the Raptors in this one since five second - unit players scored at least 10 points . The star of the game for Toronto was Jonas Valanciunas , who filled the stat sheet with 18 points , 10 rebounds , two blocks and two steals . Serge Ibaka had 13 points . Pascal Siakam added 14 off the bench . Michael Beasley was New_York 's top scorer with 21 points and seven rebounds . Jarrett Jack had 10 points with five assists , and Trey Burke had 12 points in just 13 minutes off the bench . Luke Kornet added 11 points . Tim Hardaway Jr. struggled , however , and finished with only nine points on 4 - 14 from the field .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Toronto Raptors , 122 - 119 , in OT at Air Canada Centre on Friday evening . The Bucks ( 33 - 25 ) had a great performance and even though they wasted away an eight - point lead heading into the fourth quarter , they still managed to turn the game around when it mattered the most . The Raptors ( 41 - 17 ) won the fourth quarter by eight points and they built a five - point advantage starting the OT period . But the Bucks scored eight straight points and they never looked back until they clinched a huge win on the road against one of the top teams in the Eastern Conference . As it has been the trend through most of the season , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 26 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . Eric Bledsoe chipped in with 21 points , eight rebounds and four assists , while Khris Middleton added 21 points , six assists , and four boards . John Henson had 12 points , while Jason Terry ( 14 points ) and Thon Maker ( 12 points ) contributed steadily off the bench . DeMar DeRozan was the top scorer for the Raptors with 33 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Serge Ibaka contributed with 18 points , seven rebounds , and two blocks . Kyle Lowry added 17 points and seven assists , while Jonas Valanciunas had 10 points with eight boards . Pascal Siakam had a strong performance off the bench and finished with 17 points and seven boards .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Toronto Raptors , 132 - 125 , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday . The Thunder ( 43 - 29 ) and the Raptors ( 52 - 18 ) played one of the most intense , thrilling games in the NBA in recent weeks . In the end , the visitors came out on top thanks to a huge comeback in the fourth quarter that propelled them to victory . OKC actually jumped in front after the first quarter ( 40 - 34 ) , but the Raptors won the subsequent two quarters ( 30 - 26 and 34 - 31 ) to make it a one - point game heading into the third quarter , as Toronto was up 98 - 97 . But the Thunder came from behind and after winning the final quarter 35 - 27 , they secured a much - needed win that should boost their confidence for the final part of the season . Russell Westbrook was the best player for the Thunder , as he finished with 37 points , 14 assists and 13 rebounds to notch his fifth consecutive triple - double . Steven Adams contributed 25 points , eight rebounds and four assists , while Paul George added 22 points , five boards , three assists and three steals . Carmelo Anthony had 15 points , and Corey Brewer finished with 10 . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with a 24 - point performance , but it was n't enough . Kyle Lowry delivered a double - double of 22 points and 10 assists , while Jonas Valanciunas had 10 points . Delon Wright chipped in with 15 points and eight assists coming off the bench , while substitutes C.J. Miles ( 15 points ) and Pascal Siakam ( 10 ) also scored in double figures .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 117 - 102 , at Toyota Center on Saturday evening . The Rockets ( 15 - 4 ) came from behind in this one , and delivered a great performance in the second half to come out on top against a Knicks ( 10 - 9 ) that just could n't keep up with Houston 's intensity on both ends of the court . The Knicks stormed out of nowhere to build a 39 - 29 lead in the first half and maintained a 61 - 58 at the break . But the Rockets flipped the script in the third quarter , and put themselves on top with a 37 - 13 win in the subsequent 12 minutes . Houston never looked back , and ended cruising their way to a huge win at home . James Harden delivered another impressive performance , and led Houston 's offense with 37 points and 10 assists across 37 minutes . Clint Capela added a double - double of 12 points with 15 rebounds , and Trevor Ariza contributed with 16 points . Chris Paul only made two of his 12 field - goal attempts on route to a six - point performance , but he faciliated the ball as evidenced by his 13 assists and three steals . Ryan Anderson added 17 points and seven boards off the bench . New_York did n't have Kristaps Porzingis in this game due to injury , so two unfamiliar names led the Knicks ' offense in this one . Michael Beasley had one of his best games in a long time on route to a 30 - point , eight - rebound performance , and Kyle O'Quinn added 20 points , 15 boards , and four assists . Tim Hardaway Jr. did n't have his best game either , and he only finished with 11 points while going 4 - for - 12 from the field .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 118 - 97 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday evening . The Rockets ( 17 - 4 ) entered this game as one of the best offenses in the league , once again proving it with a stellar performance . The Pacers ( 12 - 10 ) simply did n't have answers for Houston and at times it felt as if they were playing at an entirely different pace . Houston built a five - point lead at halftime after Indiana won the first quarter , but they pulled away in the third with a 35 - 22 win over those 12 minutes that put the game away for good . The Pacers could n't react in the fourth , and Houston extended their winning streak to six games with another huge performance at home . James Harden was the biggest star of the game for the Rockets , as the MVP candidate came close to a triple - double following a huge performance of 28 points , 10 assists , and eight rebounds . Chris Paul added 13 points with seven assists , while Clint Capela once again contributed with a double - double of 22 points and 13 boards . All five members of Houston 's starting lineup scored in double digits . Thaddeus Young led the way for the Pacers since he finished with 23 points , but his efforts were not enough . Victor Oladipo filled the stat sheet nicely thanks to 19 points , five assists , five steals and three blocks . Myles Turner added 15 points , 10 rebounds , and four blocks . Lance Stephenson also provided a boost off the bench since he contributed with 11 points , four boards , and four assists .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 120 - 99 , at Toyota Center on Monday evening . It was a hard fought game the whole way , with the Jazz looking like they could end Houston 's mighty winning streak . After a tight three quarters , the Jazz pulled ahead by eight early in the fourth , leading 89 - 81 with 10:30 left in the game . It was at this point that the Rockets went ballistic . Eric Gordon poured in three straight threes and within a couple of minutes the Rockets were up by three . They continued on a rampage , outscoring the Jazz 39 - 10 from the 10:30 mark to the end of the game . This marks the 14th straight win for the Rockets . Gordon finished with a team - high 33 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting , in 35 minutes off the bench for Houston . James Harden followed up with 26 points , six rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block , while Chris Paul tallied 18 points , 10 assists , nine rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Clint Capela came up huge with 24 points and 20 rebounds , in 34 minutes . The Rockets shot 52 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 43 from long range . Meanwhile , Rodney Hood led the Jazz with 26 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . Joe Ingles followed up with 17 points , four assists and three rebounds , while Ricky Rubio added 14 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Jazz shot 46 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from downtown . The Jazz ( 14 - 17 ) head to OKC to take on the Thunder on Wednesday . The Rockets ( 25 - 4 ) will be looking for their 15th straight win as they play host to the Lakers on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Miami Heat , 99 - 90 , at Toyota Center on Monday evening . The Heat ( 27 - 20 ) came into the contest sporting a stellar 9 - 2 record over their previous 11 games , a stretch made even more impressive by the fact that they 've dealt with several key backcourt injuries at different points . However , the Rockets ( 33 - 12 ) came in surging as well , with a 5 - 1 record over their prior six contests despite a recent multi - game absence by James Harden due to a hamstring injury . Houston was the healthier team Monday , however , and that may have been the difference in what turned out to be a hard - fought affair . Miami actually used a 33 - point first quarter to vault to a 50 - 46 halftime lead . The home squad got things turned around in the second half , collecting 53 points while limiting their visitors to 40 over the final 24 minutes . Houston also played some stingy defense , eliciting a total of 16 turnovers and limiting the Heat to an unsightly 23 percent ( 7 - for - 30 ) success rate from long distance . The Rockets ' top backcourt trio of Harden , Chris Paul and Eric Gordon - - finally at full health - - were key , as they combined for 60 of the team 's 99 points . Hassan Whiteside paced the Heat with a 22 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three steals . Wayne Ellington provided 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Josh Richardson followed with 12 points , three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . James Johnson contributed 10 points , four assists and three rebounds . Kelly Olynyk matched Johnson 's scoring total to lead the bench and also supplied two boards , one assist and one steal . Harden led the way for the Rockets with 28 points , a total he supplemented with five assists , two rebounds , two blocks and two steals . Paul followed with 16 points , six rebounds , six assists and three steals . Gordon poured in 16 of his own to lead the second unit and also posted a pair of rebounds and assists apiece . Clint Capela tallied 14 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal . Ryan Anderson pitched in nine points , two rebounds and two assists . Trevor Ariza returned from his two - game suspension and played 28 minutes , but he only registered three points , five rebounds and two steals . The Heat heads back to South Florida to await a Thursday night visit from the Sacramento Kings , while the Rockets make the short trip to tangle with the intrastate rival Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 104 - 97 , at Toyota Center on Sunday . This was a near wire - to - wire win for Houston , as Dallas ' only lead came in the first three minutes . The Rockets never trailed from there , as they led by at least five points for the final 20 minutes of action . Free-throw shooting was the difference , with Houston hitting 23 - of - 33 and Dallas going just 11 - of - 16 from the charity stripe . The Rockets were also buoyed by the turnover differential , forcing nine turnovers from the Mavericks while committing just nine on their end . The Mavericks dominated the rest of the stat sheet , as they won the rebounding and assisting differentials by double - digit margins . The Mavericks ( 18 - 39 ) best player was Dennis Smith Jr. , as he accumulated 16 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Yogi Ferrell led the team with 20 points , five rebounds and two steals . Dwight Powell totaled 18 points and 12 rebounds while Jalen Jones led the bench with eight points and 10 rebounds , The Rockets ( 42 - 13 ) were led by James Harden , as he collected 27 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Chris Paul finished with 25 points , eight rebounds , nine assists and three steals . Clint Capela amassed 16 points , 11 rebounds and three blocks . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Houston traveling to play the Minnesota Timberwolves and Dallas playing host to the Sacramento Kings .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 120 - 102 , at Toyota Center on Friday evening . The Rockets ( 45 - 13 ) were likely itching to get back on the floor following the All-Star break , as they 'd ridden a blistering - hot 10 - game winning streak into the extended layoff . Moreover , with 23 wins in 29 home dates , they were poised to resume play on a positive note , even against a quality opponent like the Timberwolves ( 36 - 26 ) . However , the visitors turned the tables early , establishing a 32 - 26 first - quarter lead . It was all downhill from there , though , as the hosts outscored them 94 - 70 the rest of the way . Despite the double - digit loss , the most worrisome aspect of the night for Minnesota had nothing to do with the scoreboard , as star guard Jimmy Butler appeared to suffer a serious knee injury in a non - contact situation late in the third quarter and had to be helped off the court . The exact severity is still to be determined , but the entire development naturally cast a pall on the proceedings for the Timberwolves . Andrew Wiggins led the way for Minnesota with 21 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds and two assists . Karl-Anthony Towns generated an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Jeff Teague matched Towns ' scoring total and added four boards , four assists and two steals . Jamal Crawford produced a bench - leading 14 points and complemented them with three rebounds . Butler supplied 10 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal in 25 minutes before exiting . Taj Gibson registered a modest nine points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . James Harden paced the Rockets with 31 points , nine assists , two rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela followed with 25 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Chris Paul contributed a near triple - double with 14 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists and one steal . P.J. Tucker delivered 11 points , five boards and one assist . Trevor Ariza returned from his hamstring injury to tally 11 points , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Joe Johnson produced a bench - leading 10 points and also turned in three rebounds and one assist . The Timberwolves head back home to face off with the Chicago Bulls on Saturday evening , while the Rockets head a bit further west and tangle with the Denver Nuggets on Sunday night .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 100 - 96 , in overtime at Toyota Center on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 58 - 14 ) knew they 'd be tested to an extent coming in , as starting point guard Chris Paul was declared out for the contest earlier in the day with a hamstring injury . However , to an elite squad like Houston , that usually means another top - shelf player needs to step up , especially against a struggling opponent like the Pistons ( 32 - 40 ) . James Harden was highly likely to fit that bill and then some , which is what made Thursday 's final stat sheet all the more surprising - - the home team managed to log a win almost in spite of their MVP , as opposed to because of him . The Beard shot just 4 - for - 20 from the field and missed a potential game - winning floating jump shot at the end of regulation . His struggles extended into the extra period , as he also missed two free throws with 3 seconds remaining . However , the Rockets ' four - point cushion at the time was enough to withstand the misfires . With the Western Conference pacesetters shooting an abysmal 35 percent overall , there were a plethora of rebounding opportunities for Detroit , leading to a massive 66 - 52 advantage for them on the glass . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double . Ish Smith followed with a bench - leading 18 points - - a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , three assists and one block . Andre Drummond generated a 17 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Luke Kennard managed 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Reggie Bullock delivered a full line of 12 points , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Reggie Jackson saw a 20 - minute workload , but a 2 - for - 13 effort from the field led to just four points , which he complemented with three rebounds and one steal . Eric Gordon paced the Rockets with 22 points . He added five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Harden clawed his way to 21 points on sheer volume and a 13 - for - 18 showing from the free - throw line . He also supplied eight boards , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Joe Johnson led the bench with 11 points and also tallied three rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela generated a 10 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . P.J. Tucker matched Capela 's scoring and also hauled in eight rebounds and dished out one assist . Trevor Ariza contributed nine points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Pistons head back home and take on the Bulls on Saturday night , while the Rockets remain home and tangle with the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday evening as well .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 96 - 94 , at Toyota Center on Thursday evening . The Rockets got out to a great start at home , as they used an 18 - 5 run to close the first quarter with a 36 - 17 lead . The Rockets maintained a solid lead through the second , and built their cushion to 22 points , as they led 66 - 44 by halftime . The Trail_Blazers came out strong in the third quarter and began chipping away . They outscored the Rockets by nine in the quarter to cut the deficit to 13 , as they trailed 84 - 71 heading into the fourth . The Rockets looked in control for most of the fourth , even leading by 10 with 1:47 left in the game . However , the Trail_Blazers made a brilliant run to tie it up at 94 with just six seconds left . Finally , the Rockets got the ball into the hands of Chris Paul who buried the game - winning floater , off the glass , for the win at the buzzer . Paul led the way for Houston , with 27 points , five assists and four rebounds , in 31 minutes . James Harden followed up with 24 points , seven assists , six rebounds and one steal , while Clint Capela tallied 11 points , 10 rebounds , two steals , one block and one assist . The Rockets shot 47 percent , including 13 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , C.J. McCollum led the way for the Trail_Blazers with 16 points , five rebounds , four assists and one block , in 32 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic tallied 14 points , 11 rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Evan Turner added 10 points , three rebounds and three assists . The Trail_Blazers shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 22 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 31 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Spurs in San Antonio on Saturday . The Rockets ( 64 - 15 ) will be looking for their third straight win as they play host to the Thunder on Saturday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Phoenix Suns , 103 - 89 , at AT & T Center on Friday night . Shortly before tip - off , the Spurs ( 27 - 13 ) announced that LaMarcus Aldridge would get the night off for rest . However his absence was offset by the return of the talented trio of Kawhi Leonard , Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili , who 'd all sat for the same reasons in San_Antonio 's most recent game Wednesday evening . The Suns ( 15 - 26 ) hit the floor ready to do battle , however , as they worked the home squad to a 26 - 26 draw in the first quarter . The Spurs were able to gain some distance in the second period before Phoenix battled back in the third to enter the final 12 minutes trailing by a manageable 80 - 72 deficit . San_Antonio finally drove the nail in the coffin with an 11 - 2 run between the 8:30 and 5:42 mark of the fourth quarter , which extended their lead to a comfortable 97 - 78 margin . The visitors did themselves no favors with poor ball security , as they committed a total of 23 turnovers . Devin Booker led the way for the Suns with 21 points , which he complemented with five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Marquese Chriss posted 12 points , seven rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Josh Jackson drew the start for T.J. Warren ( illness ) and produced 11 points , five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Alex Len and Troy Daniels led the bench with matching 10 - point tallies , with the former adding five boards and the latter supplying three assists , two boards and two steals . Tyson Chandler mustered a modest three points but also hauled in 12 boards . Leonard paced the Spurs with 21 points , three boards , three assists , four steals and three blocks . Ginobili matched Leonard 's scoring total and also registered three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Bryn Forbes poured in 16 points and added three rebounds , one assist and three steals . Pau Gasol contributed 15 points and seven rebounds . Davis Bertans supplied 12 points , seven boards , one assist and one block . Parker generated four points , seven assists and two rebounds . The Suns head back home to take on the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday evening , while the Spurs hit the road to tangle with the Portland Trail Blazers on Sunday night as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 121 - 116 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday . San_Antonio held the lead for the first 44 minutes of this game , but New_Orleans prevailed when it mattered most . In fact , the Pelicans rode a 34 - 21 fourth quarter to a comeback victory , as the Spurs led by 15 points late in the third quarter . The only real difference in the stat sheet was scoring in the paint , with New_Orleans winning that battle , 68 - 58 . The Pelicans starters also dominated , as they outscored the Spurs starters , 81 - 48 . The Pelicans ( 35 - 26 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he accumulated 26 points , 15 rebounds and two steals . Jrue Holiday finished with 25 points , four rebounds and three assists . Rajon Rondo accrued 13 points , eight rebounds and 12 assists . Ian Clark was a nice spark off the bench , generating 10 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Spurs ( 36 - 26 ) were unfortunate to lose their leading scorer in this game , as LaMarcus Aldridge departed in the first half due to a right ankle sprain . Dejounte Murray led the way in his absence , as he collected 18 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Patty Mills amassed 11 points , three rebounds and two assists . Rudy Gay led the bench with 19 points , five rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Manu Ginobili also played well off the bench , providing 17 points , two rebounds and three assists . San_Antonio 's next game will be on Saturday when they play host to the Los Angeles Lakers . As for New_Orleans , they 're off until Sunday when they travel to face the Dallas Mavericks .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 98 - 85 , at AT & T Center on Monday evening . The Kings got out to a good start on the road , as they jumped ahead 60 and went on to outscore the Spurs , 25 - 17 , in the first quarter . The Spurs picked up their game in the second quarter but the Kings kept their advantage all the way to halftime , where they led 50 - 43 . The Kings stayed on top to start the third and even held a double - digit lead for most of the quarter . However , the Spurs closed the quarter on a 12 - 6 run that cut the deficit to six , as they trailed , 66 - 60 , heading into the fourth . The Spurs kept up the momentum going in the fourth and took their first lead of the half . The Kings fought back , but the Spurs shut it down over the final five minutes , where they outscored the Kings 16 - 6 , to seal the home win and clinch a playoff spot for the 21st consecutive season . Rudy Gay led the Spurs with 18 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 21 minutes off the bench . Manu Ginobili followed up with 17 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting , six rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 27 minutes off the bench . LaMarcus Aldridge tallied 15 points , 14 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 32 minutes . The Spurs shot 42 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Willie Cauley-Stein led the Kings with 25 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 37 minutes . De'Aaron Fox followed up with 21 points , seven assists and four rebounds , in 37 minutes . Buddy Hield added 17 points , in 32 minutes off the bench , while Nigel Hayes added seven points , nine rebounds , one assists and one steal . The Kings shot 41 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 18 from long range . The Kings ( 26 - 55 ) go on to play host to the Rocket on Wednesday . The Spurs ( 47 - 34 ) take on the Pelicans in New Orleans on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 98 - 92 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Monday . This was a competitive game throughout , as it was within a 10 - point margin for the final 30 minutes . Despite that fact , Brooklyn never relinquished the lead in the second half . The key to victory for the Nets was defense , as they held the Suns to 35 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . Brooklyn 's ability to score in the paint was huge , as they scored 44 paint points to Phoenix 's 30 . The Nets ( 4 - 6 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , who scored 14 of his 23 points in the fourth quarter . He also added six rebounds , nine assists and two steals on 8 - of - 13 shooting to his line . DeMarre Carroll recorded a double - double , totaling 14 points and 11 rebounds . Allen Crabbe was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 15 points and four rebounds . Joe Harris led the bench with 18 points and three rebounds . The Suns ( 4 - 7 ) had just four players score over seven points , as T.J. Warren led the team with 20 points , nine rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Devin Booker accumulated 18 points , two rebounds and two steals . Mike James collected 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Alex Len scored just seven points , but provided 14 rebounds and two blocks off the bench . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup against the Miami Heat on Wednesday . As for Brooklyn , they travel to face the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday for their next game .
The visiting Miami Heat defeated the Phoenix Suns , 126 - 115 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday night , . The Heat ( 5 - 6 ) grabbed a decent lead in the first quarter , and they would never let it go . After jumping to a 69 - 54 following the first half , Phoenix ( 4 - 8 ) showed signs of potentially turning things around but every time they got closer , Miami pushed them away , and ultimately came away on top after finishing things in the fourth quarter . The win represented Miami 's third victory over their last six games , while the Suns dropped their third straight contest . This means that Phoenix has had at least two three - game losing streaks during the current campaign . The Heat enjoyed a balanced scoring effort this Wednesday , as seven of their eight players that saw the floor contributed with at least 10 points . Goran Dragic led the way with 29 points , nine rebounds and four assists , while Hassan Whiteside added a double - double of 23 points and 10 rebounds . James Johnson produced on both ends of the court coming off the bench ( 15 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals ) , and both Wayne Ellington ( 15 points ) and Kelly Olynyk ( 10 points ) added double figures ias well . The one player who did n't reach the 10 - point plateau was Josh Richardson , who only got four points . On the other hand , Devin Booker led the way for the Suns with 30 points although he only made nine of his 23 shots . Mike James had 18 points , and T , J . Warren added 16 . Jared Dudley had a decent effort off the bench as well , finishing the contest with 13 points and six boards .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 118 - 110 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday evening . The Suns ( 5 - 9 ) used a 140 run late in the fourth quarter to steal one from the Timberwolves . The Timberwolves ( 7 - 5 ) held a slight lead for most of the game , but went dry with a four - minute scoring drought , that allowed the Suns to pass them by . After winning five straight , this marks the second loss in a row for Minnesota . T.J. Warren and Devin Booker poured in 35 points each to lead Phoenix in the win . Booker added nine rebounds and six assists , while Warren grabbed six boards of his own . Marquese Chriss added 13 points , seven rebounds , five blocks and two assists , in 26 minutes . No other player scored in double digits for the Suns , but Mike James was solid in 18 minutes off the bench , with nine points , five assists and three rebounds . The Suns shot a blistering 53 percent from the field , including 38 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Andrew Wiggins led the Timberwolves with 27 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting , in 38 minutes . Jimmy Butler followed up with 25 points , seven rebounds , five assists , one block and one steal , in 40 minutes of action . Karl-Anthony Towns notched a double - double with 17 points and 12 rebounds , in 38 minutes . The only other player to scored in double digits for Minnesota was Taj Gibson , who also recorded a double - double , with 16 points and 11 rebounds , in 36 minutes . The Timberwolves shot 40 percent from the field , including only 20 percent from long range . The Timberwolves will move on to face the Jazz in Utah on Monday . The Suns play host to the Lakers on Monday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 142 - 116 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 11 - 4 ) took off right out of the gate , scoring 45 points in each of the first two quarters , on their way to a franchise - best 90 - point first half . The 90 - point first half ties the record for the second - most points scored in a half in NBA history . This game marked Chris Paul 's return to the line up for the Rockets , after he missed all but the first game of the season . Paul finished with 11 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and two steals , in just 21 minutes of action . James Harden was the high - point man in the contest , with a ridiculous 48 points , seven assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , in only 35 minutes . Clint Capela notched a double - double with 12 points and 10 rebounds , while Ryan Anderson poured in 24 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . The Rockets shot 48 percent from the field and tallied 27 assists . Meanwhile , the Suns ( 5 - 11 ) shot 45 percent from the field , including 33 percent from long range , rebounded competitively , tallied 28 assists and tied the Rockets with 14 turnovers , but fell short as they were out done from three - point range and from the foul line . Greg Monroe logged 26 minutes in his debut for the Suns , and finished with 20 points and 11 rebounds . Devin Booker finished with 18 points and 10 assists , while Josh Jackson chipped in 16 points , in 28 minutes off the bench . Troy Daniels added 23 points , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Suns will be right back in action , as they head straight to L.A. , where they will take on the Lakers on Friday . The Rockets take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Saturday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 115 - 91 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Friday . It 's rare to see a home team dominated so thoroughly , but that 's what New_Orleans did to Phoenix here . In fact , the Pelicans led by 12 at the end of the first quarter , while carrying a 30 - point lead into the half . Phoenix actually never got the game within 24 points in the second half . Defense was key for New_Orleans , as they held Phoenix to 39 percent from the field and 10 percent from three - point range . The Pelicans ended up shooting 50 percent , while outassisting the Suns , 29 - 12 . The Pelicans ( 11 - 8 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 23 points , and nine rebounds on 9 - of - 12 shooting . DeMarcus Cousins collected 19 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jrue Holiday accrued 18 points , two assists and five steals . The Suns ( 7 - 13 ) got 18 points , two rebounds and three blocks from T.J , Warren to lead the team . Tyson Chandler went 6 - of - 7 from the field to total 14 points and nine rebounds . Devin Booker amassed 13 points and three rebounds , but went 4 - of - 13 from the field , while committing six turnovers . On deck for New_Orleans is a road matchup against the Golden State Warriors on Saturday . As for Phoenix , they return to action on Sunday in a road matchup versus the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 115 - 109 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena . This marked the fourth and final game of a road trip for the Raptors , which they finished with a 3 - 1 record . After falling apart late in their last game , the Raptors came out strong in this one with an early 37 - 31 lead after one quarter . After a tight second quarter , Toronto maintained the six - point advantage at halftime . The Raptors came out strong once again in the third , expanding their lead to 92 - 79 heading into the fourth . Things got interesting in the fourth as the Suns fought to make it a three - point game with just under 30 seconds to go , however the Raptors were able to hit just enough of their free throws down the stretch to hang on . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors with 37 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting , seven rebounds and four assists , in 36 minutes . Serge Ibaka followed up with 21 points , 13 rebounds , one assist and one block , while Jonas Valanciunas tallied 20 points and 11 rebounds . Kyle Lowry chipped in 12 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Raptors shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Troy Daniels was on fire for Phoenix , finishing with 32 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . Greg Monroe followed up with 17 points , 11 rebounds , two blocks and one steal , while T.J. Warren added 17 points , three rebounds and one assist . The Suns shot 46 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 24 from long range . The Suns ( 9 - 21 ) head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Saturday . The Raptors ( 18 - 8 ) play host to the Nets on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 99 - 97 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Tuesday night . The Suns ( 13 - 23 ) and the Grizzlies ( 10 - 24 ) played a very entertaining game that went down to the wire until the final seconds . Phoenix went up by 10 in the first quarter , but Memphis answered right back to the point that they evened things up 76 - 76 heading into the fourth . The Suns had the lead late , but Jarrell Martin evened things up with less than one second left . It seemed things were headed for overtime , but an alley - oop connection between Tyson Chandler and Dragan Bender in the final seconds pulled the Suns up to an improbable win at home . Devin Booker led the way for the Suns in his return from injury , as the shooting guard finished with 32 points , six assists , and five rebounds . Alex Len contributed with 12 points , six boards , and four assists off the bench . T.J. Warren chipped in with 17 points . Tyreke Evans was the best player for the Grizzlies , as the versatile combo guard once again dazzled thanks to 25 points , five rebounds , and five assists . Marc Gasol contributed on both ends of the court , as he ended with 18 points , six rebounds , and four blocks . James Ennis III added 11 points and five boards with two assists off the bench .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 104 - 103 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Tuesday . Despite the fact that Atlanta led for the majority of this game , Phoenix led when it mattered most . In fact , the Suns led for less than five minutes , as Phoenix ended the game on a 15 - 4 run to escape with a win . The second and fourth quarters were decisive for Phoneix , as they outscored Atlanta , 61 - 44 . The Suns dominated the shooting , hitting 51 percent of their shots , while holding the Hawks to just 41 percent from the field . A 47 - 40 rebounding differential was also imperative for Phoenix , as they also outassisted the Hawks , 24 - 18 . Phoenix also dominated the scoring down low , outscoring Atlanta in the paint , 46 - 34 . The Hawks ( 10 - 27 ) were led by Ersan Ilyasova , as he tallied 21 points and nine rebounds . Kent Bazemore accrued 20 points , three rebounds , four assists and four steals on 7 - of - 8 shooting . Dennis Schroder collected 20 points , two rebounds and five assists . Marco Belinelli led the bench with 16 points . The Suns ( 15 - 24 ) got another gem out of Devin Booker , as he led Phoenix with 34 points , five rebounds , seven assists and three steals . T.J. Warren was n't far behind , totaling 31 points , five rebounds and two assists on 15 - of - 21 shooting . Marquese Chriss amassed 17 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and two steals .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 120 - 97 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . This game was over early , as a 30 - 16 first quarter was too much for Phoenix to overcome . In fact , Indiana led by double - digits for the final three quarters , as they led by at least 20 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Pacers hitting 55 percent of their shots , while holding the Suns to just 41 percent from the field . Three-point shooting was equally as lopsided , with Indiana hitting 11 - of - 23 and Phoenix going just 9 - of - 37 from long range . The nine steals were also huge for Indiana , as Phoenix could only muster up two steals . The Pacers ( 23 - 20 ) were led by Darren Collison , as he tallied 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Victor Oladipo collected 17 points , five rebounds and four steals . Domantas Sabonis started and totaled four points and 14 boards . Cory Joseph led the bench with 16 points and six assists . The Suns ( 16 - 28 ) best player was Josh Jackson , as he amassed 21 points , six rebounds and three assists . Devin Booker accrued 15 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Tyson Chandler provided nine points and 14 rebounds as the starting center . Alex Len double - doubled off the bench , putting in 12 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Indiana will have a quick turnaround , as they travel to face the Utah Jazz on Monday . As for Phoenix , they travel to play the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday for their next fixture. ,
The Phoenix Suns took down the Dallas Mavericks , 102 - 88 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday . While Phoenix ( 18 - 34 ) earned a much - needed quality win , the story of the game was centered around a gruesome lower leg injury to one of the Suns ' players . Play stopped in the second quarter when Phoenix 's Isaiah Canaan hit the floor hard and appeared to break his left ankle . Canaan was eventually helped off the floor and exited the game after only five minutes of play . Though the injury rattled players on both teams , the Suns were still able to come away with a win . They jumped out to a double - digit lead in the first 10 minutes of the game and managed to remain ahead for the remainder of regulation . Rookie forward Josh Jackson continued his strong stretch of recent play , leading the team with 21 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Dallas ( 16 - 36 ) is in a tough spot following the loss . The team has now gone just 1 - 8 in its last nine contests . Wednesday 's loss was in part due to poor shooting from the Mavericks . As a whole , the team shot just over 36 percent from the field and went only 14 - of - 26 from the free - throw line . The Mavericks were also led by a rookie , as Dennis Smith , Jr. scored a team - high 17 points in the loss . Phoenix will host the Utah Jazz on Friday , while Dallas will travel to take on The Sacramento Kings on Saturday .
The host Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 99 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Sunday evening . For the second straight game , All-Star forward Paul George led the Thunder ( 6 - 7 ) to the victory . George , who scored a team - high 42 points in the Thunder 's recent win over Los Angeles , scored another 37 points to lead the team on Sunday . The veteran All-Star hit seven three - pointers and shot 12 - of - 22 overall on the night in what was arguably his most effective night in a Thunder uniform . George 's strong play helped to make up for the absence of star forward Carmelo Anthony , who missed the game with a back injury . Reigning MVP Russell Westbrook also delivered big numbers , scoring 27 points . However , the point guard continued to struggle from the field , shooting only 6 - of - 18 on the night . Dallas ( 2 - 12 ) owns the unfortunate title of the league 's worst record . Despite a tough battle against the reigning Eastern Conference champion Cavaliers on Saturday , the Mavericks have dropped two straight games and sit at the bottom of the Western Conference standings . While the Mavericks have seen few bright spots in the 2017 - 18 campaign , rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. has impressed with his strong play . On Sunday , Smith scored 15 points to go along with five rebounds . Smith was among Dallas 's leading scorers in the game . The team 's leader in the points column , though , was veteran forward Harrison Barnes , who scored 22 to go along with 13 rebounds . Dallas will host the Spurs on Tuesday , while OKC will host the Bulls on Wednesday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 90 - 87 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Sunday . Despite the fact that San_Antonio played this game without three of their best players , it came down to the final shot . In fact , there were four led changes in the fourth quarter , as neither team led by more than eight points . Rebounding carried Oklahoma_City , as they outrebounded San_Antonio , 47 - 39 . They also dominated scoring down low as well , as they outscored the Spurs in the paint , 52 - 36 . The lack of starter production really hurt San_Antonio as well , as the Thunder 's starters outscored their starting - five , 66 - 41 . The Spurs had to play this game without Kawhi Leonard , LaMarcus Aldridge and Tony Parker , as they almost pulled out their most impressive win of the season . Dejounte Murray carried the load with all those players out , as he tallied 17 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and three steals . No other starter reached double figures in scoring . David Bertans led the bench with 16 points , four rebounds and five blocks . The Thunder were led by Russell Westbrook . as he collected 22 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists en route to a triple - double . Steven Adams totaled 19 points , 10 rebounds and three steals . Paul George had a game to forget , as he accumulated eight points , eight rebounds and four assists on 2 - of - 17 shooting , while committing six turnovers . San_Antonio will have to play again on Monday , as they host the Detroit Pistons . As for Oklahoma_City , they play host to the Utah Jazz on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 100 - 94 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Tuesday evening . The Thunder ( 11 - 12 ) came from behind to pull a huge win against the Jazz ( 13 - 12 ) that seemingly came out of nowhere . Utah was leading through most of the game and they entered the final 12 minutes up 80 - 68 . But the Thunder used a massive comeback in the fourth quarter to pull away , including a 30 - 12 scoring run in the final 10:30 minutes of the game . Utah tried to recover , it was too late for them and their own mistakes - most notably on the defensive end of the court - doomed them . Russell Westbrook was the star of the game for the Thunder , as the All-Star point guard once again delivered a triple - double thanks to his 34 points , 13 rebounds , and 13 assists . He was n't alone in the comeback effort , though . Carmelo Anthony and Paul George both came through in the clutch for OKC , and finished with 14 and 21 points , respectively . Steven Adams added 20 points with nine rebounds . Donovan Mitchell was the star of the game for the Jazz , as the talented rookie finished with 31 points , four assists and four steals , although he also committed five turnovers . Joe Ingles added 16 points , while Thabo Sefolosha and Alec Burks both had big games off the bench . Sefolosha finished with 11 points , seven boards and four steals , while Burks added 11 points with five assists .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 116 - 103 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Monday . While this was a competitive game through the first three quarters , a huge run at the end of the third quarter changed the game . In fact , Charlotte turned a 66 - 66 tie into an 88 - 68 lead with a 20 - 2 run . Oklahoma_City could n't recover from there , as the Thunder never got within single - digits from there . Shooting was key , with Charlotte hitting 53 percent of their shots , while holding the Thunder to just 41 percent from the field . They also played well on defense , with the Hornets recording eight steals and four blocks . The Hornets ( 10 - 16 ) were led by Dwight Howard , as he tallied 23 points , seven rebounds and two blocks . Kemba Walker amassed 19 points , three rebounds and nine assists . Marvin Williams totaled 18 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist amassed 17 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Thunder 's ( 12 - 14 ) best player was Russell Westbrook . as he collected 30 points , four rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Paul George accrued 20 points and five rebounds . Steven Adams recorded an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Both teams have road games on Wednesday for their next fixture , with Oklahoma_City playing the Indiana Pacers and Charlotte facing the Houston Rockets .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Washington Wizards , 121 - 112 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Thursday . While this was a wire - to - wire win for Oklahoma_City , it was much closer than that would indicate . In fact , Washington turned a 14 - point deficit into just a two - point margin at one point int he third quarter , as they simply could n't grab a lead . Turnovers really killed the Wizards , as they committed 23 turnovers while forcing just 14 from the Thunder . A huge part of that was the 16 steals that Oklahoma_City recorded . Scoring down low was also huge for the Thunder , as they outscored the Wizards in the paint , 60 - 40 . The Wizards ( 26 - 22 ) got a gem out of Bradley Beal , as he tallied 41 points , 12 rebounds , seven assists and two steals on 15 - of - 26 shooting . John Wall amassed 21 points and 12 assists . Markieff Morris accrued 20 points , nine rebounds and two steals . Otto Porter was the only other Wizard in double figures , as he totaled 11 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Thunder ( 28 - 20 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he collected 46 points , six rebounds , six assists and two steals on 19 - of - 29 from the field . Paul George accumulated 18 points , two rebounds , four assists and four steals . Carmelo Anthony finished with 13 points and eight rebounds , while Steven Adams provided 12 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Oklahoma_City traveling to play the Detroit Pistons and Washington playing the Atlanta Hawks on the road .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 110 - 92 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Sunday evening . The Grizzlies started off with a 60 lead , but the Thunder quickly took control and did not look back . The Thunder picked up the pace and amassed a 35 - 18 lead by the end of the first quarter . The second quarter was more highly contested , as the Grizzlies managed to pour in 36 points , but the Thunder kept pace with 39 points of their own , to take a 74 - 54 lead by halftime . The teams traded baskets through the third quarter , with the Grizzlies managing to gain a little bit of ground , as they outscored the Thunder by five , to cut the deficit to 15 , heading into the final frame . Nonetheless , the Thunder were able to cruise to the finish , as they maintained a double digit lead through the fourth quarter . Oklahoma_City was without Russell Westbrook ( ankle ) and Carmelo Anthony ( ankle ) , but Paul George was able to step up and take the lead by pouring in 33 points on 10 - of - 24 shooting , in 35 minutes . Alex Abrines followed up with 16 points , while Patrick Patterson , Raymond Felton and Jerami Grant chipped in 14 points each . The Thunder shot 45 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , Marc Gasol was the high - point man for Memphis , with 18 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , in 33 minutes . JaMychal Green followed up with 14 points , 12 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , while Tyreke Evans chipped in 12 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Grizzlies shot 39 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 28 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 37 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Thunder again , this time in Memphis on Wednesday . The Thunder ( 32 - 25 ) play host to the Cavaliers on Tuesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Oklahoma_City Thunder , 120 - 112 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Tuesday evening . Things were tight to start , as the Cavs and Thunder traded baskets and the lead through the first quarter . The second quarter began with more of the same , however after the Thunder took a 38 - 36 lead , the Cavs went on a 20 - 8 run to take a 10 - point lead with 3:50 left in the half and held on to take a 62 - 57 lead into halftime . The Thunder came out strong in the third and used an 80 run to cut the deficit to as fe as two , as they trailed 78 - 76 , with five minutes left in the quarter . The Thunder continued the pressure and managed to pull ahead , 82 - 81 , however the Cavs responded and reclaimed a 91 - 87 lead heading into the final frame . Cleveland slowly pulled ahead to a 10 - point lead halfway through the fourth quarter , and despite a final push by the Thunder , held on for the road win . This marks the fourth straight win for the Cavaliers . LeBron James led the Cavs with 37 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and one block , in 39 minutes . J.R. Smith followed up with 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 30 minutes , while Rodney Hood and Jordan Clarkson chipped in 14 points each off the bench . The Cavs shot 51 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Paul George was the high - point man for OKC , as he tallied 25 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting , in 39 minutes . Steven Adams had a big night with 22 points , 17 rebounds , two steals , one assist and one block , in 42 minutes . Carmelo Anthony finished with 24 points , and seven rebounds , while Russell Westbrook tallied 21 points , 12 assists , seven rebounds and two steals . The Thunder shot 44 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 35 from long range . The Thunder ( 32 - 26 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Wednesday . The Cavs ( 34 - 22 ) play host to the Wizards on Thursday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Oklahoma_City Thunder , 111 - 107 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Tuesday evening . The Thunder got out to a good start at home , with a quick 70 lead . They held the lead through the entire first quarter and took a 27 - 24 lead into the second quarter . The Warriors turned it on in the second , as they started the quarter with a 7 - 1 run and stayed in control the rest of the way until they led 57 - 47 by halftime . The Warriors maintained a double - digit lead for the first half of the third quarter , but the Thunder came back and took a momentary lead before they trailed 84 - 81 entering the fourth . The game stayed tight through the fourth , while the Warriors were able to hold the slight edge the rest of the way , en route to their third straight win . Kevin Durant led the way for the Warriors with 34 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 35 minutes . Kay Thompson followed up with 20 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals , while Quinn Cook chipped in 12 points , six assists and three rebounds . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with 44 points , 16 rebounds , six assists and two steals , in 40 minutes . Paul George finished with 20 points , eight rebounds and two assists , while Carmelo Anthony added 12 points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Thunder shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 38 from long range . The Thunder ( 45 - 34 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Saturday . The Warriors ( 57 - 21 ) take on the Pacers in Indiana on Thursday .
Two of the most promising young teams in the league squared off on Tuesday , with the Philadelphia 76ers earning a 118 - 112 win over the Minnesota Timberwolves in a thrilling overtime period at Target Center . Philadelphia ( 14 - 13 ) snapped its four - game losing streak on Tuesday in exciting fashion . The Sixers kept it close against the host Timberwolves throughout , ultimately taking the game in overtime . Throughout the win , Philly 's offensive approach was characterized by aggressively drawing contact . The team took 32 free - throws on the night , including 23 between starters Joel Embiid and J.J. Redick . The duo capitalized on those attempts , shooting a near - perfect 22 - of - 23 from the line . Embiid dominated throughout the game , finishing with a team - high 28 points and 12 rebounds , as well as eight assists . He made the most of the matchup with Minnesota star Karl-Anthony Towns , holding the opposing big man to just 6 - of - 16 shooting from the field . Redick also excelled throughout the game , scoring 26 points and knocking down three three - pointers . Minnesota ( 16 - 12 ) , meanwhile , was not in the best position for an overtime period , as every starter played big minutes in regulation . Karl-Anthony Towns and All-Star Jimmy Butler played at least 45 minutes each , including 48 for Towns . Butler made the most of the minutes , though , scoring a game - high 38 points on 15 - of - 33 shooting . The Wolves were beneficiaries of an enormous number of Philly turnovers , as the Sixers coughed the ball up 24 times on the night . Thanks to the huge turnover disparity , as well as a solid offensive rebounding night , Minnesota attempted 28 more field goals than Philadelphia in the game . The gap in shot attempts made up for the Wolves ' poor shooting , as the team shot only 41 percent from the field and hit just five three - pointers . Minnesota will host the Kings on Thursday , while Philadelphia will see the Thunder on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Toronto Raptors , 115 - 109 , at Target Center on Saturday . Six ties and 11 lead changes do n't show how close this game was , as neither team ever led by more than 11 points . The difference for the T'Wolves was their ability to get to the free - throw line , as they went 32 - of - 42 from the free - throw line , while the Raptors went just 19 - of - 21 . Rebounding was also key to victory for Minnesota , as they outrebounded Toronto , 44 - 35 . The Raptors ( 31 - 14 ) were led by Kyle Lowry , as he tallied 40 points , five rebounds and five assists . DeMar DeRozan amassed 20 points , three rebounds , six assists and three steals . Delon Wright led the bench with 12 points , six rebounds and six assists . The Timberwolves ( 30 - 18 ) were led by Andrew Wiggins , as he accrued 29 points , five rebounds and three assists . Karl-Anthony Towns totaled 22 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Jeff Teague only scored five points on 2 - of - 11 from the field but did hand out 10 assists . On deck for Minnesota is a road matchup versus the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . As for Toronto , they travel to play the Atlanta Hawks for their next fixture on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 126 - 108 , at Target Center on Tuesday night . The Rockets ( 43 - 13 ) and the Timberwolves ( 35 - 25 ) had a very intense game that went back and forth during the first half , but the Rockets pulled away in the fourth quarter and never looked back . Minnesota jumped to an eight - point lead in the first quarter , but Houston answered with a 12 - point lead in the second quarter , so they built a four - point lead at half time . A 30 - 30 third quarter kept things close heading into the fourth , but the Rockets dominated with a 42 - 28 lead in the final quarter that allowed them to ran away with the game with ease . With the win , Houston extended their winning run to nine games and remain one of the top teams in the Association right now . James Harden led the way for Houston with 34 points , 12 assists , six rebounds , and one block . Chris Paul came close to a triple - double since he finished with 13 points , eight rebounds , and seven assists . P.J. Tucker added 10 points , and the bench did a very good job as well . Ryan Anderson contributed 21 points while going 6 - for - 10 from three - point range , while Eric Gordon finished with 13 points . Karl-Anthony Towns was Minnesota 's best player since he finished with 35 points and 12 rebounds . Jeff Teague chipped in with 25 points , eight assists and five rebounds . Jimmy Butler added 15 points , seven rebounds , and six assists . Taj Gibson had 12 points with five rebounds , and Jamal Crawford contributed off the bench with 11 points in 20 minutes . Andrew Wiggins struggled , however , finishing with just seven points ( 2 - 14 FG ) .
The host Portland Trail_Blazers narrowly defeated the Orlando Magic , 99 - 96 , on Wednesday night at Moda Center . Portland ( 8 - 6 ) has had an up - and - down start to the season , but is now on a two - game win streak . While Orlando jumped out to an early lead , Portland fought back with a strong second quarter run , taking a four - point lead by halftime . As is routine at this point , the Blazers ' success hinged largely on the play of star guards Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum . Lillard flirted with a triple - double , scoring a team - high 26 points , pulling down 11 rebounds , and dishing seven assists . The star point guard helped put the game away , hitting a layup with 1:16 remaining in the fourth quarter to put Portland up by eight . McCollum , meanwhile , hit multiple big shots late in the game . He finished with 24 points and also came away with three steals on the defensive end . Orlando ( 8 - 7 ) has now lost three straight games after a red - hot start to the season . Though the Magic are having a down stretch , they remain in the top five in both three - point makes and three - point percentage . The uptick in shooting has helped fuel the new - look Orlando offense , which is seeing more success in head coach Frank Vogel 's second season with the team . On Wednesday , the team again shot well from deep , hitting 11 three - pointers on 38 percent shooting from beyond the arc . Each member of the Magic 's starting five hit at least one shot from beyond the arc . The team also saw strong bench play , headed up by sixth man Jonathan Simmons . Simmons scored 16 points off the bench , and has now scored 13 or more points in six straight games . The Blazers will visit Sacramento on Friday , while Orlando will host the Jazz on Saturday .
The visiting Denver Nuggets took down the Portland Trail_Blazers with ease on Friday , winning 102 - 85 at Moda Center . Denver ( 17 - 15 ) had an up - and - down start to the season that included injuries to star big men Paul Millsap ( wrist ) and Nikola Jokic . While Millsap remains sidelined by the injury , Jokic is back to starting for Denver , and has been a major boost for his team . On Friday , he was the backbone of the Denver offense , scoring a team - high 27 points and dishing out six assists . Jokic 's performance helped spark a much - needed win for the Nuggets , who currently sit in the middle of the pack among Western Conference playoff contenders . Friday 's win was never in much jeopardy for Denver , as the team jumped out to a double - digit lead in the first half and did n't look back . With star point guard Damian Lillard ( hamstring ) sitting out the game , it was difficult for Portland to muster the offensive output necessary for a comeback . On Denver 's end , things were smooth sailing , as five players scored in double figures and the team shot over 49 percent from the floor . Though it was a slow night for sophomore point guard Jamal Murray , who had seven points on 3 - of - 10 shooting , the team was able to find production elsewhere . Shooting guard Gary Harris and forward Wilson Chandler combined for 38 points on 15 - of - 27 shooting . Portland ( 16 - 16 ) , meanwhile , could have used the win , as they have also found themselves in the middle of a crowded Western Conference playoff picture . With Lillard out , though , the team had trouble finding reliable offense . The Blazers looked to shooting guard C.J. McCollum in his stead , but with the Nuggets able to ramp up defensive pressure on him , McCollum shot just 7 - of - 18 . The team as a whole struggled throughout the night , shooting just 43 percent from the field including a disappointing 6 - of - 22 from beyond the arc . The Blazers did find some production from their second unit , though , as three players scored in double figures off the bench . The Blazers will look to bounce back as they visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Saturday . Denver , meanwhile , will travel to Oakland to face the defending champion Golden State Warriors .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 111 - 110 , at Moda Center on Sunday evening . This game was a thriller right from the start , as the two teams played to a tie through the first quarter . The second quarter was tight as well but the Spurs pulled away towards the end to take a 53 - 48 lead at halftime . The Trail_Blazers took their turn in the third quarter , and fought back to tie it up at 80 heading into the fourth . The fourth quarter was heated , with the Spurs pulling ahead , before Portland pushed back to take a seven - point lead with 5:30 to go . The drama was no where near finished though , as the Spurs took one last lead , up 110 - 109 with 13 seconds left , setting the stage for C.J. McCollum to bury the game - winning bucket with five seconds left . The Spurs had time for a final shot but it fell short , leading to the Trail_Blazers ' second straight win . C.J. McCollum led the way for Portland with 25 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , in 38 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic added 17 points and 13 rebounds , while Maurice Harkless tallied 19 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Evan Turner finished with eight points on 4 - of - 9 shooting , in 23 minutes , and Shabazz Napier added 15 points , seven assists and five rebounds . The Blazers shot 52 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 30 points and 14 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Pau Gasol tallied 16 points . nine rebounds , five assists and two steals . Manu Ginobili came up big with 26 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 49 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 23 from long range . The Spurs ( 27 - 14 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Monday . The Trail_Blazers ( 21 - 18 ) head to OKC to take on the Thunder on Tuesday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Dallas Mavericks , 117 - 108 , at Moda Center on Sunday . Portland 's success began and ended with their backcourt on Sunday , as the Trail_Blazers ' ( 25 - 21 ) duo of starting guards combined to score 57 points in the win . Damian Lillard continued his All-Star push , scoring 31 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting while dishing out nine assists . C.J. McCollum , meanwhile , added 26 points and hit two three - pointers . While the game was never quite a blowout , Portland managed to keep Dallas at a comfortable distance late in the game . A late basket from Lillard and several free - throws helped keep the lead at eight or more points for the final four minutes . Dallas ( 15 - 31 ) got off to a rough start , allowing Portland to take a double - digit lead in the first quarter . Despite a stronger second half , Dallas was unable to close the gap by the game 's end . Like the Blazers , the Mavericks relied heavily on their starters to provide offense . Three members of Dallas 's starting five scored at least 21 points . Veteran wing Wesley Matthews led the team with 23 , while aging star Dirk Nowitzki turned in a vintage performance with 21 . The Mavericks will play host to the Washington Wizards on Monday . Portland , meanwhile , will see the Nuggets in Denver .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 124 - 108 , at Moda Center on Wednesday . Portland ( 29 - 22 ) got off to an explosive start thanks to star guard C.J. McCollum . McCollum set a new franchise record with 28 points in the first quarter alone , finishing with 50 points overall . Thanks to McCollum 's historic contribution , the Blazers finished the first quarter with a massive 22 - point lead . The hot start set the tone for the game , as Portland held a double - digit lead for the remainder of regulation . McCollum seemingly could not miss on Wednesday , as he went 18 - of - 25 from the field . He was the driving force of a strong Blazers offense , which shot 56 percent from the field in the game . Damian Lillard scored 13 points , but took only nine shots as McCollum was able to take the reigns to the offense in the blowout win . Chicago ( 18 - 33 ) , meanwhile , could seemingly not stop Portland 's perimeter attack early in the game . On offense , though , the team saw some positive developments . Zach LaVine led the team with 23 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting . This marked the end of a major slump for LaVine , who had shot just 5 - of - 28 over his previous two games . The team was also able to hit 13 three - pointers despite the absence of elite shooter Lauri Markkanen , who sat out the game for personal reasons . The Trail_Blazers will visit Toronto on Friday , while the Bulls will take on the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 108 - 100 , at Moda Center on Saturday evening . The first quarter started off as a close battle with neither team taking more than a two - possession lead , before the Thunder emerged with a 28 - 25 advantage heading into the second . The Trail_Blazers made a push in the second quarter and created some separation with a seven - point lead mid way through the quarter , but held on to just a three - point lead , 53 - 50 , by halftime . The Trail_Blazers came out strong in the third quarter and kept the advantage for most of the way , as they expanded their lead to 83 - 75 heading into the final frame . The Blazers kept their foot on the gas and pushed their lead to 10 with 5:44 left in the game . They stayed in control the rest of the way , playing the Thunder to a tie through the fourth quarter , en route to their sixth straight win . C.J. McCollum led the way for Portland with 28 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting , eight rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal , in 37 minutes . Damian Lillard followed up with 20 points on 5 - of - 18 shooting , seven assists , one rebound , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Meanwhile , Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with 30 points on 12 - of - 31 shooting , 11 rebounds , six assists and one block . The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start , as they led for most of the first quarter , before they went on an 11 - 2 to end the quarter and take a 34 - 25 lead into the second . Portland came out strong again in the third quarter , where they outscored the Heat29-25 , to push their lead to 88 - 72 entering the fourth . The Heat battled back to make it just a three - point game mid way through the final frame , but the Blazers quickly pushed the lead back to double digits and cruised to their 10th straight win . The Houston Rockets defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 122 - 121 , at Oracle Arena on Tuesday . In the opening game of the season for these title contenders , it came down to the final seconds to decide a winner . Despite the fact that the Warriors led for over 46 minutes of this game , the Rockets ended up prevailing in comeback fashion . The win has to be attributed to a monster fourth quarter , in which Houston outscored Golden_State , 34 - 20 . Turnovers really killed the Warriors , as they committed 17 of them in their defeat . Houston also did a fantastic job down low , outscoring Golden_State , 54 - 32 , in the paint . The Rockets ( 10 ) were huge underdogs in this game , but James Harden carried them to an impressive win . Harden led Houston with 27 points , six rebounds and 10 assists . Eric Gordon led the bench in scoring , providing 24 points , despite going 0 - of - 6 from three - point range . P.J. Tucker was also huge off the bench , totaling 20 points and six rebounds . Chris Paul went just 2 - of - 9 from the field in his debut with Houston , but still finished with four points , eight rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . The Warriors ( 0 - 1 ) are prohibited favorites to repeat on their title this year , but a loss like this is uncharacteristic of this bunch . Draymond Green was the difference , as he tallied nine points , 11 rebounds and 13 assists before departing in the third quarter due to a knee injury . Once he went out , the Rockets overcame a double - digit deficit to comeback and win . Nick Young led the Warriors in scoring , as he dropped 23 points on 8 - of - 9 shooting off the bench . Kevin Durant amassed 20 points , five rebounds , seven assists and four blocks , despite committing nine turnovers . Stephen Curry accrued 22 points , five rebounds and four assists . On deck for the Rockets is a road matchup with the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday , while the Warriors play the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday for their next game .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 110 - 95 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday evening . The Pelicans ( 11 - 9 ) jumped right out of the gate , outscoring the Warriors 31 - 17 in the first quarter . The Warriors ( 15 - 5 ) responded in the second quarter , where they outscored the Pelicans 36 - 22 , to tie it up at 53 by halftime , and carried the momentum through the third to take the lead , 84 - 75 , heading into the fourth . The Pelicans made a push in the final frame , bringing it to a six - point game with 4:30 to go , before the Warriors pulled away one final time . Stephen Curry was the high - point man for the Warriors , with 27 points on 9 - of - 25 shooting , in 36 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 24 points , four rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 36 minutes .
