The Golden_State Warriors defended their home court , beating the Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 106 , at Oracle Arena on Friday . Golden_State ( 26 - 6 ) is back to having the league 's best record thanks to the win . The reigning champions are also now 30 against the Lakers this season . While the results have been lopsided , the games have been anything but . Both of the team 's previous two matchups were narrowly won by Golden_State in overtime . While Friday 's contest ended in regulation , the game excited until the end . The Lakers launched a major fourth - quarter comeback to cut a double - digit lead down to just two points . In the end , though , the game finished in less - than - exciting fashion , as the star - powered Warriors pulled away in the final minutes . The Warriors saw a career night from their rookie center , Jordan Bell . Bell had 20 points and 10 rebounds , along with a block and a steal . The game proved to be a showcase of young talent , as Bell traded baskets and highlight - reel plays with the Lakers ' own rookie phenoms . Still , it was established superstar Kevin Durant who decided the game , scoring a team - high 33 points , including four points in the final minute of regulation to help seal the win . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 19 ) saw yet another heartbreaking loss at the hands of the defending champions . Still , the Lakers left Oracle Arena with plenty of positive takeaways on Friday , as a number of their young talents stood out on the big stage . Rookie point guard Lonzo Ball had one of his best shooting nights to date , scoring 24 points while going 5 - of - 6 from beyond the three - point line . Ball , along with rookie forward Kyle Kuzma , dominated on the offensive end throughout the night , helping push the Lakers to near - victory . Kuzma scored a team - high 27 points to go along with 14 rebounds . The performance comes just days after Kuzma recorded a career - high 38 points in Houston . Los_Angeles will host the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday , while Golden_State will host the Denver Nuggets .
The visiting Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Golden_State Warriors , 125 - 106 , at Oracle Arena on Wednesday night . The win was the Clippers ' first against Golden_State since December 25 , 2014 . With All-Star guards Steph Curry ( ankle ) and Klay Thompson ( rest ) sitting out for the Warriors ( 33 - 9 ) , the game looked like a prime opportunity for superstar forward Kevin Durant to take over on offense . Durant , who had missed the last four games with a calf strain , came out strong , scoring 25 first half points . Despite his early efforts , Golden_State was able to carry only a four - point lead into halftime . Durant 's early dominance was overshadowed by a miraculous second - half outing from Clippers guard Lou Williams . Williams scored 27 points in the third quarter alone , finishing with a career high of 50 points in the commanding win . He shot 16 - of - 27 from the field and 10 - of - 10 from the free - throw line , hit eight three - pointers , and dished out seven assists . Williams helped the Clippers ( 19 - 21 ) earn a double - digit lead early in the fourth quarter , which the team built up to 21 points by the middle of the fourth . For the Warriors , Durant was the only player to score more than 12 points . He finished with 40 points on 14 - of - 18 shooting and scored his 20,0th career point in the blowout loss . Fellow All-Star Draymond Green shot just 1 - of - 9 from the field and had only seven points . The Clippers , meanwhile , were without All-Star forward Blake Griffin ( concussion ) , but found offense in Williams and others on Wednesday . Bench guard Tyrone Wallace shot 7 - of - 11 to add 22 points off the bench in the win . DeAndre Jordan , meanwhile , had 12 rebounds to lead the team , including three on the offensive end . Both teams will hit the road , as the Clippers visit Sacramento on Thursday while the Warriors are slated to play in Milwaukee on Friday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Boston Celtics , 108 - 105 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday . Despite the fact that Boston led for the entirety of the first half , Golden_State prevailed thanks to a big second half . The third quarter was the difference in the game , with the Warriors outscoring the Celtics , 30 - 19 . It was competitive throughout though , as there were seven ties and seven lead changes in total , with neither team ever leading by more than 10 points . The only notable difference in the stat sheet was rim protection , as Golden_State swatted away nine shots , while Boston recorded just two blocks . Fastbreak scoring was also a big factor , with the Warriors winning that battle , 17 - 7 . The Celtics ( 35 - 15 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he amassed 37 points , two rebounds and four assists on 13 - of - 18 from the field . Jaylen Brown totaled 20 points and two rebounds . Al Horford accumulated 15 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Marcus Morris led the bench with 12 points and eight rebounds . The Warriors ( 40 - 10 ) got a season - high 49 points out of Stephen Curry , as he also added four rebounds , five assists and two steals on 16 - of - 24 from the field . Kevin Durant finished with 20 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Draymond Green collected 15 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and three blocks . On deck for Boston is a road matchup versus the Denver Nuggets on Monday . As for Golden_State , they travel to play the Utah Jazz on Tuesday .
The visiting Indiana Pacers took down the Golden_State Warriors , 91 - 82 , at Oracle Arena on Tuesday night . With All-Stars Steph Curry , Klay Thompson , Kevin Durant , and Draymond Green all sidelined by various injuries , the Warriors ( 54 - 20 ) had trouble finding the bottom of the basket . This was n't too problematic early in the game , as their stifling defense held Indiana ( 44 - 31 ) to just 39 first - half points . However , the Pacers heated up in the third quarter , thanks largely to All-Star guard Victor Oladipo . Oladipo had 24 points to lead the team as they steadily gained a lead through the second half . On top of Oladipo , forwards Bojan Bogdanovic and Thaddeus Young added a combined 34 points . Young also pulled down 10 rebounds , including five on the offensive end . While the team had a relatively strong night from inside the arc , hitting 49 percent of its shots , three - point shooting was a difficulty . The Pacers went just 6 - of - 21 from beyond the three - point line , including 1 - of - 6 off the bench . Golden_State , though , struggled far more from every spot on the floor . The Warriors shot just 41 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 17 from three - point range . Veteran guard Nick Young was the team 's scoring leader with only 12 points . The one saving grace for Golden_State , though , was its strong offensive rebounding . The team grabbed 17 boards on the offensive end . On Thursday , Golden_State will host the Milwaukee Bucks . Meanwhile , the Pacers will stay in California for a visit to Sacramento .
The visiting New_Orleans Pelicans took down the Golden_State Warriors , 126 - 120 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday night . The Pelicans ( 46 - 34 ) established themselves early , scoring 40 first - quarter points and taking an early eight - point lead . However , the Warriors ( 57 - 23 ) , led by All-Star forward Kevin Durant , battled back , taking the lead back midway through the third quarter . The final 15 minutes of the game was a back - and - forth slog , but the Pelicans were able to take a commanding edge with just under four minutes left . A Nikola Mirotic three - pointer gave New_Orleans an eight - point lead , and while the Warriors were able to whittle that down to a one - possession game , the Pelicans retained the lead until time expired . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 34 points and 12 rebounds , padding his stellar season averages of 28 points and 11 rebounds per game . Veteran point guard Rajon Rondo dished out a whopping 17 assists while also scoring 12 points . Mirotic scored another 28 , while Jrue Holdiay added 25 points to the winning effort . All five New_Orleans starters scored in double digits in the win . Durant , meanwhile , was the Warriors ' offensive leader , scoring a team - high 41 points despite the loss . Durant also grabbed 10 rebounds , as did fellow All-Star forward Draymond Green , who added 11 points and nine assists . Guard Quinn Cook scored another 21 points and dished out seven assists . On Sunday , the Warriors will visit Phoenix , while the Pelicans will travel to Los Angeles on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 93 - 87 , at Capital One Arena on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 14 - 13 ) received the surprising news of John Wall 's return , and there is no question the point guard gave quite a boost to a team that was struggling on both ends of the court . The Wizards looked in control early on and built a 12 - point advantage heading into half time , but the Grizzlies ( 8 - 19 ) crawled back and made it a three - point game heading into the fourth . However , the Wizards prevailed and escaped with a six - point win that should boost the team 's morale going forward . John Wall only played 27 minutes in his return from injury , but he contributed with 13 points , four assists , two steals and one huge block over Chandler Parsons . Bradley Beal led the scoring with 18 points , seven assists , and four rebounds , and Otto Porter Jr. added 14 points with eight boards . All five starters finished with at least 10 points , and Kelly Oubre Jr. added 11 points off the bench . On Memphis ' end , Andrew Harrison had one of the best games of his NBA career since he finished with 20 points , seven assists , three rebounds , and three steals . JaMychal Green added a strong double - double of 15 points and 15 boards , while Marc Gasol chipped in with 15 points and nine rebounds of his own . The bench struggled , however , as they only scored 19 points on 8 - for - 25 from the field .

This was a tightly - fought battle , as there were 11 ties and 13 lead changes in total , with neither team ever leading by more than 11 points . Milwaukee had to pull off their win in comeback fashion , as they outscored Washington , 28 - 18 , in the fourth quarter . In addition , the Bucks ended the game on a 14 - 4 run across the final three minutes . Despite the fact that Milwaukee is the worst rebounding team in the league , they ended up controlling the glass here , outrebounding the Wizards , 45 - 34 . Milwaukee was also much better at taking care of the ball , as they recorded 11 steals , while Washington only mustered up six . The Bucks ( 21 - 17 ) got a near triple - double out of Giannis Antetokoumpo , as he collected 34 points , 12 rebounds and seven assists on 12 - of - 17 from the field . The Utah Jazz defeated the Washington Wizards , 107 - 104 , at Capital One Arena on Wednesday evening . The Jazz ( 17 - 24 ) came into the contest facing relatively steep odds of a win , considering they 'd notched only three road victories in 20 tries and the Wizards ( 23 - 18 ) owned a solid 13 - 7 mark at home . Matters looked even bleaker after Washington jumped out to a 32 - 25 lead after the first quarter . However , Utah bounced back to outscore their hosts by a 58 - 45 margin over the second and third quarters , even overcoming the adversity of seeing Rodney Hood get ejected in the third quarter for picking up a pair of technical fouls . Ultimately , the player who enjoyed the biggest boost in playing time due to Hood 's early hook , veteran Joe Johnson , drained a trio of key free throws in the closing seconds to seal the hard - fought win . Both teams shot notably well , with the visitors posting a 47 percent success rate from the floor and the Wizards countering with an even more impressive 53 percent mark , including 40 percent from three - point range . However , ball security was a serious deterrent for Washington , as they turned the ball over a whopping 23 times . Ricky Rubio paced the Jazz with 21 points and added three assists , two rebounds and four steals . Donovan Mitchell followed with 16 points , a total he supplemented with five boards , four assists , one steal and one block . Ekpe Udoh matched Mitchell 's scoring total and also tallied nine rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . Johnson led the bench with 16 points of his own while also supplying four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Joe Ingles provided 10 points , six assists and five rebounds . Royce O'Neale poured in 10 as well in 14 minutes off the bench . John Wall paced the Wizards with a 35 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds , three steals and one block . Backcourt mate Bradley Beal followed with 23 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Otto Porter , Jr. supplied 14 points , six rebounds , one assist and three steals . Kelly Oubre , Jr. managed a bench - leading 12 points and added six rebounds . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris generated matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds and two assists , and the latter compiling six rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Jazz remain on the road and next head to North Carolina , where they 'll take on the Hornets in a Friday night battle . The Wizards remain home and await a visit from the Orlando Magic on Friday evening as well .

The Wizards ( 25 - 19 ) and the Bucks ( 23 - 20 ) played a game that seemed to be going down to the wire , but Milwaukee looked in absolute control after the second half and they simply did n't allow Washington to come back into the game . Washington actually jumped on top by two after the first quarter , but Milwaukee answered with a four - point lead in the second quarter , so they built a two - point advantage , 53 - 51 , heading into halftime . The Bucks continued to streamroll their way through this game , and won the third quarter by four points , and the fourth by three more , so they ended cruising their way to a rather comfortable nine - point win on the road . The Bucks had a strong effort offensively , and Giannis Antetokounmpo was the biggest star of the game as he finished with 27 points , 19 rebounds , and six rebounds . The Washington Wizards defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 102 - 96 , at Capital One Arena on Tuesday evening . The Wizards ( 28 - 22 ) did n't exactly get the best news to start off their day , as it was announced that star point guard John Wall will miss the next 6 - to - 8 weeks following a Wednesday procedure on his left knee . That left them significantly short - handed against an opponent with plenty of firepower in the Thunder ( 31 - 20 ) , which also were coming into the contest riding an eight - game winning streak . However , the home squad came out of the gates handling adversity well , as they forged a 30 - 25 lead after one quarter . The visitors clawed back to eventually take a slim 54 - 53 advantage into intermission , and the two clubs subsequently matched each other point for point in the third . That left the final 12 minutes as the last battleground , one in which the two teams traded the lead back and forth and also found themselves knotted up on multiple occasions . The hosts finally gained some decisive separation with success from the charity stripe , as Tomas Satoransky , Otto Porter , Jr. and Markieff Morris were responsible for the final six points with a pair of free throws apiece . Both teams shot under 40 percent , but the Wizards ultimately set themselves apart by forcing the Thunder into 20 turnovers while only committing 12 of their own . Paul George paced the Thunder with 28 points and six rebounds . Carmelo Anthony provided 19 points , six boards , three assists and three blocks . Steven Adams managed a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Russell Westbrook suffered through a 5 - for - 18 shooting night while generating 13 points , 10 assists , six rebounds and four steals . Jerami Grant led the bench with eight points , six boards and one block . Rookie Terrance Ferguson went scoreless over 19 minutes but hauled in four rebounds and dished out one assist . Porter led the way for the Wizards for 25 points , a total he supplemented with six boards , three assists , two steals and one block . Bradley Beal followed with 21 points , nine assists , six rebounds , two steals and one block . Morris poured in 18 points and supplemented them with six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Marcin Gortat mustered 11 points , seven rebounds and one assist . Kelly Oubre , Jr. registered 10 points , two rebounds and two assists . Satoransky finished with four points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and one block while drawing the start at point guard for Wall . The Thunder remain on the road and head to the Mile High City to tangle with the Denver Nuggets on Thursday evening , while the Wizards remain home and await a visit from the Toronto Raptors on that same night .

The Washington Wizards defeated the Boston Celtics , 113 - 101 , at Capital One Arena on Tuesday evening . The Wizards ( 43 - 38 ) had plenty of motivation to notch a victory despite their already - secured playoff spot , as they were looking to snap a four - game losing streak and potentially tunnel their way up to the seventh seed . However , the Celtics ( 54 - 27 ) , already locked into the No . 2 seed , came out of the gates hot , taking a 30 - 22 lead after one quarter . That was the highlight of their night , though , as they were outscored 91 - 71 over the remaining three periods . John Wall spearheaded the home squad 's efforts , hitting the 5,0 - assist milestone as part of a team - leading 29 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds , three steals and three blocks . Jaylen Brown paced the Celtics with 27 points , a total he supplemented with two assists , one rebound and two steals . Jayson Tatum supplied 12 points , three rebounds , two assists and four steals . Al Horford provided 10 points , 14 boards , three assists and one steal . Greg Monroe matched Horford 's scoring total and added six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Markieff Morris totaled 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . Otto Porter , Jr. managed 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal but did not play the second half due to a leg injury . Mike Scott matched Porter 's scoring total and also contributed eight boards and three assists . Kelly Oubre , Jr. accounted for 11 points , five boards , two assists and two steals . Tomas Satoransky produced seven points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Celtics finish their season with a home date against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday night , while the Wizards visit the Orlando Magic in their season finale on Wednesday evening .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 116 - 115 , at Wells Fargo Center on Saturday evening . The Magic jumped out to a quick 90 lead and went ahead to push it to a 26 - 10 advantage with 4:55 left in the first . However , the Sixers battled back and cut the gap to just two points , trailing , 32 - 30 , after one . The 76ers pulled ahead in the second carried the lead for most of the quarter , before taking a 63 - 52 lead into halftime . The tides turned again in the third quarter , as the Magic outscored the 76ers by eight , to cut the deficit to three points , heading into the final frame . The Sixers maintained their edge and pushed the lead back to 10 , with five minutes to go in the game , but the Magic used an 18 - 9 run to make it a one - point game with 5 seconds left and possession . The Magic were not able to convert on the final play and dropped their second game in as many nights . On the other hand , the Sixers earned their second straight win . Joel Embiid led Philadelphia with 32 points , 10 rebounds and three assists , in 33 minutes . J.J. Redick came up huge in 32 minutes off the bench , with 31 points , four rebounds and four assists . Dario Saric finished with 13 points , nine rebounds , five assists , one block and one steal , while Robert Covington added 12 points , four rebounds , two steals , one block and one assist . The Sixers shot 48 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Evan Fournier was the high - point man for the Magic with 31 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . Nikola Vucevic had a big night with 27 points , 13 rebounds , 12 assists and two steals , in 37 minutes of action , while Aaron Gordon finished with 20 points , 12 rebounds three assists , three blocks and one steal . The Magic shot 46 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 29 from distance . The Magic ( 1 - 2 ) take on the Celtics in Boston on Monday , while the 76ers , head to Detroit to challenge the Pistons on Tuesday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 113 - 101 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 19 - 10 ) fell behind by 10 points at the end of the first quarter , and given that the 76ers ( 19 - 11 ) had lost only twice all season on their home floor , things looked bleak for Indiana early . The visitors still trailed by 10 at halftime , but a prolific third quarter where they outscored Philadelphia by a 31 - 18 margin . The Pacers then kept the heat on in the fourth by adding nine points to their advantage and sealing a hard - fought road victory . Thaddeus Young led the Pacers by touching up one of his old squads for a 26 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic provided 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Victor Oladipo , Domantas Sabonis and Cory Joseph generated matching 14 - point tallies . Oladipo added nine assists and three steals , Sabonis also pulled down 16 rebounds , Darren Collison mustered eight points but also dished out 10 assists . Joel Embiid paced the Sixers with a 40 - point , 21 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , one steal and one block . J.J. Redick contributed 22 points . Ben Simmons managed 18 points , nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Furkan Korkmaz started for Jimmy Butler ( groin ) once again but only totaled six points and two rebounds . The Pacers head back home to face the New York Knicks on Sunday afternoon , while the Sixers pay a visit to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday afternoon as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 114 - 106 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday . A 39 - 34 first quarter really set the tone for Philly in this game , as they led for all but a few minutes . With that said , they never led by more than 13 points , as it was close until the final seconds . Free-throw shooting was the difference , with the Sixers hitting 19 - of - 21 from the charity stripe while the Magic connected on just 9 - of - 12 . Rebounding was also huge , with Philadelphia winning that battle , 50 - 44 . The 10 steals recorded by the Sixers were decisive as well , with Orlando picking up just four . The Magic ( 30 - 36 ) were led by Evan Fournier , as he tallied 25 points , two rebounds and two assists . Aaron Gordon accrued 24 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Jonathan Isaac amassed 16 points and five boards while Nikola Vucevic finished with 12 points , 12 rebounds and two assists . The Sixers ( 41 - 23 ) were led by J.J. Redick , as he totaled 26 points and five boards . Tobias Harris accumulated 21 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and two steals . Ben Simmons finished with 16 points , 13 rebounds , eight assists and two steals while Mike Scott led the bench with 11 points and five boards . On deck for Philly is a road matchup versus the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday . As for Orlando , they play host to the Dallas Mavericks on Friday for their next fixture .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Sacramento Kings , 144 - 109 , at Fiserv Forum on Sunday afternoon . A high - scoring affair in Milwaukee ended going towards the home team , as the Bucks ( 8 - 1 ) did n't have problems to dismantle the Kings ( 6 - 4 ) who entered this game as one of the most surprising teams in The Association during the young 2018 - 19 season . Milwaukee quickly jumped to a 39 - 30 lead in the first quarter , and they never let it go since they also won the remaining three quarters : 33 - 20 , 36 - 32 and 36 - 27 , respectively . The fact that the Bucks scored at least 30 points in every quarter certainly stands out , but they were effective on both ends of the court on their way to a huge 35 - point win . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks since he finished with a triple - double of 26 points , 15 rebounds and 11 assists , but in the end eight different Bucks scored over 10 points . Eric Bledsoe had 17 points with six rebounds , Malcolm Brogdon contributed with 13 points , and Khris Middleton added 12 of this own . Four bench players topped the 10 - point mark as well : Ersan Ilyasova ( 15 pts ) , Pat Connaughton ( 13 pts ) , Tony Snell ( 12 pts ) and John Henson ( 10 pts , 6 rebs ) . The Kings enjoyed solid efforts from De'Aaron Fox , who had 15 points , six rebounds and six assists , and Buddy Hield , who chipped in with 19 points in only 24 minutes of action . But most of the scoring contributions came from second - unit players who took advantage of the opportunity , such as Justin Jackson , who had 22 points , and rookie Marvin Bagley III , who finished with 11 points and six rebounds .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 116 - 113 , at Fiserv Forum on Wednesday . This game was full of monster swings in the second half , as Memphis made the run that mattered most . In fact , Milwaukee went on a 27 - 4 run when they trailed by 15 points in the third quarter to take an eight - point lead early in the fourth . Memphis then responded with a 23 - 7 run to take an eight - point lead with two minutes remaining . The Bucks then ended the game on a 12 - 7 run but that simply was n't enough to make up their deficit . Those small spurts by Milwaukee was the only time Memphis was n't in control , as they led for 40 minutes of this game . Three-point shooting was huge for the Grizzlies , as they went 14 - of - 36 from long range while the Bucks hit just 9 - of - 35 . Taking care of the ball was also critical , with Memphis recording two more assists than Milwaukee while committing four fewer turnovers . The Grizzlies ( 8 - 5 ) were led by Marc Gasol , as he tallied 29 points , five rebounds and two assists . Mike Conley accrued 26 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Kyle Anderson collected six points , eight rebounds and five assists . Shelvin Mack led the bench with 15 points , six rebounds and five assists . The Bucks ( 10 - 4 ) got another gen out of Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he accumulated 31 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two blocks on 10 - of - 14 from the field . Khris Middleton finished with 25 points , five rebounds and three assists . Eric Bledsoe totaled 15 points , six rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Pat Connaughton led the bench with 16 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Both teams play home games on Friday for their next outings , with Milwaukee welcoming the Chicago Bulls and Memphis playing the Sacramento Kings .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 123 - 104 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday evening . The Bulls jumped out and stunned the Bucks , as they built a 16 - 6 lead just five minutes into the game , and went on to outscore the home team , 40 - 27 , in the first quarter . The Bulls stayed in control , as they maintained a double - digit lead through the second quarter and took a 63 - 45 lead into halftime . The Bucks turned the tables in the third , as they kicked the quarter off with a 17 - 6 run , to cut the deficit to just seven . They carried on to outscore the Bulls by 29 in the quarter , to take a 91 - 80 lead into the fourth . The Bulls were not able to recover from the devastating third quarter , where they were outscored 46 - 17 , as they were not even able to get back within 10 points of the Bucks for the remainder of the contest . Eric Bledsoe led the Bucks with 25 points , six assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block , in 30 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo followed up with 23 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and three blocks , while Khris Middleton added 23 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists and two steals . The Bucks shot 50 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 43 from long range . Meanwhile , Jabari Parker led the Bulls with 21 points , eight rebounds and three assists , in 33 minutes . Justin Holiday followed up with 20 points , four assists , three rebounds and three steals , while Antonio Blakeney tallied 18 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Bulls shot 44 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 33 from long range . The Bulls ( 4 - 12 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Raptors on Saturday . The Bucks ( 11 - 4 ) play host to the Nuggets on Monday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 104 - 98 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Monday evening . The contest got out to a very competitive start , as there were multiple lead changes and ties through the first quarter , until the Nuggets emerged with a 29 - 25 lead , heading into the second . The Nuggets continued with the momentum , as they pushed their lead to 11 , just two minutes into the quarter . They continued their push until they carried a 10 - point lead into halftime . The home team turned the tide in the third , as the Bucks chipped away at the lead , which the Nuggets continued to push ahead , until they finally broke ahead in the final minutes of the third quarter . The Bucks led 78 - 77 , heading into the fourth . The contest continued with the score tied at 89 , with five minutes left . The Bucks took the lead with a three - pointer and did not look back . Despite a continued effort from the Nuggets , the Bucks held on with clutch shooting down the stretch . Giannis Antetokounmpo led Milwaukee with 29 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and two steals , in 39 minutes . Eric Bledsoe followed up with 23 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . Khris Middleton came up clutch with a crucial three - pointer , capping off a solid night , with 13 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Meanwhile , Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets with 20 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . Jamal Murray had a good game , with 17 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and one block . Gary Harris added 14 points , six assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . In fact , Milwaukee 's biggest lead was 13 points , as it was within a single - digit margin for the first 45 minutes of action . The Bucks rode a 31 - 16 fourth quarter to that double - digit scoreline , as there were 10 ties and 23 lead changes across the first three quarters . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Milwaukee recording 27 assists to 10 turnovers while Utah recorded 20 assists to 15 turnovers . The Bucks ended up shooting 47 percent from the field while holding the Jazz to 42 percent shooting . The Jazz ( 20 - 21 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he amassed 26 points and three rebounds . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Washington Wizards , 148 - 129 , at Fiserv Forum on Wednesday evening . The Bucks ( 40 - 13 ) had just handed the visiting Wizards ( 22 - 32 ) a resounding defeat on Washington 's home floor just two games prior , so there was little doubt they 'd be able to put up some points at Fiserv Forum , where they 'd been especially impressive this season . However , Wednesday 's prolific output likely exceeded even the most lofty expectations , as Milwaukee racked up a jaw - dropping 50 points in the first quarter and kept coming the rest of the way . They allowed their fair share of scoring as well , as Washington shot an impressive 52 percent overall , including 46 percent from three - point range . As the final score implies , the hosts were even more impressive , draining 60 percent of their attempts , including 63 percent from distance . Sloppy play was an unfortunate constant for the visitors , as they turned the ball over on 23 occasions . Bradley Beal paced the Wizards with 30 points , adding eight rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . However , he was also guilty of a game - high eight turnovers . Thomas Bryant generated a 26 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and two blocks . Jeff Green supplied 22 points , four rebounds , three assists and one block . Tomas Satoransky turned in a 16 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and one steal . Sam Dekker led the bench with 12 points . Giannis Antetokounmpo had his way with the Wizards for the second straight game , racking up 43 points , six rebounds , four assists and three steals . Eric Bledsoe posted a 22 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds and two steals . Malcolm Brogdon tallied 18 points , five assists , two rebounds and two steals . Khris Middlelton registered 16 points and four assists . Brook Lopez and Ersan Ilyasova pitched in 12 and 11 points , respectively . The Wizards head back home to face the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening , while the Bucks travel to face the Dallas Mavericks on Friday night as well .

The Bucks ( 44 - 14 ) came in with a well - earned reputation as one of the most dominant home squads in the NBA , as they 'd emerged victories in 24 of 28 contests at Fiserv Forum coming in . However , that did n't seem to faze a game Timberwolves ( 28 - 31 ) squad , which nearly kept up with Milwaukee during their 35 - point first quarter and then actually pulled ahead in the second to take a one - point lead into halftime . Minnesota managed to add one more point to their advantage during a spectacular third quarter during which the teams combined for 77 points , but the home squad finally found its defense in the fourth . The Bucks opened the final period on a 13 - 4 run and ultimately held the visitors to just 19 points in the final 12 minutes to claim a double - digit win . The Timberwolves head back home to face the Sacramento Kings on Monday night , while the Bucks travel to the Windy City for a Monday evening date with the Chicago Bulls .

Those runs were simply too much to overcome for the Pacers , as the Bucks ended up outscoring them , 63 - 48 , in the second half . Milwaukee ended up leading for all but two minutes , as Indiana 's largest lead was a single point . Rebounding was key , with the Bucks outrebounding the Pacers , 51 - 39 . The shooting disparity was also decisive , with Milwaukee shooting 50 percent from the field while holding the Pacers to just 39 percent shooting . The first quarter featured a few lead swings , with the Pistons up by as many as eight , however , it was the Bulls that led 27 - 25 heading into the second quarter . They were able to ride that cushion until halftime , although the Bulls cut the gap to trail by two , 60 - 58 . The third quarter featured multiple lead changes and ties , but the Pistons came out with a one - point advantage heading into the final frame . The contest went right down to the wire , where Blake Griffin and Zach LaVine exchanged clutch three - points , but ultimate the Pistons survived to earn their second straight win and remain undefeated . The Chicago Bulls defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 112 - 110 , at United Center on Wednesday . Chicago was looking for their first win of the season in this competitive matchup , as it was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , there were 12 ties and 21 lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than 11 points . The Bulls actually scored the final four points of this game in the final 80 seconds , as that turned a two - point deficit into a two - point victory . Rebounding was the difference for Chicago , as they outrebounded Charlotte , 45 - 36 . Transition offense was also key , with the Bulls winning the fastbreak differential , 16 - 4 . Chicago ended up shooting 48 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range while holding Charlotte to just 44 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . The Hornets ( 2 - 3 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 23 points , three rebounds and six assists . Cody Zeller totaled 14 points , six rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum accrued 13 points , three rebounds and four assists while Jeremy Lamb amassed 12 points , three rebounds and three assists . The Bulls ( 1 - 3 ) got another gem out of Zach LaVine , as he led the way with 32 points , four rebounds and five assists . Cameron Payne was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 21 points , five rebounds and four assists . Jabari Parker was huge off the bench , providing 11 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . These teams will have a rematch on Friday , but that will be played in Charlotte .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 107 - 105 , at United Center on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 6 - 3 ) came into the contest at full health , which is much more than the host Bulls ( 2 - 7 ) could say . Chicago came in missing a quartet of key players , but they did n't let that stop them from giving Indiana everything it could handle . The hosts jumped out to a 37 - 22 first - quarter lead , but the visitors flipped the game in the second quarter to head into halftime with a slim two - point edge . The two teams then traded the lead back and forth throughout the second half , and Chicago boasted a 99 - 92 advantage as late as the 5:55 mark of the fourth quarter . However , Indiana went on a 15 - 6 run to finish the game , with a Darren Collison 19 - foot jumper with 18 seconds remaining ultimately serving as the game - winning bucket . Ultimately , Myles Turner 's block of an Antonio Blakeney jumper with less than a second remaining sealed the victory . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 25 points , which he supplemented with 14 rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block . Turner supplied 18 points , three rebounds , three assists and six blocks . Collison provided 14 points overall , while Tyreke Evans led the bench with 13 . Justin Holiday turned in 19 points , two assists and one rebound . Wendell Carter , Jr. and Jabari Parker provided matching 11 - point tallies , along with eight and seven rebounds , respectively . The Pacers head back home to take on the Boston Celtics on Saturday night , while the Bulls remain home and tangle with the Houston Rockets on Saturday evening as well .

The Bulls got out to a great start at home , as they outscored the Cavs by 14 in the first quarter , to take a 37 - 23 lead into the second . Neither team could rebuild their lead , as the game went back - and - forth through the third , until the Bulls emerged with a two - point lead heading into the final frame . The Bulls stayed one step ahead through the fourth , but the Cavs would not go away and fought their way to make it a one - point game with 1:13 left in the game . However , that was the last point that either team would score , as either team failed to execute down the stretch , leaving the Bulls to walk away with the one - point win . The Boston Celtics defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 133 - 77 , at United Center on Saturday . Boston came into this game as a big favorite but no one could ever anticipate a 56 - point win . The Celtics actually started the game with 17 unanswered points , as that obviously killed the Bulls demeanor . It 's not like they rebounded in the second half though , as Boston outscored Chicago , 69 - 34 . Every statistic was lopsided in the Celtics favor , as they really dominated through defense . In fact , they held the Bulls to 38 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range while winning the turnover differential , 15 - 7 . In addition , Boston outrebounded Chicago , 54 - 37 , while connecting on 54 percent from the field and 51 percent from long range . The Celtics also out - assisted the Bulls , 34 - 16 , and won the steals differential , 10 - 3 . The Celtics ( 15 - 10 ) had seven players reach double figures in scoring , as Jaylen Brown led the team with 23 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals off the bench . Daniel Theis led the starters with 22 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and four blocks . Jayson Tatum amassed 18 points , three rebounds and two assists while Kyrie Irving finished with 13 points , four rebounds and five assists . Terry Rozier also played well off the bench , providing 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and three steals . The Bulls ( 6 - 21 ) had just one starter reach double figures , as Zach LaVine totaled 11 points , three rebounds and two assists . Lauri Markkanen and Justin Holiday combined for 13 points on 5 - of - 20 shooting . Shaquille Harrison led the team in scoring , providing 20 points off the bench . Cameron Payne accrued 10 points , three rebounds and three assists off the bench as well . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Chicago welcoming the Sacramento Kings to United Center and Boston playing host to the New Orleans Pelicans .

The Chicago Bulls defeated the Boston Celtics , 126 - 116 , at United Center on Saturday night . The Bulls ( 16 - 44 ) were riding high after a hard - fought one - point road victory Friday against the Magic , but they had an exponentially difficult challenge just 24 hours later in the form of the Celtics ( 37 - 23 ) . Matters looked a bit worrisome for Chicago early , as Boston forged a five - point lead after 12 minutes . However , the visitors never saw what hit them in the second , as the Bulls doubled them up by a 36 - 18 margin in the second to carry a 13 - point advantage into halftime . After both teams matched each other bucket for bucket in the third , the hosts put the final nail in the proverbial coffin with a 32 - point fourth quarter , ultimately allowing the Celtics to cut three points into their lead . Both teams shot well , but it was Chicago that dominated the boards with a 49 - 32 rebounding advantage . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 37 points , adding 10 assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Al Horford contributed 19 points , three assists , two rebounds and one block . Jaylen Brown registered 14 points , three rebounds and two steals . Jayson Tatum and Marcus Morris contributed 12 points apiece , with the latter notably hauling in six boards as well . Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 42 points and supplemented them with six rebounds and four assists . Lauri Markkanen turned in 35 points , 15 rebounds , two assists and one steal . Robin Lopez collected 17 points , six boards and four assists . Wayne Selden saw extra playing time after Otto Porter , Jr. exited early with a leg injury , totaling nine points , six rebounds , two assists and one block . The Celtics remain on the road and next face off with their biggest Eastern Conference rival in the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday night . The Bulls remain home and tangle with the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday evening .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 123 - 118 , at United Center on Sunday afternoon . The contest picked up where it left off in the Bulls ' and Hawks ' last meeting , which was four - overtime shootout . The first quarter was a high - scoring one , with the Hawks taking a 35 - 32 lead into the second . They managed to hold the edge through the second and pushed their lead to seven by halftime . The Hawks kept up the momentum in the third , as they pushed their lead to 15 , just minutes into the quarter . However , the Bulls kept fighting and managed to cut the deficit to five by the start of the fourth . They played hard through the fourth as well , but the Hawks stayed in control and held on for the road win . Alex Len led the Hawks with 28 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 26 minutes . Trae Young followed up with 18 points , five assists and three rebounds , while Dewayne Dedmon added 13 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Hawks shot 47 percent from the field , including 21 - of - 43 from long range . Meanwhile , Lauri Markkanen led the Bulls with 19 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 28 minutes . Robin Lopez followed up with 16 points , six rebounds , four assists and a block , while Kris Dunn chipped in 14 points , six assists , four rebounds and two steals . The Bulls shot 51 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from long range . The Bulls ( 18 - 46 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pacers in Indiana on Tuesday . The Hawks ( 22 - 42 ) take on the Heat in Miami on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 123 - 107 , at United Center on Tuesday evening . The final score seemed especially improbable after one quarter , considering the Bulls ( 19 - 50 ) jumped out to a 34 - 16 lead through the first 12 minutes . However , the Lakers ( 31 - 36 ) began chipping away at their deficit in the second , shaving 13 points off Chicago 's lead by halftime . The third quarter is when the game truly turned , as the visitors racked up a whopping 43 points during the period to erase the remaining deficit and build a 14 - point edge going into the fourth . Los_Angeles ultimately cruised to a comfortable win , riding a red - hot 55 percent success rate from the floor to success . LeBron James led the Lakers with 36 points , complementing them with 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope supplied 24 points , six rebounds , one assist and two steals . Kyle Kuzma checked in with 21 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Rajon Rondo generated a 14 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and two steals . JaVale McGee delivered 10 points , 11 rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Reggie Bullock furnished nine points , two rebounds and two steals . Robin Lopez paced the Bulls with 20 points , adding seven rebounds and three assists . Otto Porter , Jr. delivered 19 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Kris Dunn contributed 18 points , nine assists and seven rebounds . Ryan Arcidiacono started for Zach LaVine ( knee ) and compiled 14 points , six assists , four rebounds and two steals . Lauri Markkanen shot just 4 - for - 17 on his way to 11 points and five boards . The Lakers remain on the road and head north of the border to take on the Toronto Raptors on Thursday night , while the Bulls pay a visit to the Los_Angeles Clippers on Friday evening .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Washington Wizards , 126 - 120 , in overtime at United Center on Wednesday night . The Bulls ( 21 - 52 ) got off to a quick start by forging a 35 - 28 first - quarter lead , but the game was knotted at 60 by intermission . Fittingly , the game continued as a see - saw affair throughout the second half , and Bradley Beal sent the contest into overtime with a jumper at the 2 - second mark of the fourth period . However , Chicago opened the extra period on a 50 run and eventually outscored Washington by a 13 - 7 margin for the victory . Jabari Parker led the way for the Wizards with 28 points , adding six rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Beal delivered 27 points , seven rebounds , seven assists , three steals and two blocks . Tomas Satoransky managed 16 points , seven assists , five rebounds and three steals . Bobby Portis posted 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Jeff Green provided 10 points , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Trevor Ariza managed six points , two rebounds and two assists across 14 minutes before exiting with a groin injury . Lauri Markkanen paced the Bulls with 32 points , complementing them with 13 rebounds , five assists and one block . Kris Dunn turned in a 26 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds and two steals . Shaquille Harrison registered 18 points , six rebounds and four steals . Cristiano Felicio totaled 15 points , six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot contributed 13 points , four boards , three assists and two steals . The Wizards head back home to face the Denver Nuggets on Thursday evening , while the Bulls remain home and take on the Utah Jazz at Saturday night .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 136 - 114 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Tuesday evening . The Cavaliers ( 1 - 6 ) finally won their first game of the 2018 - 19 season and they did it in emphatic fashion , as they did n't have problems to top the Hawks ( 2 - 5 ) in a game where they looked in absolute control right from tip - off . Cleveland quickly jumped ahead to a 35 - 31 lead after the first quarter , but Atlanta kept things close in the second as both teams went separated by one point ( 58 - 57 ) at the half - time break . The Cavs sealed the deal in the second half , though : they won the third quarter 41 - 30 and also won the final 12 minutes by a 37 - 27 score . Cleveland 's second - half performance was , by far , the team 's best performance across the entire season thus far . Seven players scored in double figures for the reigning Eastern Conference champions . Rodney Hood led the way with 26 points , while Cedi Osman chipped in with 20 points and five boards . George Hill added 17 , Sam Dekker delivered 12 points with nine boards , and Tristan Thompson delivered a double - double of 11 points and 13 boards . Rookie Collin Sexton had 17 points and eight boards off the bench and Jordan Clarkson added 15 of his own . The Hawks only had four players scoring more than 10 points and the duo of Trae Young ( 24 points ) and Alex Len ( 22 points , nine rebounds , two steals ) led the way . Vince Carter did a good job of filling out the stat sheet since he contributed with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists in 24 minutes of action . Jeremy Lin came off the bench and chipped in with 12 points and eight assists in 24 minutes .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 102 - 95 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Monday evening . Both teams got out to a good start , as they went back and forth through the first quarter , before the Timberwolves emerged with a , 29 - 26 , lead heading into the second . The Timberwolves made the most of their momentum , as they pushed to a 10 - point lead early in the quarter . The managed to hold the lead for the entirety of the quarter , and take a , 54 - 47 , lead into halftime . The Timberwolves kept it up through the third quarter , but the Cavaliers did not go away , as they cut the deficit to just four , after outscoring the visitors , 24 - 21 , in the quarter . However , the T-Wolves would not be had that easily , as they once again pushed their lead back to double digits early in the fourth , and held on down the stretch , to earn their third straight win . Robert Covington led Minnesota with 24 points , seven rebounds , two steals , two blocks and one assist , in 38 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns tallied 21 points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one block , while Jeff Teague added 13 points , six assists , three blocks , two rebounds and one steal . The Timberwolves shot 46 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyle Korver led the Cavs with 22 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench . Rodney Hood followed up with 20 points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal , while Tristan Thompson finished with 16 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . The Cavs ( 4 - 15 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Thunder in OKC on Wednesday . The Timberwolves ( 10 - 11 ) play host to the Spurs on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 106 - 95 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Saturday evening . The Raptors ( 20 - 4 ) received news earlier in the day that star point guard Kyle Lowry ( back ) would n't suit up , which meant that the rest of the starting five would need to pick up the scoring slack . Toronto scuffled some without Lowry in the first half , but they still forged a solid 47 - 40 halftime lead . However , the Cavaliers ( 4 - 18 ) hung around , getting as close as 82 - 75 with 9:9 remaining . The visitors managed to stay one step ahead though , leading to the double - digit road win . Despite being short - handed , the Raptors shot a solid 49 percent while limiting Cleveland to a 39 percent success rate . Kawhi Leonard took the Raptors on his shoulders in Lowry 's absence , leading the way with 34 points and adding nine rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Danny Green supplied 15 points , seven rebounds and two blocks . Fred VanVleet drew the start for Lowry and also posted 15 points , adding four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Pascal Siakam matched VanVleet 's scoring total and also offered five rebounds and five assists . Serge Ibaka contributed 10 points and six boards . Tristan Thompson and Jordan Clarkson co - led the Cavaliers with 18 points apiece . Thompson added 19 rebounds , three assists and one steal . Clarkson hauled in two rebounds , dished out two assists and recorded one steal . Rodney Hood and Alec Burks followed with matching 13 - point tallies . Cedi Osman totaled 12 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Collin Sexton registered 10 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Raptors head back home for a Monday night showdown with the Denver Nuggets , while the Cavaliers hit the road and face the Brooklyn Nets on Monday evening as well .

The Kings jumped out to a great start on the road , as they poured in 38 points in the first quarter , while holding the Cavs to 27 points , to take an 11 - point advantage into the second . The Cavs answered back in the second quarter , as they returned the favor by outscoring the visitors by 11 in the quarter , to make it a tie game at 66 by halftime . The Kings went back to work in the third quarter , as they quickly opened up a nine - point lead , and held on to outscore the Cavs , 30 - 23 , to take a , 96 - 89 , lead entering the final frame . The Kings kept the pressure on and pushed their lead to 15 , early in the quarter . They were able to hold on from their to earn their third win in a row . De'Aaron Fox led Sacramento with 30 points , 12 assists , three steals and two rebounds , in 29 minutes . Buddy Hield added 25 points , four rebounds , two assists and two blocks , while Marvin Bagley III chipped in 17 points on 8 - of - 9 shooting , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Kings shot 58 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , despite having three players top 20 points , the Cavs still came up short at home . Collin Sexton tallied 23 points , while Alec Burks added 22 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal , in 37 minutes off the bench . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the New_York Knicks , 113 - 106 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday evening . The Cavaliers ( 7 - 21 ) and Knicks ( 8 - 21 ) demonstrated that their records are almost identical for good reason , as they engaged in an entertaining back - and - forth battle . Cleveland jumped out to a 39 - 26 first - quarter lead , but New_York erased that deficit and then some by outscoring their hosts by a 63 - 47 margin over the middle periods . That set up a thrilling fourth quarter , one that saw the Knicks take a 106 - 105 lead with just 32 seconds remaining . However , an 80 run by the Cavs sealed the win , with Rodney Hood , Cedi Osman , Matthew Dellavedova and David Nwaba all contributing . Enes Kanter and Tim Hardaway , Jr. co - led the Knicks with 20 points apiece . Kanter added 10 rebounds and three assists , while Hardaway brought in five boards , dished out one assist and recorded both a steal and a block . Kevin Knox turned in 19 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Emmanuel Mudiay provided 16 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Frank Ntilikina matched Mudiay 's scoring total off the bench . Jordan Clarkson paced the Cavaliers with 28 points off the bench , a total he supplemented with five rebounds and two assists . Rodney Hood supplied 23 points and five rebounds . Collin Sexton registered 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Matthew Dellavedova enjoyed a successful return to Cleveland , posting 15 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal . The Knicks remain on the road and take on the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night , while the Cavaliers remain home and take on the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday evening as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 111 - 98 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Suns ( 11 - 49 ) and the Cavaliers ( 13 - 46 ) have been two of the worst teams in The Association this season , so the stakes were n't very high for this game to begin with . Phoenix got on top , though , since they jumped to a 28 - 23 following the first quarter , but that was the only lead they would have during the rest of the contest . Cleveland quickly turned things around and they jumped to a four - point lead at the break ( 55 - 51 ) thanks to a 32 - 23 second quarter . Cleveland would never look back afterwards , though . Cleveland would win the remaining two quarters ( 22 - 21 and 34 - 26 , respectively ) and they ended winning the contest by a higher - than - expected 13 - point margin . Cedi Osman was the top scorer for the Cavaliers since he finished with 19 points , but he also added five rebounds and five assists . Ante Zizic also had an impressive performance thanks to his 15 points and 12 boards , while Kevin Love chipped in with 16 points and 11 boards . Larry Nance Jr. filled the stat sheet thanks to 14 points , seven rebounds , four steals and three assists . Jordan Clarkson had 15 points and five assists . The Cavs got out to a great start at home , with a 37 - 24 lead after one quarter . The Grizzlies pushed back in the second , where they outscored the Cavs by six , to cut the deficit to seven by halftime . The Grizzlies carried the momentum into the third quarter , where they outscored the Cavs by nine , to take a two - point lead into the final frame . The Cavs were not done , as they started the fourth on a 6 - 1 run , to reclaim the lead . The score went back and forth , until the Cavs created some separation in the final minutes with a couple of big plays from Collin Sexton and Cedi Osman . The Cavs went on to secure their second straight win , while the Grizzlies dropped their fourth in a row . Kevin Love led the Cavs with 32 points , 12 rebounds , one steal and one block , in 25 minutes . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Toronto Raptors at Quicken Loans Arena on Monday night . The Cavaliers ( 17 - 50 ) naturally entered as sizable underdogs , but they surprisingly built a four - point halftime lead . Cleveland then got the best of the Raptors ( 48 - 20 ) on both ends of the floor in the third , adding 10 points to their advantage in the process and never looking back . Some of the home squad 's biggest advantages were on the boards and in turnovers . The Cavs outrebounded Toronto by a 51 - 43 margin , and they forced them into 20 turnovers while only committing 12 of their own . Kawhi Leonard paced the Raptors with 25 points , adding nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . Pascal Siakam furnished 15 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Kyle Lowry supplied 14 points , six assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Danny Green contributed five points , while Marc Gasol totaled just two points but also hauled in seven rebounds , dished out four assists and recorded one steal . Norman Powell led the bench with nine points , while Jeremy Lin , OG Anunoby and Serge Ibaka contributed matching eight - point efforts , with the latter getting ejected in the second half for fighting with Marquese Chriss . Collin Sexton paced the Cavaliers with 28 points , supplementing them with five assists and four rebounds . Cedi Osman tallied 19 points , seven rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Ante Zizic delivered 17 points and seven boards . Kevin Love generated a 16 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 14 points , while Brandon Knight managed 12 points , five assists , one rebound and three steals . The Raptors head back home to take on the Los Angeles Lakers on Thursday evening , while the Cavaliers remain home and face the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday night .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 115 - 102 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . The final scoreline makes this game look closer than it actually was , as Boston won in wire - to - wire fashion . In fact , a 35 - 21 second quarter really set the tone , with the Celtics leading by at least five points for the final 30 minutes . Their offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 59 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range while recording 34 assists . Rim protection was also critical , with the Celtics out - blocking the T'Wolves , 8 - 2 . Transition offense was also big for Boston , as they outscored Minnesota in fastbreak points , 23 - 10 . Bench production ca n't be overlooked either , with the Celtics outscoring the Timberwolves bench , 62 - 18 . The Timberwolves ( 17 - 21 ) got another spectacular performance from Karl-Anthony Towns , as he collected 28 points , 12 rebounds and seven assists . Andrew Wiggins was just as good , as he scored a season - high 31 points to go along with two rebounds and three assists . Tyus Jones got another start and tallied 14 points , nine assists and four steals . No other player reached 10 points , five rebounds or three assists . The Celtics ( 22 - 15 ) played without Kyrie Irving ( eye ) , as Gordon Hayward had his best game of the season . In fact , Hayward went 14 - of - 18 from the field to lead the bench with 35 points and five assists . Terry Rozier got a rare start and totaled 16 points , three rebounds , five assists and five steals . Al Horford accrued 15 points , five rebounds , four assists and two blocks . On deck for Minnesota is a home matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Friday . Boston also returns to action on Friday , as they welcome the Dallas Mavericks to Beantown .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 125 - 103 , at TD Garden on Wednesday evening . The Celtics ( 30 - 18 ) walked into battle short a couple of key soldiers , as both Kyrie Irving ( illness ) and Al Horford ( rest ) were unavailable . Their absences may have played a part in the slim 30 - 27 deficit faced at the end of the first quarter . However , Boston roared back to take control for good in the second and entered intermission with a 65 - 50 lead . While the Cavaliers ( 9 - 40 ) chipped a modest three points off that advantage in the third , the hosts made sure any thoughts of a comeback were squashed by winning the final period with a commanding 33 - 23 margin . Shooting and opportunistic defense were both key to the wins , as the Celtics drained 53 percent of their attempts and forced 20 turnovers from Cleveland . Cedi Osman led the way for the Cavaliers with 25 points , adding eight rebounds and two assists . Ante Zizic produced 19 points and eight rebounds . Collin Sexton supplied 16 points , five boards and three assists . Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 14 points , while Alec Burks stuffed the stat sheet with 10 points , nine rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . Terry Rozier did a fine job filling in for Irving , as he paced the Celtics with 26 points and also contributed eight rebounds , six assists and one steal . Jaylen Brown poured in 23 points and added six boards and one steal . Gordon Hayward pitched in 18 points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals . Jayson Tatum registered 17 points , three assists , two rebounds and three steals . Marcus Morris and Brad Wanamaker churned out matching 11 - point , three - assist tallies . The Cavaliers head back home and take on the Miami Heat on Friday evening , while the Celtics remain home and tangle with the Golden State Warriors on Saturday night .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 107 - 96 , at TD Garden on Friday . Boston desperately needed a win here and a double - digit victory shows just how important it was . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarters , outscoring Washington , 55 - 35 . That allowed the Celtics to lead for 45 minutes of this 48 - minute game . The Celtics defense was critical , as they held the Wizards to 40 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range while recording 12 steals . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with Boston recording six more assists than Washington while committing six fewer turnovers . The Wizards ( 25 - 37 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 29 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jeff Green totaled 15 points and four boards . Tomas Satoransky accrued 15 points , five rebounds and five assists while Bobby Portis amassed seven points and 11 boards . Jabari Parker led the bench with 12 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Celtics ( 38 - 25 ) were led by Al Horford , as he finished with 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . Kyrie Irving tallied 13 points , six rebounds and 12 assists . Marcus Morris generated 17 points and nine boards while Jayson Tatum accumulated 10 points , eight rebounds , three assists and five steals . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Washington playing host to the Minnesota Timberwolves and Boston welcoming the Houston Rockets to TD Garden .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the visiting Phoenix Suns , 115 - 99 , on Wednesday evening . It was a battle of first meets last on Wednesday , as the top - ranked Clippers ( 14 - 6 ) hosted the 15th - place Suns ( 4 - 17 ) . The game went accordingly , as LA earned a blowout win to maintain its first - place standing . With 11 made three - pointers and 18 offensive rebounds , the Clippers were able to overcome some struggles with ball management . It was an easy win for the team despite committing 21 turnovers on the night . LA has now won eight of its last nine games and is showing no signs of slowing down . Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 28 points and grabbed 10 rebounds in the win . His fellow forward , Tobias Harris , added another 10 rebounds to go with 18 points on the night . Big man Boban Marjanovic , in just 19 minutes on the court , secured 12 rebounds , including eight on the offensive end . All three stellar frontcourt performances contributed to LA 's comfortable victory . Phoenix , on the other hand , struggled mightily on the offensive end . The team shot just 31 percent from three - point range and 43 percent overall . Devin Booker led the team with 23 points . It was an off night for rookie big man DeAndre Ayton , who committed five fouls and finished with just four points in 30 minutes of play . The Clippers visit the Kings on Thursday , while Phoenix will host the Orlando Magic on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 128 - 109 , at Staples Center on Tuesday evening . Los_Angeles ( 24 - 16 ) hopped out to an early lead , going up by as much as nine in the first half . While Charlotte ( 19 - 21 ) kept the game close for much of regulation , the Clippers ' offense exploded for 42 fourth - quarter points and a double - digit win . LA 's dominant bench unit helped lead the charge , as Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell combined to score 50 points in the win . The Clippers finished the night shooting over 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range . In addition to a team - high 27 points , Williams contributed 10 assists in the win . Harrell , the Clippers ' breakout big man , added 11 rebounds and five assists . The team also saw an impressive defensive effort from rookie point guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , who grabbed three steals and blocked four shots in just 21 minutes of play . Charlotte , meanwhile , relied heavily on its own bench for production . Shots were n't falling for All-Star guard Kemba Walker , who went just 6 - of - 18 for 13 points . Sophomore Malik Monk picked up some of the slack , though , delivering a team - high 24 points off the bench . Ultimately , however , Charlotte 's offense could not match LA 's top - notch production , shooting just 40 percent from the field . The Hornets will visit Portland on Friday , while the Clippers have a trip to Denver on Thursday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 121 - 117 , at Staples Center on Monday evening . It was shaping up to be an easy win for New_Orleans ( 21 - 23 ) , as the team led by as much as 20 points midway through the third quarter . The Clippers ( 24 - 19 ) , however , had other plans , and mounted a furious comeback late in the fourth . LA cut the lead to as little as two points by the end of the fourth quarter , thanks in large part to a 13 - 2 run in the third quarter . Lou Williams , Montrezl Harrell , and Tobias Harris all scored for LA during the run . Unfortunately for the Clippers , though , Anthony Davis and the Pelicans were able to hold off the comeback . Davis delivered a monster performance to help protect his team 's lead . The superstar big man scored 46 points to go with a game - high 16 rebounds and three steals . It was Davis 's seventh 40 - point outing of the season . The Pelicans also saw impressive outings from Julius Randle and Jrue Holiday . Holiday scored 19 points and dished out eight assists . Randle , meanwhile , had 27 points and grabbed six rebounds . LA saw its own fair share of strong performances despite coming up short . Danilo Gallinari delivered 25 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , adding five rebounds and six assists . Bench big man Montrezl Harrell led the second unit with 26 points and also had 10 rebounds . On Wednesday , the Pelicans will visit Golden State while the Clippers will host the Utah Jazz .

The Warriors took the early advantage on the road , with a 28 - 25 lead after one quarter . However , the Clippers stayed with it and cut the deficit to just one , as they trailed 52 - 51 at the half .
