The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 123 - 120 , in overtime at Staples Center on Thursday . After missing the Lakers ' ( 27 - 25 ) last 17 games with a groin injury , superstar forward LeBron James made his return to the court on Thursday . Things started quietly for the four - time MVP , as he notched only two points in the first quarter and finished the first half with just five points under his belt . James delivered when it counted , though , scoring nine points in the fourth quarter and scoring or assisting on nine of the team 's points in overtime . The Clippers ( 28 - 24 ) , meanwhile , fought hard to force the game into overtime . They ended regulation on a 70 run , tying the game on a three - pointer from Tobias Harris . Victory , however , eluded the team 's grasp in overtime , as the Lakers went up by five points quickly and never looked back . James finished the game with a team - high 24 points for the Lakers . He flirted with a triple - double , tallying 14 rebounds and nine assists . His play was complemented by fellow veteran Rajon Rondo , who finished with 14 points , 13 rebounds , and seven assists . The Clippers , meanwhile , saw 15 points , eight rebounds , and eight assists from Harris . The team also got a gem from Lou Williams , who scored 24 points and dished out six assists while committing only one turnover . Next on the agenda for the Clippers is a trip to Detroit on Saturday . The Lakers will also hit the road on Saturday , as they pay a visit to the Warriors at Oracle Arena .
The Los_Angeles Clippers rolled past the Phoenix Suns , 134 - 107 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Suns ( 11 - 48 ) entered Wednesday 's contest having lost 14 in a row , and it became apparent early in the game that their streak was going to continue . The Clippers ( 32 - 27 ) grabbed a quicklead and never looked back . LAC shot a blistering 60 percent in the win , taking advantage of Phoenix 's 29th - ranked defense . As always , the Clippers relied heavily on their strong second unit in the win . LA 's bench scored 70 points , with the tandem of Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell doing much of the heavy lifting . Williams and Harrell contributed 49 points and 13 assists in the blowout win . LA also saw a 20 - point night from Danilo Gallinari , who was wildly efficient in just 19 minutes on the court . New Clipper Ivica Zubac also impressed , scoring 16 points to go with seven rebounds . Phoenix , meanwhile , saw a promising night from forward Kelly Oubre , who scored 28 points to lead the team . Star guard Devin Booker went cold in the loss , though , shooting just 2 - of - 10 en route to 10 points . Both teams will head into the All-Star break after Wednesday 's lopsided contest .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Phoenix Suns , 117 - 96 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday night . The Grizzlies ( 3 - 2 ) had some solid momentum coming into Saturday 's game , and they finished the contest even hotter than when they started . Memphis jumped on the Suns ( 1 - 4 ) early by building a 26 - 18 first - quarter lead , and they extended their advantage to 25 points by halftime . That essentially decided the contest , and the home squad closed things out in decisive fashion with a 30 - point fourth quarter . Both teams shot well overall , but the Grizzlies managed to coax 19 turnovers from the visitors while only committing 12 themselves . Deandre Ayton paced the Suns with 24 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , five assists and one steal . Elie Okobo followed with 12 points and two assists . Isaiah Canaan and Jamal Crawford generated matching 11 - point tallies from the first unit and bench , respectively . Josh Jackson drew the start for Devin Booker ( hamstring ) and turned in eight points , three rebounds , three assists and three steals . Marc Gasol led the Grizzlies with 19 points and added eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Mike Conley registered 18 points , seven assists and two steals . Garrett Temple managed 15 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal . MarShon Brooks led the bench with 18 points , while Wayne Selden contributed 14 . The Suns remain on the road and battle the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday evening , while the Grizzlies are home again versus the Washington Wizards on Tuesday evening .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 112 - 104 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . While the final scoreline shows a close game , Memphis held the lead for all but a few minutes . The second quarter played a big part of that , with the Grizzlies outscoring the Kings , 33 - 23 . Memphis actually held the lead for the entirety of the second half , as Sacramento never got the game within a four - point margin from there . The Grizzlies ended up shooting 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range while holding the Kings to 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from long range . Memphis also dominated the turnover differential , forcing 21 turnovers from Sacramento while committing just 13 on their end . The Grizzlies also dominated down low , outscoring the Kings in the paint , 54 - 42 . The Kings ( 8 - 7 ) got another gem out of De'Aaron Fox , as he tallied 23 points , four rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . Buddy Hield finished with 16 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Willie Cauley-Stein accrued 11 points , eight rebounds , two assists and three steals . Bogdan Bogdanovic led the bench with 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) leading scorer was Jaren Jackson Jr. , as he collected 27 points , six rebounds , four steals and two blocks on 11 - of - 16 from the field . Mike Conley accumulated 19 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol generated 19 points , 15 rebounds and two assists . Garret Temple totaled 14 points , five rebounds , two assists and three steals . On deck for Sacramento is a road matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Saturday . As for Memphis , they return to action on Sunday when they face the Minnesota Timberwolves on the road as well .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 101 - 94 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , with the visitors emerging with a two - point lead after one quarter . The Grizzlies took the upper hand through the second , as they outscored the Pistons by six in the quarter , to take a 55 - 51 lead by halftime . However , the Pistons flipped the switch in the third quarter , where they held the Grizzlies to Just 12 points , and pulled ahead to take a 72 - 67 lead into the fourth . The Pistons maintained the upper hand through the fourth and held on to end a three - game slide . Blake Griffin led the Pistons with 26 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and two steals , in 38 minutes . Reggie Jackson followed up with 16 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal , while Luke Kennard and Reggie Bullock added 13 points each . The Pistons shot 43 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 40 from long range . Meanwhile , Jaren Jackson Jr. led the Grizzlies with 26 points , 10 rebounds and two assists , in 35 minutes . Kyle Anderson followed up with 15 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block , while Marc Gasol added 11 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks . The Grizzlies shot 47 percent from the field , including 4 - of - 18 from deep . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 19 ) will look to avoid a fourth straight loss as they play host to the Nets on Friday . The Pistons ( 17 - 19 ) play host to the Jazz on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 95 - 92 , at FedExForum on Monday . With Monday 's contest being their third game in four days , the Nuggets ( 34 - 15 ) predictably came out flat in Memphis . As a result , it took the the home team opened on an 18 - 4 run and maintained that 14 - point through the remainder of the first quarter . The Grizzlies ( 20 - 31 ) ended up taking a 19 - point lead into halftime and still maintained a 17 - point advantage as they entered the final period . And that 's when everything went south , as the Nuggets decided to wake up and put together a huge fourth quarter . After a Justin Holiday three - pointer with just under 40 seconds left put the Grizzlies up one , All-Star Nikola Jokic countered with a 7 - foot jumper with 29 seconds left that would end up being the game - winner and cap off a brilliant comeback effort . Jokic finished with a game - high 24 points in 35 minutes , while Will Barton , who was back in the starting lineup due to the absence of Jamal Murray ( ankle ) , was close behind with 20 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting . The Nuggets ' bench as a whole did n't provide much , but Malik Beasley did have a quality night off the bench with 18 points in 24 minutes . As for Memphis , only two players managed to score in double figures in the disappointing loss , and it happened to be the team 's two veteran stars . Mark Gasol was dominant for most of Monday 's game , scoring a game - high 28 points to go along with nine rebounds in 38 minutes . Mike Conley came through with a double - double of 23 points and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes , but unfortunately for the Grizzlies , the next highest scorers were Kyle Anderson and Holiday with just nine points . On top of all that , Memphis got just 15 points from its second unit Monday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 97 - 85 , at State Farm Arena on Saturday evening . The Hawks got out to a slow start , as it took them three minutes to score their first bucket , while thankfully for them , they only trailed 50 . However , the Bulls stayed strong and pushed their lead to 10 - 1 . Nonetheless , the Hawks responded with 24 - 12 run , to take a 25 - 22 lead by the end of the quarter . Things tightened up from there , as the teams stayed within two or three possessions for the length of the quarter , matching each other 's 19 points , so that the Hawks still led by three at halftime . It remained a one - possession game for most of the third quarter , until the Bulls pulled away with a 9 - 6 run , which allowed them to take a four - point lead into the fourth . The Bulls kept up the momentum and pushed their lead to 10 , just minutes into the quarter . They guarded their lead heavily from there , and did not let the Hawks get too close , as they closed out their first road win of the season . Zach LaVine led the way for the Bulls with 27 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . Jabari Parker followed up with 18 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 34 minutes off the bench . Ryan Arcidiacono continued his solid play with 13 points , seven assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . The Bulls shot 43 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 33 from deep . Meanwhile , Taurean Prince led the Hawks with 16 points , five rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 34 minutes . Trae Young finished with 13 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals , while Dewayne Dedmon tallied 13 points , 13 rebounds and five blocks , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Hawks ( 2 - 3 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Sixers in Philly on Monday . The Bulls ( 2 - 4 ) play host to the Warriors on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 131 - 117 , at State Farm Arena on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 11 - 14 ) came into the contest seemingly building some momentum after a forgettable start to their season . However , their Wednesday fortunes appeared somewhat in peril earlier in the day , when it was announced that star point guard John Wall would miss the game for personal reasons . The rest of the roster helped ensure that his absence would be made up for , however , starting with Wall 's backcourt mate Bradley Beal . The sharpshooting two - guard racked up a game - high 36 points and supplemented them with nine assists , six rebounds and one steal . Washington sent the tone with a 72 - point first half , which allowed them to withstand a 68 - point surge by the Hawks ( 5 - 20 ) over the final 24 minutes . In fact , the Magic won each of the final three quarters by at least six points apiece , outscoring the Hawks , 94 - 72 . Orlando ended up shooting 51 percent from the field , 38 percent from three - point range and 91 percent from the free - throw line while holding Atlanta to 45 percent from the field , 30 percent from long range and 70 percent from the charity stripe . Ball movement played a big factor in that , with the Magic out - assisting the Hawks , 29 - 23 . Rim protection was also huge , with Orlando recording eight blocks and Atlanta picking up just three . Evan Fournier finished with 29 points , three rebounds and seven assists . D.J. The Hawks ( 23 - 45 ) opened the game in less than ideal form on the defensive side of the ball , allowing the Pelicans ( 30 - 39 ) to forge an early 33 - 26 first - quarter lead . However , Atlanta gathered itself from that point forward and went on to outscore New_Orleans in each of the subsequent three periods . The visitors did get to within six at the 8:1 mark of the fourth quarter , but the home squad finished on a 25 - 19 run from that point forward to secure the win . Their dominance only expanded coming out of intermission , as they compiled 45 points while limiting their visitors to 20 in a decisive third period that essentially put the game away . As the final score implies , Miami won the battle on the stat sheet in the majority of categories , and they out - shot the Knicks by a 48 percent - 36 percent margin . The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Miami Heat , 105 - 89 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . While Miami came into this game as a sizable favorite , Chicago dominated them in this surprising upset . What 's even more shocking is the fashion of the win , with the Bulls leading for nearly 40 minutes of this game . They did most of their damage in the first , third and fourth quarters , outscoring Miami , 86 - 62 . The shooting disparity was key , with Chicago shooting 51 percent from the field while holding Miami to just 38 percent shooting . Much of that can be attributed to scoring down low , with the Bulls outscoring the Heat in the paint , 48 - 36 . The Bulls ( 12 - 40 ) were without Zach LaVine ( ankle ) for this game but picked up just their second win in their last 16 games . Bobby Portis was their best player , as he provided 26 points and four rebounds on 10 - of - 17 shooting off the bench , Wayne Selden Jr. led the starters with 20 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Kris Dunn accrued 14 points , five rebounds , eight assists and two steals while Lauri Markkanen finished with 14 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . The Heat ( 24 - 25 ) were led by Tyler Johnson , as he provided 15 points , three rebounds and two assists off the bench . Justise Winslow led the starters with 14 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . On deck for Miami is a home matchup versus the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday . As for Chicago , they return to action on Saturday when they play the Charlotte Hornets on the road .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Miami Heat , 118 - 102 , at American Airlines Arena on Friday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for Oklahoma_City , they won this game in dominating fashion . In fact , a 31 - 24 first quarter really set the tone , with a 41 - 29 second quarter sealing the victory . The Thunder actually led by at least 15 points for the entirety of the second half . Three-point shooting was the key difference , with Oklahoma_City hitting 16 - of - 30 and Miami connecting on 11 - of - 36 . The Thunder also dominated in transition , winning the fastbreak differential , 23 - 8 . The Thunder ( 33 - 18 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 43 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Russell Westbrook collected 14 points , 12 rebounds and 14 assists . Steven Adams accrued 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder was huge off the bench , as he provided 28 points on 11 - of - 13 from the field . The Phoenix Suns defeated the Miami Heat , 124 - 121 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Monday . The Heat ( 26 - 32 ) headed into halftime with a fairly comfortable 11 - point lead after scoring 63 points over the first 24 minutes , but the visiting Suns ( 11 - 50 ) wasted no time making their comeback in the second half . And after scoring 40 points in the final quarter and some timely free throws in the closing minutes , Phoenix was able to walk away with the upset victory . Seven different Suns players would score in double figures Monday , and the team managed to torch Miami 's defense , shooting 41 percent from behind the arc and 51 percent from the field overall . Devin Booker , who hit what ended up being the game - winning free throws with 17 seconds remaining , led the way with a team - high 20 points and nine assists in 33 minutes , while former Heat player Tyler Johnson , who was traded to Phoenix at the trade deadline , was close behind with 18 points of his own . In the end , it was just a complete team effort from the Suns , who recorded 30 assists on their 45 made field goals to just 14 turnovers . As for the Heat , their shocking home struggles continue , as they dropped to 11 - 17 on their home floor this season and have now lost five of their last six games . Miami did , however , get stellar play out of their starting frontcourt , with Hassan Whiteside scoring a game - high 29 points to go along with 11 rebounds in 27 minutes and Kelly Olynyk posting 28 points and 10 rebounds of his won in 41 minutes . However , for the Heat , offensive production was not the problem , as they simply could not string together stops in the second half against this lowly Suns team . It was the second game in a row that Miami gave up more than 115 points in a game .
The Miami Heat defeated the Detroit Pistons , 108 - 74 , on Wednesday at AmericanAirlines Arena . From start to finish Wdnesday night , it was a dominate defensive effort from the Heat ( 32 - 35 ) , as they did n't give an already - struggling Detroit team an inch on that end of the floor and held them to a season - low 75 points . They were able to do so primarily with turnovers , with five different players recording two steals . Miami still , however , put up a complete offensive performance to go along with it . Seven different Heat players scored in double figures , with Justise Winslow 's 16 points leading the way . Dion Waiters was close behind with 14 points of his own , while Hassan Whiteside and Josh Richardson each added 13 . As a team , Miami shot a respectable 39 percent from behind the arc and 46 percent from the floor overall . The Pistons ( 34 - 33 ) , on the other hand , could n't put anywhere near a complete performance on offense , and it was the second straight game the team failed to score more than 75 points . It was n't off to a horrible start for Detroit , as the team scored 49 points in the first half , but the offense shut down over the final 24 minutes , scoring eight points in the third quarter and 17 in the fourth . The Pistons shot an abysmal 36 percent from the floor and turned the ball over 17 times . Blake Griffin was the team 's high scorer with just 13 points and only two others reached double digits .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 102 , at Spectrum Center on Tuesday evening . The Hornets ( 6 - 5 ) and the Hawks ( 3 - 7 ) locked horns for the first time this season and while the Hawks looked surprisingly good during the first two quarters , eventually the Hornets tightened things up on defense and that was enough to give them their sixth win of the 2018 - 19 season , while moving them up one game over .500 . Atlanta jumped to a 25 - 23 lead after the first quarter and finished the first half on top by three points ( 54 - 51 ) , but the Hornets delivered an impressive second - half effort to secure a strong win in front of their crowd . A 30 - 23 third quarter put Charlotte up by four heading into the final 12 minutes of action , and they did n't look back since a 32 - 25 win during the final 12 minutes was enough to close the game out with ease . Kemba Walker was the biggest scoring threat for the Hornets in this game since he finished with 29 points , but he also added seven assists , three rebounds and three steals . Marvin Williams contributed with 20 points and eight boards , Jeremy Lamb added 13 points , and Nicolas Batum filled the stat sheet with 10 points , five rebounds and four assists . Trae Young had a double - double of 18 points and 10 assists , but he went 0 - for - 7 from three - point range . Kent Bazemore contributed with 16 points and Alex Len added 12 with three boards .

In fact , Milwaukee held the lead for the first 20 minutes while Charlotte held the lead for the entirety of the second half . The Hornets actually led by 25 at times in the second half , as Milwaukee rode a 27 - 17 fourth quarter to make the game close . A 33 - 17 second quarter ultimately decided the game for Charlotte though , as that was too much for Milwaukee to overcome . The shooting disparity really decided things , with the Hornets shooting 47 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range while holding the Bucks to 41 percent from the field and 35 percent from long range . The Bucks ( 14 - 6 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 20 points , 13 rebounds , nine assists and three blocks . Eric Bledsoe finished with 17 points , four assists and two steals . The Sacramento Kings defeated the Utah Jazz , 119 - 110 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Wednesday evening . Two of the league 's more notable second - year players squared off in Wednesday 's contest , as both Donovan Mitchell and De'Aaron Fox delivered impressive performances to lead their respective teams . For Sacramento ( 10 - 8 ) , Fox was at the center of the win , dishing out 13 assists and scoring 17 points . His strong facilitation helped contribute to an excellent offensive night for the Kings . They finished the game shooting 53 percent from the field . Utah ( 8 - 10 ) , on the other hand , shot only 43 percent in the loss , but kept the game close by making it to the free - throw line 31 times on the night . While Fox 's double - double helped propel the Kings to victory , a number of other players also had big performances . Willie Cauley-Stein shot 11 - of - 15 on his way to a team - high 23 points . Nmanja Bjelica finished with 18 points and seven rebounds , while rookie big man Marvin Bagley III impressed on the defensive end , blocking two shots and grabbing two steals . Utah , meanwhile , saw 35 points from Donovan Mitchell . Mitchell shot 13 - of - 22 , but his big night was not enough to earn his team a win . Rudy Gobert added 13 points and 15 rebounds , while Joe Ingles had 12 points and seven assists . The Jazz will visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Kings will take a short trip to face the Golden State Warriors at Oracle Arena on Saturday .

Results like this can usually be deceiving by the lopsided scoreline but that was n't the case here with this dominating effort by the Jazz . In fact , Utah set the tone with a 39 - 17 first quarter , as they led by at least 20 points for the final three quarters in their wire - to - wire win . Rebounding was a huge factor , with Utah winning that battle , 60 - 35 . The Jazz also connected on 55 percent of their shots while holding the Knicks to 37 percent shooting . Ball movement played a big factor in that , with Utah recording 30 assists and New_York handing out just 17 . Not to mention , the Jazz outscored the Knicks in the paint , 70 - 26 . The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 106 - 93 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Wednesday evening . The Magic got out to a great start on the road , with a 32 - 19 lead after on quarter . They stayed on top through the second , where they outscored the Jazz by four , to take a 63 - 46 lead into halftime . However , the Jazz turned the tables in the third , outscoring the visitors by 20 in the quarter , to take a three - point lead into the final frame . The Jazz held on to the momentum and kept pushing through the fourth . They outscored the Magic by 10 in the quarter , to secure their ninth home win of the season . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 33 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 37 minutes . Joe Ingles followed up with 16 points , seven assists , two rebounds , a steal and a block , while Rudy Gobert tallied 12 points , 14 rebounds , two assists a steal and a block . The Jazz shot 49 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 33 from long range . Meanwhile , D.J. Augustin led the Magic with 23 points , six assists and three rebounds , in 29 minutes . Aaron Gordon tallied 18 points , 10 rebounds and three assists , while Nikola Vucevic finished with 20 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Magic shot 40 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 33 from downtown . The Magic ( 17 - 24 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Celtics on Saturday . The Jazz ( 21 - 21 ) play host to the Lakers on Friday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 128 - 112 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Friday evening . The contest got out to a hot start , as the Jazz outscored the Hawks , 36 - 34 , in the first quarter . The Hawks picked it up in the second and pulled ahead , as they outscored the Jazz by four in the quarter , to take a two - point lead by halftime . However , the Jazz came out on fire in the third quarter , where they outscored the visitors , 38 - 27 , to take a nine - point lead into the final frame . The Jazz held strong through the fourth and earned their 30th win of the season . Rudy Gobert led the Jazz with 25 points , 13 rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 27 minutes . Ricky Rubio followed up with 22 points , 11 rebounds , two rebounds and one steal , while Joe Ingles tallied 19 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one block . The Jazz shot 53 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Trae Young led the Hawks with 28 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting , nine assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 37 minutes . John Collins followed up with 19 points , four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , while Dewayne Dedmon chipped in 15 points , seven rebounds , three steals , two assists and one block . The Hawks shot 40 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 46 from deep . The Hawks ( 16 - 35 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Saturday . The Jazz ( 30 - 23 ) play host to the Rockets on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 98 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday evening . The Jazz got out to a good start at home , with a 28 - 21 lead after one quarter . They kept the pressure on the second , where they outscored the visitors by 10 , to take a 17 - point lead into halftime . The Jazz started the third very well , as they pushed their lead to 20 , five minutes into the quarter . The Nets did their best to hang in there but trailed by 19 points at the start of the fourth . They kept fighting through the fourth , but could not make much progress , as they could hardly get within 10 points of the Jazz . This marks the third straight win for the Jazz . Rudy Gobert led the Jazz with 23 points , 17 rebounds , three blocks and one assist , in 34 minutes . Donovan Mitchell followed up with 24 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Derrick Favors added 13 points , 12 rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Jazz shot 44 percent from the field , including 13 - o - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Spencer Dinwiddie led the Nets with 22 points , two assists , one rebound and one steal , in 24 minutes off the bench . D'Angelo Russell added 20 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Caris LeVert chipped in six points , four assists , one rebound and two steals . The Nets shot 35 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 36 from long range . The Nets ( 36 - 35 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Clippers in L.A. on Sunday . The Jazz ( 40 - 29 ) take on the Wizards in Washington on Monday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 118 - 108 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Tuesday . Utah ( 50 - 31 ) secured its 50th win of the season and its 13th in its last 15 games with Tuesday 's comfortable victory . Utah shot 53 percent from the field in its final regular season home game of the season . The strong offensive showing gave the Jazz a lead for the final 18 minutes of action , making Tuesday 's win a relatively safe one for the playoff - bound team . Denver ( 53 - 28 ) was short - staffed for most of the game after big man Nikola Jokic fouled out early on in the going . Jokic had two points on 1 - of - 6 shooting before his early exit . With their loss , the Nuggets are now tied for second in the Western Conference with the Houston Rockets . The Jazz were led by a season - high 46 points from sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell . Mitchell shot 14 - of - 26 from the field to lead Utah 's scalding - hot offensive attack . Star big man Rudy Gobert finished with 20 points and 10 rebounds , while Joe Ingles recorded another double - double with 10 points and 13 assists . Denver , meanwhile , saw 64 points from its bench unit in the tough loss . Malik Beasley recorded a team - high 25 points off the bench , while sixth man Monte Morris pitched in another 22 . Neither showing was enough for the Nuggets , who struggled at the free - throw line for the second straight game . Denver went just 14 - of - 22 at the stripe on Tuesday . Both teams will close out their regular seasons on Wednesday . Denver will host the Minnesota Timberwolves , while the Jazz will visit the Clippers in LA .
The visiting Toronto Raptors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 105 , at Golden 1 Center on Wednesday evening . Toronto ( 11 - 1 ) continued its early - season roll on Wednesday , comfortably defeating the Kings ( 6 - 5 ) in Sacramento . Toronto capped off a sweep of its four - game West Coast road trip with Wednesday 's win , extending its conference - best record to 11 - 1 . The Raptors saw Kawhi Leonard return to action in the game . Leonard had missed the team 's previous contest with a foot injury . Leonard took some time to find his groove in Wednesday 's win , but still managed to lead the team with 25 points . He added 11 rebounds in what was a relatively smooth win for the Raptors . All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry had another strong showing , finishing with 16 points and seven assists in the win . Serge Ibaka shot 6 - of - 10 , blocked three shots , and had a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . In sum , the Raptors were firing on all cylinders , knocking down 11 three - pointers and shooting a comfortable 47 percent from the floor in the win . Sacramento was led by 24 points from big man Willie Cauley-Stein . Cauley-Stein added eight rebounds and four assists . De'Aaron Fox scored another 20 points , while rookie big man Marvin Bagley added 13 . Despite shooting 49 percent from the field , the Kings could not make it happen from three - point range , where they shot just 8 - of - 23 . Sacramento will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while Toronto will see the New York Knicks on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 101 - 86 , at Golden 1 Center on Saturday evening . Both teams started their respective seasons heading in opposite directions , with the LeBron James-led Lakers ( 6 - 6 ) surprisingly opening with an 0 - 3 mark and the previously lowly Kings demonstrating a level of offensive efficiency that surprised the rest of the league . However , each club appears to be slowly coming back to their expected mean , with Los_Angeles now having won four out of their last five contests . Saturday , they jumped out to a 50 - 44 halftime lead with some strong first - half shooting . They were even sharper in the second half , outscoring the Kings ( 7 - 6 ) by a 51 - 42 margin on their way to a double - digit win . The Lakers limited Sacramento to 35 percent shooting and elicited 19 turnovers from them , and they also won the rebounding battle by a 59 - 50 margin . James led the way with 25 points and added seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Brandon Ingram provided 12 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Kyle Kuzma , Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Josh Hart contributed matching 11 - point tallies . JaVale McGee supplied 10 points , eight rebounds , two blocks and one steal . De'Aaron Fox paced the Kings with 21 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Marvin Bagley III followed with a bench - leading 13 points . Buddy Hield and Willie Cauley-Stein had matching 12 - point efforts , with the latter also hauling in 12 boards . Iman Shumpert and Nemanja Bjelica underwhelmed with seven and two points , respectively . The Lakers head back home and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday evening , while the Kings remain home and take on the San Antonio Spurs on Monday night .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 117 - 113 , at Golden One Center on Thursday . This was a true tale of two halves , as Denver role a big second half to victory . In fact , Sacrament blew a 13 - point halftime lead , as the Nuggets tied the game with a 31 - 18 third quarter . The Nuggets then held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter , as they made their final five shots of the game . Rebounding was the difference for Denver , as they outrebounded Sacramento , 54 - 33 . Getting to the free - throw line was also critical , with the Nuggets hitting 21 - of - 30 and the Kings connecting on just 10 - of - 15 from the charity stripe . This win gives Denver their best start in franchise history , as they maintain the top - seed in the Western Conference . The Nuggets ( 25 - 11 ) were led by Jamal Murray , as he scored 34 of his 36 points in the second half , adding seven rebounds and six assists to his impressive line . Nikola Jokic was just as valuable , collecting 26 points , 13 rebounds and six assists . Mason Plumlee accrued 12 points , 10 rebounds and four assists while Gary Harris led the bench with 14 points and three boards . The Kings ( 19 - 19 ) were led by Buddy Hield , as he tallied 29 points , two rebounds and two assists . Nemanja Bjelica amassed 17 points , six rebounds and three assists . De'Aaron Fox finished with 16 points , two rebounds and eight assists while Bogdan Bogdanovic led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Denver playing host to the shorthanded Charlotte Hornets and Sacramento welcoming the Golden State Warriors to Sac Town .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 104 - 97 , at Golden 1 Center on Saturday evening . The Kings got out to a solid start at home wit a 35 - 29 lead after one quarter . The Hornets bounced back in the second , where they outscored the Kings 30 - 22 , to take a two - point lead by halftime . However , the Kings regained control in the second half , as the outscored the visitors 25 - 17 in the third quarter , to take a six - point lead into the fourth . Despite a strong push from the Hornets in the final frame , the Kings managed to stay one step ahead , and held on for their second straight win . This marks the third straight loss for Charlotte . Bogdan Bogdanovic led the Kings with 22 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , six rebounds and two assists , in 29 minutes off the bench . Buddy Hield tallied 21 points , four rebounds and three assists , while De'Aaron Fox finished with 21 points , seven rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . The Kings shot 41 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 31 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , four assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 33 minutes . Nicolas Batum followed up with 13 points , eight rebounds , five assists , two blocks and two steals , while Michael Kidd-Gilchrist added 11 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . The Hornets shot 41 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 36 from distance . The Hornets ( 19 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Spurs in San Antonio on Monday . The Kings ( 22 - 21 ) play host to the Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 135 - 113 , at Golden 1 Center on Wednesday . The Kings ( 26 - 25 ) let their visitors stick around for one quarter Wednesday before deciding to start pouring it on in the second quarter and never look back . After holding a one - point lead after the first 12 minutes , Sacramento went on to win the next two quarters by a total of 24 points , making for light work for one of the NBA 's most promising young teams on a Wednesday night . The most impressive part about the Kings ' win , however , was the play of their second unit , which continues to be one of the league 's best . With the starters getting a light workload in the blowout , the bench took full advantage . Seven of the eight players who saw work off the bench scored and the unit combined to score 80 of the team 's 135 points . Harry Giles lead the way off the bench with a career - high 20 points , while rookie Marvin Bagley III scored 17 and Bogdan Bogdanovic added 16 of his own . As for the Hawks ( 16 - 34 ) , they were unable to replicate the performance that lead to an impressive victory over the Clippers on Monday night . The team did shoot a respectable 35 percent from behind the arc , but Atlanta hit just 44 percent of its shots from the field overall . The biggest downfall for the Hawks , however , was their inability to take care of the basketball , as they recorded 20 turnovers Wednesday night . Trae Young was responsible for five of those turnovers , but he did have yet another impressive offensive performance , finishing with a game - high 23 points and eight assists in 29 minutes . Six other Hawks players managed to score in double figures , but none scored higher than John Collins ' 14 points in 25 minutes .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 127 - 112 , at Golden 1 Center on Monday evening . The Kings ( 28 - 25 ) wasted no time in this one , jumping out to a double - digit lead in the first quarter . Buddy Hield contributed nine points in the period , while rookie sensation Marvin Bagley III came in halfway through the quarter and put up seven quick points . Bagley 's dominance continued into the second quarter , where he made an impact with a pair of blocked shots . His absence was felt when he returned to the bench , as San_Antonio ( 32 - 23 ) briefly regained the lead at the end of the second . All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge had seven points in the final five minutes of the quarter to help close the gap . However , the Kings reopened their big lead once again in the third quarter , going on a 16 - 4 run to retake control of the game . Bagley , Hield , and star point guard De'Aaron Fox all contributed multiple baskets over the course of the run . Sacramento never gave this lead up , holding on for the duration of the game . The win made it three straight for the Kings , who now sit just 0 games back of eighth place in the Western Conference standings . Sacramento 's young core was superb in Monday 's win , with Bagley scoring a team - high 24 points off the bench . The rookie big man added 12 rebounds and three blocks . Fox finished the game with 20 points , six assists , and six rebounds , while Hield added another 18 points to go with eight rebounds . In total , the Kings shot a blistering 56 percent from the field and knocked down 13 three - pointers . The Spurs , meanwhile , saw 22 points from Aldridge , who was a perfect 10 - of - 10 at the free - throw line . Fellow All-Star DeMar DeRozan scored a team - high 24 points . All five Spurs starters scored in double digits in the loss . As a whole , though , the team still struggled with efficiency , shooting just 43 percent from the field overall . Next up for Sacramento is a tilt with the Rockets on Wednesday . The Spurs , meanwhile , will continue their California road trip with a visit to the Warriors at Oracle Arena this Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 102 - 96 , at Golden 1 Center on Friday evening . The Heat got out to a great start on the road , with a 28 - 17 lead after one quarter . The Kings picked it up in the second quarter , but could only make a small dent in the deficit , as they trailed by nine at the half . The Heat came out strong in the third , and held a 17 - point lead with three minutes left in the quarter , but the Kings rallied back to make it an eight - point game by the start of the final frame . The Kings carried the momentum into the fourth , where they outscored the visitors by 14 , to steal the win at home . Buddy Hield led the Kings with 23 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and an assist , in 34 minutes . Bogdan Bogdanovic followed up with 16 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals , while Harrison Barnes added 12 points , seven rebounds and two assists . The Kings shot 41 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . Josh Richardson led the Heat with 21 points , four assists , three blocks and two rebounds , in 37 minutes . Hassan Whiteside followed up with 17 points , 19 rebounds , three steals , two blocks and an assist , while Dwyane Wade added 15 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot 43 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 33 from long range . The Heat ( 25 - 28 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Warriors in Golden State on Sunday . The Kings ( 29 - 26 ) play host to the Suns on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 117 - 104 , at Golden 1 Center on Sunday . A 33 - 23 first quarter really set the foundation for Sacramento in this game , as they won in wire - to - wire fashion . The Kings defense was critical , as they recorded 12 steals and 11 blocks while holding the Suns to 42 percent from the field and 22 percent from three - point range . Sacramento ended up shooting 45 percent from the field . The Kings also recorded four more assists than the Kings while winning the turnover differential , 17 - 12 . Sacramento 's bench also outscored Pheonix 's bench , 53 - 25 . The Suns ( 11 - 47 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he tallied 27 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Josh Jackson accrued 18 points , five rebounds and three blocks . DeAndre Ayton amassed 16 points and nine boards . Richaun Holmes led the bench with 10 points and nine boards while Tyler Johnson totaled nine points , five rebounds and three assists in his first start . The Kings ( 30 - 26 ) were led by Marvin Bagley III , as he provided 32 points and seven rebounds on 10 - of - 15 shooting off the bench . Bogdan Bogdanovic also played well off the bench , accumulating 14 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Buddy Hield led the starters with 18 points and six boards while De'Aaron Fox collected 17 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Phoenix traveling to face the Los Angeles Clippers and Sacramento facing the Denver Nuggets on the road as well .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 116 - 109 , at Golden 1 Center on Friday evening . The Clippers got out to a solid start on the road , as they led for almost the entire first quarter , before settling on a three - point lead heading into the second . The Kings responded in the second by pulling ahead in the first couple minutes and then holding the edge to take a 56 - 52 lead into halftime . The third quarter featured almost the same pattern of scoring , except that it was the Clippers that outscored the Kings , to reclaim the advantage , with a five - point lead entering the final . The Clippers stayed strong in the fourth and while the Kings managed to make it a three - point game with four minutes left , the Clippers came up clutch to seal the road win . This marks the third straight loss for Sacramento . Landry Shamet led the Clippers with 20 points , four rebounds , two assists , and a block , in 32 minutes . Danilo Gallinari tallied 19 points , nine rebounds and three assists , while Lou Williams chipped in 17 points , four assists , three rebounds and a steal , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Clippers shot 44 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Buddy Hield led the Kings with 23 points , seven rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 35 minutes . Willie Cauley-Stein added 16 points , 12 rebounds , four blocks and one assist , while De'Aaron Fox finished with 12 points , 12 assists , five rebounds and one steal . The Kings shot 44 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 21 from long range . The Kings ( 31 - 31 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Knicks on Monday . The Clippers ( 35 - 29 ) play host to the Knicks on Sunday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host New_York Knicks , 115 - 89 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . It 's rare to see a home team dominated so thoroughly in the NBA but that 's just what the Magic did here to the Knicks . In fact , Orlando took advantage of a 30 - 10 first quarter , as they held a double - digit lead for the final three quarters . In addition , the Knicks never got the game within a 20 - point margin in the second half . Orlando 's defense was stifling , as they held New_York to just 35 percent from the field and 18 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was also huge , with the Magic recording 31 assists to nine turnovers while New_York committed 19 turnovers to 13 assists . The 10 steals recorded by the Magic was a big part of that , as the Knicks recorded just two steals on their end . The Magic ( 6 - 7 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he totaled 21 points and 14 boards on 10 - of - 17 from the field . Evan Fournier collected 12 points , two rebounds and four assists . Terrence Ross led the bench with 22 points , three assists and two blocks . Mo Bamba also played well off the bench , amassing 15 points and eight boards . The Knicks ( 4 - 10 ) had no starters reach double figures in scoring , as Tim Hardaway Jr. led them with seven points and six boards on 2 - of - 12 shooting . Kevin Knox led the team in scoring off the bench , as he tallied 17 points and three boards . Enes Kanter was their best player , as he provided 16 points and 15 rebounds off the bench as well . On deck for Orlando is a road matchup versus the Washington Wizards on Monday . As for New_York , they travel to play the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday for their next outing .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the New_York Knicks 118 - 114 at Madison Square Garden on Tuesday . CJ McCollum and Damian Lillard were too much to handle for the Knicks at home as they fell for a sixth straight game . New_York paced the game well and entered the half up two points , but their very small lineup that consisted of four guards late failed to secure a defensive rebound down two points . Evan Turner 's timed a missed Lillard shot perfectly which gave him the easy two point put back shot , and Enes Kanter missed a skyhook in the waning seconds of the fourth quarter , which secured the win for the Blazers ( 11 - 5 ) . McCollum finished with 31 points and four rebounds on 13 - of - 23 shooting , which included five made threes . Lillard added 29 points , eight assists and six rebounds , while Jusuf Nurkic pitched in 13 points , 10 rebounds and four dimes . The Knicks ( 4 - 13 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr , who has now scored 29 - plus points in his last three outings , and finished Tuesday with 32 points , to go with five rebounds and four assists on 10 - of - 21 shooting . Rookies Kevin Knox and Mitchell Robinson were quiet off the bench and combined for eight points . Robinson did add two blocks in his 18 minutes of action . Both teams play the second game of a back - to - back on Wednesday , as the Knicks visit the Boston Celtics and the Blazers visit the Milwaukee Bucks .

While Toronto came into this game as a sizable favorite , New_York made it closer than most expected . In fact , there were nine ties and eight lead changes in total , as is stayed within a seven - point margin for the final 15 minutes of action . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with the Raptors connecting on 24 - of - 29 while the Knicks hit just 11 - of - 19 . Ball movement was also key , with Toronto recording 27 assists and New_York handing out 22 . The Raptors ( 41 - 16 ) were led by Kyle Lowry , as he tallied 22 points , four rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Serge Ibaka totaled 15 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Kawhi Leonard finished with 11 points , five rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol made his debut and provided seven points and six rebounds off the bench . The Knicks ( 10 - 45 ) lost their 16th - straight game here , as Kevin Knox led the way with 20 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . DeAndre Jordan accumulated 10 points , 18 rebounds and three assists . Dennis Smith Jr. collected 13 points , four rebounds , six assists and three steals .
