The Sacramento Kings defeated the New_York Knicks , 102 - 94 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday afternoon . The Kings ( 33 - 32 ) eventually hit their stride in the East Coast matinee matchup , shrugging off some body clock challenges to forge a 48 - 46 lead by halftime after a slow start in the first quarter . Sacramento then made it back - to - back dominant periods by outscoring the Knicks ( 13 - 53 ) by a 10 - point margin in the third . New_York made one last surge and actually owned an 89 - 87 lead at the 6:6 mark of the fourth quarter , but the visitors finished on a 15 - 5 run over the final 5:54 to seal the win . De'Aaron Fox paced the Kings with 30 points , adding eight assists , five rebounds and one steal . Buddy Hield produced 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . Nemanja Bjelica furnished a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and two blocks . Harrison Barnes posted 11 points , eight rebounds and one steal . Bogdan Bogdanovic turned in nine points , four rebounds and three assists , while Willie Cauley-Stein mustered seven points and hauled in 12 rebounds . Dennis Smith , Jr. led the Knicks with 18 points and supplemented them with five rebounds and five assists . Deandre Jordan generated a 14 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Lance Thomas and Allonzo Trier pitched in 10 points apiece , with Thomas notably adding seven boards . John Jenkins and Emmanuel Mudiay each poured in nine points . The Kings remain on the road and next visit the Washington Wizards on Monday night , while the Knicks pay a visit to the Minnesota Timberwolves on Sunday night .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host New_York Knicks , 137 - 116 , at Madison Square Garden on Wedneday . It 's rare to see a home team dominated so thoroughly but that was the case here for the Knicks . In fact , the Jazz led by 14 points after the first quarter and carried a 27 - point lead into the half . That allowed Utah to lead by at least 20 points for the entirety of the second half . The Jazz had one of their best offensive games of the season , as they shot 57 percent fron the field and 48 percent from three - point range . Ball movement played a huge factor in that , with Utah out - assiting New_York , 38 - 23 . The Jazz also went 21 - of - 25 from the free - throw line while the Knicks connected on just 13 - of - 21 . The Jazz ( 42 - 29 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds and five assists . Rudy Gobert went 7 - of - 7 from the field to finish with 18 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Joe Ingles accrued 18 points , five rebounds and seven assists while Ricky Rubio collected 12 points , three rebounds and nine assusts . Jae Crowder led the bench with 15 points , three rebounds and two steals . The Knicks ( 14 - 58 ) were led by Kevin Knox , as he amassed 27 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Mario Hezonja got a start and totaled 23 points and two boards . Damyean Doston finished with 21 points and three assists . Mitchell Robinson led the bench with 14 points , 12 rebounds and three blocks . Utah will have to play again on Thursday , as they travel to face the Atlanta Hawks . As for New_York , they 're off until Friday when they play host to the Denver Nuggets .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 114 - 110 at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Lakers and Timberwolves battled all four quarters , wrestling with lead changes throughout . The Lakers came out with a run and gun style offense that saw Lonzo Ball push the pace , along with JaVale McGee finding some easy dunks down low . Minnesota entered the half with a two point lead , but the Lakers kept within striking distance all second half before taking the lead behind LeBron James ' leadership . Derrick Rose had the hot hand all night , but when it mattered most , Rose 's three point shot to take the lead in the waning seconds bounced off the rim after a great look at the top of the arc . The Lakers ( 5 - 6 ) were given three possessions with just under a minute left in the fourth quarter after new addition Tyson Chandler swatted back two rebounds towards Lebron James after a missed three pointer from himself and Kyle Kuzma . Chandler , who joined the team this week , made a massive impact with his nine rebounds . The Timberwolves set a new franchise record with 20 three pointers , seven of which came from the 2011 MVP Derrick Rose . Rose has seen a resurgence in his game and scored 31 points 11 - of - 17 shooting . Down 111 - 104 late in the fourth quarter , Rose hit back - to - back threes to single handedly keep his team alive . All five Minnesota starters finished in double figures scoring and all five also logged at least 37 minutes . LeBron James fell one assist shy of triple - double after he finished with 24 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists . Both the Timberwolves and Lakers will face the Sacramento Kings next , as the Kings will host a back - to - back with both teams starting with the Wolves on Friday and the Lakers Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 104 - 96 , at Staples Center on Thursday evening . The Lakers ( 12 - 9 ) came out of the gates seemingly intent on eradicating a two - game skid in short order , as they exploded for 38 first - quarter points while limiting the Pacers ( 13 - 9 ) to 15 . However , Indiana almost turned the tables completely on Los_Angeles in the second quarter with their own 35 - point haul , and they entered halftime with a manageable 56 - 50 deficit . It was a much tighter game in the second half , but LeBron James helped ensure the win by scoring the Lakers ' final six points . It was a particularly impressive defensive performance for the home squad , which limited Indiana to a 37 percent figure from the field and forced them into 17 turnovers . James led the way for the Lakers with 38 points , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Brandon Ingram followed with 14 points , three assists , one rebound , three blocks and one steal . Josh Hart contributed a bench - leading 13 points . Kyle Kuzma produced a near double - double with 11 points and nine rebounds while also adding two assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope matched Kuzma 's scoring total over 18 minutes off the bench . Domantas Sabonis led the Pacers with a 20 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , one steal and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 14 points while adding three rebounds and two assists . Thaddeus Young supplied 11 points , five boards , one assist and five steals . Doug McDermott and Cory Joseph had matching 10 - point tallies off the bench . The Pacers remain on the road and tangle with the Sacramento Kings on Saturday night , while the Lakers remain home and face off with the Dallas Mavericks on Friday evening .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 118 - 107 , at Staples Center on Friday evening . The Clippers got out to a strong start as they led 28 - 23 after on quarter . The Lakers turned the tables in the second , as they outscored the Clippers by eight in the quarter , to take a three - point lead by halftime . However , the Clippers came out strong in the second half and regained control through the third , where they outscored the Lakers by five , to take an 82 - 80 lead into the final frame . They kept the pressure on through the fourth and outscored the Lakers by nine in the quarter , to secure their second straight win . This marked the second straight loss for the Lakers as they carry on without LeBron James ( groin ) . Lou Williams led the Clippers with 36 points , seven rebounds and three assists , in 30 minutes off the bench . Danilo Gallinari finished with 19 points , 10 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , while Tobias Harris tallied nine points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Clippers shot 44 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyle Kuzma led the Lakers with 24 points , eight rebounds and five assists , in 41 minutes . Lonzo Ball tallied 19 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal , while Brandon Ingram added 17 points and seven rebounds . The Lakers shot 41 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . The Lakers ( 20 - 16 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Kings on Sunday . The Clippers ( 21 - 14 ) play host to the Spurs on Saturday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 101 - 95 , at Staples Center on Sunday evening . As the Lakers ( 23 - 21 ) continued to forge ahead without LeBron James ( groin ) in the lineup , they found an unlikely obstacle in his former team . Cleveland ( 9 - 35 ) owns the league 's worst record and had dropped 12 straight heading into Sunday 's matchup . Sunday 's tilt with the Lakers ended the Cavaliers ' skid , though , as all five starters scored in double figures en route to the win . The Cavaliers held a multiple - possession lead for much of the second half and managed to stave off a late - game comeback effort from LA . For the Lakers , the loss dropped the team to just 3 - 6 without James . Forward Cedi Osman showed flashes of the talent he showcased early in the season , scoring a team - high 20 points to lead the Cavaliers . Big man Tristan Thompson , recently returned from injury , finished with 15 points and 14 rebounds . Nearly matching Thompson 's effort on the boards was Alec Burks , who tallied 13 rebounds to go with 18 points in Sunday 's bounce - back win . LA , meanwhile , saw 29 points from sophomore forward Kyle Kuzma . The Utah product continued to excel in LeBron 's absence , improving upon his season average of 19 points per game . As a team , though , the Lakers were not as impressive . LA shot just 40 percent and hit only seven threes in a loss that put the team in a tie with Utah for eighth in the Western Conference . LA will host another of the Eastern Conference 's struggling teams when the Chicago Bulls come to town on Tuesday . Cleveland , meanwhile , will continue its West Coast trip with a visit to Portland on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 130 - 111 , at Staples Center on Monday evening . The Warriors ' ( 33 - 14 ) win evened the season series after the Lakers ( 25 - 23 ) trounced them on their home court on Christmas Day . Of course , that game saw the Lakers take a significant blow , as superstar LeBron James went down with a groin injury . James has been out of the Lakers ' lineup ever since , and did not suit up for Monday 's tilt . The Warriors , on the other hand , added one more All-Star to their already loaded lineup , as big man DeMarcus Cousins made his second appearance since returning from his Achilles tear . In characteristic fashion , the Warriors blew Monday 's game wide open in the third quarter , where they outscored LA 45 - 25 . Golden_State already held a 10 - point halftime advantage , thanks in large part to a white - hot 21 - point first - half from Klay Thompson . The Warriors did not take their foot off the gas , however , as they racked up another 65 second - half points . Thompson in particular remained on fire , knocking down his first 10 three - point attempts in a row . He exited the game with 44 points on 17 - of - 20 shooting . On top of Thompson 's impressive night , the Warriors saw 20 points from Kevin Durant , who shot 8 - of - 13 from the field . Steph Curry , meanwhile , had an off shooting night , going just 3 - of - 12 from the floor . He did , however , tally 12 assists . The Lakers , meanwhile , were without LeBron James , Rajon Rondo , or Lonzo Ball , each of whom was sidelined by an injury . In their absence , the team struggled , with only two starters scoring in double digits . Kyle Kuzma tallied 16 points , while Ivica Zubac led the team with 18 off the bench . On Thursday , the Warriors will visit the Wizards in DC , while the Lakers will host the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down their rival Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 105 , at Staples Center on Monday evening . The Lakers ( 30 - 34 ) entered Monday 's contest in desperate need of a win . The LeBron James-led team had dropped its previous two contests and was five games out of the playoff picture heading into Monday 's crosstown clash . While the Lakers seemed ready to play initially , putting up 34 points in the first quarter , the team 's energy quickly began to wane . The Clippers ( 37 - 29 ) were able to regain the lead by halftime before building up a comfortable cushion in the second half . LAC started the fourth quarter with a quick 80 run to push the lead to 12 , and over four minutes of scoreless basketball from the Lakers allowed the Clips to maintain their advantage . The outcome lifts the Clippers to seventh in the Western Conference while moving the Lakers to 6 games out from eighth place and the coveted final playoff spot . Early on , the Clippers saw a massive spark from Patrick Beverley . The veteran embraced the mismatch with his coverage of LeBron James and finished the first half with five steals . Danilo Gallinari , meanwhile , helped to fuel the Clippers ' offensive outburst in the second half . He finished with a team - high 23 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting . The Lakers , meanwhile , saw a triple - double from veteran Rajon Rondo . Rondo , who has added a three - point shot recently , knocked down four triples on the night . James also delivered a gem , scoring 27 points to go with eight rebounds and six assists . Next on the agenda for the Lakers is a tilt with the Denver Nuggets at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Clippers , meanwhile , will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Utah Jazz , 113 - 109 , at staples Center on Sunday evening . It was the second straight win for the Lakers ( 37 - 44 ) against a playoff team , as LA managed to upset the Jazz ( 49 - 31 ) despite its slough of injuries . Operating without four members of their opening day starting five , the Lakers shot over 51 percent against a typically ironclad Utah defense . LA was tenacious on the glass , grabbing 16 offensive rebounds and outrebounding Utah 49 - 35 overall . Recent G-League callup Jemerrio Jones stood out after earning a start on Sunday . Jones grabbed 16 rebounds and dished out five assists while playing a whopping 38 minutes . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope logged a game - high 42 minutes and scored a team - high 32 points in the win . LA also saw 22 points from veteran center JaVale McGee . Utah was led by 21 points and 10 rebounds from Rudy Gobert . Donovan Mitchell scored another 19 points for the Jazz . The loss comes at an inopportune time for the Jazz , who are fighting for playoff seeding in a crowded Western Conference . With the loss , they now sit two games behind the fourth - place Portland Trail Blazers . Utah will host the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Lakers will clash with Portland .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 104 - 101 , at Staples Center on Tuesday . Drama surrounding the Lakers ' organization overshadowed the team 's final game of the season on Tuesday , as Lakers ( 37 - 45 ) president Magic Johnson unexpectedly stepped down from his role this evening . Johnson held a press conference that lingered past the start time of the team 's game to address his decision to move forward . On the court , though , the Lakers put up a tough fight against Portland ( 52 - 29 ) , but the playoff - bound Blazers ultimately got the last laugh . Maurice Harkless came up in the clutch for Portland , scoring the team 's last 10 points , including a game - winning three - pointer with just one second remaining . Harkless led the Trail_Blazers with 26 points . He was also active on the defensive end , blocking four shots . Enes Kanter contributed a double - double for Portland in the win , finishing with 22 points and 16 rebounds . With the win , Portland sits at fourth in the Western Conference . However , a win on Wednesday coupled with a loss by Denver could move Portland into third place . The Lakers , meanwhile , saw 32 points from Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . It was the second straight game in which Caldwell-Pope tallied 32 points . Jemerrio Jones grabbed 15 rebounds , and all five Lakers starters scored in double figures in the narrow loss . Portland will visit Sacramento for its final game of the season on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 102 - 100 , at Amway Center on Monday . It 's rare to see a game with just seven ties and five lead changes come down to the last shot but that was the case here . Evan Fournier played the hero , as he hit a game - winning jumper at the buzzer to break a tied game . Orlando rode a big fourth quarter to victory , outscoring Cleveland , 32 - 21 , in the final quarter . The Magic won despite being dominated in shooting , as Orlando shot just 45 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range while Cleveland hit 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from long range . Transition offense was the only notable advantage for Orlando , as they won the fastbreak scoring , 21 - 11 . The Cavaliers ( 1 - 9 ) were led by George Hill , as he tallied 22 points , four rebounds , six assists and four steals . Tristan Thompson amassed 19 points , 16 rebounds and four assists . Cedi Osman totaled 11 points and 10 boards . J.R. Smith and Jordan Clarkson scored 14 points apiece to lead the bench . The Magic ( 4 - 6 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , as he accrued 23 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Evan Fournier collected 15 points , five assists and three steals to go along with his game - winner . Nikola Vucevic accumulated 14 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . Terrence Ross led the bench with 15 points and two boards . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Orlando welcoming the Detroit Pistons to Amway Center and Cleveland hosting the Oklahoma City Thunder .
The Miami Heat defeated the host Orlando Magic , 115 - 91 , at Amway Center on Sunday evening . The Heat got out to a great start on the road by outscoring the Magic by 11 in the first quarter . The Magic tightened up in the second and cut the deficit to nine by halftime . However , the visitors showed no mercy , as they came storming out in the third to outscore the Magic by 10 in the quarter and take a 19 - point lead into the final frame . The Magic had no answer as their state rivals cruised to the 24 - point win . This marks the fifth straight win for the Heat , and the third loss in a row for the Magic . The Heat had six players score in double digits , led by Tyler Johnson , who finished with 25 points , 20 of which he scored in the third quarter alone . Justise Winslow added 22 points , six rebounds , five assists and four steals , while Josh Richardson tallied 15 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . The Heat shot 51 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Evan Fournier led the Magic with 17 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal , in 26 minutes . Aaron Gordon added 14 points , six rebounds , four assists , one steal and a block , while the only other player to score in double digits for Orlando was Jonathan Simmons , with 11 points . The Magic ( 14 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Suns on Wednesday . The Heat ( 16 - 16 ) play host to the Raptors on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 120 - 91 , at Amway Center on Thursday evening . The Magic ( 32 - 38 ) left little doubt about the eventual outcome with a dominant first half . After forging a 36 - 20 lead through the first 12 minutes . Orlando added another four points to their advantage in the second to give them a formidable 20 - point lead . Any hopes of a Cavaliers ( 17 - 52 ) comeback were dashed when the hosts extended their edge to 25 points entering the final period . The Magic leveraged strong rebounding and defense , winning the battle of the boards by a 50 - 43 margin while forcing 15 turnovers and holding Cleveland to 41 percent shooting . Collin Sexton led the way for the Cavaliers with 23 points , adding four rebounds , three assists and one block . Jordan Clarkson led the way with 15 points and supplemented them with four boards , two assists and one steal . Brandon Knight poured in 12 points , while Ante Zizic contributed 11 and also pulled down eight rebounds . Kevin Love generated 10 points , eight rebounds , one steal and one block across 24 minutes . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 21 points and complemented them with six rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . D.J. Augustin followed with 20 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Nikola Vucevic turned in a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Terrence Ross poured in 14 points and also totaled four rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Khem Birch contributed a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and two steals . The Cavaliers next pay a visit to the Dallas Mavericks on Saturday night , while the Magic remains home to face the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday evening .
The visiting Utah Jazz defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 113 - 104 , at American Airlines Center on Sunday . Utah withstood a tough comeback effort from the Mavericks , re - establishing a strong lead in the third quarter after having given away an 11 - point advantage in the second . The Jazz went on an 18 - 6 run in the late third and early fourth quarters , rebuilding a lead after the Mavericks tied it at 73 - 73 . Dallas cut the lead to as little as six in the fourth , but Utah was able to hold firm until the final buzzer . Rudy Gobert led the Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) with 23 points and 16 rebounds in the win . Six of Gobert 's rebounds came on the offensive end , and he shot 9 - of - 13 from the field . The reigning Defensive Player of the Year also tallied two steals and three blocks on the defensive end . Sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell also made a big contribution , scoring 20 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting . Dallas ( 2 - 4 ) saw a similarly impressive night from its own All-Star center , DeAndre Jordan . Jordan flirted with a triple - double , as he scored 12 points , grabbed 19 rebounds , and dished out nine assists in the loss . Dennis Smith , Jr. led the team with 27 points and hit 3 - of - 4 three - point attempts on the night . As a whole , though , the Mavericks could not find their rhythm offensively . The team shot just 42 percent on the night . The Mavericks will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Monday , while the Jazz have three days of rest before taking on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Wednesday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 111 - 96 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday evening . The Mavericks ( 4 - 8 ) have n't exactly enjoyed a smooth start to their season , but the little success they have had , they 've found on their home floor . Dallas had secured all three of their wins at American Airlines Center , and Saturday , they were facing a short - handed Thunder ( 7 - 5 ) squad once again playing without Russell Westbrook ( ankle ) . To their credit , OKC matched Dallas basket for basket in the first quarter , but the Mavs created space in the second period with some sharp shooting , leading to a 34 - point haul . That proved to be enough , as the home squad was able to keep pace with whatever the visitors threw at them in the second half . Dallas shined on both ends of the floor , shooting 56 percent from the floor ( including 48 percent from three - point range ) while limiting the Thunder to a 39 percent success rate . Paul George and Steven Adams co - led the Thunder with matching 20 - point , 13 - rebound double doubles . Dennis Schroder drew another start for Westbrook and posted 19 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jerami Grant provided 13 points , two rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Luka Doncic paced the Mavericks with 22 points and added eight assists , six rebounds and one steal . J.J. Barea followed with 21 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal in 22 minutes off the bench . Harrison Barnes and Dorian Finney-Smith posted matching 11 - point tallies , while Dennis Smith , Jr. turned in 10 points , five assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block . The Thunder heads back home and takes on the Phoenix Suns on Monday night , while the Mavericks hit the road and tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Monday evening as well .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 105 - 103 , at American Airlines Center on Sunday . In a battle between Western Conference rivals , this game was n't decided until the final seconds . Dallas made the run that mattered most though , as they finished the game on a 10 - 2 spurt to turn a six - point deficit into a two - point victory . There were 11 ties and 18 lead changes though , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Three-point shooting was the difference , with Dallas connecting on 14 - of - 39 and Oklahoma_City hitting just 9 - of - 38 . Rebounding was also critical , with the Mavericks outrebounding the Thunder , 49 - 39 . The 13 steals recorded by Oklahoma_City was the only thing keeping it close , as they won the turnover differential , 23 - 11 . The Thunder ( 22 - 13 ) were led by Paul George , as he accrued 36 points , five rebounds and two steals . Russell Westbrook went just 4 - of - 22 from the field but still finished with nine points , nine rebounds , eight assists and six steals . Steven Adams accumulated eight points , nine rebounds , two assists and two steals while Dennis Schroder led the bench with 19 points , four rebounds and three assists . The Mavericks ( 17 - 18 ) were led by Luke Doncic , as he tallied 25 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Harrison Barnes totaled 16 points , six rebounds and two steals . Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 14 points and four rebounds while DeAndre Jordan collected 12 points , 17 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . J.J. Barea provided 10 assists off the bench to lead the team . These teams next game will actually be a rematch on Monday , although that game will be played in Oklahoma_City .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 119 - 114 , at American Airlines Center on Sunday night . The Warriors ( 29 - 14 ) knew they were in for an uphill battle against a home - dominant squad in the Mavericks ( 20 - 23 ) , which had notched 16 of their 20 wins coming in at American Airlines Center . Accordingly , the defending champs found themselves down by four coming out of the first quarter , but they 'd forged a 62 - 54 lead by halftime . However , this was a game that would n't be decided until the final minute , with Golden_State coming back from a five - point deficit with 3:51 remaining to finish the contest on an 11 - 1 run . Stephen Curry was key to both the comeback and the victory overall , as he tallied a game - high 48 points , including the last seven . Curry added six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal to his aforementioned scoring haul . Kevin Durant provided 28 points , seven boards , five assists , two blocks and one steal . Klay Thompson mustered 16 points , four rebounds and one assist . Alfonzo McKinnie offered 10 points and five rebounds . Draymond Green mustered just four points but added seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Luka Doncic led the Mavericks with 26 points and supplemented them with six boards , five assists and one steal . Harrison Barnes supplied 22 points and four rebounds . Deandre Jordan generated a 13 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Jalen Brunson managed 12 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Wesley Matthews could n't help make up for the absence of Dennis Smith , Jr. ( back ) , managing just eight points on 3 - for - 11 shooting . The Warriors remain on the road and next visit the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday evening , while the Mavericks remain home to take on the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday night .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 106 - 101 , at American Airlines Center on Friday evening . The Pistons got out to a good start on the road , with a 28 - 23 lead after one quarter . However , the Mavericks turned it up a notch in the second , where they outscored the visitors by 13 , to take a 62 - 54 lead into halftime . The Pistons started off the third quarter well and tied it up at 70 just a few minutes in , but the Mavericks pulled back ahead and took a three - point lead into the final frame . The Pistons battled right down to the wire , but the Mavs were able to hold on at home for their second straight win . Luka Doncic led the Mavs with 32 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , eight rebounds , eight assists , two steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 19 points , five assists and two rebounds , while DeAndre Jordan added 13 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Mavs shot 46 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Blake Griffin led the Pistons with 35 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 39 minutes . Andre Drummond followed up with 23 points , 15 rebounds and three steals , while Reggie Jackson added 12 points , nine assists and three rebounds . The Pistons shot 41 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 38 from long range . The Pistons ( 21 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Bucks on Tuesday . The Mavericks ( 22 - 26 ) play host to the Raptors on Sunday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 110 - 108 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday evening . The Timberwolves got out to a good start on the road , as they took a 32 - 27 lead after one quarter . The Mavs picked it up in the second and tied it up at 36 , three minutes into the quarter . After a few lead changes , the Mavs and Timberwolves ended up tied at 58 by halftime . The third quarter started out close , but the Timberwolves took over toward the end of the quarter , to build a 10 - point lead entering the fourth . The Mavs did not back down and got out to a good start in the fourth . They kept fighting and managed to tie it at 99 , with four minutes left . The last minutes was filled with ties and lead changes , but the Timberwolves were able to stick it out to finish on top , and end a two - game losing streak . Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves , with 28 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and three blocks , in 36 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 19 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals , while Tyus Jones added 15 points , six assists and a rebound . The Timberwolves shot 49 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 27 from deep . Meanwhile , Luka Doncic led the Mavs with 27 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and a block , in 31 minutes . Dwight Powell followed up with 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , while Trey Burke chipped in 12 points , four assists and two rebounds . The Mavs shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 39 from long range . The Mavericks ( 31 - 47 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Grizzlies on Friday . The Timberwolves ( 35 - 43 ) play host to the Heat on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 120 - 109 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for the Mavericks , they dominated the final three quarters . In fact , a 33 - 18 first quarter really set the tone , as Phoenix could never get the game within four from there . Rebounding was a clear difference , with Dallas outrebounding Phoenix , 64 - 38 . Ball movement was also key , with the Mavericks out - assiting the Suns , 28 - 21 . The Suns ( 19 - 63 ) were led by Jamal Crawford , as he provided 51 points , five rebounds and five assists off the bench . He became the oldest player in NBA history to score at least 50 points . Josh Jackson led the starters with 17 points and eight rebounds . Dragan Bender totaled 12 points , 11 rebounds and six assists . The Mavericks ( 33 - 48 ) were led by Dirk Nowitzki , as he tallied 30 points , eight rebounds and three assists on 31 shots . Luka Doncic picked up another triple - double , collecting 21 points , 16 rebounds , 11 assists and three steals . Dwight Powell amassed 11 points and 11 boards while Dorian Finney-Smith led the bench with 15 points and 10 boards . This marked the season finale for the Suns , who finished with the second - worst record in the league . The Mavericks will have to play again on Wednesday when they travel to face the San Antomio Spurs .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 127 - 119 , at Barclays Center on Saturday evening . The Nets got out to a good start at home , as they kicked things off with an 11 - 4 lead . The Clippers pushed back , but the Nets held on to take a , 37 - 32 , lead into the second quarter . The Nets stepped it up with a 14 - 4 run to start the quarter , and once again held off the Clippers , who continued to chip away . The Nets led 67 - 60 at halftime . Both teams came out strong in the third and matched each other bucket for bucket , until the score was settled at 97 - 90 , with the Nets ' advantage heading into the final frame . The tides turned in the fourth quarter , as the Clippers hit a quick 70 run to tie it up . The game was tied at 110 , with 4:36 to go , when the Clippers mounted a 9 - 2 run , to take a seven - point advantage with 2:13 remaining . The Clippers held on to earn their fourth straight win . Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 28 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 32 minutes . Tobias Harris followed up with 27 points , eight rebounds and three assists , while Montrezl Harrell added 16 points , 10 rebounds , one assist and a block , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Clippers shot 51 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Jarrett Allen led the Nets with 24 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and a block , in 28 minutes . D'Angelo Russell followed up with 23 points , 10 assists , three rebounds , two steals and a block , while Joe Harris tallied 19 points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 28 from long range . The Nets ( 7 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Heat in Miami on Tuesday . The Clippers ( 10 - 5 ) head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Monday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 114 - 110 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . In one of the tightest games of the evening , it took 17 ties and 15 lead changes to determine a winner . In addition , neither club led by more than 10 points , as none of the four quarters were decided by more than three points . The shooting disparity was huge , with Brooklyn connecting on 48 percent of their shots while holding Orlando to 43 percent from the field . The Nets also won the points in the paint differential , 58 - 44 while outscoring the Magic in fastbreak points , 15 - 7 . The Magic ( 20 - 28 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 21 points , 14 rebounds , five assists , two steals and four blocks . D.J. Augustin finished with 19 points , three rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jonathan Isaac totaled 16 points , four rebounds and three blocks while Jonathon Simmons led the bench with 13 points , two rebounds and three assists . The Nets ( 26 - 23 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he collected 25 points , seven rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . Joe Harris accumulated 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was huge off the bench , as he provided 29 points , three rebounds and three assists . DeMarre Carroll also totaled 19 points and four rebounds off the bench as well . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Orlando playing host to the Washington Wizards and Brooklyn welcoming the New York Knicks to Barclay 's Center .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 113 - 107 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . Brooklyn came into this matchup as a sizable favorite but Cleveland made it close late . A 31 - 20 first quarter really set the tone for the Nets , as they capped off their victory with a 33 - 22 fourth quarter . With that said , there were six ties and eight lead changes in total , as Brooklyn overcame an eight - point third quarter deficit to win . The shooting disparity was key , with the Nets shooting 47 percent from the field and the Cavaliers connecting on just 40 percent of their shots . Brooklyn did most of their damage down low , outscoring Cleveland in the paint , 58 - 38 . The Cavaliers ( 16 - 49 ) were led by Kevin Love , as he tallied 24 points , 16 rebounds and four assists . Larry Nance Jr. finished with 17 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and four steals . Collin Sexton amassed 12 points , five assists and two blocks while David Nwaba led the bench with 22 points . The Nets ( 34 - 33 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he accrued 25 points , four rebounds , five assists and three steals . Jarrett Allen amassed 15 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was huge off the bench , providing 28 points , four rebounds and five assists . Ed Davis led the team with 12 rebounds off the bench as well . On deck for Cleveland is a road matchup versus the Miami Heat on Friday . As for Brooklyn , they return to action on Saturday when they travel to face the Atlanta Hawks .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 115 - 107 , at Pepsi Center on Monday evening . The Celtics got out to a great start on the road , with a quick 10 - 2 run , before going on to build a 34 - 19 lead by the end of the quarter . The Nuggets answered in the second , as they kicked things off with a 90 run , just minutes into the quarter , to cut the deficit to six . The Celtics managed to push their lead back to 10 , but the Nuggets did not back down , as they outscored the Celtics , 19 - 11 , through the rest of the quarter , to trail by just two at halftime . Both teams came out strong in the third , as they went back - and - forth to keep the score within one or two possessions , however , the Nuggets took over in the final minutes , where they outscored the Celtics 11 - 4 , to take a seven - point lead into the fourth . The Nuggets did not look back from there , as they managed to stay one step ahead throughout the fourth , to earn their fifth straight win , and move to 60 at home . Jamal Murray went off for a career - high 48 points on 19 - of - 30 shooting , in 38 minutes , to lead the Nuggets . Gary Harris and Trey Lyles chipped in 13 points each , while Nikola Jokic tallied eight points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . The Nuggets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with 31 points on 13 - of - 17 shooting , five rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block , in 33 minutes . Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown tallied 15 points each , while Al Horford finished with 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes . The Celtics shot 51 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from deep . The Celtics ( 6 - 4 ) will look to avoid a third straight loss , as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Thursday . The Nuggets ( 9 - 1 ) take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 99 , at Pepsi Center on Monday . Injuries have continued to plague the Nuggets ( 18 - 9 ) this season , but they fought through the absence of two starters Monday to earn a key victory over the Grizzlies after dropping back - to - back games to the Hornets and Hawks . They were led by a stellar outing from Nikola Jokic , who contnues to show how he 's one of the best all - around players in the NBA . Jokic posted a game - high 27 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting to go along with 12 rebounds and six assists in 38 minutes . The most important performance from a Nuggets players Monday night , however , was from reserve point guard Monte Morris . Morris came off the bench to score 20 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting on top of five rebounds and six assists in 28 minutes . As for the Grizzlies ( 15 - 11 ) , they have now dropped two games in a row , and Monday 's loss can be chalked up to a lack of production from the starting unit . Mike Conley shot just 5 - of - 14 from the field , but he was the only Memphis starter to reach double figures , scoring a team - high 19 points in 32 minutes . Marc Gasol was just 2 - of - 6 from the field and scored just seven points , while rookie sensation Justin Jackson Jr. played just 20 minutes and managed to post only seven points in the process . The Grizzlies ' bench , however , did everything it could to keep the team in the game . Led by Shelvin Mack 's 14 points , the five Memphis reserves scored 51 of the team 's 99 points , outscoring the five starters .
In a battle of the Western Conference 's top two teams , the Golden_State Warriors took down the Denver Nuggets , 142 - 111 , at Pepsi Center on Tuesday . Things got off to a historic start as Golden_State ( 30 - 14 ) scored a whopping 51 first - quarter points . Despite their opponent 's scoring surge , the Nuggets ( 29 - 14 ) held close behind , trailing by only 13 points at the end of the first . However , an incredible first half from Kevin Durant kept Golden_State far ahead . Durant finished the first half with 20 points on blisteringly hot 8 - of - 10 shooting . Durant and the Warriors never slowed down , finishing the night shooting 62 percent from the field and 21 - of - 40 from three - point range . 18 of the team 's three - pointers came from the trio of Durant , Steph Curry , and Klay Thompson . The three All-Stars combined to score 89 points , including a team - high 31 from Curry . Draymond Green , meanwhile , scored only four points but added 13 assists and two steals while committing only one turnover . On the other side of the court , it was a fairly pedestrian night for Nikola Jokic , who tallied just 17 points and three rebounds . The elite big man did , however , lead the team with eight assists . Denver saw a team - high 22 points from Malik Beasley , while Jamal Murray notched another 21 . Golden_State will host the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday , while Denver next faces a tilt against the Chicago Bulls this Thursday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 126 - 110 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday evening . The contest got out to a high - paced start , as the Nuggets led 41 - 37 after one quarter . The Sixers battled through the second , but the Nuggets closed the quarter strong , to extend their lead to nine by halftime . The Nuggets stayed in control through the third and managed to push their lead to double digits by the start of the fourth . They pushed their lead to 16 mid way though the fourth and cruised to their second straight win . Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets with 32 points on 12 - of - 22 shooting , 18 rebounds , 10 assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . Mason Plumlee followed up with 17 points , six rebounds , four assists and one block , while Torrey Craig added 15 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Nuggets shot 52 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , J.J. Redick led the 76ers with 22 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , three assists and two rebounds , in 27 minutes . Corey Brewer followed up with 20 points , six rebounds , four steals and two assist , while Ben Simmons finished with 19 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . The Sixers shot 42 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 36 from long range . The 76ers ( 32 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Lakers in L.A. on Tuesday . The Nuggets ( 33 - 15 ) take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Monday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Sacramento Kings , 120 - 118 , in a last - second thriller at Pepsi Center on Wednesday . All eyes were on former Celtics star Isaiah Thomas , who made his debut with Denver ( 39 - 18 ) on Wednesday . Thomas had not seen NBA action in 11 months , as he had been sidelined by a hip injury . The diminutive All-Star made an impact in 13 minutes on the court , scoring eight points on 3 - of - 6 shooting . His Nuggets debut was overshadowed , though , by a back - and - forth game that culminated in a thrilling final sequence . Down two late in the game , Sacramento ( 30 - 27 ) tied it up at 118 on a layup from shooting guard Buddy Hield . Hield could not force overtime , though , as the Nuggets capitalized on their last possession with a buzzer - beating floater from superstar Nikola Jokic . On top of his late - game heroics , Jokic led his team with 18 rebounds and 11 assists . The standout showing marked Jokic 's 12th triple - double this season . Paul Millsap also delivered a gem for Denver , scoring 25 points to go with 12 rebounds . The win marked the second straight for the Nuggets after the team suffered a three - game losing streak last week . Hield was Sacramento 's leading scorer with 25 points . The Kings also saw 11 assists from star point guard De'Aaron Fox . Newly-acquired forward Harrison Barnes had his best night since joining the team , tallying 19 points and 11 rebounds . Wednesday 's contest carries both teams into the All-Star break .
The Denver Nuggets took down the Detroit Pistons , 95 - 92 , at Pepsi Center on Tuesday evening . The Pistons ( 37 - 37 ) fought back from a double - digit deficit and trailed by just two late in the fourth quarter on Tuesday . However , Denver ( 50 - 23 ) closed out the game in style with a clutch step - back two from Jamal Murray . The jumper capped off a 31 - point night from Murray , whose performance helped Denver move back into a tie for first in the Western Conference . Nikola Jokic also had a big night in what proved to be an exciting big man duel . Jokic scored 23 points and grabbed 15 rebounds while squaring off against Detroit 's own All-Star bigs . Paul Millsap grabbed another 13 boards for the Nuggets , though he shot only 2 - of - 10 from the floor . As a whole , it was a less - than - stellar offensive night for the Nuggets , who shot just 42 percent overall . However , their defense got the job done , holding Detroit to just 35 percent shooting . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons with 29 points and 15 rebounds . Griffin attempted a game - high 31 shots , making 12 . His strong performance was complemented by Andre Drummond , who added 18 rebounds and 13 points . Detroit will host the Orlando Magic on Thursday evening , while the Nuggets will visit OKC .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 98 - 94 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday night . The Rockets ( 4 - 5 ) and the Pacers ( 7 - 4 ) played a very interesting game on Monday , as neither club gave an inch to the other and the game had to be decided in the final minutes thanks to an impressive comeback from the visiting team . Houston was up 29 - 22 following the first quarter , but Indiana flipped the script and won the second quarter 33 - 24 , as well as the third one 20 - 16 , to put themselves ahead by six points entering the final 12 minutes of action . But the Rockets did n't give up , and won the final quarter 29 - 19 to pull away for good . Both teams struggled with their shooting percentages , as Houston shot 44 percent from the field and 32 from three - point range , as opposed to Indiana 's 44 and 29 , respectively . James Harden led the Rockets offensively with 28 points , but he also added six assists , four rebounds and three steals , while Clint Capela back him up with a double - double of 18 points and 10 rebounds . Chris Paul only had nine points , but contributed with 13 assists and five boards . James Ennis III had 13 points , while Carmelo Anthony chipped in with eight points and five rebounds off the bench . Victor Oladipo paced the Pacers offensively with 28 points , six rebounds and two assists , while Bojan Bogdanovic contributed with 11 points . Thaddeus Young and Myles Turner disappointed , however , since they combined for only 15 points while going 6 - of - 17 from the field between them . Domantas Sabonis ( 17 points , eight rebounds , five assists ) and Tyreke Evans ( 11 points in only 16 minutes ) looked solid coming off the bench , though .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 97 - 89 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Saturday . There were six ties and 14 lead changes in this game , as it took a big second half for Indiana to pull away . In fact , the Pacers outscored the Hawks , 50 - 33 , in the second half . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held Atlanta to just 36 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was also a huge factor , with the Pacers outrebounding the Hawks , 54 - 41 . These teams combined for 39 combined steals and blocks , which is one of the highest totals of the season . The Hawks ( 3 - 13 ) had just one starter reach double figures in scoring , as Kent Bazemore collected 13 points , five rebounds , four assists and four steals . Jeremy Lin led the team in scoring off of the bench , providing 16 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . John Collins made his season debut , as he amassed 12 points and two rebounds in 12 minutes of action . The Pacers ( 10 - 6 ) lost their leading scorer in this game , as Victor Oladipo left after eight minutes due to a sore knee . Bojan Bogdanovic stepped up in his absence , leading the way with 22 points and four rebounds . Darren Collison accumulated 12 points , two rebounds , five assists and two steals . Myles Turner generated 10 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Domantas Sabonis was huge off the bench , providing nine points , 16 rebounds and six assists . Both teams play home games on Monday for their next fixture , with Indiana welcoming the Utah Jazz and Atlanta facing off with the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Utah Jazz , 121 - 94 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 11 - 6 ) ended their three - game homestand on a strong note , destroying the Jazz ( 8 - 9 ) right from tip - off and they never gave the Western Conference team a chance to re - group themselves . Indiana quickly jumped to a 13 - point lead following the first quarter ( 32 - 19 ) and while Utah offered some degree of resistance in the second quarter ( 28 - 25 ) , they were never in the game long enough to make this a tight contest . Indiana cruised their way in the second half and won both remaining quarters ( 29 - 23 and 35 - 24 , respectively ) , securing their third straight win and leaving Indiana on a strong note . On the other hand , Utah lost again and now they have dropped three of their last four games . They ended their five - game road trip with a 2 - 3 record . The Pacers did n't have Victor Oladipo , but that did n't seem to matter and six Indiana players ended scoring in double digits . Bojan Bogdanovic led the way with 21 points , while Myles Turner and Thaddeus Young each contributed 12 points coming off the bench . Most of the scoring damage came off the bench , though . Domantas Sabonis and Aaron Holiday each had 19 points , while Doug McDermott added 12 points . Ricky Rubio was by far the best player on Utah and he did an admirable job of filling the stat sheet since he ended the contest with 28 points ( 10 - of - 13 from the field ) but also added six assists , four rebounds and three steals . Rudy Gobert had 12 points with 11 rebounds , and Jae Crowder added 14 off the bench . Donovan Mitchell struggled and only finished with seven points .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 107 - 97 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Saturday . This was a tale of four quarters , as Indiana rode the second and fourth quarters to victory . In fact , the Pacers outscored the Kings , 64 - 48 , in those 24 minutes . Indiana really finished strong , ending the game on a 23 - 14 run across the final eight minutes . Rebounding was key for the Pacers , as they out - rebounded the Kings , 52 - 43 . They also dominated scoring down low , as they outscored the Kings in the paint , 56 - 46 . Bench production was also huge , as Indiana had three bench players reach double figures in scoring while Sacramento had just one player reach that threshold . The Kings ( 13 - 12 ) were led by Buddy Hield , as he tallied 20 points and four rebounds . De'Aaron Fox accrued 18 points , six assists and two blocks . Willie Cauley-Stein totaled 14 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Bogdan Bogdanovic started and finished with 11 points , three rebounds , six assists and three steals while Nemanja Bjelica amassed six points and 12 boards . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 92 - 91 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Cavaliers ( 8 - 23 ) were one of the worst teams in the Eastern Conference entering Tuesday 's action , so there 's no question that this win against the Pacers ( 20 - 11 ) , who were riding a seven - game winning streak , should qualify as quite an upset . The game was tight and sloppy during most of the game , as both teams struggled from the field during the entire contest , but they saved the best for last . With Indiana up by only one point , Victor Oladipo missed two pivotal free throws , and that gave Cleveland a chance they would n't waste away . Rodney Hood missed a mid - range jumper , but Larry Nance Jr. tipped it home on the rebound to give the Cavs a huge win on the road , and their first one this season when they are trailing after three quarters . The final score in each quarter was : 21 - 19 , 24 - 25 , 22 - 24 , 25 - 23 . Larry Nance Jr. might have been the hero for Cleveland , but he also filled the stat sheet admirably in this game since he finished with 15 points , 16 rebounds , six assists , and three steals . Rodney Hood was the leading scorer with 17 points , and rookie Collin Sexton had 12 points . Cedi Osman chipped in with 13 points and seven rebounds , while Matthew Dellavedova ( 10 points , four assists ) and Alec Burks ( 14 points ) looked solid off the bench as well . Six Indiana players scored in double digits and Domantas Sabonis was the leading scorer thanks to a 17 - point , eight - rebound performance off the bench . Victor Oladipo had 12 points , but struggled from the field ( 4 - 15 ) and missed two clutch free throws . Bojan Bogdanovic added 14 points , and Myles Turner had a double - double of 12 points and 10 rebounds .

The Pacers ( 24 - 12 ) set the tone for what would be a dominant win early , forging a 32 - 21 first - quarter lead . The Pistons ( 16 - 17 ) could n't make any serious inroads into their deficit after that point , and Indiana 's pinpoint shooting had a lot to do with it . The home squad shot an eye - popping 60 percent overall , with seven players hitting double digits in the scoring column . They were nearly as impressive on the defensive end , as they limited Detroit to 37 percent shooting - - including 25 percent from three - point range - - and forced them into 22 turnovers . Indiana came into this game as a huge favorite and a 131 - 97 scoreline vindicates that thought . A 38 - 19 first quarter really set the tone , as the Pacers won in wire - to - wire fashion . In addition , they won the first , third and fourth quarters by at least 11 points apiece . Defensive rebounding was big for Indiana , as they won that battle , 43 - 33 . The assist - to - turnover differential was also decisive , with the Pacers recording five more assists than the Suns while committing five fewer turnovers . Indiana shot 52 percent from the field , 48 percent from three - point range and 75 percent from the free - throw line while Phoenix hit just 42 percent from the field , 30 percent from long range and 50 percent from the charity stripe . Things tightened up again in the third , but the Mavs could not do much , as they only cut into the deficit by one point , entering the final frame down by 15 . The Mavericks kept chipping away through the fourth and cut the lead to single digits , however the Pacers were able to hold their position and walk away with the home win . The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 108 - 106 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . While there were only a handful of ties and lead changes in this game , it came down to the wire . In fact , Oklahoma_City took a 12 - 11 lead halfway through the first quarter and did n't surrender that lead until late in the fourth quarter . Indiana actually overcame a 13 - point halftime deficit by riding a 58 - 43 second half to victory . Wesley Matthews played the hero , as he made a putback lay - up with less than two seconds remaining to break a tied game . Free-throw shooting was the difference , with the Pacers hitting 27 - of - 32 and the Thunder connecting on just 16 - of - 20 . Indiana 's bench came up big too , outscoring Oklahoma_City 's bench , 31 - 25 . Assists , steals , blocks and turnovers were all decided within one in this tightly - contested game . The Thunder ( 42 - 27 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 36 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Russell Westbrook collected 19 points , 14 rebounds , 11 assists , four steals and two blocks en route to a triple - double . Steven Adams amassed 17 points and eight boards while Dennis Schroder provided seven points , five rebounds and five assists off the bench . Bojan Bogdanovic led the starters with 23 points , four rebounds and five assists . Darren Collison totaled 17 points , six rebounds , seven assists and four steals while Matthews finished with 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Saturday against the top teams in the west , with Indiana traveling to face the Denver Nuggets and Oklahoma_City playing host to the Golden State Warriors .

The Pelicans ( 30 ) and The Clippers ( 2 - 2 ) played a back - and - forth game , but in the end the hosts came through and used a big second half to keep their undefeated streak alive . However , the Pelicans did n't want to lose their undefeated record and flipped the script in the second half : a 32 - 22 third quarter pushed them ahead into the final 12 minutes , and they closed things out with a 25 - 25 fourth quarter that secured them a seven - point win while keeping their winning run alive to start the 2018 - 19 season . It was a full - fledged blowout , as Orlando ( 26 - 32 ) never let New_Orleans ( 25 - 33 ) come especially close . Four Orlando starters scored at least 20 points in the win , including a team - high 25 points from Nikola Vucevic . Davis , who has had a rocky month since requesting a trade and then not being dealt , went just 1 - of - 9 from the field in 24 minutes of play . The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 131 - 122 , at Smoothie King Center on Thursday . The Pelicans ' ( 26 - 33 ) Anthony Davis , who has seen his minutes dwindle since his trade request , and Thursday night , the All-Star big man played 16 minutes in the first half before being ruled out for the rest of the game with a shoulder injury . Whether the injury was a legitimate concern or not did not matter to New_Orleans , as they managed to fend off one of the Western Conference 's best teams in the last game before the All-Star break . Julius Randle was unstoppable in the winning effort , playing 39 minutes and posting a team - high 33 points , 11 rebounds and six assists in that time . Jrue Holiday was very close behind , scoring 32 points to go along with five rebounds and seven assists . As a team , it was a very efficient night offensively against a stout Oklahoma_City defense , as New_Orleans shot 46 percent from three and 54 percent from the field overall . As for the Thunder ( 37 - 20 ) , Russell Westbrook came through with his most efficient performance of the regular season , but it still was n't enough . Westbrook shot 18 - of - 30 from the field en route to scoring a season - high 44 points to go along with 14 rebounds and 11 assists across 39 minutes . It was his 11th straight triple - double . Paul George was not as efficient , going a miserable 3 - of - 17 from behind the arc , but he still finished with 28 points , seven rebounds and six assists . The only other Thunder player to reach double figures was Nerlens Noel , who posted 22 points and 13 rebounds in just 22 minutes off the bench . Now , heading into the All-Star break , the Thunder sit comfortably in third place in the Western Conference standings , while the Pelican own the third - to - worst record in the conference .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 107 , at Little Caesars Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Pistons ( 10 - 7 ) have now won two straight in the midst of a five - game homestand , and they did it while playing at a stellar level during the final 12 minutes of action against a Suns ( 4 - 15 ) team that simply could n't hold on to their slim advantage . Phoenix jumped to a three - point lead after the first quarter ( 30 - 27 ) , but the Pistons were in front at half time by a two - point margin ( 62 - 60 ) . The Suns restored their lead and were by up by one after three ( 84 - 83 ) and it seemed as if they were going to pull the upset . However , Detroit sealed the deal with an impressive fourth - quarter performance ( 35 - 23 ) to win comfortably by an 11 - point differential . Six Detroit players scored in double digits in this game . Andre Drummond led the way with 19 points , 16 rebounds and five steals , while Reggie Jackson also contributed 19 points while adding eight assists . Blake Griffin posted a double - double with 16 points and 11 assists , and Reggie Bullock added 13 points . Langston Galloway ( 15 points ) and Stanley Johnson ( 14 points ) impressed off the bench as well . Devin Booker carried Phoenix 's offense with a stellar 37 - point performance that also included five assists and four rebounds , but he did n't have a lot of help from his teammates . DeAndre Ayton chipped with a strong double - double of 25 points and 13 rebounds , while Jamal Crawford did his part with 12 points and five assists coming off the bench . Trevor Ariza disappointed with only five points in 36 minutes of action .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 100 - 93 , at Little Caesars Arena on Tuesday night . The Pistons ( 40 - 41 ) came into the contest with the utmost urgency , knowing they 'd need to win their last two games to control their own destiny and hang on to the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . It was therefore rather surprising to see Detroit get off to a poor start , as they were behind by a 32 - 20 margin after one quarter and 57 - 38 at halftime . They finally seemed to awaken to the reality of their circumstances coming out of intermission by cutting four points in the Grizzlies ' ( 32 - 49 ) advantage during the third quarter , but it was a monumental 21 - 4 run over the first 5:58 of the final period that finally gave them a lead for the first time since 11:44 mark of the first quarter . Although it held Detroit to just 40 percent shooting , Memphis hurt its cause by committing 21 turnovers . Delon Wright and Bruno Caboclo co - led the Grizzlies with 15 points , with Wright notably pulling down nine rebounds . Tyler Zeller totaled 13 points , six rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Tyler Dorsey generated 12 points , four rebounds and three assists . Ivan Rabb , Chandler Parsons and Jevon Carter had matching nine - point tallies off the bench . Ish Smith led the Pistons with 22 points , adding four assists and three rebounds . Andre Drummond posted a 20 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , five steals and three blocks . Luke Kennard contributed 15 points , two rebounds and one assist . Reggie Jackson supplied 12 points , five assists , one rebound and one steal . Blake Griffin , whose workload is being managed due to knee soreness , posted just five points , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block while logging 18 minutes . The Grizzlies wrap up the season by hosting the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday night , while the Pistons visit the New York Knicks on Wednesday evening in another must - win game .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 116 - 107 , at Scotiabank Arena on Friday evening . The Raptors ( 60 ) had proven invincible at home coming into Friday 's contest , and their level of play in the first quarter was a good example of why . Toronto jumped on the Mavericks ( 2 - 3 ) early , establishing a 39 - 26 lead . While Dallas managed to bring their deficit down to a slim three points entering the final period , the home squad stepped up , outscoring the visitors by a 24 - 18 margin . Both shooting and rebounding were keys to victory , as the Raptors enjoyed a 48 percent - 41 percent advantage from the field and a 50 - 44 edge on the boards . Luka Doncic paced the Mavericks with 22 points , which he complemented with five rebounds and four assists . Wesley Matthews supplied 21 points and dished out one assist . DeAndre Jordan generated an 18 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and one block . Harrison Barnes turned in 14 points , six rebounds , three assists and one block . Jalen Brunson , who started for Dennis Smith , Jr. ( ankle ) , and Maxi Kleber both generated eight - point deficits . Kawhi Leonard paced the Raptors with 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block . Kyle Lowry posted a 20 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and a block . Jonas Valanciunas started and managed 17 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . Danny Green poured in 15 points and added eight rebounds , one steal and one block . Serge Ibaka pitched in a bench - leading 11 points along with eight rebounds , an assist and two blocks . The Mavericks heads back home and take on the Utah Jazz on Sunday evening , while the Raptors pay a visit to the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday night .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 104 - 99 , at Scotiabank Arena on Sunday . In a battle between two of the Eastern Conference elite , this matchup was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , it took eight ties and 14 lead changes to determine a winner , as neither club led by more than 11 points . The statistics were incredibly even , as these clubs tied in field goal percentage , rebounds and steals while coming within two of one another in assists and turnovers . Three-point shooting was the only noticeable difference for Milwaukee , as they connected on 15 - of - 39 while holding Toronto to 15 - of - 44 . In addition , the Bucks won the points in the paint battle , 38 - 32 , and the fastbreak scoring , 12 - 7 . The Bucks ( 16 - 8 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he collected 19 points , 19 rebounds and six assists . Brook Lopez matched those 19 points , adding two assists and two steals to his tally . Malcolm Brogdon tallied 18 points , two rebounds and two assists . Khris Middleton finished with 10 points , nine rebounds and five assists . The Raptors ( 21 - 6 ) were led by Serge Ibaka , as he accrued 22 points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Kawhi Leonard amassed 20 points , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Pascal Siakam totaled 17 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Fred VanVleet led the bench with 19 points , two rebounds and two assists . On deck for Milwaukee is a home matchup versus the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday . As for Toronto , they return to action on Tuesday when they face the Los Angeles Clippers on the road .

The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 115 - 103 , at Toyota Center on Sunday . It 's rare to see a team score 13 points in the fourth quarter and win by a double - digit margin but that was the case here for Houston . In fact , they rode a 44 - 23 second quarter to victory , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the second half . Three-point shooting was the difference for the Rockets , as they connected on 20 - of - 47 from long range while holding the Pacers to 11 - of - 29 . Points off turnovers was also a big factor , with Houston winning that battle , 21 - 11 . The Pacers ( 8 - 6 ) were led by Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 22 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Tucker finished with 12 points and five rebounds . Houston returns to action on Tuesday , as they travel to face the Denver Nuggets . As for Indiana , they do n't play again until Friday , when they play host to the Miami Heat .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 126 - 111 , at Toyota Center on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 13 - 14 ) came into the contest trying to build on a Tuesday night win against the Trail Blazers , which had snapped a three - game losing streak . However , they had a formidable opponent in the red - hot Lakers ( 17 - 11 ) , which had gone on a 15 - 5 run after opening the season with a 2 - 5 record . Los_Angeles unsurprisingly kept the pressure on Houston throughout the majority of the game , taking a couple of fourth - quarter leads and facing just a three - point deficit with 4:16 to play . However , James Harden , who led the way with a 50 - point , 11 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double , took over from that point , scoring 15 of his points during the remainder of the contest as the home squad finished on a 17 - 5 run . Lance Stephenson led the bench with 17 points . Josh Hart contributed 15 points , while JaVale McGee supplied 11 points , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Danuel House , Jr. paced the second unit with 15 points and also posted three rebounds and one steal . Chris Paul had a near double - double with 14 points , nine assists , one rebound and three steals . Eric Gordon drew a start for James Ennis ( hamstring ) and registered 13 points . The Lakers remain on the road and visit the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday night , while the Rockets pay a visit to the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday evening as well .

The Houston Rockets beat the intrastate rival Dallas Mavericks , 120 - 104 , at Toyota Center on Monday night . The Rockets ( 33 - 23 ) were looking to get back on the right track after having endured a heartbreaking loss to the Thunder in their most recent game , a contest in which they 'd blown a 26 - point second - half lead . The first quarter was tightly contested , but Houston opened up a 14 - point lead by halftime with a 39 - point haul in the second . The Mavericks ( 26 - 30 ) were unable to make any further inroads into their deficit when it was all said and done , as the hosts had actually added two points to their advantage by game 's end . Ball security was decidedly in the Rockets ' favor , as they committed only half of the 18 turnovers they forced Dallas into . Luka Donic generated a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists to lead the Mavericks . Jalen Brunson provided 13 points , five rebounds and one assist . Dwight Powell generated 12 points and four boards . Tim Hardaway , Jr. totaled 10 points and four rebounds while shooting just 3 - for - 10 . Maxi Kleber contributed nine points , two rebounds , two assists and one block , while Dorian Finney-Smith , Trey Burke and Devin Harris all had matching eight - point tallies . James Harden just managed to extend his streak of 30 - point efforts while leading the Rockets , as he compiled 31 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and five steals . Gerald Green had a bench - leading 19 points while also hauling in six rebounds and dishing out one assist . Eric Gordon supplied 18 points , two rebounds and one assist . Chris Paul pitched in a 17 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds and two steals . Kenneth Faried matched Paul 's scoring total and also notched eight boards , one assist , one steal and one block . The Mavericks make the short trip back home to face the Miami Heat on Wednesday night , while the Rockets pay a visit to the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday evening as well .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers 131 - 118 on Sunday at AT & T Center . The final score did not depict the back and forth nature of this battle as the Spurs were able to pull away early in the fourth quarter with big time scores from Rudy Gay , DeMar DeRozan and LaMarcus Aldridge . The game itself had over 10 ties and nearly 20 lead changes , with the all - star back court of Damian Lillard and CJ McCollum firing on all cylinders trying to match the Spurs all - stars in the process . Portland ( 13 - 10 ) entered the fourth quarter down 97 - 90 , but McCollum drained a three pointer right out the gate to pull within four . Rudy Gay answered with his vintage mid - range jumper and that was the nature of the final period . Anytime the Blazers pulled within the reach , the Spurs ( 11 - 12 ) answered immediately and did damage in the paint , which led to easy free throws . DeRozan finished with 36 points , eight rebounds , six assists and two steals . Aldridge contributed 29 points and eight boards . Derrick White found a clutch rhythm off the bench and knocked down 4 - of - 7 from the field on his way to 10 points , while Patty Mills added 15 points in 25 minutes . Lillard led all scorers with 37 points , to go with 10 assists and a pair of steals . McCollum added 24 points and Al-Farouq Aminu pitched in 20 points and nine boards . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Blazers visit the Dallas Mavericks , while the Spurs visit the Utah Jazz .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 154 - 147 , in double overtime at AT & T Center on Thursday evening . The Spurs got out to a great start at home , with a 33 - 23 lead after one quarter . The Thunder chipped away through the second and cut the deficit to seven by halftime . The Spurs maintained control through the third and pushed their lead to 105 - 93 entering the fourth , but the Thunder would not back down and outscored the Spurs by 12 in the quarter to force OT . The teams matched each other for 11 points each in the first overtime , which led to a second overtime period . The Spurs managed to pull ahead early and held on despite a relentless effort from the visitors . The Spurs held on for the impressive home win , mostly thanks to a career - high 56 points from LaMarcus Aldridge . This marks the third straight loss for the Thunder . Aldridge led the Spurs with 56 points on 20 - of - 33 shooting , in 48 minutes . Derrick White followed up with 23 points , eight assists , five rebounds , two steals and one block , while DeMar DeRozan finished with 16 points , 11 assists , eight rebounds , one steal and one block . The Spurs shot 56 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with 24 points , a career - high 24 assists , 13 rebounds and two steals , in 49 minutes . Paul George followed up with 30 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting , eight rebounds , three steals and one assist , in 46 minutes , while Jerami Grant tallied a career - high 25 points , along with 12 rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Thunder ( 25 - 16 ) and Spurs ( 25 - 18 ) will have a rematch on Saturday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 99 - 89 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Thursday evening . Phoenix ( 5 - 24 ) entered Thursday 's nationally - televised game amidst turbulence on and off the court . The Suns had dropped 10 straight games and had declined to play Trevor Ariza in their most recent game as they attempt to find a trade destination for him . Rumors had also begun to swirl that team owner Robert Sarver was threatening to relocate the team to Seattle or Las Vegas , prompting outrage from many Suns fans . On Thursday , though , the team got good news , as Sarver publicly promised to keep the team in Phoenix and the Suns earned their first win in over three weeks . The Suns saw a strong shooting night from beyond the arc , knocking down 10 three - pointers . Dallas ( 15 - 13 ) , meanwhile , shot a dismal 5 - of - 33 from beyond the arc in one of its coldest nights of the season . T.J. Warren led Phoenix with 30 points , shooting 11 - of - 17 from the field in the win . Trevor Ariza also saw the court again , where he scored 13 points and grabbed eight rebounds . Josh Jackson added 14 points but shot just 5 - of - 17 from the field in doing so . Dallas , meanwhile , scored only 89 points , as none of its players scored more than 15 in the loss . Rookie wing Luka Doncic scored 13 points to go with five rebounds and six assists . Veteran big man DeAndre Jordan also had a nice night , scoring 14 points and pulling down 16 rebounds despite the loss . Phoenix will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday , while Dallas will see the Sacramento Kings on Sunday .

The Suns continued to fight and pushed right down to the wire , as they outscored the Nuggets by eight point in the quarter . The Detroit Pistons defeated the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 98 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Thursday . It was a close contest through the first 24 minutes , with the Suns ( 17 - 56 ) taking a narrow two - point lead into halftime , but from that point on , it was all Pistons ( 37 - 34 ) . More specifically , the fourth quarter was all Detroit , as the team wasted no time rattling off a 17 - 2 run over the course of four minutes to put the game away . It was a complete team effort from the Pistons , with seven different players scoring in double figures Thursday night . Blake Griffin put together yet another terrific all - around performance with 17 points , seven rebounds and eight assists in 31 minutes while Andre Drummond posted a monster double - double of 16 points and 19 rebounds . Luke Kennard matched Drummond 's 16 points in 25 minutes off the bench . As for the Suns , it was their second straight loss and fourth in five games . They shot a decent percentage from the field Thursday , going 48 percent from the field , but they committed a staggering 19 turnovers . That , combined with giving up 19 offensive rebounds , led to Detroit getting 17 more shooting possessions . Devin Booker lead the way with a game - high 26 points , while DeAndre Ayton posted 20 points and eight rebounds .
