The Sacramento Kings defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 131 - 120 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Sunday evening . With their surprisingly high - powered offensive performances over the first three games , the Kings ( 1 - 2 ) have seemingly caught the rest of the NBA off guard . The latest team to fall victim to their high - scoring prowess was the Thunder ( 0 - 3 ) , which failed to notch their first win of the season despite the debut of Russell Westbrook ( knee ) . The perennial All-Star unexpectedly logged 35 minutes despite not having had the benefit of a training camp or preseason and racked up 35 points , 12 rebounds and eight assists . However , Sacramento saw every member of their first unit post double - digit scoring totals and shot a blistering 55 percent overall , including 46 percent from three - point range . In contrast , the majority of OKC 'S offense ran through Westbrook and Paul George , and as a team , they only mustered a 23 percent success rate from behind the arc . Iman Shumpert drew the start and led the Kings with 26 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , three rebounds , three steals and two blocks . De'Aaron Fox supplied 22 points , 10 assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Buddy Hield pitched in 17 points , five boards and two assists . Willie Cauley-Stein and Marvin Bagley III generated matching 13 - point tallies from the first unit and bench , respectively . Each also brought down seven rebounds . Nemanja Bjelica totaled 12 points , five rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . George followed Westbrook with 29 points , six rebounds , two assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder still logged 32 minutes despite Westbrook 's return and posted 14 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one steal . Hamidou Diallo registered 11 points , two assists , a rebound and two steals . Adams managed 10 points , 14 rebounds , three blocks and two steals . The Kings remain on the road and next tangle with the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday evening , while the Thunder try again for their first win against the Boston Celtics at home on Thursday evening .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Utah Jazz , 122 - 113 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Monday . The final score certainly indicates that the game was a lot closer than it actually was , as the Thunder ( 17 - 8 ) were in full control from start to finish en route to their fifth win in the last six games . After jumping out to an early lead , Oklahoma_City never looked back and took a 24 - point lead into the fourth quarter . While the visiting Jazz ( 13 - 15 ) had a big final period and tried to make a push , they never had a legit chance to win Monday 's game . Paul George 's impressive stretch continued , as the swingman scored a game - high 31 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting from the field in just 30 minutes . Russell Westbrook struggled mightily from the field , going just 4 - of - 18 and scoring 12 points , but 11 rebounds and 10 assists gave the point guard yet another triple - double . Dennis Schroder , however , made up for Westbrook 's struggles in a big way , coming off the bench to score 23 points in 30 minutes . As for the Jazz , this was their second straight loss as the team 's up - and - down season continues . They had six different players score in double figures , but Donovan Mitchell scored just 19 points to lead Utah in scoring . Rudy Gobert added a double - double of 13 points and 14 rebounds , but for the most part , Utah 's starters were a no - show Monday night . As a team , the Jazz shot a solid 51 percent from the field , but they could n't get anything going from behind the arc , going just 8 - of - 29 from long range .

The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 138 - 128 , in overtime at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Thursday . It was a close finish in regulation , as Russell Westbrook knocked down three last - second free - throws to tie the game at 122 . Overtime , however , was a different story , as the Lakers ( 25 - 21 ) took off on a 16 - 6 run . Sophomore Lonzo Ball kickstarted the run by winning a jump ball and knocking down a deep three - pointer . OKC ( 26 - 18 ) , meanwhile , struggled to find offense late in the game . Westbrook could not buy a basket throughout , finishing the night shooting just 7 - of - 30 . LA won its second straight despite the absence of LeBron James ( groin ) . Sophomore forward Kyle Kuzma continued to excel , leading the team with 34 points . LA saw strong play from the entirety of its young core , as Brandon Ingram notched a team - high 11 assists while Ball added another 10 assists and 18 points . OKC , meanwhile , saw a triple - double from Westbrook despite his poor shooting night . The former MVP tallied 26 points , 13 assists , and 10 rebounds . Steven Adams added a 17 - point , 17 - rebound double - double , while Paul George led the team with 27 points . The loss dropped the Thunder to 1 - 5 in its last six . On Saturday , the Lakers will visit Houston while the Thunder will travel to Philadelphia .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 131 - 123 , at Target Center on Friday evening . The first quarter was a back - and - forth affair , with both the Timberwolves ( 1 - 1 ) and Cavaliers ( 0 - 2 ) finding the net often while scoring a combined 62 points . Minnesota created distance by outscoring Cleveland , 39 - 24 , in the second period , leading to a comfortable 71 - 54 halftime advantage . However , Cleveland stayed on the attack , shaving eight points off their deficit with a 41 - point explosion coming out of intermission . The visitors got as close as 127 - 123 with 47 seconds remaining following a Cedi Osman three - pointer , but Jimmy Butler accounted for the final four points with a pullup jumper and a pair of free throws to seal the win . Kevin Love paced the Cavaliers with a 25 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and one block . Osman finished with 22 points , eight assists and one steal . Jordan Clarkson contributed a bench - leading 19 points and supplemented them with four assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Tristan Thompson generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . First-round pick Collin Sexton matched Thompson 's scoring total in 23 minutes off the bench . Butler led the Timberwolves with a game - high 33 points . He also managed seven rebounds , three assists , four steals and two blocks . Andrew Wiggins supplied 22 points , three boards , two assists and three steals . Taj Gibson ( 13 points , eight rebounds , two assists ) and Karl-Anthony Towns ( 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists , four blocks ) provided important complementary production on the starting five . Derrick Rose led the bench with 12 points , eight assists and four rebounds . The Cavaliers next tangle with the Hawks in a Sunday evening home contest , while the Timberwolves are back in action Saturday night against the Dallas Mavericks at American Airlines Center .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 100 - 87 , at Target Center on Sunday afternoon . The Grizzlies ( 10 - 5 ) seem to be leaving their awful 2017 - 18 season in the rear view as they delivered another strong effort to defeat the Timberwolves ( 7 - 10 ) , putting themselves near the top of the Western Conference echelon and sitting five games over the .500 mark while also ending Minnesota 's three - game winning streak . The T'Wolves jumped to a three - point lead after the first quarter ( 20 - 17 ) , but Memphis would flip the script in the subsequent two quarters , winning them 30 - 23 and 28 - 19 , respectively . The final quarter saw Minnesota put up a fight , but it was n't enough and Memphis ended cruising their way towards a rather comfortable 13 - point win away from home . Marc Gasol had a spectacular performance and led the Grizzlies offensively with 26 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and three blocks in 36 minutes of action . Mike Conley came one assist shy of a double - double thanks to 18 points and nine assists , while Jaren Jackson Jr. ended with 13 points despite playing only 19 minutes . Shelvin Mack delivered 12 points off the bench . Despite coming off the bench , Derrick Rose led the way for the Timberwolves on offense after finishing with 18 points , three rebounds and three assists in 30 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns posted a strong double - double of 15 points and 20 rebounds , while Robert Covington delivered 15 points and four steals . Andrew Wiggins had 14 points , but only shot 6 - of - 18 from the field . Dario Saric also contributed with 14 points coming off the bench .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves in overtime , 123 - 120 , at Target Center on Friday . While there were only three ties in the first three quarters , it took an extra session to determine a winner in this tightly - contested game . In fact , there were four ties and seven lead changes in the fourth quarter and overtime alone , as it came down to the final shot . Atlanta ended the game strong though , finishing on an 8 - 3 run to take control . Defensive rebounding was critical for the Hawks , as they won that battle , 41 - 31 . Atlanta 's three - point shooting was also huge , as they connected on 16 - of - 35 while Minnesota hit just 11 - of - 32 . Free-throw shooting was the Timberwolves downfall , as they hit just 21 - of - 38 . The Hawks ( 10 - 24 ) were led by Kent Bazemore , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals before fouling out . John Collins also fouled out , as he finished with 21 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . DeWayne Dedmon amassed 19 points and 13 boards while Trae Young accumulated 16 points , four rebounds and 11 assists . The Timberwolves ( 16 - 19 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 31 points , 19 rebounds , five assists and three blocks on 10 - of - 17 shooting . Robert Covington accrued 28 points , seven rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Derrick Rose collected 25 points , three rebounds and nine assists . Andrew Wiggins amassed 16 points , six rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Atlanta has a quick turnaround , as they play host to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday . As for Minnesota , they travel to South Beach to play the Miami Heat on Sunday for their next outing .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Orlando Magic , 120 - 103 , at Target Center on Friday evening . The Magic ( 17 - 21 ) may have caught the host Timberwolves ( 18 - 21 ) a bit by surprise early , as they ambushed them out of the gates to the tune of a 40 - 31 first - quarter lead . That seemed to serve as a wake - up call for Minnesota , however , as they would go on to outscore their visitors by an 89 - 63 margin the rest of the way . Despite the double - digit margin of victory , the T-Wolves clearly dominated in only one area , that being rebounding - - they won the battle of the boards over Orlando by a 54 - 35 margin . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic with 22 points , adding seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Evan Fournier followed with 21 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Terrence Ross followed with a bench - leading 13 points and supplemented them with two rebounds and one assist . Jonathan Isaac and Aaron Gordon turned in 10 points and three rebounds apiece , with Gordon also dishing out six assists . Karl-Anthony Towns paced the Timberwolves with a 29 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Jeff Teague managed 23 points , 10 assists , two rebounds and one steal . Andrew Wiggins poured in 16 points . Taj Gibson generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Anthony Tolliver led the second unit with 11 points and also offered four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Dario Saric contributed 10 points . The Magic remain on the road and visit the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday afternoon , while the Timberwolves remain home and host the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday afternoon as well .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 116 - 114 , at Target Center on Sunday . While Minnesota came into this game as a sizable favorite , it was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , Derrick Rose hit a fadeaway jumper with 1 seconds left to break a tied game , as T.J. Warren missed a three at the buzzer to give Minnesota their victory . There were eight ties and 14 lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Rebounding was big for the Timberwolves , as they outrebounded the Suns , 44 - 39 . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with Minnesota connecting on 32 - of - 40 and Phoenix hitting 22 - of - 32 . The Suns ( 11 - 37 ) were led by Warren , as he finished with 21 points , four rebounds and two steals . Devin Booker accumulated 18 points , six rebounds and six assists . Dragan Bender started in the absence of DeAndre Ayton ( ankle ) , as he amassed 12 points and 10 rebounds . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 18 points , eight rebounds and two steals . The Timberwolves ( 22 - 24 ) were led by Rose , as he provided 32 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench . Karl-Anthony Towns led the starters with 30 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and four steals . Taj Gibson totaled 17 points and five rebounds while Jeff Teague tallied four points , five rebounds and eight assists . These teams will have a rematch on Tuesday for their next outing , as that game will be played in Phoenix .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 111 , at Target Center on Tuesday evening . The Clippers ( 45 - 30 ) deployed one of the best strategies for winning on the road - - they got out to a sizable lead early . Los_Angeles forged a 42 - 23 lead through the first 12 minutes and held a 75 - 55 halftime advantage . The Timberwolves ( 33 - 41 ) did manage to put a nine - point dent in their deficit overall during the second half , but that was n't nearly enough to overtake Los_Angeles . As their final point tally implies , the visitors shot extremely well , draining 54 percent of their attempts , including 50 percent from three - point range . Danilo Gallinari paced the Clippers with a 25 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Lou Williams followed with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Montrezl Harrell delivered 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Garrett Temple supplied 15 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Patrick Beverley and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander contributed 11 and 10 points , respectively . Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves with a 24 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two steals . Andrew Wiggins poured in 22 points and added three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Dario Saric furnished 18 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Tyus Jones managed 13 points , eight assists and two rebounds . Josh Okogie and Jerryd Bayless managed nine points apiece . The Clippers remain on the road and next visit the Milwaukee Bucks on Thursday evening , while the Timberwolves remain home to tangle with the Golden State Warriors on Friday night .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors in overtime 131 - 130 , at Target Center on Friday . This game was full of swings , as it was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , Stephen Curry hit a game - tying three with 0 seconds left in OT but they fouled Minnesota on the inbound in the following possession . That allowed Karl-Anthony Towns to nail the game - winning free - throw , who then missed the second free - throw intentionally to run out the clock . There were nine ties and 12 lead changes in total , as Minnesota never trailed in the OT . Rebounding was the clear - cut difference , with the Timberwolves outrebounding the Warriors , 59 - 45 . Their bench also came up big , outscoring Golden_State 's bench , 52 - 25 . The Warriors ( 51 - 24 ) were led by Stephen Curry , as he went 11 - of - 19 from long range to tally 37 points , three rebounds , five assists and two steals . As for Golden_State , they return to action on Sunday against the Charlotte Hornets .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 121 - 108 , at Moda Center on Saturday evening . The hard - fought contest fittingly began with a 22 - 22 deadlock over the first 12 minutes . However , the Trail_Blazers ( 20 ) outscored the Spurs ( 1 - 1 ) by a 75 - 60 margin over the second and third quarters to gain distance , and they then held serve over the final 12 minutes to post the double - digit victory . Shooting was a key to the win , with Portland draining an impressive 54 percent of their attempts and San_Antonio managing a 42 percent success rate from the field . As customary , a significant portion of the Blazers offense flowed through their backcourt , as the star duo of Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum combining for 53 points on identical 9 - for - 15 shooting efforts . DeMar DeRozan paced the Spurs with 28 points , a total he supplemented with nine assists , three rebounds and two steals . Bryn Forbes was a distant second with 17 points and added three assists and two rebounds . LaMarcus Aldridge and Rudy Gay contributed matching 12 - point tallies , with the veteran duo also hauling in eight and seven rebounds , respectively . Davis Bertans ( 11 points ) and Paul Gasol ( 10 points ) were productive off the bench . Lillard 's 29 points led the Trail_Blazers , and he also contributed nine assists and two rebounds . McCollum followed with 24 points and a pair of assists and rebounds apiece . Jusuf Nurkic offered 12 points , eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu went for 10 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . Zach Collins led the bench with 11 points . The Spurs remain on their West Coast swing and next face the Lakers on Monday night , while the Trail_Blazers remain home and tangle with the Washington Wizards on Monday evening as well .
The Trail_Blazers ( 14 - 11 ) were seemingly set up for success Thursday , considering they were back on their home floor and facing a significantly short - handed Suns ( 4 - 21 ) squad . Both Devin Booker ( hamstring ) and T.J. Warren ( ankle ) were out for Phoenix , while first overall pick Deandre Ayton was bumped to the second unit in favor of Richaun Holmes . The disparity between the two clubs was evident from the opening tip , as Portland jumped out to a jaw - dropping 34 - 9 first - quarter lead . The Blazers ultimately built a 62 - 41 halftime advantage and cruised through the second half as well . As the final score implies , they won the battle in the majority of categories handily , including a significant 56 - 41 edge in the rebounding department . Troy Daniels led the Suns in the rout with 15 points off the bench . Justin Jackson followed with 14 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three steals . Elie Okobo and Ayton followed with matching 11 - point tallies . Okobo added five rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block , while Ayton brought down eight rebounds , dished out three assists , and recorded both a steal and a block . Holmes finished with nine points , four rebounds and one assist . Damian Lillard paced the Trail_Blazers with 25 points , adding eight assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Jake Layman followed with a bench - leading 24 points , complementing them with seven rebounds and two steals . Zach Collins poured in 10 points , while Jusuf Nurkic mustered nine points , 14 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . The Suns return home to tangle with the Miami Heat on Friday night , while the Trail_Blazers remain home and face the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday evening .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , in overtime at Moda Center on Sunday evening . The Mavs got out to a good start on the road , with an early 10 - 4 lead , before taking a 27 - 25 lead into the second quarter . However , the home squad turned it on in the second , where they outscored the Mavs by 12 , to take a 62 - 52 lead by halftime . The Trail_Blazers maintained a double - digit lead through most of the third quarter but the Mavs pushed to make it an eight - point game heading into the fourth . The Mavericks kept fighting and managed to trim the deficit to just two points with four minutes left . They traded baskets down the stretch , culminated by a super - clutch three - pointer by Luka Doncic to send the game to overtime , tied at 107 . Nonetheless , the Trail_Blazers took control with an early lead in OT and stayed a step ahead the rest of the way . Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 33 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one block , in 39 minutes . C.J. McCollum added 22 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal , while Meyers Leonard chipped in 13 points and six rebounds , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Blazers shot 47 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 38 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavs with 27 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , and one assist , in 35 minutes . Luka Doncic followed up with 23 points , 11 rebounds and six assists , in 35 minutes . DeAndre Jordan finished with 14 points , 10 rebounds and one assist . The Mavs ( 15 - 17 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pelicans on Wednesday . The Trail_Blazers ( 19 - 14 ) take on the Jazz in Utah on Christmas Day .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 127 - 96 , at Moda Center on Friday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a solid start at home , with a 37 - 27 lead after one quarter . They kept up the momentum through the second , where they outscored the visitors by 11 , to take a 70 - 49 lead into halftime . The Hornets had no answer in the second half , as they were outscored 31 - 19 in the third quarter , before finally putting up a bit of resistance in the fourth . However , it was too little , too late , as the Trail_Blazers cruised to their fourth straight win . C.J. McCollum led Portland with 30 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 28 minutes . Damian Lillard followed up with 20 points , five assists , four rebounds , four blocks and three steals , while Evan Turner chipped 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 21 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 18 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting , three rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 31 minutes . Jeremy Lamb followed up with 15 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Nicolas Batum added eight points , five rebounds and two assists . The Miami Heat defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 118 - 108 , at Moda Center on Tuesday evening . Tuesday 's contest was shaping up to be a close one until the third quarter , when Dwyane Wade turned back the clock to help Miami ( 25 - 27 ) pull away . The future Hall of Famer scored eight points in the last four minutes of the quarter , extending the Heat 's lead to as much as 15 . The Trail_Blazers ( 32 - 21 ) were unable to come back despite a valiant effort early in the fourth from Jake Layman and the second unit . Wade finished the win with 22 points and nine rebounds . While Wade anchored the second unit , the starters relied heavily on Hassan Whiteside . The star big man finished with a team - high 28 points on 11 - of - 12 shooting and also grabbed four steals and two blocks . As a whole , the Heat shot a whopping 54 percent from the floor , despite hitting only seven three - pointers . Portland , meanwhile , saw a game - high 33 points from C.J. McCollum . McCollum 's strong night helped to partially offset a poor shooting performance from Damian Lillard , who went just 5 - of - 15 from the field in the loss . Off the bench , Jake Layman pitched in another 25 points and eight rebounds . Portland will suit up again on Thursday as the Trail_Blazers play host to the San Antonio Spurs . Miami , meanwhile , will continue its West Coast road trip with a visit to Sacramento on Friday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 131 - 121 , at Oracle Arena on Wednesday . The Warriors ( 8 - 1 ) managed to survive a track meet in the Bay Area on Wednesday , and they earned their sixth straight victory in the process . Steph Curry was , yet again , sensational , scoring a game - high 37 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting from behind the arc and 12 - of - 20 shooting overall . He also dished out a game - high nine assists , barely edging out teammates Kevin Durant and Draymond Green , who each recorded eight . Durant finished with 24 points , while Green posted a very impressive stat line of 16 points , 14 rebounds and eight assists in 34 minutes . As a team , the Warriors consistently found ways to get open looks from three , and it paid off , as they shot 16 - of - 32 ( 50 percent ) from long range . As for the Pelicans ( 4 - 3 ) , they put up a good fight , but were unable to close the gap over the course of the second half . Jrue Holiday was the driving force behind the team 's offense Wednesday night , as he scored a team - high 28 points to go along with nine assists in 42 minutes . It was a rough night , however , for superstar Anthony Davis , who did n't appear to be 100 percent healthy after missing the previous game with an elbow injury . Davis had just 17 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting and 12 rebounds in 41 minutes . Nikola Mirotic and E'Twaun Moore did an adequate job picking up the slack , scoring 26 and 21 points respectively . Up next , the Warriors will remain home to play the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Pelicans will head to Portland on Thursday to take on the Trail Blazers .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 129 - 127 , at Oracle Arena on Sunday . There were 20 ties and 13 lead changes in this game , as it was n't decided until the final shot . In fact , Avery Bradley recorded a dunk with 10 seconds left to tie the game but Stephen Curry countered that by hitting one of his patented lay - ups with 0 seconds left to win the game . Los_Angeles lost this game despite having the best three - point shooting game of the season , as they connected on 18 - of - 23 from long range . The key for the Warriors was free - throw shooting , as they hit 31 - of - 36 while the Clippers connected on 23 - of - 29 . Defense was also critical , with Golden_State picking up nine steals and eight blocks while Los_Angeles had just one apiece . Offensive rebounding was also decisive , with the Warriors winning that battle , 15 - 5 . The Clippers ( 19 - 14 ) were led by Tobias Harris , as he tallied 32 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Danilo Gallinari amassed 25 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Lou Williams was huge off the bench , as he provided 25 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Montrezl Harrell also played well off the bench , amassing 13 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Warriors ( 23 - 11 ) were led by Stephen Curry , as he collected 42 points , six rebounds and two assists . Kevin Durant accumulated 35 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Draymond Green finished with 14 points , four rebounds , six assists and five steals . Kevon Looney led their bench with 10 points and seven boards . On deck for Golden_State is a Christmas Day showdown against the Los_Angeles Lakers on Tuesday . As for the Clippers , they return to action on Wednesday when they play host to the Sacramento Kings .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Golden_State Warriors , 127 - 101 , on Christmas Day at Oracle Arena . It was a marquee matchup between two of the Western Conference 's top teams on Christmas . Ultimately , however , it was not the Warriors ' ( 23 - 12 ) night , as the team shot just 41 percent en route to a blowout loss . Struggles compounded for Golden_State , as each of the team 's four active All-Stars performed poorly in the loss . The team saw a dismal final quarter , culminating in Draymond Green fouling out with only four points scored on the night . It was a big win for the Lakers , who now sit at fourth in the Western Conference standings . All did not go as hoped for Los_Angeles ( 20 - 14 ) , though , as superstar LeBron James exited the game in the third quarter with a left groin strain . James did not return to action , though his team saw plenty of success in his absence . LA , without LeBron on the court , outscored Golden_State 36 - 19 in the fourth quarter . LA saw a true team effort as it took down the defending champions . Seven players scored in double digits for the Lakers , and the team tallied 27 total assists . Kyle Kuzma led the team in scoring with 19 points , while veteran point guard Rajon Rondo delivered 15 points and 10 assists in just 23 minutes of action . Golden_State , meanwhile , was led by a season - best 23 points from Andre Iguodala . Iduodala 's vintage performance was not enough to help his team , though , as the Warriors shot just 41 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . It was a particularly poor showing for Klay Thompson and Draymond Green , who combined to shoot just 4 - of - 14 while committing six turnovers on the night . Next on the agenda for the Lakers is a visit to Sacramento on Thursday . Golden_State , meanwhile , will gear up to host the Portland Trail Blazers later this week .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 135 - 134 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday evening . The Warriors got out to a great start at home with a 34 - 22 lead after one quarter and expanded their lead to 70 - 53 by halftime . The Rockets turned it up in the third quarter and outscored the Warriors by 11 , to cut the deficit to six at the start of the fourth . They kept the pressure on through the fourth and managed to tie the game in the final second of regulation thanks to pure heroics from James Harden . The Rockets scored the first points in OT , but the Warriors battled back and held a two - point lead with five seconds remaining . However , Harden had more magic left in his bag , as he drilled a seemingly impossible game - winning three - pointer over two Warriors defenders to steal the win on the road . Harden led the Rockets with 44 points , 15 assists , 10 rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 44 minutes . Clint Capela followed up with 29 points , 21 rebounds , two steals , one assist and one block , while Austin Rivers added 18 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 21 - of - 54 from long range . Meanwhile , Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 35 points , six assists and three rebounds , in 40 minutes . Kevin Durant finished with 26 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one block , while Klay Thompson tallied 26 points , five rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks . The Warriors shot 38 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 37 from long range . The Warriors ( 25 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Saturday . The Rockets ( 22 - 15 ) will look for their eighth straight win as they take on the Trail Blazers in Portland on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the Miami Heat , 120 - 118 , in a down - to - the - wire tilt at Oracle Arena on Sunday . Miami ( 25 - 29 ) caught Golden_State ( 40 - 15 ) off guard , jumping out to a 26 - 7 lead in the first quarter thanks to a flurry of perimeter offense . The Heat saw three quick three - pointers from Josh Richardson , who had the hot hand all night as he scored 37 points . Hassan Whiteside also contributed early for Miami , scoring six points off of offensive rebounds in the first quarter . However , the defending champs fought back in characteristic fashion . The Warriors delivered a classic third - quarter thrashing , pouring in 36 points to erase Miami 's lead . Golden_State held onto the lead thanks to a number of crunch - time shots from Kevin Durant , who led all scorers with 39 points . The All-Star backcourt of Klay Thompson and Steph Curry also impressed in the win , pitching in 54 combined points for the Warriors . Draymond Green took on a playmaking role in the Golden_State offense , dishing out a season - high 14 assists on the night . It was a quiet night on offense for DeMarcus Cousins , who scored just seven points while pulling down only three rebounds . Cousins was a disruptive force defensively , though , logging three blocks and two steals . The Heat saw 24 points from Dion Waiters , who shot 9 - of - 19 from the field . It was also a big night for Justise Winslow , who poured in 22 points to go with six rebounds and four assists . Next on the agenda for Miami is a trip to Denver , where they will play the second half of a back - to - back on Monday . Golden_State , meanwhile , is set to host the Utah Jazz on Tuesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Utah Jazz , 115 - 108 , at Oracle Arena on Tuesday evening . Utah ( 32 - 25 ) seemed ready to test the Warriors ' ( 41 - 15 ) dominance , holding a lead until late in the fourth quarter . The Jazz 's top - five defense shined in the loss , limiting Golden_State 's high - powered offense to 81 points through three quarters . However , Utah was unable to hold onto the game late , as Golden_State poured in 34 fourth - quarter points to earn the victory . Steph Curry , who finished with 24 points , helped to seal the win in the final five minutes , knocking down a pull - up three - pointer and an ensuing layup to put Golden_State up 10 . Kevin Durant was the game 's high scorer with 28 points . Durant also tallied seven assists in the win . Klay Thompson scored another 22 points , while DeMarcus Cousins contributed 12 points , 10 rebounds , and five assists . The Warriors shot over 49 percent from the field and knocked down 13 three - pointers . The Jazz were led by 25 points from sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell , who shot a dismal 10 - of - 29 from the field . Outside of Mitchell , Utah was remarkably efficient . The Jazz finished shooting over 47 percent from the field . Rudy Gobert had a double - double , finishing with 13 points and 16 rebounds . The Jazz will have two days of rest before enjoying the All-Star break , while Golden_State will travel to Portland to tangle with the Trail Blazers on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Denver Nuggets , 116 - 102 , at Oracle Arena on Tuesday . Tuesday 's tilt had big stakes , as the Nuggets ( 51 - 26 ) entered the contest just one game behind the Warriors ( 53 - 24 ) for first place in the West . Golden_State made quick work of the competition , though , hopping out to an early double - digit lead and never looking back . Denver trailed by double - digits for the entirety of the second half , shooting only 38 percent from the floor en route to the blowout loss . With their win , the Warriors now have a two game lead for first in the West with just five games remaining . The Warriors were led by 28 points and 12 rebounds from All-Star center DeMarcus Cousins . Kevin Durant tacked on another 21 points as the Warriors shot a blistering 54 percent from the floor in the win . Draymond Green finished with nine rebounds and nine assists , and five Warriors in total scored in double figures . Jamal Murray scored 17 points for Denver , making him the lone Nuggets player to score more than 11 points . Superstar big man Nikola Jokic was limited to 4 - of - 10 shooting and six turnovers . The team as a whole hit only seven three - pointers and committed 15 turnovers . Denver will host San Antonio on Wednesday , while the Warriors take on the Lakers in LA on Thursday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 106 , at Capital One Arena on Wednesday night . The Wizards ( 17 - 25 ) were coming off a significant loss to the 76ers ( 27 - 15 ) just 24 hours earlier , but they opened Wednesday 's contest ready to extract some revenge . Washington had forged a 63 - 48 lead by halftime , and they made sure to keep their foot on the gas in the second half . The home squad shot a stellar 54 percent , including 48 percent from three - point range . The Wizards also played some impressive defense for a change , forcing 24 turnovers and limiting the Sixers to a 30 percent success rate from three - point range . Joel Embiid was a bright spot for the 76ers , posting a 35 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three blocks and one steal . Jimmy Butler provided 23 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two steals . Furkan Korkmaz furnished 16 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Ben Simmons supplied 15 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists and two steals . The 76ers now head back home to face the Atlanta Hawks on Friday night , while the Wizards remain home to tangle with the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday night .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New_York Knicks , 101 - 100 , at O2 Arena in London on Thursday . The Wizards ( 19 - 26 ) and the Knicks ( 10 - 34 ) played this game on a neutral arena and there is no doubt they gave fans an unbelieveable showdown that went down to the wire , as this game was decided with a lay - up in the final second of regulation . The Knicks got off to an impressive start , though , winning the first quarter by 10 points ( 30 - 20 ) and extending their lead in the upcoming two quarters ( 33 - 33 and 26 - 24 , respectively ) so they entered the final 12 minutes of action up by a considerable 12 - point margin . However , the Wizards came alive in the final quarter and not only they won that frame by 13 points ( 24 - 11 ) but they also did it in style : the Wizards won this game thanks to a Thomas Bryant lay - up with only 0 seconds left on the clock . Six Washington players ended the game scoring over 10 points and Bradley Beal was the team 's top scorer with 26 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Tomas Satoransky had 14 points and five assists , while Trevor Ariza filled the stat sheet thanks to 12 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Otto Porter Jr. had an impressive effort off the bench since he chipped in with 20 points and 11 boards . Emmanuel Mudiay led the way for the Knicks with 25 points and seven rebounds . Luke Kornet chipped in with 16 points and five steals , while Noah Vonleh contributed with a strong double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds . Allonzo Trier and Damyean Dotson each had 13 points coming off the bench . Kevin Knox was a disappointment , however , as the rookie only had five points while shooting 2 - 11 from the field .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 135 - 128 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday night . The Wizards ( 30 - 40 ) have developed a reputation for plenty of offense and very little defense , while the visiting Grizzlies ( 28 - 42 ) are essentially known for being their diametric opposite . The first half of that narrative held true Saturday , while the second portion was completely disproven , at least for one night . Memphis exploded for 71 first - half points , but they also were uncharacteristically generous in yielding 69 to Washington . Neither team showed the slightest hint of fatigue following intermission , but the hosts were just a bit better defensively while outscoring the visitors by a 66 - 57 margin in the third and fourth quarters . As the final score implies , each squad shot particularly well , draining over 50 percent of their respective attempts . Mike Conley paced the Grizzlies with 28 points , adding 12 assists and three rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas furnished 22 points , eight boards , three assists and one block . Avery Bradley poured in 21 points and also posted five assists and two rebounds . Chandler Parsons delivered 16 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . Joakim Noah turned in 15 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block . Bradley Beal led the Wizards with 40 points and complemented them with seven assists , five rebounds and two steals . Jabari Parker generated a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Bobby Portis collected 18 points , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Jeff Green totaled 15 points , three assists and one rebound . Tomas Satoransky overcame a head injury to start and contribute 15 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Thomas Bryant tallied 10 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . The Grizzlies head back home and take on the Houston Rockets on Wednesday night , while the Wizards remain home and take on the Utah Jazz on Monday evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Washington Wizards , 116 - 110 , at Capital One Arena on Tuesday . The Celtics ( 49 - 33 ) and the Wizards ( 32 - 50 ) both played their regular - season finale although both clubs had different objectives in mind - - while the Celtics had already clinched a playoff berth and are vying for home - field advantage in the first round of the postseason , Washington has been eliminated from quite a while and only wanted this season to come to an end . But despite the difference on both team 's approach , this turned out to be a very competitive contest . The Wizards managed to jump to a 14 - point lead in the first quarter ( 39 - 25 ) but Boston responded with a 38 - 25 second quarter so the Wizards only had a one - point lead at the break . It seemed Washington would break free once again following a 31 - 26 third quarter , but Boston won the final 12 minutes by an expressive 27 - 15 and that notched them the win . The Celtics rested several starters for this game and Terry Rozier was the top scorer since he finished with 21 points , four rebounds and four assists . Semi Ojeleye had 17 points , four boards and three assists . Jaylen Brown contributed with 15 points but also filled the stat sheet with three steals , three rebounds and two assists . Both Brad Wanamaker and R.J. Hunter had 17 points , although Wanamaker also added six boards and seven assists . Tomas Satoransky led the way for the Wizards with 19 points , while Bradley Beal delivered 16 points , five boards and four assists . Thomas Bryant had 14 points with six rebounds , and ended with an impressive 22 in 17 minutes . Bobby Portis had 11 points , while Devin Robinson contributed 14 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench .
